user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Michael Sebok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6zerS98oHlrnjvbdwact2nAA0hnPE-92faWiO0f5lUQorHD12=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best place to get a cut in Denver, hands down.
Abo is the best. He's been cutting my hair for around 18 years.
My only complaint is that I used to be able to walk in anytime.
They are doing so good that I now need an appointment at least a month out.
Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7WFIYi0wvuLanUM08g948A9jAvU5LQPO0Nx6xaP3LWEUYxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the first barber I ever went to since moving to Denver in 2021, and I've seen no reason to go elsewhere. David is my guy here. Overall, everyone here is cool. Thankfully the guy at the end who felt everyone should share the same political views as he, has left.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yisroel Goldbaum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8wNwu0itsQym-LMtBzr-K4xnZVSD5oV_sqjm-xxVmrRgVMcnkAw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing service. Top notch haircuts and attention to detail from master barbers. You walk out of Alanis barber shop feeling like a million bucks and looking even better!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tabian Waddle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3OVU8dTsATQ_HN6xjHP9ckPUUW5p3hgenYpGFksNR6efNveMa=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is great.   Immaculate vibes, the barbershop you need to attend.   If you’re not going here, you’re missing out.  I always get in with my boy Lucca when I’m in Denver, never disappoints.   Very chill & easy to talk to.    Great at what he does.    I highly recommend this shop, and Lucca himself.   I’ll be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Roberto Ocana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZ-AcJnzZUdTaFlOPI5i4DwcnH7EIe3EVOU-YhbioROvoESg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Liked this place. Just not my first choice anymore.  Prices are comparable but service is more about quantity than quality. They literally try to get you in and out under 20 minutes. Part of going to the barbershop is the banter and conversation. Hard to do that with limited time.  Feels like a factory rather than community. Would rather pay $45 to another shop that is not so rushed. That’s what it costs to go to the barbershop nowadays. When I first started going 7 years ago it was $23. Crazy!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ricky Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVa2ZQ7_99vXSpUDCAT7oLA-ou_NP1lU8otsEaaXj5pav42M0mQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alfanis is the best barber shop in Denver! David gives a great cut ... all staff members are very nice and accommodating . Highly recommend !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Avis Blankenship","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGrtF0IAUDEqjJpNFkiUKIfvHqgbXy0y970PvX5gAoBkN_COg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I arrived 5 minutes late to an appointment that I had failed to finalize on line. Alfanis' staff graciously stepped up, made a phone call, and in 10 minutes, I was seated for another great cut from Maria. Many Thanks.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan Sacco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYaAVAVsQ6KHxAP-OONRI0IyqJgm9tySf45o_ACpvu7_CvZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"No matter who I go to here it’s always an amazing haircut. He even started doing my 19 month old son and it comes out perfect every time. love these guys have been going here for 5+ years.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Henry Hampton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXicHUVlI1YFeDRpnlHIXYsdWVd_tIriir2JX5m0_xo_xQyNeoS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super awesome guys cuts here.. very friendly local easy going staff.. super easy to book. Stress free environment. If I’m ever in Denver again this I where I will go!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOum6FddGwN7FtzMVu0J8V2CR20Exo3k3NapHIR&fid=0x0:0xf33451651f76c42b"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Drew Trattler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGGGiiVp6-DV0SQ9rtVTvC13bPcICafmkPjh9QNxm49yChtA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been coming here for the past 6+ years and it’s always the best! Easy to schedule, very fair price, great music, great conversations and top tier cuts every time!
Would recommend highly Giovanni and his team!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"steven england","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-5Ak8gz48kPBRD-TssO5bdU4kihKylRGVQ6Wi42db_GOLtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time visiting this shop.  It was clean and has easily accessible public on the street parking.  I love that the experience was not over-hyped and was lowkey.  Crystal is a rock star! She was professional and gave me a great haircut.  She had great attention to detail.  I highly recommend her and this shop.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan Whedon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8ElBLcZqWWj8d6qp6uo_mYyBuFaHqE-FztViir0NwgyYcsXE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great shop with nice, friendly and personable people. Got a great cut from Crystal and even got to hold onto Bogey the dog during my cut! All within walking distance from my house, a big win! I’ll definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLfFVVOoD4aF_Bn9dKeEajd0tSgK3UkWBCvNz_&fid=0x0:0xf33451651f76c42b"],"When":"2022-3-17"},{"Name":"Jake Kluver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDZyrvx3-s-bPK4MfnpF1VUfm7LSr-qhinMgS_8mJXHP51RQa6Ew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"$30 for a bad cleanup?? I used to love this place and the stylists but it’s not worth it anymore. Came in for a simple back & sides cleanup and left with uneven sideburns and hair sticking out around my ears. Should’ve done it myself at home! I’ll be going elsewhere for my haircuts now.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Douglas Basnight","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxsJQfAmSuSDA2VhZDTJ2SrUd0CEHdzr3LxoSmya-oUH65lUE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this place. Stef is incredible.  He's always ready with a story and a good time chatting while you get a stellar haircut and beard trim. Would highly recommend booking with him.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeff Roy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHt6FgtW5nxBT85cNQz6_Vy2l0e0PDyWmPrDofqeQskaLQx4Zg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place, great price, great barbers. I’ve been looking for a solid spot for a haircut for 2+ years, and always ended up leaving other places feeling just fine, or worse.

Glad I found this spot—Stef did a great job, best haircut I’ve had in years, and I won’t be going anywhere else from here on out.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joel Vernon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXeId1GK5sz-y7UvTRPu66xcmWsBkcjSbFMuefheVAVziNhxpg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best barber shop in Denver hands down!
Great cuts & conversation no matter who’s chair you’re in. I’ve never walked away with a haircut I wasn’t happy with.
Good price, good vibe, and I always feel right at home.
Stef is the man, Gio is too.
I’m so glad I found a shop that treats you like a friend and not just another customer to get out of the way.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Esteban Bustos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLA3aStTpZprzKB5gqcmHB0IuLch35CCYF_Ccuayd3wSDJYu80=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been coming here since I moved to Denver almost two years ago and have never been disappointed. Jade does an amazing job every time. I’ve always been bad about explaining what kind of haircut I want but Jade somehow always understands exactly what I’m talking about and makes it it happen. Also does a great beard! The vibe here is so chill. I’m one of those people that have always felt weird and anxious at a barber shop but everyone here makes you feel so welcomed and relaxed. Cannot recommend Barber X enough!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Selwood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpvoj_URQW6tKWC30dtlPlGkBeegD_rNGacpiHW_jJvwi9Lg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm new to Denver and needed to find a new barber - I did my research by looking at reviews on Google and Yelp and intentionally picked Lauren at BarberX and am really happy with my choice!

Customer Service / Space: I took a spill on my bike on my way to BarberX (completely my fault) and they were able to provide me with a bandage. The option of getting a drink is always nice, even if I didn't partake. Everyone was super nice and friendly. The space is very stylish and modern. For someone like myself that looks for a high quality barbershop that offers not only great barbers but a good experience, BarberX certainly hits the mark.

Haircut: I chose Lauren based on her good reviews across the board and she was great! Very personable and very knowledgeable. I am currently aiming for a new hair style but don't really know how to go about achieving it myself. Lauren was really great at listening to what I envisioned, answering my questions or explaining things I didn't know about how to achieve my desired hairstyle, and bringing that to life. The haircut itself was great! Additionally, for this new style it will be a process as my hair continues to grow, and Lauren was great about explaining that, making notes in my profile for next time (I love the attention to detail and customer service with making notes like this), and explaining what I can do in the meantime to help me along that process. Definitely will be back to see Lauren!

Overall: Great experience! 10/10 would recommend. Not the cheapest haircut you will find but I think it is priced very appropriately for the quality of haircut and customer service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adam C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWhgWZTyKnqdZT4RRgYZvdhLS96Cfm25hJJ__UyWdz0VKZjg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My regular stop for haircut and style. I see Molly, who is great! I come in almost every other time with a new style to try and she nails it every time. The environment and offerings are nice too. Queer friendly which is a great cherry on top.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Seth Melchor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSe4s69soGpbwC43ABUhIkOhSym6LTh2A4U0VpEvAJAuK114cQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have been going to BarberX for over a year now. Used to live across the street. Even after buying a home and moving further away I still make the trip.

Lauren is fantastic. Great at what she does and enjoy catching up when I get my hair cut. Clean and nice space. Give the team a shot and they’ll take care of you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jake McGuire","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcoTieriT2IyPCDZvZZk199rNnmn9qWH_XNqYbvGU3JKTuPrEt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"BarberX is always a great experience - free parking, super easy online booking and payment, always offered a drink before your haircut. Lauren is AWESOME and always does a great job!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gregory Shields","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhzOjbmr-rDH3Q_-yXuPL1TdLoeuh8knaUJXjLFbiFG-Rh2DSz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lauren is the best! Her attention to detail, skill, and consistency are unmatched. Every visit is not just a haircut but a perfect blend of professionalism and genuine care for her clients. Thank you for always going above and beyond!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rocco Brudno","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeBpZdNj7KQqnIRjAiESG65dfN4cwW2zBbdzuJS_rst6l491YBwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vanessa is the best barber ever. She always is so welcoming, always takes time to help me figure out what look would work best for my hair, and does an amazing job with the cut and style! I always recommend BarberX to anyone I know, best shop in town!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNy7T1BaWSxg_bLuftQlqvqNEBEzPgsJU3zoGfv&fid=0x0:0x1040b378b317b81c"],"When":"2024-1-12"},{"Name":"Michael Paoletta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI1LA1esXzjfeL57qaTIKJLbkuNIV3Mb2WGsy80jm6mdRZRzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was in Denver for work and needed a quick haircut so I decided to try BarberX. I got a great haircut from Molly. She even adjusted the price down from what I originally agreed to pay since my haircut didn't require a full 30 minutes. I highly recommend BarberX to anyone who wants a great haircut in a nice welcoming environment. Thank you Molly it was nice meeting you","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Forrest Simpson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUsfRU94n0wSqkpUJTqz1cMkZOzQV1DAPUDGxzONJucJs8lFg8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wise Guys Barber Shop is fantastic! They give great haircuts at unbeatable prices. The atmosphere is welcoming, and the staff is friendly and professional. The owner even cut my hair, and it was an awesome experience—it's clear he really takes pride in his work and cares about making sure you leave looking your best.

I love supporting small businesses, and Wise Guys is the perfect example of why. It’s a local gem that offers excellent service without breaking the bank. Highly recommend this place if you're looking for a top-quality haircut in a friendly, down-to-earth setting!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brian Papa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvyXzKZpyYu5BbxejulCVBsNF5OFEAb5iIMOi-Vk2NZglooQke4A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best barbershop in Denver!  Came in a couple of months ago for the 1st time after years of crappy cuts around town and Vitaliy nailed it his first time.  He asked lots of questions before cutting , making sure it was exactly as I wanted and cut with confidence and skill.  Been back 3 times and it's perfect every time.  Easy in, easy booking, fantastic cut!  Ask for Vitaliy!  Thks!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"G Serrano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJD1vNEksRzufgdNfpUIfyXWZ0Z7ZzNqDaJysan4ZXHkUTqGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time and I'll definitely be returning. I didn't book an appointment as I was trying them out, however they were able to accommodate & I maybe waited 5 minutes or so. Zoya was kind and is very skilled, I showed her a picture of what I wanted & she nailed it. The environment felt welcoming, comfortable and clean.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"sayed masood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLztokxCAoJKRAUN6t1aRZkGceDSz9zWkfXKWKawqCiwRl8bF9L=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good man very nice gave me five star haircut pick Alex for your hair it’s the best","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNi1xcwktJv0VZIT0k1oLTHKJ5vtpOCbdyAQDxV&fid=0x0:0x108b48d2fbea5f55"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Jocelyn Bencken","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4DY-CQRH626pblK9Ga-zPY7kgy0iPzxEQvF2acTe42dTo7g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alex is the best! He did an excellent job on my cut and design. Got right in. Was quick and his work is solid! Did exactly what I wanted. Looks awesome! I now have a new barber 😁","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOi9KukkzL3sfJLTa8-c_GXtVYFoakscs0O_717&fid=0x0:0x108b48d2fbea5f55"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Todd Van Maldeghem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxKR6NuCOFTJL5bnRgUzRkINddSAMD_oPzXpjobZrdq3b9IdBJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I first met Ariel last month. I was in need of looking sharp for my company Christmas party. I called the Wise Guys Barber shop, Ariel answered the phone and said, "come on through!" I was a last minute walk in, and he did a GREAT job on getting me cleaned up and quick.
Ariel did such a great job, I came back and brought one of my sons with me. Again, Ariel did a great job on both of our us. I think I found my new favorite and regular place. If you live in the area, trust me. This is the place you'll want to get your next hair cut! Not only is every one there wonderful. They're all professional, friendly and very kind.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMpVS47rLbM0ZVRjU77qctdFKkNbj9IlGGc3Uf&fid=0x0:0x108b48d2fbea5f55"],"When":"2023-1-16"},{"Name":"Jared Leggett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNS3bM_sN_KE0IQ7-Tyuwmo5FhURwidsI-ub7EIBdKbqUKfygqBA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I booked an appointment online with a price and they charged me more after the service with. My barber was very quick and didn’t have any attention to detail in cutting my hair. I would not recommend and would not go back. Their marketing online is good and the actual experience doesn’t live up to it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thomas Furlong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIkYF2xgQlF_yRGfFGj4v6ejK0xLT6TkpTCLHuSKgHB-Blr9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alex always makes sure to take care of me been coming here for over 5 years now. Best haircut in the denver metro area. Highly recommend","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: The Rosemont Barbers
open_hours: {"Friday":["10 AM–6:30 PM"],"Monday":["Closed"],"Saturday":["10 AM–5:30 PM"],"Sunday":["10 AM–5:30 PM"],"Thursday":["10 AM–6:30 PM"],"Tuesday":["10 AM–6:30 PM"],"Wednesday":["10 AM–6:30 PM"]}

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tommy Bagwell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxVusLdo9XKtdHtpb1o6uuRNb00a7kyGNC7M_UfQ2dmBZE0w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Brian Popp is hands down the best barber I’ve ever had cut my hair! The precision, skill, and attention to detail he brings to every haircut are truly unmatched. Every time I sit in his chair, I know I’m about to walk out looking and feeling amazing. Not only is he incredibly talented, but he also creates such a welcoming and enjoyable environment. Great conversation, great energy, and an all-around fantastic human.

I can’t recommend him highly enough—if you’re looking for the best haircut of your life, Brian is the one to see!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Francis Wright","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxRslZtLK-ZOhtX6mhbSy6mPfuLUWqqlzr0erFQ8RgvUNo9w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This establishment provides fantastic haircuts that are high-quality and thoughtfully personalized.   All of my haircuts have been phenomenal, and every member of the staff is welcoming and friendly. Zach is my go to barber. He is friendly, cool, and his haircuts are top-notch. He’s also very knowledgeable about all types of hair products and styling accessories. The shop’s atmosphere is great too, with a pleasant amount of sunshine coming in and nice windows.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mitchell Luti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9jBKp-QN3ednummNWB9ENXp4zwQ-NNrjCwtcKMJeM-3xw_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Izzy and the rest of the Rosemont Barbers are the best in the business. In a short time, I have developed absolute trust in Izzy. He has demonstrated that he understands my hair and the intended style. He has mastered the craft and was able to take my overall vision (transitioning from a classic high fade to a long-haired mullet) and put it into practice, finding an interim style that looked great at each stage along the way.

Izzy is also an excellent communicator. He goes out of his way to provide explanations of how he was able adapt the style to my hair texture/head shape/etc. to have me looking my absolute best. His unmatched professional ability is enough of a reason to keep me coming back forever, but it’s his friendliness and intellect that guarantee sitting is his chair will be the bright spot of my day.

Thanks Izzy!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel Shannon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIs8EmVik-Iw7fbNjMrNUauFCOWSU3rixC0Fh4OZyF18yx9kw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rosemont Barbers is a great place for grooming.  Brian is, by far, the best barber I have ever experienced, and I recommend his services without reservation.  He takes his time, is experienced, and incredibly skilled, thoughtful and talented. He is also a genuinely nice person. I came to him after being given a pretty bad cut at another shop, and he was able to fix it. My wife noticed the difference immediately, and says that it’s the best haircut I’ve ever had. Book an appointment with him, you won’t regret it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Danny","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJrg5SWxmIBfMtRUbtlnQ7pttlbZno-qLl23qmC312XHjsuw2N=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down, the best barbershop in Denver. While the rest of us mere mortals were out partying, the fine craftsmen at Rosemont were studying the blade. I had been growing my hair for two years when I found The Rosemmont Barbers online. Came in with hair below my shoulders and left with a completely new short-medium style I’d never tried before. There’s no on else I would trust to do half as good of a job. Best cut I’ve ever had. Also the most expensive cut I’ve ever had, but the quality of service and results match the price. You get what you pay for. This is the real deal.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hyden Polikoff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQDFNrUlNL4KqZQrmEB7nZF-RHoMDzm4ptkn8eVYWFSfRIZC20=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best barber shop I've ever been too. One of the things I miss most after moving away is coming here.

Shelby took the best care of me and I can't recommend her enough. Every step was done with care and precision and I always left feeling and looking great.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Drew Jordan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWG9SWCJGzB-UPvTri6NiX1WJkZGsjA1eVbl9gKjZ-ClBpJbODs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely great experience. First time at this shop and Brian was amazing. Great conversationalist, great consultation and superb craftsmanship with his skills. I got the Royal Beard Treatment, and man my skin feels great and the beard looks better. 10/10 atmosphere, experience and work. Will be going back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeFaZQ_CY63uUJ_M2po91WUh3YffXdq6VJnAGt&fid=0x0:0xe1207572d5c0ea1f"],"When":"2025-1-13"},{"Name":"Matthew Robinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmVJ1o7W4yhlzX7Jx5G-cnENKn_QbWexHRrrg2WAYz6s73InlO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was traveling for a business trip and needed a last minute haircut. The team had a cancellation and worked me into their schedule. The experience was wonderful! From the service to the shop (great music playlists) everything was top notch. Shelby was amazing!!! I’ll definitely be booking with her when I revisit Denver.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Christian Greenwell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIbNg04RQBPXZNO9ygSi-S_HzjAJfCw3pEIARjuaG00CtNYng=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Im not one to usually write reviews cause I know we all gotta eat and maybe he just having a bad day but this cut was awful. My barber was Richard. I asked him for a really low fade and to leave the sides above the fade long and the top long. His cut was so uneven and I had to point out his mistakes a couple times, he took the fade way too high and told me it was a hard hair cut and that his coworker in the other chair (who wasn't there at the time) does a better job at these. He didnt even finish my haircut. He told me there was no charge but honestly he just seemed so dishovled from the start, his work station was a mess, my chair was covered in hair when he had me sit and he was having trouble finding things, he tripped over my chair ( which could have been a simple mistake) but he let the hair dryer fall on the floor and couldn't find his scissors. Hopefully this guy is better with other clients but I had to go to another barber to finish my haircut. 10/10 would not recommend or be back to this barber shop.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joshua Watson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK2IgcfK_LUgd-w1HQoWp24cDKG-Yij1QtLhQbKRyp1k6ZOZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stan’s is great. If you’re in ask for Samantha. Very kind, great conversationalist, and she gives a great haircut. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Harry Littman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3GUh46jYrPWpJ_sYQbeX9wo4jtJxige53J7gv1PD4T8hW6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Marcos did an excellent job as always.  He makes being in the chair pleasant.  I hope he stays for a long time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Orie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtSkJPd_1-Zds2GyVYZz6xC63ODsMaWn--Wm2ZY7LwatxpIE-JLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Marco's is amazing. For this sake of this review being 3 years old, Marcos is still amazing! Make NO mistake he isn't the only barber and all the magic makers are magnificent!!! Love LOVE Love to this business...the owners, their family. The only issue is... you WILL leave looking better than you came.  🤪 my boys... Marcos hands 😏. Thankful!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfk8SdT0ir1JTeJqK8e5irZvWNUaFtFgKnq8Xj\u0026fid=0x0:0x40ee1ce9b6592157"],"When":"2023-5-2"},{"Name":"Joe Kabatek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_iQaQSymQacTT70cYqtELfh4YTotX4wUYZqEX110TqdEnw0o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Spent about 8 weeks in Denver for work and needed a haircut. I went to Stan and it was an absolute pleasure. Not only does he cut a great head of hair, he's friendly, affordable, very easy to schedule with. I ended up visiting 3 times during my trip because of the service he provided. I highly recommend \u0026 will be back next time I'm here for work!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kevin Judy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDQTXgAN-GZXLjLIXujOjXxrnqonRsigQnrul-l1rxrmwE9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been coming here for 3 years now, Marcus does an awesome job!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mateo Rising","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsGM9yetRVbBn_l3EJllBK-8_F3hdeqSymzaTCEjXICaGwNpXvWg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In Denver for work. Stopped at Stan's for a haircut, Randy is the real MVP! He did a great job.\n\nHighly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMorcUoROSebObgyEYOdPPN5mK20NzGs2knum56\u0026fid=0x0:0x40ee1ce9b6592157"],"When":"2022-12-1"},{"Name":"Brad Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTCsX2oBakJxc3cgTE5_4L8wkkGGnfuLrVZAfSRFKClRUnqFrk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for a hair. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Austin Sholly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnjz04oXXEqzTstYcG1_MtLjedIDcMGhf9Rw98KsoTTEcaNNk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lisa and the whole crew at Leetsdale provide amazing haircuts and maintain the true feel of a traditional barbershop. Straight razor and a hot towel just the way it should be. Definitely check it out and give them a try.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sock Monkey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGspy3hBFZ_8WYsGweO8HCZwwtN_tR81niVtscu7kIVRd3N-M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I booked an appointment here for the first time on Friday, pretty excited after seeing all the good reviews, but unfortunately, it will probably be the last time I come here. I had booked an appointment with Sean, and I wish I had waited a couple of days for a barber with more reviews. Sean was super friendly, and I told him I wanted a 3 on the sides and half the length on top. He was great about asking if I preferred the 3 all the way up to the top or if I liked it more blended as it goes up, and if I meant half an inch off the top or half the length. After discussing it with him, I made the mistake of not watching him in the mirror. Not even a minute after discussing what I wanted, I felt the clippers go over the top of my head, and by the time I looked up, he had already taken the 3 guard to half the top of my head. I was pretty disappointed because if he had forgotten what I wanted, he should've just asked before shaving my head. It's not something worth yelling about, as it's just hair, but now I am going to have to spend twice as much getting the sides cleaned up as I let the top regrow over the next three months. I will say he did a great job cleaning up the back of my head, and he was super communicative in making sure the back looked the way I wanted; if only he had done that for the top of my head too. I understand mistakes happen, as we are all human, but it never hurts to double-check what someone wants. Hopefully, this was a one-off occurrence and won't happen to another customer.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Black","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMycIn8NltvEX2mLUAefO8CMwW8cWjN5ZAzkStyEDU9ISdOYLF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lisa, gave me the best haircut, I have ever had!  She was good, quick and made sure I was happy with it. She is a real pro!  I highly recommend her!  I also liked the old time barber shop feel with a modern touch, really cool!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Derek Knable","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocITnlD9lTkM5zXVBAylePbG2YD68zI16CGAu8thA2t2Vt88Gw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jeff S - by far the best barber I’ve encountered in Colorado. Moved from NY. Took a while to find him but now I’m glad to drive over 60 miles round trip for haircuts. Extremely consistent and always listens. Execution of new styles absolutely on point.

Shop is great too. Easy to schedule, clean, classic barber vibe.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cody Pena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_hbENhC-a85v6Krz2NOl1vHqR2ArgYJzAWQA6pRIrKTAe3oE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I usually get my haircut by Paul.  I trusted the rest of the staff could cut. If you’re not confident just tell me.  My hair was a good 5-6 on the side. The under confidence of this barber used a one to go all the way up to make the fade easier. As you can see this haircut did not go well. I only asked for a skin 0 on the side, nothing off the top. It has only been a week since my last cut and now my head looks like Bert and Ernie, thanks. Btw I paid 30$ for this cut.

Update: I respectfully decline, no thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOq_V6D8wZ4PfYBIf6zN7otH18qRTV8POf-bZtG&fid=0x0:0x84424f10b6cb262b"],"When":"2020-9-19"},{"Name":"Mike Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW624g6VBBgkplG-pvcaTOvxsuUrI3dHI2PCsgVSu-VK1g-wGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️10 Stars!!!⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Absolute Phenomenal Service Here!!
I come see my man Brian Popp here and always walk away with an amazing fade! He's super personable and helps me make super important personal decisions about how I look to the world. It means a lot that he talks to me and can create something amazing outta this Mop of hair I got! Absolutely 1000% Recommend this place! Come see Brian P or any of their team, you won't be disappointed!! All Star Team and Fantasitc Barbershop!
Oh and I've never treated myself (33 year old guy) to a full face shave and it was the most amazing experience! It was like a manly salon treatment that felt so special and I looked great! Do It!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steven Heindell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbXT27CUTKfvNU_1WeELXU7gtXwraAF8EGQHjDoMvSY_TYHBfY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sean cut my hair and it is exactly what I wanted.  He was personable and pleasant,  I emoted the experience and will book him again","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shadowtrax","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOOKOl-xpg1z7QVY0i5Xaw6Es62M--0khhHuzPGGN1X20sMWKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for a great, traditional men's haircut. All the barbers are friendly. During Covid, they are asking customers to call and make reservations for a cut - normally they only do walk-ins with first come, first served.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2Kn50PxdMbn4odCYnYL2fILTT8wTDQ0UiAdLj&fid=0x0:0x84424f10b6cb262b"],"When":"2020-12-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Avery Lloyd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8T7GlPbZk2GtfnUHgLXZ1Ndwax_0czBEaqVlKqSi3cmSRSg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Barber theory Platte is amazing. I’ve never gotten so many compliments on my haircut going about my day to day. I’ve been getting cut by Blake ever since he was in school. Now he’s really leveled up his artistry being at Barber Theory. Blake really knows how to get me looking right and sharp. Not to mention he’s always fun to chat with and get to know. Super welcoming, fast, and quite the perfectionist.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Russell Kunze","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgVCaPxrEIFKrW4ssZS8GBa2rau17htxXnimQw_4ir4VniJA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Josh is very good at what he does! Whether I’m letting my hair get a bit longer and needing it trimmed to look alright, or getting it cut short with a skin fade, he takes care of me with a great result every time. Even though I’ve moved a little further away than when I started getting cut by Josh, I see him for every haircut because I know I’ll get consistent results.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gerber Ramirez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0BBJDD_B552XTz3I__djuTIxZukVhn3R-Ud8-JMp-jXEq5m1e=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been going here for a few months now and the amount of compliments I get on my fade is insane. David and Josh have been my barbers for some time now and they both do an amazing job. Although, every person that walks in leaves looking amazing. The vibes are immaculate and just good vibes all around. I keep recommending to every one I know.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steve LeBrun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJct8nVhUQpsjupDpvLggaywbmSFqiDWdAlHH8NB8af_XtlVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Blake has blessed me through mullet season, faded me up for the summer and everything in between. He's passionate about cutting hair and making you feel like the man (or woman)  both when you're in and when you're leaving the chair. 10/10 would recommend. whether you need someone once every two weeks or once every two months don't sleep on this gem.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Reilly Brizzolara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI2mYPYyPX3VYQXvbU1jmmFDlg5Z82gu6FeaWJIlqpHkEwuqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Blake at the Barber Theory on Platte turned me into an absolute gentleman. I had a messy mop-top when I walked in, & just knew I wanted it “a lot shorter”. Blake heard that and made me at least 60% more handsome.
10/10 will be returning again and again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christian Racey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEhno3nqB_pOuvKJ4mY2W3aOm-udQ9U2PVoMiSxDbAy0V2yA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Denver, you got an artist for a barber. I’m from Houston Texas, and when the hair cuts gotta be perfect, the 2 hour flight isn’t a thing to come see Ray.

Dude is master at his craft, super personable with an eye for detail!
Houston, Colorado, Kansas City. Where this dude goes I’ll follow 🤘🏼","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sam Lawler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJ3fRWBPrSVuAzl7l2YV1Ssju2T5P7uFbkYW-cR4jTXgLakfI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place is probably the worst barber I've ever been to. Me and all the other patrons were spun around so we couldn't see the work being done, the haircut moved too fast so even if I gave feedback, he'd be done chopping it all off before I could finish. The line work is sloppy, and they don't listen whatsoever, they get a general idea, then roll with that the whole time. I needed a good haircut before a social event, and they did not deliver.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andre Greene","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK_RpROvF8O-xAPzBxD8AZabOyFN_8xY_FyI-U_s-7hyOCeIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Josh is a great Barber! Every time I see him, he is very personable and does an amazing job. I highly recommend him.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"brian rafferty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLk9dH-_YD1ye1pA-Wc8EE6ECY-z8_sJdQNVLcKbf2ouFF38w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Had the worst experience with Ray. 1.) She was 15 minutes late for the appointment 2.) For the haircut I asked for “2 buzzer on the sides and a 1/2 inch off the top” she said “You have 2.5 inches on top, how about 1 inch off to top?” I said ok, she proceeded to take 2”+ off the top 3.) she used a buzzer on the TOP of my head 4.) the haircut is entirely too short, completely uneven and I walked out with what looks like a uneven military buzzcut - COMPLETELY different hairstyle than what I walked in with 5.) The MINIMUM tip on her register is 25% which only adds insult to injury for such an awful experience and haircut …Came to around $60 after Ray’s self serving 25% tip. How does this even happen?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKOKCpw5m_T1j0JApuMWsSZJP8wcggAeORiVVf&fid=0x0:0x7c8fdb94250f551a"],"When":"2025-3-9"},{"Name":"Noelle Onodera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtpCf_b2ayY_dQFWFoMSGGvBI1haK03Jc-tnmi1tCZEFKcCg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just wanna give Brittney a big shout for doing an amazing job with my son for his first haircut! She’s cut his dad’s hair and always done an awesome job, but I was not expecting how great she would be with kids! She was amazing at keeping my one year old comfortable and entertained for his first cut, and honestly the entire staff was super kind and welcoming. Great vibe, great first cut, 10/10!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrgPwdf25HiGW1yY8xK7HJb7PnpzBlULSjdpTc&fid=0x0:0x7c8fdb94250f551a"],"When":"2025-2-15"},{"Name":"Bradley Grimm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8O5AzxbwQZEgmMWz9hqLh3Z5vEfPTlvOarW28FP9RfSHhoBMi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Updated review:

I wasn’t happy with the uneven sides on my recent haircut and was bummed because this place came highly recommended and the girl that cut it was really nice.

However, the owner reached out to help me fix the issue with my haircut and I really can’t overstate how much respect I have for a small business owner that makes big moves like that. I haven’t gotten in to get it fixed yet bc it’s going to take some time to grow back, but this may be the place I was looking for just yet. Thank you again for reaching out Ryan, I appreciate it.

I would recommend this barbershop after all said and done!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emilio Lucero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvLf0CALVr92c_dyxS-V47cjlUnocj5yITHpwr2gk_l7Y5QQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited during Christmas break from Dallas/Fort Worth and Jimmy did a stellar job; I gave him references (pictures) from bald fades I have had done back home and he was able to get the job done as a professional should.
Great atmosphere, great service 10/10","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matt Lopez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSytqOn3qTHrF_spIsyCLgapdpwwILAodBVRRG0twMhBvUlCGR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always a great vibe in Spruce. Love the location and being able to pop on Tenny after. Grab a free beer while you wait and/or during your cut and I love checking out the clothes when I’m there too.

But most of all, love the staff there! Always Personable and friendly. Britt does a mean fade be sure to check her out! Don’t sleep on getting the ultimate, Treat yo self! You won’t be disappointed!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeffrey Cutcliffe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3VVW45wuGcPSCDnSLX-GwWF-jTNY-J4SULf6aUb7G-EJIhFUq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sarah is everything you'd want in a stylist. She is always consistent with attention to detail and quality. Also, she is easy to talk to and get along with. If you've been looking for a new stylist, look no further.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John Douthit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUx8OdvmUdlZoTFbMXlwCIg9nuv95H7tyCPKqZUNos-j-D8AbqW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been coming to Spruce for over a year now and love the overall vibe of this place. Daris gave me an awesome haircut the other day (that i’ve constantly been getting compliments about) so I had to leave a review. We switched up my hairstyle and he was able to do exactly what I wanted. Cheers Daris - see you next time!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris Kleinhenz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0W9KAUODPIwWd1IgJMGLulOAfQ8WvyRsmjlX5Yg3YEC_m4H0j=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great barbershop! Friendly barbers, good vibe, and great atmosphere. And free beer and soft drinks!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Ian Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJtvsla7_8gJdiO4ChrbEV-qDZS00TR2UlOYX8QfzJor1Wuew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Betty is the best hair stylist I've ever had.  I'm so happy that I found her after years of searching and being disappointed.  I finally have someone I can trust to consistently give me excellent results and she's also fun to talk to while I'm there 🙂  on top of that she can handle natural hair types that many people struggle with here in Denver.  Give her a shot, you won't regret it!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dusty Henderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2c4vjqf5D5CQMFRym_3quNx1x5UbyKusLBg9zy3S2U0fqlMhsZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Impressive facility! Will definitely be back again and recommend Boulder Barber and Stylist Jake to other friends!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Johnny Bravo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVi9aak-klhavBZHph8bjWnbllyQUFefjyG8w-Fb6y8nVf9jOCl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Betty is one of the best barbers there. She always does a great job and is knowledgeable in men's cuts. The atmosphere is great and laid back and Betty does great work. If your looking for a haircut near Broadway or just a great cut , get a appointment with Betty and she won't disappoint. 👍","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aly Livingston Shelburne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVeLQpbq-c4uo2deZ6hEe8_qFyv2bLQkO1NUUwrMrzgu8yKAYk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve only been here once. My stylist was Betty and she was FANTASTIC! Very sweet and professional. I’m always nervous to find a new hair stylist cause I have curls and not everyone knows what they’re doing but Betty nailed it!! I’ve gotten so many compliments and will definitely be going back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matt Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfpf4gevQPKY6LVpDN7IlCSsu1Ajbmh4oUNKG2pI2Iq6L51rwj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My first two times three experiences were great. $35 for a simple fade and finger length on top. Why this told to me only at the end. What does that even mean? Seems kind of dishonest.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Judson Maddox","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVk1y_B8c34bFGpsj7_wZNpk0WUvRNp7oJW5Q5Fs5O8Ls5IUDXI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have been going her for over a year and Skylar is my girl! Skylar is also so fun and we have just the best time and great conversations every time~!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeffrey Lammer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyzdVqA-rG0sam4GJWKNIkBW6v0LycytBSBL73XuTW5Hb-BNOA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a really great haircut with Jake today. They are very friendly and professional and took great care of me. I highly recommend them. Wonderful shop. Great music and vibe.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John Julian (W7JPJ)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbCz2RPtS0YLmzzNuhB7Qz8v8Pvo5Rh7dvLsSErntWAjgpj0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Glad we found Lupe again! It is a bit of a drive from our home but it is well worth the drive.","Images":null,"When":""}]

I highly recommend Justin for anyone looking for a quality haircut in a friendly atmosphere!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ray Silvia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzSyfvDUJL5WTjgNRXe5VCFvrcEx-WGL-XObvaHNfZDdUD6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came in after not getting a haircut in 6 months and Rachel did an amazing job. I’d definitely recommend Barbershop if you want an awesome fade in a laid-back setting.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jillian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAzu044A6o1pwmz_X2k47jkFx7WS71NXXxj4RReHRUY_HU6Nw7nQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rachel A did a fantastic job! Will 100% be coming back to see her!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Djuna Martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXB9N4NJRD3bqZmrs5CTeGWCa-WXxpSKkezrNFmCigf4OxrJhX4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jayleaine C gave me one of the greatest haircuts of my life! The next time I'm in Denver, I will definitely be seeing her!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nikolai Mannsfeld","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXl1PdYUDK4xZYLZAgNocVp7NKQuNmJPaYsWhZTooQ_wte5hvPN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gotta love Floyd’s! Awesome barbershop for kids and adults! Decided to get a haircut since my hair was long (and this location is my go-to) , and it was easy and smooth! Our barber AJ was nice and so was the rest of the staff, clean, and well organized on their items! My haircut also looked really nice! Booking through online or calling them is recommend because it can be a longer wait in-person. So, all in all, awesome Floyd’s Barbershop location. Will be back! Thanks AJ for the haircut! :D","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnxTolqixhFJMWo1J2TPQFtxWxvLnL1eavhEUo\u0026fid=0x0:0xc1102fd4b69a27cb"],"When":"2023-3-11"},{"Name":"Brianna da Silva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpxs5f5MbQENTnbIyutfIY1emp4kYGmGO_KllZeRTZolE5t_P0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place. It's such a welcoming environment. As a queer woman with a short hair style, I often find it's hard to get the hairstyles I want at regular hair cutters because the stylists have some weird block or fear around committing to a masculine look for women. I never have that problem here; I feel very well taken care of!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Craig Shank","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtD6DclXnCJpqzQthlgwrKdeHL9D91GPrR4Rv_tuBTthtwTJyw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the fourth time JAYLEAINE has cut and styled my hair and I am amazed at the job she has done! Thank you JAYLEAINE!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObb9wcLDhx4qkeqni_M33rsWbkmli91Y2dHWre\u0026fid=0x0:0xc1102fd4b69a27cb"],"When":"2025-1-26"}]

My barber (Jordan?) was able to give some good pointers as well as a great haircut.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Case Hushen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoViZVRwa_Ao3rHuXczP6PJwsD0VFdS1r71TfUoU_x5FplHIzsDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is THE spot. Nice clean shop and great barbers. Parking is always easy despite being downtown. As long as I have hair on my head, I’ll never go anywhere else for a cut.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Edward Driver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSoTgLuwO8hNkkg3-txYFnZNuX7Cgs3ALdfNzSTjeMxvdT-7rB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Just had a beard trim by Hunter. I came to this shop for a couple years in 2021 and before but moved out of Denver for a period so this was my first time back in a while. The beard trim I had was the worst I've had by any barber, at any barber shop. Completely uneven and didn't follow my instructions on how I'd like it trimmed at all. Now I have to fix myself or go to another spot to have it evened out. I used to really like this shop but would now never return given how bad the trim by Hunter was. Was obviously not caring whatsoever during the trim and tried to breeze through it as quickly as possible. Really disappointed in this experience and after being a huge fan of The Usual in the past, won't be returning in the future.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"George L Humphries II","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6snJSQ6NeiKk0ds2G00kW9to-ho_occBscEwfRZspq2JiB-uA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic local shop! Find your chair!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Peter Lindholm","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUad2bW3eDRQQljdUqoEw5q-OroJugHu020rvhHeMkDdNQaVqyK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Adam did an amazing job on my haircut and beard trim. Highly recommended","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bell Angel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUm8vIz71s2yYTxR3tWCsKp6f7oo0UIy7c7wfd8FQEbWFaBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jordan does a great job with my boyfriends haircuts. user_reviews: [{"Name":"Andrew Norman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKq1WXRultjnQxYbNkxM95HFU5PHMozDXXEgkODwuY_lrU8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been to Multiple Barber Theory locations over the years and have had haircuts from multiple barbers and have never had a bad haircut. Every location I have visited has always been very clean and organized, had friendly and exceptional staff, and always have good conversations. All you can ask for in a barber shop.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zachary Griset","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIXZ1EFPL2G8fXn-f9C-FSzivVC41u7zE_RVhtxNFusa2KXRPO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great haircut with Kaden yesterday. I highly recommend this place. It was one of the best haircuts I’ve had and I heard someone two chairs down from me say the same thing. These guys are a good team. I have curly hair that’s really hard to cut and style and Kaden did a great job. He got me in last minute too so don’t be afraid to just drop in.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mateo Wheeler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUQ0oFwBJcUcVWmJz429EEaqLiywOnra_hxQK80uBtI4S4zA8k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Top quality facilities, amazing staff. I’ve been seeing Eric for 7 years and he is a master of his craft. Both Martin and Jessi have also given me amazing haircuts. Unparalleled consistency.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPy78iXzeTmbXIAQcwVNUy1eBxsx6k6cxQRplOO\u0026fid=0x0:0xb64f8ebaff497fcc"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Luis Robles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIeb9-bt1BXc7jmrHGzHTlCfOsHx7BTKHQBrIOs1KZrwtr-RY3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Booked a haircut with Martin. I will start off by saying that growing up, my parents would cut my hair and before Martin I only had one other barber I trusted with my hair. Coming to Barber Theory for the first time made me a little anxious but that all went away a soon as I walked in and started talking to Martin. He took time to really understand what I wanted and explained things to me about my hair and why he was doing what he was doing while cutting my hair and beard. Overall the experience was great and I will continue going back to him!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Corey Cox","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7cR1LiTn3rGUmL3Ci4GCn2R3rys_3aFJfSf4WOpoNHc-H6dztxw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"John is too classy. Can always count on a great cut and friendly conversation. Great barber for long and/or curly hair as well. Clean and professional shop and easy to book.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jake Tripp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXeUBDVp79u05RMdobFUMsIdIkHmN8HwNOHndbwm_Yt1KVb-_Mzbw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just moved here, was worried about being able to find a great barber. Eric did a phenomenal job, gave me tons of context about decisions he was making and why, gave me advice. Absolutely love my new haircut 😌","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shane Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWn-V5vTdsQVe6mmWgIAmA95hq5nmArFdjtT3dLT5D8iZBhwl8Rg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to Martin a few weeks ago. Saw his work in insta and loved it. Came in and we had a great consultation. I felt very heard and the results were exactly what I wanted. Felt very welcome will be back! -Doja","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kalled Ashour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQ--J5aas8yyE5F1XKt1qPqC4D8sFAaKF0CFOiWX3yvvMMKjYx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I wouldn’t go to any other Barber Shop to get a cut. Great atmosphere and people on one of the most underrated streets in Denver. Eric is one of my favorite people in this city and I’ve recommended him and his establishments to any friend needing a cut.\n\nStop by and have a nice conversation in a welcoming environment while you get a top class cut. Then pop next door for some amazing coffee or food at any of the local establishments.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Collin Ingram","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMpncR4miUh4J1BOVI3Vy87gxmuwXt8_Us7f67O97JwcWPPxwO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ralph and Tony rule. Easily my favorite haircuts I've gotten since I moved to Denver. Awesome atmosphere in the shop and always fun talking to the dudes. Come with cash and leave with a perfect haircut.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"B Mark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLS9HwLRT0mdYkTWF35jendPOuq6Mv6iJCo-PaZuc0Z4SfMGA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I hesitated to write a review, because I didn’t want to share Ralph’s Barbershop with anyone else. But looking at the outpouring of positivity that’s already on here, my review isn’t going to change anything.\n\nIt’s a unique experience that’s hard to fairly encapsulate in a Google review. It was like everything was just perfectly placed. Ralph’s provides a great haircut, of course. But something more than that, an experience that I won’t soon forget. It’s a good reminder of why the best barbershops are timeless places, where conversation and community can blossom over hair.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Collin Shepard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD9k9vGADRFpFZs6oDP3tjtls2S_6kQpfk0qBz0Phi4OfLQw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ralph was great, I came in at the end of the day but that made zero difference with the quality. The cut was excellent and Ralph was extremely professional. Support local business, these guys will get you looking right","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cain Hernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLOYbSKYGLohdFHgcMNn81I8xQMS8cYf7wMfuuKOWoGriOF5-8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I highly recommend this Barbershop!!! Tony and Ralph were extremely knowledgeable and professional. I got the best haircut I have ever had in my 38 years on this planet!!! Nothing makes a man feel better than a good haircut and nice conversation, thanks guys!!! I will be back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cyndi Yarborough","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIl8hvY29dPfgSRtkDdApKUgyIVUM43lnb0c0GPWlrk80E-HQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We booked an appointment with Ralph for my son while we were visiting Denver. It was a great experience! Awesome atmosphere, unique location. Ralph was amazing! Very friendly and professional. The very handsome Campion was the cherry on top. 10 stars!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris Molkentine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLjKxf9T2IH24oRdQfTUjKLJHhtx3Af7SGFTrC17-2nYy1ZLlQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My 4 year old got the most amazing haircut today at Ralph’s.  He got to sit on a skateboard and see his experience in the mirror.   The vibe was chill with very relaxed and friendly barbers.   We are from Texas and will have a hard time matching this great old school barber shop.  Thank you Ryan!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNv9vS2jo_LBrzH6nrtYSnCAsmr4bshzP3-ztIw\u0026fid=0x0:0x7027bcd6fecc3896"],"When":"2023-2-8"},{"Name":"Justin Bookhammer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpRd6wCSyOk-oD_rpdVjVLHUFLpR0rTf7jDlCDcGG_7Rv5w7qeUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Close by. On time. One of my best cuts ever. Convenient. Trusting. I’ll be back as long as I live in the city.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cole Leboffe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSdD0JsjSXomrCmoW4BO0EQoUL9TCaZWPKYSdheJ0Yx9af80dT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here after getting the worst and most expensive haircut I’ve ever had at Rosemont Barbers. Came to Ralph and got a perfect cut for nearly half the price. Will definitely be returning as a regular and I highly recommend this shop. Great service and great conversation.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Arista Ferrell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWp_Kd-dVL2S5GurrORBVDThIjAI1WScg94nLW-BxXSOKHdlJYDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jeannette B. was pretty rad. I must say I normally go for male barbers but this person changed my mind because they are now my go to while in Colorado. This person made me feel confident and I did take one of their advices and did a shade darker on my eyebrows which I like so thanks dudes! I’m so happy I took a chance on a different person because I definitely don’t regret that decision with how my new cut turned out, two words: dope AsF! 🙂🖖🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuu7-HQKyWo4iov1SGMC073FESbrCpSQfM9M6k\u0026fid=0x0:0xcec9e93a6289bdad"],"When":"2025-3-9"},{"Name":"Jon Hanford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwedTc5fbiKmcU7NdoUeZwJK2vFdrfgH3QSKhbb8E7mGxIdtXI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently I moved to Denver, and this quickly became my go-to -- In fact, there was almost a whole year while I was living in New York that this shop, in Denver, was still the only place I'd get my haircut!\n\nAlways does a great job and never fails to exceed expectations. I can't recommend them strongly enough!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Calvin S.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPT2qYk9oseyP9KdAuH6WTjKQgHokFFUaG15vjbMcI1Pg-lA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quality cuts, prompt service, great price! Proud family owned business. It was my first time in and Lila did an amazing job turning me from a hairy mountain man to looking respectable in the city. Mr. Semion was in the store with his son and then you notice the wall hangings depicted with pictures of his relatives and their proud family heritage of cutting hair. Usually I hate walking to the register to pay, not this time I happily paid for my haircut and will be back again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Logan Bosscher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyE7YQeRwtcmokGJSSa9ePCA07AgY9sB-GXv_MptwRVAOcYV4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came in with one of my friends so he could get a hair cut after boching my own. The owner Semion took me in and gave me an amazing haircut. Super quick, super nice, and looks great. Would definitely recommend coming here for good service and even better conversation. Hands down 5 stars","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Phill Kaplan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwfVN_DJEfIlDiSG-23XW8EGfk5rFoKaINf1s87wDYf5VZ06Ao=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been getting my haircut and beard trimmed at Semion by Verre for several years! I’ve never had any issues making an appointment or had to wait unnecessarily long when I got there. It’s reasonably priced, at least it is for men. Not sure about the women’s prices, but I would imagine they are also reasonably priced!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Greg Leichtman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPJP4kXTFQpAAClglMIzVxEzfDD5j901jDTia-OD3qxeQz3sVJ0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst haircut of my life.  Thanks Jess.  This place has been slowly going down hill for a while.  But I can safely say I won't be back.  Jess chopped off hair I've been growing for years. I had a bad feeling but it was too late.  Jess didn't show me the back of my head with a mirror, she knew she screwed up.  The stylist here used to care, but there has definitely been some level of turn over.  STAY AWAY!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sean Hoppe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyuSYrctllUsnXfNXHOylTJfntnfMoApKPZ-3-PHqFJqZjhGvu-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Glad to have found a great barber Rayann at Simeon barbershop. I was looking for a regular person to cut my hair, and now that I work in a professional setting its important for me to look sharp. Rayann cares about doing a great job every time, and I've got many compliments from others since coming here! I highly recommend Semion barbershop, and especially Rayann if you are looking for an excellent barber! She will ask you want you want, but its best to let her do her thing, she is a natural at figuring people out and making them look good. I won't go anywhere else to get my hair cut. Its just not the same. Straight razor, zero fade and beards are all no problem here. 5 stars!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Omar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUv2KqBLO07HOx4wEzrnEYrmFPiuGQb3DIz_f4yCni0cSKKMgeN_w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend Shayna B. She gave me some of the best haircuts in years and I always look forward to our chats, thank you! Semion Barbershop got great people and have the talent to back.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Matthew Ruhl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmUQH-NCWgZ9TV4DBSClBNqsbcCqFIhMBkmNUbjYXt6LNBGA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been going to Marisa for about 8 or 9 years, and have no plans of changing. She has done an amazing job with updating the shop over the years and always has complimentary cold beverages. Even though I've moved further away from when I first started going, it's still worth the drive every time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Guillermo Ramirez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX03j4Zjjk9U-mXuFxI-bq7rGVtFAdIxbzEgCp97xyG2Uw6E_iy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Found Fresh Barbershop early this year through Thalia when I needed a new barber, and never turned away! Hands down the best barbershop in Denver! The confidence Thalia has given me through my haircuts is out of this world and super appreciative. Will always return and all the barbers and atmosphere of the place is really cool and chill! Book now!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shaneil Sarkar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEeOm2LMjVD6FIsYtpLuBUCOuZIsaXZi3C9ULqu7ZGErEy-wkS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of visiting Fresh Barbershop Denver and I am thoroughly impressed with the level of service provided. The atmosphere was welcoming and professional, creating a relaxing environment from the moment I walked in.\n\nThalia demonstrated exceptional skill and attention to detail, ensuring that my haircut was precisely what I wanted. Their expertise and dedication to their craft are evident in the quality of their work. I appreciated the personalized approach and the care to understand my preferences. The cleanliness and organization of the shop further enhanced the overall experience. I highly recommend Fresh Barbershop Denver and Thalia to anyone sinking a top-notch haircut and outstanding customer service. I will certainly be returning.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"William “Stan” Walts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIpAsBWRPgA3DFesOTNjX5xloS_4E12HbTO3tRQCkyew1xn6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Marisa is the best! She listens to your preferences and gives great recommendations. Everyone I have sent her way comes back with glowing reviews also! I would recommend her and Fresh Barbershop to anyone who is looking for a barber in Denver.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vince P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWucuM_l74P6v5NnxR10aZoPgUltXBOcTiEobKP-E7vzewQURa=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been going to Marisa for years and absolutely love her and her shop. She always does a great job and is very friendly. The atmosphere is welcoming to all people and very comfortable. I recommend her to anyone that needs a fresh, modern cut. She’ll take care of you and is low stress.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alan Lindsey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLjj71zClm895d5ulVr46HODoiZi0FvOWiJA1TRVsBAGRCM4uL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thalia always gets my hair looking right! I didn’t quite know what I wanted when I first came in, and she provided great style advice. I have been seeing her for months now and don’t plan on changing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPfuE3Rw65XoleVpVN6ExlY6ojpQjJ1Fb_7_QZ\u0026fid=0x0:0x45545de1df152fa3"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Christopher Norman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmMYJ26QaMlZ3hCz4uERDYAFZEP9qUlMPv8pP2t1SpRiN00tRl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was in a wedding a year ago and Marisa cut all of the groomsmen and the groom the day of the wedding.  She did a 2-3 minute consult before my cut to get a feel for my style and what I was looking for then spun me around and went to work.  When she turned me back to the mirror she had nailed the haircut so well that for the first time ever when a barber asked me \"what do you think?\" I did not have a single thing I wanted her to change or adjust.  Needless to say I have found my new barber and will be a regular here!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"CJ Soukup","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqeZg0GMk7fF-ghf00r6TU-Gk7IRfERdWHxXKl8FGe0IjhRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Eric was recommended by a friend. He is super friendly, easy to talk to, and does great work!!! Thanks for making me pretty!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN8USw-1VV5wwzKgt_EmlOgi6QENLPRj_wKS7LE\u0026fid=0x0:0x45545de1df152fa3"],"When":"2023-6-9"}]

This will definitely be his go to barber!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPixHOQVLDhK4nlgRxin67TshgPFscbNqvLL_q4&fid=0x0:0xbb1e0d06c6e19836"],"When":"2023-12-19"},{"Name":"Charles Pierce","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmeb0HqPdPy1d7woJ1Ytd0FEsQu6g0_FSjMnbbL02M_akL2tbr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have hunted for a good barbershop in the Denver area for a few years. I found this shop, and I found Miriam. She is a great Barber. I will keep coming to this shop as long as Miriam is there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"D S (DES)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHWEwN9y4X3zS5ztiuPwS2DaUlBIEdNgVlUp4ZqtZ8YcIVfM8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Old school vibe Barbershop with a sweet english Bulldog ready to greet you at the front door.
I got a haircut and beard trim from the owner Matt. 5 star service all around! I will return monthly","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nate Holloway","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLcjlICwB0bQYqSlrc1S6wCgecE878B-4SRl7DqakLvkEDt6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Matt is the best barber in Denver! Everyone is so nice at the shop and they treat you like family. Great haircuts for a great price!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Samuel B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJsAO6i2LfmuL0xlH41sPLR229kTpXUdl2KLpmiwQPmPGtf-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been getting my haircut by Jonathan Sanchez since I moved to Denver after making a few poorer barbershop choices.

Superior haircuts at a better price than some of the more "upmarket" hipster barbers in Denver.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrew Fredrickson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLVXVd3UlwuV0fwFJbkSFXsSY7TuR0fr7YF1oKpG0xnKzpK8g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great barbers and good atmosphere! You have to book 1-5 days in advance depending on your flexibility in timing and barber preference but it’s never been an issue for me. I’ve been to other barbershops that feel very corporate and like a haircut factory farm with chairs crammed from wall to wall but these guys are not that. Every person in there has a personality and gets to know the regulars.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tim Burgess","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPQR7mClCK5jefsiI69i0Gz-WoBj08sFSIuz5UFc9A4tBwAXq4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So thankful that Brandon set up his shop;  it's a pleasure to to enjoy the classic barbershop experience.

Cut quality is top notch.  Brandon brings his extensive experience  and skills to all my cuts.

He's also great with kids:  had my grandson's hair cut there.  Excellent cut;  even his mom was over the top with the results.

Thank you, and looking forward to the next appointment!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Michael Verdolin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJ1h03FyTTy-U7dKpdnLOTwB0aDRbCt3NGgzn3F--QOEXoB7J1gg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Unique and great service. Amazing beer trim. Definitely worth finding and coming to. Van was excellent. Literally best beard lineup I’ve had in a good long while. United flies 5x a day to Denver from San Diego maybe I will come here for just for haircuts","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzTWEazwH-jn7S5wK04yZyZaYa15GlJGdBX17n&fid=0x0:0x1f25312ed14ed7e7"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Nick Kohli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8luKADKDXAqZV3YrgVI_gQcMBum_4C3-ThH3HvKzYJFXiTyf6NA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super simple booking process, and real-time availability. David was super friendly and welcoming, and most importantly gave a really good haircut + beard trim + fade. Hyper attentive to details in a fun, friendly, relaxing hidden barbershop. The bar (and especially the nitro Cold Brew Coffee) was a delicious touch. Reasonable prices and absolute quality. Will for sure be back when traveling through Denver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOF-uAK98DeJjxrPB25B4RTGZwGUY4k-8t4ygtB&fid=0x0:0x1f25312ed14ed7e7"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Mike Ahern","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWR1fDiQlCl1rrwlT_6himUDM7fphJIeJJV8FyHHUedCmApMvId=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I walked in 20 minutes before close (unknowingly) looking to have a free haircut I had received over the weekend fixed. I needed it bad. Julian offered to stay late without hesitation, provided the full service, and was extremely professional and happy to do it. Most importantly, he did a great job. Highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgh4d4vQxOjIKZ9qHprqj46Yi6hyGgLlz-tt7p&fid=0x0:0x1f25312ed14ed7e7"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Kemuel Martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJk2HOWxBbm3n_sqIqMivxXRz42gWfjtHIlvH2XfhzjObuB2FL=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been coming to speakeasy for months now, and I can honestly say it's the best barbershop experience I've ever had. From the moment you walk in, you're greeted with a welcoming atmosphere and a team of professionals who really know their craft. The shop is clean, modern, and comfortable ,it's clear they take pride in both their work and the space they create.

My barber, Van, always listens to exactly what I want and delivers every time. Whether it's a trim or a complete style change, I know I'm in good hands. The attention to detail is second to none, and I leave feeling refreshed and confident every time.

What really sets this place apart is the customer service. Everyone here is friendly, approachable, and genuinely cares about making sure you're satisfied. It's easy to book appointments, and there's never a long wait. I highly recommend speakeasy to anyone looking for top tier service, excellent cuts, and an overall great experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Samantha Macias","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-b18PjGUu3mXTIs5rgAW1rRTj204iz9WiYTnD4DgSIXztKHmCEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Julian was phenomenal! I always have issues at other places, my hair is stubborn. Julian understood what I was asking for and gave me an amazing cut! Very thorough and asked questions to make sure I got what I envisioned. Great atmosphere and really cool concept for a barber shop!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maximillian Alvarez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJCkSIrbfJ5EBxxL4veQ0EqcVig-AUML0EhU1gqL1yf3eDVA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was a fantastic experience. I work in luxury hotels and I could feel the value, the layers and attention to detail the owners put into this shop. Drinks, coffee bar, hot towels, heated and massage chairs, etc. This cut was worth every penny. David was a true gentleman barber; my cut was flawless. The reviews are for real. Book here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ian Schudel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXywaxL-UrCx4JOxlg2zzfpLKAhPx1n1eOQFoD8NzqoEQjBKz5x6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"GO HERE. No, seriously, stop wasting your time and go to Speakeasy. My wife and I moved to Colorado from out of state a couple months ago, and I have been missing having a good home barber. Having grown up in California, and lived in both Utah, and in Seattle, I can honestly say that Julian gave me my favorite haircut I have had in YEARS. Not to mention how cool the venue is. A Speakeasy Barbershop is a wild idea, and props to him for knocking it out of the park. I DON’T EVEN DRINK ANYMORE, but I am a cold brew coffee snob and the locally roasted cold brew coffee on tap is outrageously smooth and delicious. Besides the atmosphere, Julian is a wizard with the razor and was able to crush a world class undercut fade with subtle designs and clean lineswith ease. Great location on Blake and 16th. Go to Speakeasy…the 300 five star reviews (in six months since opening no less!) speak for themselves. You won’t regret it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXkInmyNTehDonrR5w62rvYQJlGaJhah_gZ4Sn&fid=0x0:0x1f25312ed14ed7e7"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Beli Granic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKIjNte3PBSBQzwdFZvU9IiwsTJLgR4cC0H5ZEr1KCFkztk_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Van is my personal hairdresser, great gentleman who will always listen to your individual needs and someone who takes time to deliver the best service and haircut. He is very respectful to clients and very professional. I saw through my visits two other stylist and saw their work just simply amazing and very knowledgeable hair stylist. It’s located on famous Blake street in LoDo upstairs boutique style place with alcoholic drinks and soft drinks too. I highly recommend this hair salon for your needs . Beli","Images":null,"When":""}]
