user_reviews:
[{"Name":"J. Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdZoMYnoPyFShsh_OG8IHE_O0EKzKPscl4bISsgY3F3RdiyMH7JA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Eddie Diaz at Barba Denver is simply the best barber I've ever had. Period. From the moment you walk into Barba Denver, you know you're in a cut above the rest. The shop itself has a fantastic, welcoming atmosphere – modern, clean, and stylish.

Eddie's skill and attention to detail are unmatched. He doesn't just cut hair; he crafts it. He listens carefully to what you want, offers expert advice, and then executes with precision. Whether you're looking for a classic cut, a modern style, or something completely unique, Eddie delivers flawless results every time.

Beyond his technical skills, Eddie is genuinely a great person. He's friendly, personable, and makes you feel comfortable from start to finish. The entire experience is relaxing and enjoyable. You leave Barba Denver not only looking your best but feeling your best too.

If you're looking for a top-tier barber experience in Denver, look no further than Eddie Diaz at Barba Denver. He's earned my unwavering loyalty, and I highly recommend him to anyone who values quality and professionalism.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Edgar Renteria","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLSws1oMowdi-lIYTDTKoZpgwcJdYAn13fc-F7xYhsKT2nVsbI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been coming here for years, atmosphere is amazing and the people are the best! Kat is my barber but recommend Anyone here","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrUlDHraDhCjsfSvt8dUTdN-N8QHF81deOPxSS&fid=0x0:0x3fd35df20f96a525"],"When":"2025-3-6"},{"Name":"Justin Gamble","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbU-GWvrGtIbPi-IbOzV1kXA3m9JPaAEMbYIRXI7cAhB2DUA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been going to Barba since I move to Denver last year. Always a great experience with the barbers in the shop. Recently started getting my hair cut my Memphis. She always gets my hair right and is quick. Highly recommend her or anyone else at Barba.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kelly Flores","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgxzkpqMqNd6aNkZ8UcFWbuONU4Z0WbXXH4wyti4ZNtHHD4hg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Eddie is ALWAYS so great with my son has been cutting his hair since he was 10 months old and now 10 years old refuses for any other barber to touch his head. Even when he was younger he would move around and Eddie always was patient and took his time to make sure his hair was looking great. There’s definitely pride at Barba!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Claudia Cabral","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7EsE-BEKDslP7qfkLRd8bkZ4evcSEpNLBxhNmmoTpAoepVw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We LOVE BARBA! The Barbers are the best of the best! The atmosphere is always welcoming and CLEAN. They can accommodate every age, style, color, hair type and more!

The owner Eddie is amazing, 10/10.
TJ is our go to as well!

No matter the choice you won’t be disappointed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cecil Gonzalez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLINGiLKrjF6PqDBWzY0KLp-sPQ_FIz-oFv7lO11TDsrRkU_w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Barba is the best shop in CO. The whole team is welcoming give great hair cuts. I have been a loyal customer for 5 years and don’t see myself getting a hair cut anywhere else!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ruben Armendariz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRNb1DnXkIBsvPNCztUsWF_aEqCP-qSqYY3vSinfNWrzamDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome shop, great music, great vibes, always laughter & smiles here! I’ve been coming here since my barber opened it and was going to him before that. Everyone else is equally talented here. Highly, highly recommend for men & women!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Will Mayer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0e95lG6W47qc0i7W41q0zqoqUBDr7-xlJeAmi6kc98MqbAdDa=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been coming here for a good six months. Nini has always been my barber and I trust her more than I trust myself with my hair.

She’s such a dope barber and such a dope person. Coming back for a cut from her every time.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jason F.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK78UGihiI_ws-exMsgRFoofJ4GZRtdvBI7ySrBT-1PNs2O3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently had to find a new barber after going to the same guy for 4+ years. Really happy I went to Barber Theory - the shop has a nice laid-back atmosphere and everyone there is welcoming. Free street parking is available too.

I was a little worried about going somewhere new, but Cory Spencer was able to cut my hair exactly how I wanted. I was way overdue for a cut and just showed him a photo of how I like my hair.

He offered suggestions, asked for my preferences along the way, and took his time to make sure I was satisfied. Super nice guy and a talented barber.

Highly recommend this place to anyone looking for high quality cuts in Denver!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jaclyn Berra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKWDbrEFA2bfQfRPXyizr3zXwr3bN24x3zXlRaH-z9qidewJo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Way too pricey. I had an inch of hair cut off. I am a female with short hair and often go to barbers. Easily $20 more than an inclusive barber in Rino, that doesn’t overcharge cause you’re a person with breasts.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Edgar Ivan Lopez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVR2TBEitwz_Xj8IHC4iaZXZuT2R77vmU1H7XrT0aPIcmDtt49C=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Have been trying out different barbers in the area for the past year and this spot is great. Went in unsure of what I needed but after describing what I had tried/liked/didn’t like, Ben was confident in the vision and I’m so thankful. It looks great, I feel great about it, and looking forward to coming back for my next cut.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Taylor Pipes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwPSc48qL2WHCyZdV4Kqy_MFeiie8VaTSXWcO_Qv7Q6KqHBPTDLA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been driving by and happened to be in search of a new stylist. Thorin saved my day and was so accommodating to helping bring my style into a new chapter. He was so wonderful to chat with and was my best cut I have gotten in Denver.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dustin Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnZPKL3mFUkU0IOcxfnxUi2stYUIFapjAESAPGQeKr3MTXm9ChEw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a great barbershop for a high-quality cut. I've seen Joe and Thorin and both did really great jobs. I actually went somewhere else for a while due to the higher prices and the location not being as convenient for me, which is where I met Thorin. When he went to Barber Theory, I followed him back. My wife always comments how much better my hair looks whenever Thorin cuts it and I figure that is worth the higher price and longer drive.

Prices are a bit high compared to some other shops, but it doesn't feel like the hair cut is as rushed as those other shops.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jason Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsong6J2wqaesu7APx5HXFAZol5ubPlgPAk835gnfjz2O0RMz4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been getting my hair cut by Thorin Decatur for around 8 years at this point and he is the best barber I have found in Denver by a landslide. Great guy who does a great job. Highly recommended.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nic Vasquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXXdO1_GJAOeAiLDbjfiAc_Pz9ifxhGahek1j4l94pi8gcATU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been getting my haircut by Thorin for well over 8 years. He consistently gives me the best cuts I’ve ever had. He takes the time to listen and really understand what the client wants. Plus he’s an awesome guy, great conversationalist, and always professional. Glad to see him at Barber Theory!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bryan Healy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVm6S_W9GWTST9V36uZvvXt7pW6kfhizjj8GcwHyC32lHmAvbrk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I told the barber I was growing my hair out, showed him a picture of how I wanted my bangs cut (shorter), and layers put in… he left the top and bangs completely unchanged and way too long, and cut off several months of growth from the back and sides. I am appalled.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCT_atis0T4-rJw87p3RHAhWAFEWGXJj09nrR5&fid=0x0:0xb7e676cc05822a1f"],"When":"2025-3-7"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"ODB","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJD95eIfU5VhipkB6HdWt1L58ChaGk5WxXp04KL2-BRITOEWI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Victoria is amazing. She is professional, very knowledgeable, and super friendly. My appointment was so relaxing and I left feeling and looking great! I really appreciate the personal touch she brings and my experience was excellent, I have nothing but positive things to say about Victoria!

It was my first time at Frank’s and I definitely enjoyed it. The staff is very welcoming and helpful. I appreciated the man cave style waiting area and the vibe of the whole space. Very clean and comfortable. I will be going back again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Roman Bost","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocInIMh612aAWbtT6aEsUlnsdejogyi_BJOsvhIfkrdI8IYhVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Salina does a fantastic job every time. She does an excellent job at listening to and understanding your needs, and providing an experience and a cut that fits what you need and want.

Barbers and stylists who really genuinely care about how well they do what they do are rare, so If you haven’t already, book her now before she fills up!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kyle Bohmann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJc_NJjDgyHOpSCPJo9EO6G7rJIBsG6wtPhAPOUS_wqfbjPtw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My experience with Victoria was great! My haircut came out exactly like I wanted and the head/neck massage was super relaxing. She has cut my hair a handful of times now and every time I walk away feeling and looking my best. Would recommend Victoria to anyone looking for a stylist who is not only talented but is also really personable and committed to making you look your best. 10/10","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paul Carter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXN2N8LAbsf88spzTff0pi84cN0-V1LBgmmVtRELflPuCqQcsux=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Having lived in Denver two years now, it's been extremely difficult to find a barbershop here that does quality work and is not rushing you out of the chair for their next clients. I decided to give Frank's a shot and wow, so glad I did! I booked online which was super simple, and got there early to grab a parking spot since it is downtown off Larimer. Headed inside, was greeted/checked in and was told to wash my hands which I liked. They then asked if I wanted anything to drink and it being my day off, I went the local craft beer route and got a Strawberry Rhubarb Sour Ale by Great Divide (their beer selection is spot on, even got a koozie for the can). I was then told to take a seat in their lounge area dubbed the "man cave" which is the only thing I happened to take pictures of while there. They had all kinds of things available while waiting, from chips, snacks, suckers, even condoms which I thought was a nice touch. I hung out in there for a few minutes before Addison came and introduced herself and took me to her chair.

Now back home in Houston, I had the same barber for about 7 years and I have spent some time here in Denver looking for anyone comparable to her- and I think Addison just may be that fit. She was amazing, listened to every detail on what I was looking for with a haircut, and was very personable but also professional. I was so impressed by her work I'll definitely be going back and requesting her as well. Highly recommend her for anyone reading this review! My bar is set pretty high, and she went above and beyond. Facility was very nice and well kept, loved how clean everything was.

A couple of pro tips, get there early because of street parking. I went during the day which was fine, but you always need to be prepared going downtown to find a spot unless you are walking/scooting/biking. Coors Field is two blocks away, so I can see parking not even being an option during baseball season. Also Addison told me a lot of people book in the evening and come in for a beer and a cut, then head out on the town afterwards which is not a bad place to be to get the night started!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAcLVv6tMUxneDzQd0XBB6mWytIs4uxP1gJgac&fid=0x0:0xdbd81559303c376a"],"When":"2024-1-27"},{"Name":"Dan Ramsey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlCO_Tv_vGIzhydQdw_SOeJ_ftcu2JoHjbAVf0equkTQcjYb_V=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been going here for over 3 years and still love it. I have long hair and get a fade cut every few weeks. All the stylists are great, good service, and good products available. I just really appreciate the quality experience from booking to arrival to sending me on my way!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kevin Butman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVngizYK30Hb-LZKaYwqljfPQmFc-BVgLJ6yO7idHAF9AVo-B43=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great time at Frank's.

Very good customer service, and very good service itself. Thanks to Levi, I didn't feel rushed, and he clearly took time to understand what I wanted as well as to explain the limitations involved in the cut together with the best after care practices for the style. He made sure I was 100% happy before I left, and that is something that can never be over appreciated when it comes to Barber shops.

Will definitely make this my regular go-to.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bennett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLct4J0BVU-u0XMuY9NppJq77x0l4LF4sxXcKW96GowffKFXA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Top tier service across the board, even the other customers in the store offered welcoming conversation. Salina did a great job on the haircut,  was very kind and a joy to talk with throughout the process. The ambiance is fantastic and the Man Cave is sweet.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vladimir Reshetniak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLu9mrf9Ugrhk-pstgSx2D34ih9kdAidSGnumoArIUi5ehvAPi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kirill did an amazing, meticulous job with my haircut.
His attention to detail is outstanding, and he takes his time to make sure everything is perfect.
On top of that, he recommended a great shampoo, which I really appreciate.
Big thanks to him!","Images":null,"When":""}]

open_hours: {"Friday":["9 AM–8 PM"],"Monday":["Closed"],"Saturday":["9 AM–8 PM"],"Sunday":["10 AM–6 PM"],"Thursday":["9 AM–8 PM"],"Tuesday":["9 AM–8 PM"],"Wednesday":["9 AM–8 PM"]}

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Chris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWh_VODUS1--RHsoVh8NA9Lkk0vM9nQVwqoXLQGpS4zJFYDxPo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The quality has REALLY declined over the last year or two. I used to be able to book whoever was available because I had the confidence that person who cut my hair would do a good job. That it really didn't matter since Floyds seemed to have very high standards. Can't do that anymore. After a few bad/mediocre haircuts, I decided to try and book someone who I recognized had been there for a while.

I spent 20 minutes in the chair. No massage, no product, and no wash (that I had booked). She didn't even ask how I wanted the back. These are the things that I came to Floyds for. An experience that lets me relax and enjoy the haircut. It all felt rushed and frankly, I can get the same cut at Great Clips for half the price.

It's a shame, because I like the people that work at Floyds, but I can't keep spending my money here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karina Hall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfCA7FkrQAtlhow9kflmTZPOf1TFESK5T19gUIHfQBNFWUncFtLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Made a day of appointment for my 10 yr old. He wasn’t sure what he was exactly looking for & hesitant to speak up. Heather was amazing! She answered every question he had and went aboye and beyond to make sure he liked his haircut. We will definitely book with her again!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMejK9aTeFWoB2abLw_8OdrxrYzjnUIrx1fuFe7&fid=0x0:0xca72a36c81e96792"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Annika Etchings","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLRYITZt7H858edtTLcxY19W81Fo7fDEHW5RtyuMQq8Xyp-zg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to get a haircut. Heather did layering and feathering on my long hair and gave me a wolf cut. She did an amazing job! She also cut my son’s hair and it’s the first haircut he’s liked in awhile. She takes her time to make sure everyone is happy and feeling their best! Definitely recommend!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"tom127127","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKBeSza8V__1BPfTt8V34GZSubfPFy9HNVdfWwMjjXdAcY8ag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My $38 haircut literally took them 15mins. That means they’re pulling in $152/hr giving people half baked haircuts, per stylist. Mind you that’s not including tip, of course it’d be impolite to not tip

I know that Denver rent is expensive and all that but that’s more than double what I make in my 6 figure office job. I should consider switching careers, scamming people seems like a great gig","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anne-Marie Beaumier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkHRxvciF_hsEkp2Oq98Cf3c2HtOWyE7Q82ZhdkdNgXbJsv_D9Eg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the 3rd Floyd's I bring my son to and the only one where stylists take pride in their appearance. They are coiffed, dressed appropriately and their stations are neat. I'm so glad we found Tammy. She's experienced and masters ALL techniques, not just clippers. She is the best.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nikolai Mannsfeld","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXl1PdYUDK4xZYLZAgNocVp7NKQuNmJPaYsWhZTooQ_wte5hvPN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely Floyd’s location. I decided to get a nice haircut from here. Loved the music, the cleanliness of the salon, and the lovely hair stylists and staff, especially Anna! Convenient location on Colfax as well. Highly recommend this place, love my haircut!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5upXneS98LvXXBuc7-2bvlFbEP47zj6qO9oev&fid=0x0:0xca72a36c81e96792"],"When":"2024-2-9"},{"Name":"Joshua “Break bread” Dickens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfs0efOfqZkxyfclJfEkF2_A8aCO2iMTz8gcTKTr4Qa2ZRRV4-xw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Floyd 99: A Disappointing Experience

I've been to Floyd 99 multiple times, hoping each visit would be better than the last. Unfortunately, my experiences have been consistently disappointing.

Despite providing clear instructions and photos of the desired haircut, the barbers have consistently failed to deliver. My most recent visit was particularly frustrating. I came home to discover that the lining on my haircut was completely botched. It was clear that the barber had not paid close attention to the details I had provided.

To add insult to injury, I tipped a generous 15% only to realize that my hair was a complete mess. If you're looking for a barbershop that can actually follow your instructions and deliver a quality haircut, I highly recommend looking elsewhere. Floyd 99 has failed to meet my expectations on multiple occasions, and I won't be returning.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pat Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzv-3AaHVdMNnT8P4gWn4dl4VnG_UNZECa20y8EflghoLhXBU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had to cut my hair today , he did a great job , just what I wanted ..this was the first time he cut my hair & I will be returning to him...He also does color, which I want highlites for the summer....Book with him he is a very good stylist and works with you on the cut you want...Book Book Book, He Is Great.......","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Josh Kenney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbP-7oqUEXqmuKGRggzjdrWzJXTBm0km1zrSPJOxpz5RdMj57m=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been coming to Megan for haircuts for 5+ years now. She is  amazing at what she does and really develops relationships with all her clients and the community. You'll always leave looking your best! Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Logan Lakos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKAh4-qErrQZOUkasBTz8gdpv8lfosQLI-asFO4teTVsY3uLq5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"5 STARS!!! Best haircut & beard trip I have received in Denver. Meagan is a total and complete pro. She has the most amazing shop, is a fantastic conversationalist, and does incredible work behind the chair. If you've been looking for a good Denver based barber, look no further! Meagan is the BEST! Book an appointment now!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8iJw2Ju32yi4x7mMZsdZjgBTSRHHgFEbPfZyV&fid=0x0:0xd0faeee6a8c6ef6d"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"David Obuchowski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9W5fAtz-GHRcMOtbEWsTFtpk8TJtHM-ck_x7DcAhuulov3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely awesome. Meagan is so nice, so talented, and the prices are great. I went here right before a job interview and I got the job and because no one could mistake me for an intelligent person by listening to me speak, it must have been how I looked!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cameron Cowart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3ViXaGMedFomiqzdQ73M_hC3YYHzChFp-RFNk8wuZ8dl4E-Cr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been going to Meagan for years and can't say enough good about her and her haircuts.
Definitely recommend her to any guy needing a new barber or if you're in town and just need a local spot to try.
Book online a week or two early and you'll be good to go!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christopher Rokahr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlYRAvCgpZycYwXt07KSVx-ILjJS9OJ7jvsQwL0_lwN-2KBr4x=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have had the joy of knowing Meg for the better part of a decade and would recommend her barber services to anyone. She is a fantastic barber and an even better person. Please come see her in Park Hill.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cruz Arias","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXlPNRKvGKkTl_Q6L2w2R91iLEs7L02S-lIe2N_wnDHbbvDr4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ceremony Barbershop is the best barber shop in Denver! Megan is an expert at what she does and will always leave you looking and feeling your best. The vibes are great and the shop always has great products to try. 10/10 would recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anthony Carmeci III","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2fPatXna30otviWWjJdFzuU0bbSwmjGxupSLW6uIYFe2tlaYD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For seven years, Meagan has been my go-to barber. She has helped me with a variety of haircuts, from high-and-tight buzz fades to flowing locks. She is also a pro at beardsmithing, keeping mine tidy and looking its best. I have never left her shop disappointed.

Meagan's salon is built on the values of hospitality, inclusivity, and community. Her shop is a welcoming place for everyone, and I wouldn't trust anyone else to keep me looking fresh.

So, what are you waiting for? If you need a great hairstylist who values community and inclusivity, Meagan is the one for you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jason Barlow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGtYzaLR0w8ak3aw1FzyQOBRUQvkCkbMN0qsunj_emyVn7Qk3w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"BEST BARBER ON THE BLOCK!! I’ve been going to Ceremony since it open and have seen Meagan for 6+ years. We always have a great conversation and I always leave with a great haircut. Really nice, clean, small, local barbershop. Great barber and friend!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"D R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzTt0jSX-i2Bb26lHGYE_fR3C0N19LTVupw4JoGptpKeUSibo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been going to Ryan for years, and I can honestly say he’s the best barber I’ve ever had. I’ve followed him from shop to shop, and it’s always worth it. He knows exactly how to nail the look I want every time and doesn’t rush through a cut.

The vibe at Dark Rose Club is awesome, too. It’s got a laid-back atmosphere that makes the whole experience feel like more than just a haircut. If you’re looking for someone who’s skilled, consistent, and genuinely cares about getting your cut right, Ryan and his colleagues are excellent. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dave McBreen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXp5NVx-fwsSzM6mOcDyiEanvKmM4XM8BXS0K_GxUva57V68uOj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My experience at the Dark Rose Club is always top notch. Easy online scheduling, on time appointments, awesome staff and location, and a consistently great haircut!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"W B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGepQEMGHcvH49IizLHP-HGsCfo9h1hUxMrIGRrWxJ4ylXGw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sabrina was AMAZING! She was patient and listens to what I was wanting. She stayed a little longer. The shop had a lowkey atmosphere. Im happy I found a barber that I can go to for now on!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Will Olson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOePFfI6bjr2G-3yJs3PkB4ya0r2gWXFSb61xK3DQL3GNndfiq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great cut at a good price. Sabrina is awesome but you can’t go wrong with any of them. Parking is difficult so get there early.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mark Scott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGPZn4RnD09MqOCDsxWY18JE3NbnEZcH5chUxRanwXTOb6fSM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great barbershop! The staff are skilled, friendly, and always deliver exactly what I’m looking for. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Austin Chambers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_yRFSiohuwFNwtUkAAys24R1b0RfyFxTPOYRvAYr-4AP1IpKI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dark Rose Club is a great experience in all aspects. My cut is always excellent, every person on staff I've interacted with is professional but also genuinely friendly, not that 9-5 fake friendly.

Most recently, I came in for my first appointment with Violet, who was absolutely great. Not only did she give me some insightful tips on continuing to grow my hair out during my cut, but also some great tips and ideas for my beard as well.

Overall, I highly recommend this place, especially if you've just been bouncing around random places like I was and are looking for a solid, reliable spot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Katie Padrón","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKaty_o5NGwRN1VLL795LuPK35DfgmBgpbz_zRCKedmkhxIbg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really love the atmosphere in this little shop! I struggled to find a good consistent barber that I vibed with since moving to Denver. Finally I found this place! Andrew has been cutting my hair for about 6 months now. The conversation is always great and not forced, he’s a pretty funny guy so it’s nice to get a good laugh when I’m there. 10/10 would recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stepan Papazian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMYgJ7-YqNydyZM8GvMTptY9WcVlyE9HnZV_7T3soFrtMlAy0JgA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Overall, the place has a welcoming atmosphere with friendly staff, but unfortunately, my recent haircut experience was far from satisfactory. The barber, while a nice individual, didn't deliver the results I expected. I'm puzzled by the practice of some barbers turning their clients away from the mirror during the haircut. In my case, the barber rotated my chair away from the mirror, leading me to blindly trust his skills. Regrettably, the final look was quite displeasing. It gave me the impression that ensuring client satisfaction isn't their top priority. Instead, it seems the focus is on quick service: cut the hair as rapidly as possible, collect payment, and then swiftly move on to the next customer.

Here are a few suggestions for improvement:
1. Always keep your client facing the mirror while you're cutting their hair. This allows them to see the progress and provide immediate feedback, which can help in achieving a haircut that meets their expectations.
2. Engage in less conversation and devote more attention to the task at hand. While friendly chatter is appreciated, the primary focus should be on providing a high-quality haircut.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Hollywood's Barber Shop
open_hours: {"Friday":["9 AM–6 PM"],"Monday":["9 AM–6 PM"],"Saturday":["6:30 AM–6 PM"],"Sunday":["Closed"],"Thursday":["9 AM–6 PM"],"Tuesday":["9 AM–6 PM"],"Wednesday":["9 AM–6 PM"]}

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Angela Griffin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4T6tVwdjHIIjDdaz5_lTSLl46JfqOrlc-JU3qHE3eBg3NLaLi=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been traveling from Highlands Ranch to Hollywood Barbers since 2012 to get my son's hair cut. They offer a friendly comfortable atmosphere, easy-going barbers, and they support the community they have been present in for decades.

They give back, offering free haircuts at the beginning of the school year so kids can feel good and confident for the first day of school. They do other community functions like sponsoring families for the holidays making sure kids have presents to open on Christmas or serving a warm meal. There are times when I have come for my appointment and they are feeding patrons in the barbershop just because.

The owner, Mike is very professional and gives a warm welcome to all entering the establishment. He's a strong male figure and has no problem talking to the young boys.

Shellie, my current is the only female working in the barbershop. She has been my barber since she joined the team. She has given me guidance on keeping my hair the best it can be. She is constantly upping her game doing new things like steam treatments and Scalp Micropigmentation.

The most important thing about the barbershop, they don't discriminate. All races, religions, genders, and economic statuses (rich, poor, and anywhere in between) are welcome without judgment. The ONLY requirement is to be respectful.

Recently, the shop has received bad press because of a resident living above the barbershop. Don't judge them based on something they can't control - freedom of speech. Practice peace and understanding. Millions of mental health situations are undiagnosed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert Greer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlZuhELx9L3oOSPR-buKuXYOh1XuIcYIhKrm5hINfMfP2GKyic=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've gotten my hair cut here a few times. They always take a lot of care and listen closely to what I'm looking for. Nice conversation too!

The owners hate what's going on upstairs but they don't have direct control over it. So don't punish them with bad reviews; they're victims of the notsee too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Doug Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTg3s30u0Ny687QlQVLP9k4RV9CJ9telPMUJFO8Q9gkOticG4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a black man whose father is a barber, I struggled to find consistency and skill when I moved to Denver. James Muhammad gets me right every time! I’ve gone to him for almost 4 years consistently! The shop also has a cool, old school atmosphere. Check it out!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert huffman (Robert Huffman)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLKEkhfx_ZaZh5xP5bVA8FQecMVzu8skESZVOmf_UIVHlQ7SXd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I need a haircut. I stand against the hate windows above. I've driven past y'all everyday for work. Might be time to come in and get a cleanup. Sorry for the hate being displayed in the windows above your business. The community stands with your shop neighbor.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"eli robinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKmYSBvQjMtFNPq2eevNdd-Jn-bOPZn7Fh_PQeZ5PHt3deeuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is the best! Been going to Shellie to get my dreads done for years and had Xavier fading me up before that even. I wouldn't go anywhere else.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bekah Heine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJoqBAAjqD7H6xeRenNXzejarzGeDZXJSfdYCWevGGaGEoJCg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been taking my kids here since my 24 year old was 3 years old and will always recommend this shop I love the atmosphere the barbers have been here for years, my son's had the same barber since he was like 6 or 7, They have literally watched my kids grow up the owner is amazing and has the best conversations with my kids!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amanole Getaneh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzDFrC2w3BhRUuXlgfH4ECbC3djUlWH-SblEc7Pqbuf5vo8g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I got a terrible cut from here. I came in for a fade and he cut a bunch of the hair off the top accidentally. Now I'm going bald after 5 years of growth","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ancel James","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOqio_KMpFtITAIcn4tZ9MLeI5CzSE9tfemiaubZAAz9Gx360a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hollywood's Barber Shop is an exceptional place to get a haircut. The owner, Mike, is an incredibly skilled barber who pays attention to detail and always takes his time to ensure that his customers leave looking their best. I don't mind traveling an hour away to have him cut my hair because the prices are very reasonable, especially considering the high quality of service you receive.

The barber shop itself is well-organized, and the staff is friendly. The waiting area is spacious, so you never feel cramped or crowded. Plus, the atmosphere is always lively, with great music playing in the background. They play a mix of old-school, R&B, and other genres, so there's something for everyone to enjoy.

What I love most about this place is its location. It's located in a multicultural area with numerous bars, eateries, and a gym, all within walking distance and just 5-10 minutes from downtown Denver. You can easily make a day of it by grabbing lunch or a drink after your haircut. The whole experience is always pleasant, and I highly recommend Hollywood's Barber Shop to anyone looking for a great haircut and a good time.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"John Storbeck","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_-uVyFqFaYbGgZm8ZvaeE6lGg4UbD2q12oljY69BCBBtuBg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing service, start to finish. After a disappointing experience with another barbershop, I decided to try this one. Unfortunately the day of the appointment, I had a last second medical issue, and when I called them last minute, they changed the appointment no problem.

As for the appointment itself, awesome. The location is a little out of the way, but totally worth it. The barbershop itself is SO cool, too. Lizzy was very thorough with everything I had booked (hair buzz, shampoo, beard trim, and hair carving), and worked with me to make sure I was happy with the design I chose.

Can't recommend enough.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKSdZTs3ZxLd9K0qUXKOKntjGQN64nXbj1z0yV&fid=0x0:0x7210c8cf7bffbcd9"],"When":"2025-2-1"},{"Name":"Zeana Dick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBRYzVT34b82GhETIc4tTWTWoH2Q1-xDifhrDPppb2gARtVA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lizzie is amazing. She takes super good care of me every time. I’ve had bad experiences with other shops and getting undercuts but she always does the best! Forever loyal client.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMlui0jGBPrYYU8dIr2_SpD8NSNqsLHKJxtmSaF&fid=0x0:0x7210c8cf7bffbcd9"],"When":"2025-2-13"},{"Name":"Lindsey Fuquen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPI0Mg-MMWn6dhLXw6mYjqF76n8Wj71jP-hySWwo4TVlK7hxOX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I moved here in July and was so happy to find Lizzy at Faded Barbershop! I get compliments on my hair all the time and I love to brag about her craft and creativity.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzRlUd7JrDJGUl1vnHzIDyXVccEm2rPCWdNSrI&fid=0x0:0x7210c8cf7bffbcd9"],"When":"2025-2-22"},{"Name":"Cyn L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1IzsIBSWUTI_bDDWJTj1AbxHorYoUl28v-UKZzu9kTjscsdKnjw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience at Faded Barbershop! I was having a rough hair day and decided on a whim that I needed a haircut. While running errands, I spotted the salon and walked in, hoping they'd take a walk-in. I was immediately greeted warmly by the staff. I explained my situation, and they were able to fit me in right away.

I was paired up with Lizzy, who was fantastic from start to finish. She was incredibly patient and helpful, taking the time to ensure I was comfortable and checking in with me throughout the cut. I've always wanted to find a barbershop where I felt welcome and valued, and it's been hard to find a place that is both inclusive and attentive.

This salon exceeded my expectations in every way. It's wheelchair accessible, LGBTQ+ friendly, and the staff truly cares about their clients. I'm thrilled to have found this place and can't wait to plan my future haircuts with Lizzy.
Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaDVNLamMYTbeWZYciB_bV9yoO4ZqVHxfAPSBw&fid=0x0:0x7210c8cf7bffbcd9"],"When":"2024-5-19"},{"Name":"Jo Carroll","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIe9BrrLydM8ug0D1Fuq5XWHypXU-4L1hQeLTOEqGeV0W7csvq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Genuinely the best haircut I’ve gotten in my whole life. Liz absolutely killed it by listening to every ask, giving input, and making it happen. Everyone in my life has said it’s the best cut they’ve seen on me. Went on a date and they couldn’t stop complimenting it. I will never go anywhere else ever again. 10/10, 5 stars.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ABC Custom Framing","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdrFEv6BYyM53WFnuEbpUA7DoqdeYgTY7_UD-PIM2UAbMxfoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great shop. Clean booths and friendly barbers. Thank you for helping us look our best! Stephanie was amazing - 🙏🏽💈","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONcfAxZMLDX1_PKO-WgQ2eUvXwb9axbgxIeYCl&fid=0x0:0x7210c8cf7bffbcd9"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Taylor Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQi56x-MqRNvPmKcPP2uOe0khjVdWwcuRtJzF2D-flrTAIdneB2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lizzy did such a good job with my hair!! She is an expert barber who offered a very relaxing experience and welcoming atmosphere. I highly recommend and you can expect to be always satisfied.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bianca Manzanero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKU9lcYPb0l7qPV86P__dHI1O3Ce0yI3myJDem8_7vFtnBgXg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"recently visited Faded Barber Shop and had an amazing experience getting my curly hair cut. STEPHANIE understood how to work with my curls, giving me a cut that enhances their natural shape without sacrificing volume. The atmosphere was welcoming and relaxed, and the she took the time to explain the best way to care for my curls at home. I’m so happy with the result and will definitely be coming back. Highly recommend for anyone with curly hair looking for a skilled professional!"","Images":null,"When":""}]

Overall great experience and I’ll definitely go back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alex Czyzowicz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJJysS8H68_BqGyxnvxvEQeDleVPL7DR3rWkd120QHiuBnp3Eu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love Ollie’s barbershop. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Taylor L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIEQj_r8oEfXmXpb3KFzAYO_SKm3FYL9KlJcigeM74-HMq9tA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Updated****
Taylor took care of my sons Back To School Haircut today and my son said it is the best cut he has had in his life. Haha. Always a great experience, we have had 3 different barbers since our first visit. Never disappointed!!!

Took my 7yr old son here for a haircut yesterday. And I am very happy with the service and my sons cut!!!
Sip took care of us and he did amazing!!! My sons haircut and style was perfect! The atmosphere is fire! And they are kid friendly! Very professional and we will definitely be returning! My husband recommended I switch my son barbers and take him here instead and I’m glad I did! It’s official to say Sip is my sons new barber!! Thank you!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPW5sVwiLpQjy4wlcpEmSMNthePckSiq8lZkpXP&fid=0x0:0xddb2394eabd0d0e"],"When":"2023-6-4"},{"Name":"Megan Burge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3PDsqKQGG9rQUSnMe52_B-0TIYJ7eq_w6qJhhPLB_I1jbsg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Legacy Barbershop, and I can’t say enough good things about my experience! Carlos is the man! Any style you need, he can absolutely accomplish it. The atmosphere is welcoming and modern, and the staff is incredibly skilled and friendly. Carlos took the time to understand exactly what I wanted and delivered with precision. The attention to detail was impressive, from the clean cuts to the perfect fade. Plus, the added touches like a relaxing shampoo and a hot towel made the visit feel special. I walked out feeling fresh and confident. Highly recommend this place to anyone looking for top-notch service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pam Martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvnuAIH9a8hUJe_KE5BfZsEWnYrJ0vK9TCxZHmPrlVbiRAJTPf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chris Cruz was my son Anthony’s barber for years. Not only was he his barber but friends which if you know Chris you become family. I lost my son almost 6 years ago. Not only did Chris offer to give him his last haircut he also helps us celebrate his birthday every year by doing cuts in his name and invites myself, my family and Anthony’s friends into the shop to honor Ants and celebrate his memory.  I’m beyond grateful for his generosity but for welcoming us and helping me through some difficult times as a mom that’s lost her son. Legacy Barbershop is more than a business.. it’s a family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOD8OmkxKuT31qUbOGB7PqOGUSY6vruuRk9hLNy&fid=0x0:0xddb2394eabd0d0e"],"When":"2023-9-15"},{"Name":"Randall Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEZoBa-YDPECnZQGh6sKNgHeI-HI-oa8TLMMFMX2LBKCpv1fxF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great place to get a cut. Very welcoming atmosphere & greeted with the same energy. This is my 4th time coming & bringing my 7 year old son.
Christian is my barber & he gets the job done. Tell them exactly what you need and watch the transformation happen.

Thanks Legacy Barbershop","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thomas Roeger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJk4QNEO2Xd1R6xlkjo3QR68hMExTKK1jfcZvgG7T3ItgeJAg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm only in town for vacation and I wanted a nice clean cut for my anniversary.  This place did not disappoint.  This would be my go-to as a regular if I lived here.  The shop is super cool and the staff is friendly.  Taylor is extremely talented.  It's usually very hard for me to trust other barbers after seeing the same barber for 10 years but this is probably the best cut and shave I've ever had.  I will recommend his business to anyone in the Denver area that needs a fresh cut.  Wether you're in town for vacation, just moved here or need a new barber, do yourself a favor and give them a visit.  Next time I visit I will be dropping by for sure 💯👌
@cutsbytaylor5280","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"D Gz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIBLllu7pzH5iujzW2dBTJO1h_WCyWZEX1ctYi5R-hG1eJ-Zg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down best barber shop in Aurora get with my boy styme he'll get u looking right! I've been growing my hair and beard out for a few years now and needed a change and a fresh new look walked in and styme was the first one to greet me all the other barbers are really cool too and everyone they cut walked out with a smile love the vibes at the shop too and laughed a lot well I was there styme made it a point to make it a really good personal visit for me felt like I was kicking it with my homie from way back! Even bought me a soda lol this will definitely be the only barbershop I go to for now on had me feelin like a million bucks when my cut was done! shout out to styme and legacy barbershop! I let all the boys know this is the spot to go to well in the A much love God bless y'all 🙏","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBOsvWFOZM-azdnCGOAOYXHXcjqcDid77cCqyx&fid=0x0:0xddb2394eabd0d0e"],"When":"2025-2-12"},{"Name":"Jonathan Borgia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPczA3Ji1NumobvWm7fNqRM2gsiC6hRatKT8sI--6SjGlAvyDxEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"🙅🏽 Absolutely terrible experience. The barber never communicated, nicked my ears multiple times (I've never been nicked so many times during a cut in my life), and kept saying "oops." Then, without asking, he started shaving the front of my hair to "line me up." 🤦🏽 He butchered parts way too low, panicked, and just made it worse. Now I’m left with uneven patches and shaved spots (on only one side of my head - said he was gonna even it. He didn't). Easily the worst haircut I’ve ever had. I should’ve walked out after the first nick. Can’t remember his name, but he mentioned doing janitorial work—he should stick to that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoRIEIMDi1LZOS8M3fCXu106LiUc1dpWcn6hKL&fid=0x0:0xddb2394eabd0d0e"],"When":"2025-2-1"},{"Name":"Timothy Goodwill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIuemdsz-yT38kNrXXEX7ubpcrnB9UhUeGzGyT7dqbAS2jdHVSaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Legacy is one of the finest establishments I've had the pleasure of discovering. The entire team is highly professional, their skills are top tier, and the owner, Chris, always makes sure you feel welcomed.

I highly recommend Taylor whenever you visit. He's one of the most consistent, punctual, skilled, and the most friendly barber you'll ever meet. @cutsbytaylor5280

This place is an absolute experience, and you'll be happy with the results with whomever chair you choose.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Elsa Hoagland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWr2cvxTy06EQGp92TVjG6Qq_Y0aesE9q8Us7TJ0_Pjbb7mZCpf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Snow leopard is the best barbershop in Denver! The environment and decor is so cozy. All of the barbers make you feel so at home and are so easy to talk to which makes this place such a vibe. They work with all hair types and styles including women’s hair and always do an amazing job :) Love you guys!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNo3PG3DFsqQBwFbMEHIOaQpyavKJiFnyU_rVm8\u0026fid=0x0:0x45437e43e4c36e8d"],"When":"2025-1-16"},{"Name":"Alan Bouhamdan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWo1tHAH8hUHrsy_li5ztgBi_Qz8AqYG1ZaOaN32ycIJ7rnEDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience at Snow Leopard! The barbers were friendly, professional, and knew exactly what I wanted with minimal explanation. The cut was clean and well-executed. On top of that, they generously donated a haircut to my homeless friend, which speaks to their character. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Frank Sclafani (Frankie)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUERYCOZZdOXV2OxqNhGJEyO4i-20UFJatQANg5y0Z98BW5ju_xuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"New, exciting, and super chill barber shop! It still has the \"new shop\" feeling to it and I can tell are starting to find their vide and their clients and regulars. Everyone there was friendly and fun to chat with and Moe gave a great cut with a skillfully executed fade! Definitely give Snow Leopard a shot if you are looking for a new shop!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOEwfuVrnLw-uAGjdxjiCxgobsge7FvTKXBILZ\u0026fid=0x0:0x45437e43e4c36e8d"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Kirby Quick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmcKc7oOvdAvSXyL-wssq-S6I3WT_Q94fVZnxKRvkfBYrASKo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly and talented staff, the vibes are immaculate. Snow Leopard Barbershop provides the best quality cuts in Denver at very reasonable prices. The shop is conveniently located in RiNo with a great atmosphere. If you're not going here for a shape up you're not doing it right!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andy W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKB4J34x22SDsd3iu4bSVQANO3ZFZMkHDRZL3J7eO6KaHDzOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend brought me here and this shop did not disappoint! Relaxing vibes, great atmosphere, and highly talented barbers. This is definitely my new spot! I have extremely thinning hair on top and Keevon set me up perfectly with a buzz and fade. Check this place out! They 100% deserve your business.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dalton Berkey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwqAJEZiyyS9YGWHCAY60U0ANxgL0lYSVMyebNS1nTbXsdmA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Snow Leopard is an incredible shop that cares about the community too! The owner and staff provided free haircuts for an entire middle school soccer team I assistant coached for! The players had a blast chatting with the staff, and everyone was happy with their cut, myself included! Thanks Snow Leopard!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Doctor Bo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWompBibie7_Z3rF3HQXJJ6QpCUG1ePr_FesljPbO67I8v_BLO5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I kept working with Bella when she opened this shop because she provides the highest quality haircuts I have seen in Colorado. On top of the attention to detail, professionalism, and fair pricing she is simply an awesome human to chat with. I have tried many barbers around CO and am really happy to have found her and if she ever does move to another shop I will be sure to follow her there!\n\nI (selfishly) hesitate to leave a glowing review because I would never want her too busy to see me but ultimately I am thrilled for all the success she has coming her way; so you should hurry up and get on her books while you can.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgVZ5PNFoq6yWLbNtJ5T8su_eV0plfgaDR5mqP\u0026fid=0x0:0x45437e43e4c36e8d"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Simon Rooney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCfpz5DcnaTQc0P30V8AENfgxXmGgMFcEdsJcGUzxa2xTe5WK0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best barber shop in town! Bella is amazing at what she does and always takes her time to make sure you’re looking fresh by the time you leave. Always appreciate the conversation with her and Moe as well!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"diana linares","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINwPZGSeuzBvfB-dc4kGvvI93IF4IUcxUBq5W7ldwAGDVswA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"WORST HAIRCUT OF MY LIFE! I am embarrassed to have to walk around with this haircut! I can't stop crying. A refund won't justify this. All I wanted was a TRIM!\n\nUpdate: I have spent more than 3,000 dollars to fix my hair. Bullshit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8asp_maSxqhzKYI3aT6YDcv4nuf_YrActUbzh\u0026fid=0x0:0x963f5935c77ceaab"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"MtZ Reviewz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5Wjs1y4-UPs5ZYqMWYia0bRFt4IY1hRAB-XsLox3u-Sl8qpRs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice check in process, music makes it lively but also feels comfortable. Most important a the haircut was very good. Also saw they do beard trims and cuts, eyebrow trims, and coloring. I really enjoyed the friendly barberette who talked a little but also concentrated when needed! Great place- fair price too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9N_N-HjVOyZaD89HvP3LLFlQQyIFCP4VIa2O2\u0026fid=0x0:0x963f5935c77ceaab"],"When":"2024-5-17"},{"Name":"Monet Olmos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEtXzdT1CfExH2GiRhosC0k4cQE56DLcMPFJyCnBb_P0spfuHO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"got a simple haircut as a female with long hair and they were so flexible with the online booking i chose. i live nearby so this location was chosen for convenience for me, but the service was great and communication/staff friendliness will bring me back for my next trim :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stuart Peterman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJphoIc0Eblon3EYY9G7Q-jPviKKCWr2r0ohtHMSunf0pX-JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Was a customer at Finley’s for about a year and a half, live right next to it, and loved Shaudae, and the scheduling has always been a huge issue but I always tried to be understanding about it. I did not go a single time where we started within 15 minutes of my appointment. Today, they turned me away for being 8 minutes late (a minute and a half of that was me sitting at the front counter waiting for the person behind the counter to look up from their phone)… really terrible customer service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"KåTĮë B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkNqEZKNMNz_ggZm4M5C7gEGE5S9dJXPzrcsNkwAi7j5mVrnI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What can I say, Clyde is a master of his craft. I always get up from his chair, feeling refreshed. He has a certain vibe to him that is delightful. If you need a haircut, give him a hollar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPU3-k0iQyX7Q-J4MW1bDx9aZxxG-aK1vMBfhRn\u0026fid=0x0:0x963f5935c77ceaab"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Julio Marquez (julioooo)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWivfQ0pdfQCeK4Wvo1VzLUdGMSqk9UCjRsMzLCXhRB5bHi00xP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service, very friendly staff. I was done in ~20 mins and i left feeling and looking good! Great place to stop during lunch breaks at work if you need a trim.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOA0mnhLgl1HtqLhB7vR3klMdQeLj1ZtI29ORtT\u0026fid=0x0:0x963f5935c77ceaab"],"When":"2025-1-30"},{"Name":"michael st. john","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNKTV2Isx3cLHVZVERYzSOri2LLTvRTGIliZ6HPogwKXKwlh2i=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Clyde is the best stylist in the city, hands down. Get on his schedule now while he is still affordable! Love this location; hidden gem.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paul Kamber","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkF_zafXPJoWDn46wl6KpMoZD9w5uDRcgUhTtgj8V5AqJpWAU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bobby is a great hairstylist and friend. He has curly hair for years. I worked with him many years ago. A great manager.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Melissa Turney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKPv0M2GeWj758Xb_lvo0YD6wReRX5bUwp2daHPuZ8Eg9vSw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My sons have been clients here for the last 2 years. Every time has been an excellent experience. We love each barber we have seen, they are quick but thorough, highly capable, and really kind!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jasper Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKF2seeCQ86RX77LaLfPJ1nJAahiZFm7CLUk7rmLXFPBzdZuA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been loving getting my cuts from Jester and I am so happy to have met him! No one listens better and he always is willing to give great advice as well to style my cuts better. I always look forward to having him take care of me when I swing by, A+ and highly recommended for also knowing how to cut Asian hair very well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ben Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLB3Yp1XqZpJT3wwxdcyYRtBOsAs32NtRT48dPf02HT6LbOsg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nicole is a wizard. Very reasonably priced for this quality of service. Booking system is intuitive and fast. Definitely recommend this spot","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Julie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkCHjW8ALFWoFxR0w7TajY4yEa_eg4zxMemjeqFpIPxko9Knss5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I could not be happier! I wanted to get my hair cut short and I was so nervous, but Imani was fantastic. I've never had my hair this short and the whole experience was great. Highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpgZfsy0xgBUE9kzcMhRxjT33n0f1mX7XhZkc9\u0026fid=0x0:0x2d11020166841ab6"],"When":"2021-5-7"},{"Name":"Corrigan Conroy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWH06Ww5lklfhIQA5_XmDTn_xoglVkKdfL-eT84yKer9jXrPtZb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a minor mishap with my haircut when I visited this shop about a month ago. I made a review about the person who cut my hair as I was frustrated about the whole incident. The owner ended up reaching out and calling me directly. I am updating my review and the stars for this very reason. This small business owner truly cares about her clients and employees and it shows. Stuff happens and things will inevitably go wrong but how you handle the outcome is what matters. Thank you for making me feel heard and appreciated. From the bottom of my heart, I am sorry as well as one negative incident shouldn't be a stamp on the business and people as a whole. I wish you and your business the best. Thank you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jon baron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWc0e61-xZAnCeu71QDZwwaYY9vrv3Y5hJFbY7gQf91AqaCKIs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I only get my hair cut by Taylor. She is super talented as a barber and business owner and typically goes above and beyond when cleaning me up. That's not to say that the staff their is any less talented or friendly. I've never seen a customer come out of the doors unsatisfied or with a crooked line up. If you're in Denver and can fit yourself on the schedule you know where you need to book.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christopher Debo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPEIbITZmoOLI6jBdBikH0XoT6OpqbMTJsMWvBU8S-BoFN6w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nicole does a great job and makes sure that the client is happy with the cut!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rachelle Hernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZHqhP8ZKGXrbzUTeVxefYpzBDTyn9zBeqQcPwKRYwzq-sSw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My partner and son have been getting their hair cut here by Erika for several years now. She is extremely thorough and patient with my son. They have been to a few of the other barbers too and have always gotten great haircuts! I highly recommend this shop!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Chuck's Barber Shop
open_hours: {"Friday":["8 AM–5 PM"],"Monday":["Closed"],"Saturday":["8 AM–3 PM"],"Sunday":["Closed"],"Thursday":["8 AM–5 PM"],"Tuesday":["8 AM–5 PM"],"Wednesday":["8 AM–5 PM"]}

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Addison Faul","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGXOD2bbsG_B59kA0VYD-KtF-vxH2i1gM7NpAzFr71xLWf_Stl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is the worst haircut I’ve ever gotten. I asked for a #4 length on the back and sides with it blended longer into the top. Pretty standard traditional men’s cut.

What I got is almost shaved down to the scalp above my ears, you can clearly see the skin. There is also zero blending into the top of the head. It goes from nearly buzzed to a couple inches long with no transition. It looks like I have a dent in my head.

A refund would be nice but that doesn’t make my hair grow back faster. There are 3 or 4 other barbers/salons on Tennyson, definitely check those out instead.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbP4VWCBKvI676Zb6nVgo8rAabw05vbiJFtB9q&fid=0x0:0x7459e57f88bbc51d"],"When":"2025-2-5"},{"Name":"Tim Bearden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVEr2ruJG5tW_94LujdkeCaLTgNWMh1ugFjU0wPR-lfFvXpec=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dan and Le Le are amazing. They go way above and beyond with a great cut, straight neck shave and head and shoulder massage. Affordable price as well. Great people!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmzGCfCwFF6XYxloxVOCIq5v_BqJ4yi4-hvTKZ&fid=0x0:0x7459e57f88bbc51d"],"When":"2024-6-13"},{"Name":"Blair Draper","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjelFsq96pNOw-cpG52Gw1mYoD5jz0rQlEztoo26FM_yw3S3_c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chuck's has been around for a long time. Dan is the last in line, but man does he have an interesting story about his life. The amazing immigrant story. Plus his haircuts are good and that crazy massage thing - awesome.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"N S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvof_BUw7L49dR4V-6YNBM-61fuqopEdQmZYvDRyAVdAbp-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owner Dan and his wife were so sweet. Dan cut my boyfriends hair and did exactly what he wanted. He also uses this massage tool, that was different. Fantastic place","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Benedetto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJF8xunnXzEOcEaSSnMWM_QSQoFyTTsa2NAavCqrqD5eMzLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best barbershop on the Northside of Denver. I have been coming here for years and never had a bad cut and fade. I’ve had Dan do zero fades and tapers and I have never left feeling less than fresh. Dan is a really nice guy and awesome to talk to. Definitely would recommend this shop to anyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKEIKuCkmq0GojF0nHcsEfdZnKbmc1qodfrXxNnMTM0XGvoMI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Really nice barber and I hate to say it, but I won’t be coming back. I don’t have a high standard for haircuts, but this one was noticeably patchy and poorly blended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPh7Fcx4NVaFDBsDOjb0kVpFLmkco3ZCv27NhB&fid=0x0:0x7459e57f88bbc51d"],"When":"2021-4-8"},{"Name":"ryan wilkman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKSeyxOuciH9VrtNLr3QMJKaMTgxidQ5sA7EqDXqJ8ohFVnKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went in yesterday after not having been to Chuck's in quite a while. At first I was a little skeptical as things looked different and I didn't see the barber I normally go to. So glad I stayed! Dan and his wife did such a great job. They are both very kind and I got one of the best cuts I've ever had. I'm a guy that usually find a great barber and that person is the only person I go to and Dan is definitely that guy from now on.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matt Allan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-HaVHaCCBYo8fJ0RPj3Hr3Yvz_-ZTYWtU5qfOef9gaFbULA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sweet, family-owned place. Chill, old school atmosphere.  Best haircut I've had in a long time and I will be back. Dan and Lily are awesome!  Super friendly, professional (20+ years cutting hair) and a fair price. $23 gets you a shoulder massage and a cut with a straight-razor neckline. Cash only, no cards.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Anibal Sierra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqhMXwZVtYx6c3yzf0Ue_Wv0QaFTHYv6Nbqh26Ww22-EQ0xQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been going to Piper at Blank Barbers for a while now, and I can confidently say they’re one of the best barbers in the area. Piper has an incredible attention to detail and always takes the time to make sure my haircut is exactly how I want it. They’re not only skilled but also super friendly, making the whole experience relaxing and enjoyable.

Whether I’m looking for a clean fade, a beard trim, or just a fresh new look, Piper always delivers. The atmosphere at Blank Barbers is great too— clean, modern, and welcoming. If you’re looking for a barber who truly cares about their craft and their clients, I highly recommend booking an appointment with Piper. You won’t be disappointed!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zachary D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJEiKPTqHfvq6rDKeKCHFlh_96hfdFQ37vqlcn20tQtMfvNuA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a fantastic experience at Blank. Courtney was very accommodating and so friendly! She offered a delicious espresso and I enjoyed chatting with her while my barber finished up with another patron.

Kylee cut my hair and she did such a great job. One of the better haircuts I’ve received in cherry creek. 10/10 experience!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Filippo Galbo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX24b0FFoIUMjD_3akO1T4v_-Sb3zjLUw0FBOkE0K8KHQtN4_EVuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been going to Piper at Blank Barbers in Cherry Creek for a few years now, and I can confidently say she's given me some of the best haircuts of my life. Piper is a true artist—her attention to detail and ability to understand exactly what I want (even when I can’t articulate it perfectly) is unmatched. Every time I sit in her chair, I know I’m in expert hands.

Not only is she incredibly skilled, but she’s also extremely friendly and welcoming. She has this amazing ability to make you feel at ease, like you’re catching up with an old friend.

If you’re looking for a barber who truly cares about their craft and their clients, Piper is the one. I can’t recommend her enough!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Will Lynn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRcd4q3R7GwUYIV_8PS2sXi-zyiW80WyK7yNTc5l9ktG_jWA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love going to BLANK Barbers for my haircut. The vibes are great and everyone is very welcoming!

I’ve gotten my haircut from Piper multiple times and have loved every singe cut. She is great at seeing the clients vision and executing it! I look forward to her cutting my hair!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Team Fox LLC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJqUom5WXVHP8JqyysGQCe52gLMsSs-G6rAgdRCX3v8d1qq9w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always love coming here and getting my haircut from Piper. She’s an expert, and always takes the extra time to get the details right. Every time I know I can come in and get a haircut that I’m gonna feel great with. Men’s haircuts tend to get less attention in my experience, but it’s never felt like that with Piper. She treats me just like a $200 salon client  Highly recommended. Love the close shave with the razor. It’s such a cool experience. She books up quick so make sure you have your reservation. Thanks, Piper!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsVZ61puDF4Kl3byrK7ijzI-5NQfCiLbeobGM_&fid=0x0:0x28716cc0550ed1ea"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Juli Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKaBMsTrRIUYYMlVEvFzPEAGLUWKKCaNrfnKJ6GhcV4AT9fqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience at this shop! Piper is fantastic – it took me a long time to find a barber who consistently delivers great haircuts, but with her, I know I'm always in good hands. She puts in top effort every time, and it shows. Worth every penny.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mary Wade","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4tNRoRIDOaWDVRTulqkjTGkw3XXmWZyS6BOqKpeFlkF2UpeYa=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We always go to see Piper here and have never been let down. My son always leaves looking absolutely amazing. She has a way of perfectly executing the exact haircut he wants and it is always right up my alley too. The vibe is always great and she's always so friendly and professional.  It took us awhile to find a barber we both like and we absolutely love Piper's work and will never see anyone else.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bonpyre","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdcDNlhjoHzWFSoEQdvxwcPXCjPibChQrF0X7C9QR4NiHcTDU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cool barber shop. The music was on point and the people all gave off great vibes. I also thought the places style was really nice.

First time I've got my hair cut in over a year. Madison was my barber. She was very nice and did an amazing job. Feeling a lot more confident thanks to her.

Will most likely come back again!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: R&R Head Labs
open_hours: {"Friday":["9 AM–7 PM"],"Monday":["Closed"],"Saturday":["9 AM–6 PM"],"Sunday":["10 AM–5 PM"],"Thursday":["9 AM–8 PM"],"Tuesday":["9 AM–8 PM"],"Wednesday":["9 AM–8 PM"]}
