user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Erik Strelow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFKXwuY84ZLrxz9MF3U3bsocRBsD_RSGaVCdPUF5DVOcM0-tJb-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best,quickest, freshest fade I ever had anywhere in Denver. Super cool spot, good awesome people, doing awesome things. Everyone needs to check out the custom hair product mixer in house, custom made for you and only you , on the spot.
Much love Deb an again let her know Mindi's cut game, an line up so on point you know, I had to come back just to snap a pic, and say thanks. Love every one there.! Only shop I'm going to from day one out till I have no hair to cut. !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtWCsMlfiM3pOIVvEAHUPCjri-tROn4V2wgIwe&fid=0x0:0xe4077a4df7d374f4"],"When":"2025-3-8"},{"Name":"Kevin Vidal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0dQvF2K3itT4pAa_t2SGGFO9zKVieZB4Mw3zjZ62eV7yEYnGs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"12.06.24
I highly recommend supporting R&R Head Labs.  This is a top flight operation, with class, style, and a great social mission!

Check them out.  Tell them that Kevin Vidal sent you and enter into their referral discount program.

Here's my experience.

I am always looking for a better  barber with the right combination of skills, professionalism, and a good attitude.  R&R met all bullets and more.

I was introduced by a news article focusing on R&R's mission to give formerly incarcerated persons a second chance.  It touched my heart, so I switched barbers and visited for the first time this week.

I was first impressed with the classy and clean interior of the shop.  ... spotless and high end.  The salon includes a "lab" that formulates your own personal hair products.  They sell a variety of other products too.

There are both female and male barbers and stylists, all extremely kind, personable, and anxious to please.  My stylist, Melinda, was not rushed and constantly checked to see if I was pleased.  I was.  She took notes for my next visit.  There will be a next visit!

I received more than just a haircut at R&R Hairlabs.  I received a warm female, gentle haircut manner, with good conversation, a hair washing, a steam towel to my face, and a conditioner head massage!   It was wonderful.

Guess what?  The price was competitive with my prior barber who does much less.

R&R Head Labs is dope!  And, they are giving their stylists a second chance.  We've all needed an extended hand, giving us another chance, at one point in life.

Please, please give R&R Head Labs a chance so that they can satisfy more clients, lift up more lives, and open more shops.

Thanks Melinda!
Kevin Vidal","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqYx5GlX1qMOqFsFOtheycm2xS8yu1TChLvScd&fid=0x0:0xe4077a4df7d374f4"],"When":"2024-12-6"},{"Name":"Nick Poole","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXd3Tv8iC1jrOZZnGbZU_WL5V5KMzJ0kOvZWSjAMGHKkS2g5gsW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went in today for the first time and arrived 15 minutes before my appointment, my barber was able to fit me in a bit earlier.

Not only did they ask questions to make sure I got the perfect cut but also explained some of the benefits behind the hair lab shampoo and conditioner they sell.  No pressure to buy but wanted me to know the details when I seemed curious.

Absolutely will go back and support this business. Great haircut and staff, if you need a cut, I can’t recommend this place enough.

Thank you R&R!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"William Boeckmann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJM3gamHnjbao3NvwfVk0-aaH8eXQ9Xmh_zulyNpH4fXr4ltA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"★★★★★

Tray is hands down the best barber in Denver! I was searching for a solid barber who could do clean, precise fades, and Tray exceeded all expectations. I’ve been coming to him for the past nine months, and every cut has been on point.

He’s consistent, detail-oriented, and knows exactly how to get the perfect fade every time. On top of that, he’s professional, friendly and makes the whole experience top-notch. If you’re looking for a barber who truly knows his craft, Tray is the one. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris Muecke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfFKg-QCm7DiNYqcCc-PF97nk6xzFgbwjPJFgTBKSp55LxYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a 5 star experience.  The people are friendly and the quality of your haircut is extraordinary.  Melinda was my stylist, and she took the time to do a precise job, and meticulously tightened everything up before being finished.  I live 2.5 hours away in the mountains, but I'll be commuting in for my haircuts from now on!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFt6xhA6evXi83gjD09EPPN5x-46oMFsM5VLB-Tgv8pzXYED4i=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exceptional shop. Dom cuts my boyfriend’s hair now regularly and I’m so grateful for her because it’s the Cleanest fade he has ever received! Barbering is an art form, not everyone can cut men’s hair or do a nice shave.

I used to manager a barber shop for a few years and some men just don’t understand you really get what you pay for when it comes to your hair and the pricing here is perfect! Stop going to Floyd’s go see a real barber here!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anthony Ortega","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8i6uImcxc4Rf3L63re3hlDRcf4m40Qul9oVSaVlD_qffNjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can’t say enough good things about my experience at R&R! From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with a warm smile and a welcoming atmosphere. The shop itself is stylishly designed, creating an enjoyable vibe that instantly puts you in a good mood.

Melinda is truly a master of her craft! She took the time to listen to what I wanted, offering great advice and suggestions tailored to my hair type. Her attention to detail was impeccable, ensuring that every cut was precise and flattering. I left feeling like a brand new person!

Not only is Melinda skilled with the scissors, but she also has a fantastic personality. Our conversation flowed easily, making the whole experience feel relaxed and enjoyable. It’s clear that they genuinely care about their clients and take pride in their work.

The final result? Flawless! I've received so many compliments on my haircut, and I couldn’t be happier. If you’re looking for a barber who combines expertise with a friendly touch, look no further than Melinda/R&R. I highly recommend them and can’t wait for my next appointment!

Thank you for an amazing experience! ✂️💇‍♂️✨","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jazlyn Hancock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwVMlZStBAKuQM8j3xfKa3jaOLsZv45edHzqiFTBGIdAI98Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the most amazing experience with Melinda at R&R! I found out about this shop because of the business model and was very excited to support the values, but was blown away by the experience. I have curly hair, and my stylist did an anmazing job with my texture. Melinda was very communicative through the process and took time to make sure the layering and styling was exactly what I was looking for. Everyone working at the salon had so much energy and was extremely kind. We also talked about future color ideas and my hair goals, and I felt super inspired by the entire experience. I cannot recommend this place enough!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shay A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWldE-CLWmdk-FSrB0SxWl8GLCOzFVAuPy3EsvdaCm3U8ZIJAY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If I could give blank barbers more than 5 stars I would. They are very accommodating to walk ins. Even if they don’t have availability they find a time that works best for you, the barbers are all professional and give beautiful cuts and you’re always greeted with a smile. I will never let my boyfriend go to another barbershop. They also cut my hair which is longer and very curly and it’s better than any cuts I ever got at a salon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPK3Kif-YP3KyIW_K7Ejbp3dkRwMhoTz9KnowcZ&fid=0x0:0xb4e7e5b4672655e1"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Mario Tweed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjeMYpVcJg5H4dVupxxfFUc_I7FWjbyIVBiWN0sOAUEKfGnBiv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been going to this barbershop for a while now, and it’s always a great experience. The team is friendly, helpful, and always accommodating. Booking an appointment is simple, and they’re flexible with timing.

Holden is the one who usually cuts my hair, and he does a great job every time. He’s got skill and attention to detail. Plus, he’s always up for a good chat if you’re in the mood, which makes the whole experience that much more enjoyable. Highly recommend this place!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael Rinella","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4DKKOdp3pT-fIeGx_RD6U2faTLB_IndBOter0oedDzrK8NA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite barbershop in Denver hands down. The atmosphere is welcoming, and the staff is incredibly skilled. I highly recommend Holden – he consistently delivers top-notch haircuts. Not only does he take the time to understand exactly what you're looking for, but his attention to detail ensures you're always leaving with a great cut. Highly recommend this spot!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nicholas Seewald","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKW-sSfY8AYwOWqCGjgYEOq2vI1TxDDC61mySSX0f7Dk4kdyw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Blank Barbers in Washington Park is a neighborhood hidden gem! It has been just over a year since I began utilizing Blank Barbers outstanding barber services. I am able to book my bi-weekly haircut appointment a month in advance. I also utilize the additional special services and I opt in for “The Experience” on a bi-weekly basis to relax and wind down. Literally, A Great Experience! I do what to mention a special shout out to my go to barber, Holden. Always on time or early. Holder is polite, professional, and I consider Holden, the best barber at the Washington Park location. One other special note, the entire staff are welcoming, genuine, sincere, and kind. Pretentiousness is not part of the cool vibe at Blank Barber Shop! I salute every single employee. Kind Regards- Nick S.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Phillip Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVFgPgrOXEl1ktzkqSwS1FcC2KxUHeOVDbxLqce1ZlXHV9xw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been going to Blank Barbers since their first shop opening in Cherry Creek. For the past year I’ve been a regular at the Wash Park location and Holden, my barber, has been nothing but exceptional. Dear a say the GOAT? Calm, attentive, funny, and someone you want to sit in the chair with.
All of their shops are always clean, welcoming, and have a genuine sense of hospitality. THE BEST. I’m about to move to a different part of Denver and will continue to make this my regular spot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christopher Anglin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsaUfu5zQReSlM8AdSzBhvWqya2pq2ctT3IvEt7kSWv57moGqu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tam was extremely gentle and precise. Her personality was welcoming and she works around the chair like she’s dancing. I’m looking forward to visiting this location for my regular cut and I will happily ask for Tam every visit. 10 stars would be better. Easy parking nearby. Beautiful building and location. Highly recommend Blank barbershop for anyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joe Esq","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLah1Vt3UlHl-tzq7WKQXDnaJTbeop4RnnpFEj4uIZuYMRDOA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Holden's attention to detail is amazing and always does a great job. Have worked with most of the Wash Park team and always looking like a movie star after their done. Thanks for the great work.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Parangat Bhaskar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYkKYoRz38JFCrANvs2izIPUFS3gMRfyzzQF26WffuCFjl-g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Mediocre experience. I have long hair, and went in to get a couple inches taken off and my hair shaped up. There’s an option to pick your stylist by their experience level. I picked the option for the highest experience stylist. But i dont think i got a stylist of that tier (i didnt remember seeing that person in the stylists available for that tier). I was trying out a new barber shop; but the haircut and the experience was pretty mediocre so I dont see myself coming back here unfortunately (because the interior’s cool and I wanted to like the place).","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Justin Baas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI6kAJbbgVJ53VVTpn7Ra58osCMuWPK08WJvJAj2Hvi2kzOng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am 39 years old and have never been loyal to any particular one— until I went to The Men’s Escape Barbershop. All my life I never had enough confidence in barbers or hairdressers and would resign myself to correcting their mistakes with my own clippers and limited ability to groom myself. Mike, the owner of Men’s Escape, is an expert. Period. He comes from a line of barbers and creates a smooth, comfortable experience for his clients. I have also never recommended a barber to anyone in my entire life and, since finding his establishment, I have already referred 3 of my friends to him. I would give 6 stars if I could— truly extraordinary experience 🤌🤌","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wes Steiner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTqFETcYjQDInj8-KQK2nzu25kuidkJ-BOE1k3G-6V3hFxoJIbqA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in here with my big brother a few weeks back. I didn't have an appointment and Michael mentioned it was his last cut for the day and that he was looking forward to going home. After my brother was done, Michael waved me into his chair. I was thankful to get tightened up last minute. He gave me an awesome haircut and I enjoyed hearing stories about how he grew up in his grandpa's New York barber shop. Every part of my experience was perfect. Next time I'm in town visiting my brother, I'll be sure to make an appointment to see Michael again. Great job!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"nick soley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIpGN7fJoZeTAQNgyXhwpRhjpSnBBnZ36xgHnb52mBbN7RwgA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kiara absolutely kills it every time! I’ve gotten multiple different haircuts from her \u0026 they have been amazing every single time. Whenever I have extra time I get the neck shave \u0026 facial done also \u0026 she makes it so relaxing for me, I always feel refreshed after. She is also amazing at waxing my ears \u0026 nose \u0026 always makes sure all the hair is gone. No matter what haircut you want I HIGHLY recommend coming to see her, she will let you know what looks good \u0026 what doesn’t \u0026 you will always get compliments after.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rusty GUZZO","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGNWUEpvFV8qeeJiT_UQPmtNnag4BUYfuhsE9QUW8KJXLH8w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Barber shop in Denver! I travel to Denver often and will wait to get a cut until I can get here! To add to how great they are, they do have free candy, coffee, drinks and snacks. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cody","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWgIRGgL8mcFzbAHKTHOCDcgUjgDHlncVhV7XohA3LLQha1w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jared did a tremendous job on both of my son’s hair. Couldn’t as for a better haircut and he was very friendly/courteous/professional.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhbQ0Z-n5JlokKkbajYn-ER_5oAa51LHYta46o\u0026fid=0x0:0xa163e9c54efe2414"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Steven Boe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVstkc_-nfiekQWM4vZEtAFomjwrTng032e-rEya7PqvsOY1bfB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I highly recommend Men's Escape Barbershop. I went in for a haircut and ended up getting a beard and eyebrow trim. It's amazing how something so simple makes you feel like a new person. Great job, nice professional staff and reasonably priced.  It's the only place I go when I'm in Denver.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Isaac Peel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3v4edQpnzVfhdfqhaA0-0x2VJWFH0NJCKqaM-Vf-cikdH1hmDTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kiara is amazing! She gets my hair done perfectly but it's her work with my son that stands out.  My boy is significantly impacted by autism and has severe sensory issues.  Her ability to work with him and keep him looking and comfortable is invaluable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Benjamin Sokol","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLVMJe_3QR_Dq7FsXkN_dLrDctqbnfoc-Ik5zPtNx7awOmeZ5U=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Michael is the best! Everything you can ask for. Really nice environment, extremely clean, and complimentary espresso, cookies, candy and drinks for when you get there! Easily book your appointment on their website and they’ll reserve your spot so there’s no wait at all. Very happy to have found a reliable and great barber in Denver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqQ7oC7EOstppVT6NY5x-ZaRPBpgYE2ZufPeMD\u0026fid=0x0:0xa163e9c54efe2414"],"When":"2023-5-10"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Brandyn Bell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUeDdlkmUgVN1gw7Sga_NKXCEqDpv6A4B6shxoTnh0oKKuMeX7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am always late 20-30 minutes and Pat always does my cuts, love they way he does them he’s definitely your guy for a great cut!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Benjamin Sweet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5nXB1nfAaceWE23Id37zd3vr3XilZO45v7Oz4vQxKEfLN6gSO_g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Truly a great place! Patrick is super friendly and all the barbers there are excellent. I rarely leave reviews for places, but they do such a great job on my beard that I wanted to make sure they get their due credit!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cameran Cleaves","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLO6-nbrg17izL-ksu4yZU7ytpqFaOBMjM7drccqsRCXvvLAA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Patrick Gives The Best Haircuts Out Here In The Denver Area\nI Go Every 2 Weeks Pass 2 Years","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shane Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSUfiTt13WE23_wbpNFJta7hjhqC8fwGYUjQKJvZFNw3nI_rno=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Andrew is a phenomenal barber! I’ve been seeing him for a year now and so thrilled with his new location! He’s a huge asset in the industry! Very personable, professional and always does an amazing job with my cut! I will continuously go see Andrew for his amazing skills and experience in the industry! If you’re looking for a new barber or need a cut, Andrew is your guy to see!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steve Martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURisGZnTV-hLkpUxhgM9dU1XyUgPdDn0NMz0ptx3IYBj0ItiY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service, friendly staff, Patrick go to but everyone will get you right","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Booker Gatson II","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfdYaB2Gy1-mz1mVAJKbno6qW-FqBM6TajUxECOw_2cn0bJw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Patrick is the best barber in town. He’s kind, detail oriented and has an eye for what looks good. I’ve even had my hair colored with him too and he has always done a great job. Over the years I’ve seen him cut all types of hair. Top notch experience and a good location, never had an issue finding parking.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pierce Morrill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJg8T7tEBJh_EXPhw0H1_mh80smVrst4qdq1sKXtCpuomKn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great atmosphere and haircut! These guys are always laughing while providing top tier cuts","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Trevor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWu_6Kt1W9AY-A6Ri9AikqeYxblDZ1hSIn2WVOp8kQzRn4GZ_s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pat is a legend. He’s a phenomenal barber, provides great customer service, and makes his clients feel welcome. Best cut I’ve had in over a year!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Soren Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwJNJ41PcNAypxqoUyut0rDRFrqKtSG3PKGF-tYCY1vxUsMw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always an excellent experience at the Tejon shop. I have had probably two dozen cuts from Justin and Jason over the past few years, and they always manage to make me look better than when I came in! The shop is always relaxing and comfortable, and the guys are fun to chat with. I don’t have kids, but I admire how well they seem to take care of their youngest clients. 10/10 recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jordan Lyons","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHHujhLa8G4axfR45uXeHorX3cVSeOyIg6bSTs6v1Aa4lut0cQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great vibe and not at all intimidating in the “this barbershop is too cool for me” kind of way. Friendly group of barbers who really try to achieve the cut you’re going for and don’t try to rush you out of the chair. Travis has been cutting my hair for years now and I’d definitely recommend him or any of his colleagues for a sharp cut and beard trim.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Collin Verner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5eP13giUT6u3WGeHA__UD6mjXmGziqPuCD-S-iIX79-CzCAJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My man, Justin has been my barber for as long as my child has been alive. His skills with a blade are not to be underestimated. I will never ever have my haircut by anybody else as long as my dog can hold a pair of scissors.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPopwwL2dWgnSisQ67SLEzC35ItIaFK7_gOVTM1\u0026fid=0x0:0x8061489bfafb5964"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Nate Wade","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViwyyCrEKuB2QEAox_U21CbyMA9dd0edg2U6-FwZTS0nX_3ZID=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Justin did an amazing job. Conversation flowed well and he truly sculpted my hair and beard. As it being my first time there, I will definitely go back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kellan Deyo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtDqHkINOofrDWGb9abTvTM2iWVC0BspflnKtsrQJEM3b1QIq9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This shop is absolute class. I’ve been going to Travis and Brandon for about 10 years as Prospect Trail Barbershop is the best there is in Denver. I drive a hour from work thru traffic to get my cut from Travis. Classic barbershop feel, good conversation, and obviously the best fades","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zach (zach)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtGMXMn4wQclsVzTHXt8Hi_vMWNF-pvBj_NewBhXStxOxo92c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here and got an awesome cut last week from Debra. Went in with a pretty vague description of what I was looking for, and not only did Debra really deliver, but she made suggestions along the way to guide me to what I was actually looking for.  I’m not a guy with great hair, but for the first time in a long time I feel really confident about it. I will definitely be getting my haircuts from her from here on out!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Clay Cole","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4M6Ktr02HHUfqkVp1bGyLNEJJhxqLivuUE6gnN_WqL8J5og=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Prospect Trail is an awesome barber shop and I always leave with a fresh and proper cut. The staff is welcoming and they carry on great banter. David Yorty is the man, he’s a fantastic barber and solid guy all around! I definitely recommend stopping into Prospect Trail on Tejon!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"William Sands","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMzgOCYtlZO2Kstd9SOy-9osKm8PLiiVyIIDMWxvnAmicMqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been getting my hair cut by Jason for the last year and half and he has never lead me wrong. On top of that, he’s a great guy and I always enjoy our conversations. 10/10 would recommend to a friend!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Brock Belt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWtNm8KL758Xr13LhU79gKrOr-ErItRUPDwC1yn-jNO7eyqIZaA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alec was fantastic. I’ve been looking for a good barber for the last 6 months and always left disappointed. But Alec hooked it up with a great cut and for a great price. Will definitely be my new go to spot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Josh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkz9NpsboSq91E346Px6HpkekSC-jrxvxWITRPcogoh8S7llr42g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had business in the area and needed a haircut. Walked in and Alec gave me the best cut I've had in years. Very knowledgeable. Understood what I wanted and gave me options. End result exactly as discussed and I couldn't be happier. Rock Time is a bit of a haul from my house, but believe me, I'll find a way back for my next cut. FWIW, place was jumpin' and everybody seemed really happy. Lot of positive energy. Overall wonderful experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paul Britt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJTcJWrUwRP3FgNSZfeD0EbGa3-esaYiPli4LhnV0xVmjSAqg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I moved to Denver from Florida so I was looking for a barber to do a nice skin fade on my sides, with a beard trim… I’m so glad I found this place… the barber I used was Alec ask for him if You want a crispy fade and line up like the one I got! He touched up my uni-brow too, and finished my line up off with a straight razor!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWGQ9ypbN1k8S04IJGUd3FfLsjI_yIbx1AZzxq&fid=0x0:0x880f4223fcee79d2"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Alejandro Delgado","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOXVvhrXvd-HJBORr91iDjt3SIU9Mvp9CbU1VH6u6NQ7uAlOY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been going here for a a few months now. I started booking with Alec and he cuts and fades really well for a good and fair price. Pays attention to detail and makes sure you leave satisfied with your cut. Would recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Romelo Bisesto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqENZfwyZucbmsCMC9aKs0NiuRZzgLomLGeJNxQfEvd2okKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been going to Alec for about a year now and have been very satisfied. Every time that I have went for a haircut, Alec has never disappointed me. Always getting me right with just what I had asked for. If your looking at this review then I would for sure recommend him, very trust worthy, very nice, and completely understanding. 👍","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Akzorz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8EdGXrLYYSLXKFZNKO7BSn0qyNSwFGblfgMbK_MwW4osgU0Z9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Home Town vibes with attention to detail.

Nayder was awesome and did a fantastic job.  He gave me the full treatment.
Haircut and beard trim took about an hour.
If you don't want the beard trimmed, you should specify though or they will just do it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bill Weber","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4RJY4YaiXUJTsDyRK5Y1Ge9ejBqMaeB4I6YwBWNXFSq_JDxI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Called and asked about the charge for a haircut, was told $30-40.  Sent my son up for a cut and he gets charged $55.  Called back and asked why, was then informed that each barber prices differently.  ZERO mention of this on the first call.  Will take our business elsehwere, not playing these bait and switch games and not being given complete picture ahead of time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joel Lemus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhW4fzX1I241UDMyD-36yTQUP0pbc4bDNjByMmKC5IK6GXNg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shout out to my man Eazyy! Been to many barbers thru out Colorado. And now I can honestly say that I found the one. Not only is he Talented at his craft but is also friendly, respectful, funny and keeps it professional 12/10 would recommend","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Trevor Steen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTkXqRN-5aLJeo8li5wIYbEIOmF86bsV81A8bPnYpjmvGdc0KdOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always professional for my son's haircuts. Is happy to give advice for caring for hair. Will continue going back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"soarzaxyy “Nmieyez”","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGnuZQ2jXF3N5gCnd8joLyze9Zz62glmYNJS_v0WdcLV9a9tKn3w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Buddy \u0026 O are amazing Buddy been cutting my husband and boys hair for years. We will NOT  GO anywhere else. He moved out of Colorado and makes trips back to keep his clients looking good. Love us","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kaylem Cain","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4bnGE0y1nbFcUkZGiRzVOr6W408cTcKsEj-2ECW_m1TbdLSU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Carl was prepared from the very moment that the toddler sat down with things to keep him occupied and patience to finish the haircut properly. It was very timely and my daughter thoroughly enjoyed it! I know hair isn’t a life or death matter because it grows back and you can always eventually fix what goes wrong but this haircut turned out beautiful.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Quinton Allen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTZubXvuNh-h_qHYhbmTddqMZmzKouZAc8Pk8IykzTdHguDA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally started to grow hair back from fighting stage 4 Cancer \u0026 O and the staff made me feel like I was normal. like I wasn't even sick. Gave me a cut to make me feel like a millionaire. It's not just a barbershop it's the whole experience of life that flows throughout the shop. Old teaching the young \u0026 the young keeping us from getting old. Lol. Love this place you and family would be missing out on great haircuts and hairstyles along with that atmosphere that is fading away and that's treating people like their people period.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Roger Simons","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjh7Bi1OlyIGRkMrsTzNJwiFgNKo1L56KS8HSWShSvKO69W_hs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Would give 0 stars if I could. First, your info says you're open on Sundays until 4pm. Wrong, came to the door to get my son and I cut and some dude comes to the door and I asked if their open and he says, \"Nah man, im not open, I just had to come in to do an emergency cut.\" Amazing, what the hell is an emergency hair cut? Anyways, I tip anywhere between 25-30% on a good cut and they just lost out on $100+ in addition to a potential return customer as I am a Marine Corps veteran and get my hair cut every week and I live 4 minutes away.... Amazing. Ill keep my business at Scissorhand Design Studio.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephon Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQKNTKmsoqZ-o_JeV2gjj16hC7oLYvHrXKizIcHMpTz_ZbaIs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Been growing my beard for over a year with no real trim, went to this barbershop for a clean up. When I got in the chair, the \"Master Barber\" owner of the shop didn't even ask me what I wanted done (my mistake) I assumed that he knew what he was doing since he was being assertive, when I got out the chair he cut all my chin hair down to the point you could see the skin again, my sides were still thick like I had huge sideburns and cut most of my mustache hair off. He sprayed quarter of oil sheen on my beard, \u0026 told me I need that for my beard, keep in mind I use Scotch Porter religiously, I understand that cutting hair is a side hustle for most barbers but it's starting to get embarrassing for alot of these black barbers, they take no pride anymore. Just putting money in they pocket.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tammy King","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLD_14AC-l_YSeYMC7Dn6vsIdfafDuASG3EGYJgppheP2CLA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This shop is clean and sanitary! I can’t say that about a lot of the barbershops in the area. I like how they don’t play vulgar music and use profanity while my 3 year old son is there. This was my first time and I will return.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"blake moya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsBHWkeG9hHrusklKMwk4wI1xvwurYqszb-_jW8gR28TBHxhgr-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best haircut I got in a while. People usually take tips 10 mins to cut my hair and they dont pay attention to detail but damn J hooked my head up. This is now my only barber and I recommend him if you wanna get faded up right","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alondra Simmons","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUx036i-kI9KrpOmt-j1CZ0mcYhU5O_Iv2UFLDNHY2nN1ZPfNU5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We do not live in the Denver area and we called Abu. He told us that he takes walk ins so we came in and he cut my husband’s hair super fast! He was extremely nice and very funny. I definitely recommend this barber shop.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jimmy P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJbkLfHnUqV1psZP1fpJmdrSOtkPJAma7Z2pTApT02x1wolyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing and the best barber hands down, maybe in the world! Asked for a mid skin fade and was done PERFECTLY. The attention to detail was spot on and it is apparent that Abu is an expert. I wish I lived in Denver because I would only come here!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMes42UyVDHnBeFYWphag0SNTmlGxtwcze4ZWfr&fid=0x0:0xbb656d6df175558b"],"When":"2024-3-16"},{"Name":"William Furlong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwGiPPj2gBRQqtF_M_m3oOUaXWm5nIiUwpT34IoW9i5oSGsoCSpw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Phenomenal chop highly recommend stopping in here . Grab a coffee next door too and chat a while . Great conversation in the shop and a very crisp line up. Definitely found my spot going forward.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alaa Almafrachi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0FflfLeqmMEZLsnG6HehYRDnnvBUREfw_v7JP-4i8awgJng=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to the shop with my brother and dad and he made my brother and dads hair so nice and they were so happy with it and I’m writing this review because abu saif barber did my eyebrows and they are so nice and clean I really like them and 100% RECOMMEND PLEASE VISIT THIS BARBER NOW!! (Mustufa almosawi : I don’t know what’s ur problem with him he is a great person and why are you doing this with you and ur brother and you guys are cursing at him what’s ur problem if there’s a problem just let him know and he’s a respectful and you told him he’s a really filthy person I don’t understand he’s a very good and nice person and your just wasting ur time commenting these dirty comments 🤦🏻‍♀️)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fady Said","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjvTAMp-B0nK4OEfbNDdziy5gjDELaPyldaEd8LEaYcySD3OdGvg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice people
Saif got the job done
And my cut was on point
Highly  recommend  them
Also the price  was super  great","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"B Ajour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWV2zNDQxquWTKCuc_YEs1UjLvqNFODoT7ZUHt8NEWQtq6T0ead=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you’re looking for a barber who truly cares about their craft, this is the place to go. 5 stars all the way!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan MacDowell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9LAW_zS7B8FZ-tq-k4SHGSoe5r5YaDXBpYjpG4ZcC0_7KYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for a beard trim and shave. Abu Saif was very kind and patient. Would certainly return and recommend to others.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dom Pawar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLv6VJiK70vCheGfdUbRadl55TKGy-8zPGBis4iySaiHbYrDA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you have Latino hair, Arab hair, Indian hair. This guy will get you 100% right. I’m Indian and I have thick hair and other barbers cannot do my hair or beard right and abu saif does both of them RIGHT. Feels like getting haircut back home.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: The Mug Shoppe Barber Shop Denver
address: 955 Lincoln St STE. F, Denver, CO 80203
open_hours: {"Friday":["10 AM–7 PM"],"Monday":["10 AM–7 PM"],"Saturday":["10 AM–6 PM"],"Sunday":["10 AM–5 PM"],"Thursday":["10 AM–7 PM"],"Tuesday":["10 AM–7 PM"],"Wednesday":["10 AM–7 PM"]}

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Zeana Dick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLBRYzVT34b82GhETIc4tTWTWoH2Q1-xDifhrDPppb2gARtVA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I came in on November 3rd around 12:15. There was one other person in the shop waiting for another stylist. Taylor went ahead and took me back. I was getting an undercut design and eye brows. My eye brows turned out amazing. 🤩 Taylor was nice and the shop was clean. As for my design for my undercut, I asked him 3 times if he could do what I wanted and if not we could do something else. He agreed to do the design I wanted and said he could. During the cut I asked if he would like to see the design again. He said no. As a person with 13 years of experience, I trusted him! Once done with the design, it wasn’t what I wanted but I thought it looked okay in the mirror. I paid/tipped, and left. Once in my car I took a picture and really looked at it. It looks like a vagina. I’ve had multiple people comment the same thing and it’s only been a day. I wasn’t going to write a review but I just feel embarrassed I have to have this on my head for two week. Taylor may be great at other hair styles no doubt but designs not so much. I hate to say I’m unhappy with the results. (First pic is what I wanted/ 2nd is what I got.)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYIYevAvZ7m1wDCH3eEvO3RHNPhVmMyR6cmfFH&fid=0x0:0x326ad2fb51b234e8"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Nick Archuleta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuKtTQoszNsHDkdI_CQkvS1yqKNjJ-HKwiEVjDjn2tUCKCEyqC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been a barber in Colorado since 2015 and I truly love what I do! This is more than a job to me it’s a part of who I am…. I recently moved to Denver and I’m currently located at The Mugg Barbershop…. If you’re in the Downtown area and looking for a barber who cares about what he does then stop by! I specialize in Skin-fades (Low, Mid, High, Drops), Tapers, Comb-over fades, as well as the Classic Traditional Men’s Haircuts! Hope to see you soon! Ask for or book with Nick Archuleta","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIwXxqWETgZi5s75w-NcvCbzO4NfAGwxwceSQD&fid=0x0:0x326ad2fb51b234e8"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Just Watson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaD95IVuJ7ZLLZFQlsF2OXV094cecTENcal4Dl60yjJa1K_RZA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dayna hooked IT UPPPPP!!! Last minute walk-in, sat instantly, fun and professional. The music was the best kind of ADD-Awesome! She took care of me and made me feel so special. The fade was fast and tight. She added a badass line starting from my left brow, curving back through the left side and it’s fire!

Dayna recommended I check out lunch down the street at Stoney’s and not only was it also spectacular, but the second I sat down, the patron next to me complimented the artistry!

I 100% recommend Dayna at Mug Shoppe!!!

-Watson
(Visiting - Flight Paramedic)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQ5_e9q2jyMbhi0jptZCXazzOXJ2x1U9e2M1Pj&fid=0x0:0x326ad2fb51b234e8"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Yossi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRdJToC05S7DLtq7I0gXUEWBn6kNUC0aZuOYbgtOkPiTHXhg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been going here for 2 years now. Dayna and Crystal are the best! Super friendly, and they know how to cut my hair really well. I get a lot of good insight to reach my hair goals. I'm really happy every time i get to schedule a haircut here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSpGIldcKVsKL_yFVMn-exIXdWPing4E_zw4oa&fid=0x0:0x326ad2fb51b234e8"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Jonathan & Tiffany Ray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5dZYU2iAjV7U1lCSl99bdVUPMHjFxzg1HLuy3l0JS_c64NE0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We LOVE the haircut! Shayna did an excellent job and worked with this picky mama! She got us the perfect haircut my son was looking for! 100% recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2gYJFQHghaUS3yifVH4C_KTMzqdSehH0BoyxQ&fid=0x0:0x326ad2fb51b234e8"],"When":"2023-12-4"},{"Name":"C M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIgRCM7dTKCIJz-WapaVZ5MmQuMA08UlTzWgfbNAGA1VMFTog=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hi everyone, I’m Cynthia and I am accepting new clients here at the Mugshoppe. I have 16+ years experience in men’s hair. I specialize in all hair types, razor fades, gentleman’s cuts, beard trims, and The Mugshoppe Signature. Book online or call today to schedule your next appointment!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1ZGMdVDrI6867BWn9t6I6JWLuk8aP_vYwQkbK&fid=0x0:0x326ad2fb51b234e8"],"When":"2024-3-27"},{"Name":"Elisha Arellano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLh37U9KND4uHRJkxXO1jz0d2pfuSoeiMyrDKAIUl77vkZO6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is absolutely magnificent 💯 The customer service was outstanding and the staff made me feel welcomed 😊 My hair was a disaster, horrifying lookn' orange with black patches 😬 didn't want to go anywhere and Julia fixed it 🙃 😅  talk about outstanding. Look at my before picture to my outstanding lookn' model hair picture 📸  I love it so much 💖 I look so fresh and so clean 😍 I will definitely go back. Thank you all so much ❤️ I will be back fo shooo!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHsAJWjadTYTcqCmHPGqElhBARqFSTIMgmN7gp&fid=0x0:0x326ad2fb51b234e8"],"When":"2022-1-3"},{"Name":"Nick Blagg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJEQXu2X1-8WnSdCpQ-3BGbhvPrb3vGw3_h5qe_QDv6PP_VEA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend recommended this spot and I am now a loyal customer. Always a great cut and the entire staff and the energy of the shop is fantastic. Sara is my go-to ride or die and always gets my hair right. Highly recommend both Sara and Mug Shoppe as a whole!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marvin Davies","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9vq16JE9hvZueZKO7LWri6gleU3G1cvHGEF2U5TdY9U9hk-u8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"New to Denver, and I got referred to Park Hill Barbershop. Herman gave me one of the best haircuts I’ve had! Would definitely recommend to anyone in need of a new barber, or just needs a fresh cut!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brittany Dawson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNQCJpu0Hc-bBhuEe8G9yPq9x6M9aZv0SUJEizgrkXUg-7lJZm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Left the Barber is the TRUTH! I've been to many barbershops in many states - NC, NYC, CT, TX - and here's the honest truth  - he stands out across all barbers I've experienced!!  I love going to the barbershop just like going to the nail salon so if you're looking for a clean cut booking with Left is a must have. I've been going to Left for almost 1+ year and his service is top notch consistently and never disappoints. From clear and consistent communication when booking online, to being attentive to cut your hair as you'd like, it's a 5/5 best in class barbershop experience that I love every time. I leave a whole new person, that confidence cut will do it for you 😂 Thank you for your incredible work!! Definitely check him out 🔥🔥🔥","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Martin Robert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaprWSaHJw5fXdQrgsZOa5Eqn_7bLG9a3kW7uSxCdqeKdy_TIk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very professional and wonderful atmosphere great barbers and friendly people","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mehret Alema","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI40XJK7TnqmY_XrRebBl2ExLtAMx4E5FuWskKBHX70uLn0xQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great atmosphere talented barbers, they pay attention to your hair .Easy 5 star.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kiesha Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXE9co7K0FaU5bnL9tlBkAObUuwX0zqZFXRbQxVQLFah41B10AZlw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you need a cut, look no further. Mr. Jesse is professional, and his attention to detail is amazing. Love Park Hill Barbers!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"L V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWZRgOiBQrIJvuL6KQzz59F0759YUGJSvD5pSMYYmOXME6Wd3s=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The tape-up fade on half my head was decent, the upper half of my head was absolutely awful.

I was the next person in line and some guy walked in off the street that was friends of the barber and the barber told me he was doing him first and I had to wait even though I was the first guy in line.

I had to go back and I asked for my money back, he offered to trim it up because the new guy wasn’t back to fix his mistake. It’s not fixed and I have to pay someone else to fix it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Monique Bankston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV83r9m2AQebONI-8CL0kln5DRxawE7ES3HE18M8adVQ4rnnTVr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"They do a great job cutting however I set an appointment for my son at 8:30 am, waited until about 9:15 and no one showed up. Very disappointing. The first time I came in they weren't very nice, I believe it maybe because I had a 3 year old and they thought he might give them a hard time but after seeing how compliant he was they loosened up. Don't know if I will be coming back, not very professional","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"steven mason","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLrfL6OHqjHetkJO5TdWC0Jho_9UN_MpIGICYjtRBwoIlJIH28=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best barber shop in the city parkhill Barber shop with your favorite new barbers and stop by and grab a lineup fade whatever you like","Images":null,"When":""}]

open_hours: {"Friday":["10 AM–7 PM"],"Monday":["10 AM–7 PM"],"Saturday":["10 AM–2 PM"],"Sunday":["Closed"],"Thursday":["10 AM–7 PM"],"Tuesday":["10 AM–7 PM"],"Wednesday":["10 AM–7 PM"]}

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marvin de Jesus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKIE7FY7XqQfztLjgYj_Kr0SN0kFoAUrZJqWdKwxUgOh67TuFz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend. The only place I let cut my hair. My hair is extremely difficult to cut because of the shape of my head and because my hair doesn’t lay flat. Aaron or Nick expertly sculpt my fade with sheers and clippers every two weeks. Aaron’s my go-to guy and has been cutting my hair for 8+ years but they’re all legit. Everyone’s very welcoming, fun, and very LGBTQ+ friendly. And, if you’re not in the mood to chat, you can politely tell them and they can just get to work. This is what every barbershop should be.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOp0TM2402cePp8LFkdQyDHZGNITJ0ylURp3RJ9&fid=0x0:0x6e094bfc94aaba51"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Joseph Fredericks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBwzL_h8pAFmD3BoxyBzFP8Jpyy8ufLF3ztim86gsVbClcU2wKTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great spot, great vibe. Billie my barber (25 yrs experience) was excellent and very personable. Ypu can't go wrong. Shop has at least 6 chairs and many options to consider. Worth a cut above other shops. I'll be back. 👍","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Megan Farrell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUc6c3TrfAwRC0agfhrbz8X1N0-7Er8JKS2sHM_OWeGWUiwSSO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been getting my hair cut by Aaron for about 2 years now and every time he absolutely crushes it! He is knowledgeable and takes the time to understand what I’m trying to do. I never feel rushed or misunderstood. His attention to detail and skill is unmatched. As a woman in a barbershop, I’ve had poor experiences before. All the guys in Fortune Cat make me feel respected and welcomed to be there. 10/10 every time! 🤘","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cameron V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTXMfON20f3BuAEbBuVxUeKUHhqNh_NWY8VvxwLXCWLOmxCTs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Killed it. In the best of ways, Aaron is meticulous and very detail oriented, I am very happy with the care and attention he puts into his craft.

After loosing my barber of 4 years this is my new spot!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fil Tekle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwmNZuSPCW97dRQuN_gLA2mpHTn3sY3SaGukqsXseOmAwaF0ve=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent cut! Billy Stump got me right for my interview with a fresh cut and beard trim. Relaxed atmosphere with a lot of art on the walls and barbers who you can tell have a passion for their craft. Shout-out to the owner Jesse, I'll definitely be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tyler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZ-MXz6yWMCn6fULXxCli3qsGMgi_p5T0DmPqaVgPsNHvIOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been seeing Jesse for a few years now and Im always impressed with my cut. The guys promote a welcome and aesthetically pleasing environment. I always look forward to my appointments.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike Pirone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLRxx5nEZLicnAf8RoefvYeOJU__ta-NhueoLwQ7-qRKb6emoxRw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jesse, Nick, and the boys run the best shop in Denver, bar none. The haircuts and attention to detail are impeccable. Don't expect a quick 20-minute cut when you come here - you're getting a one-of-a kind experience where they truly understand what you're looking for and have you leaving looking fresh as can be. On top of that, they're just absolute homies and the best people.

I moved from Denver almost 5 months ago, still haven't gotten my hair cut because I don't trust anyone else, and legit might fly back to Denver just to come here - it's that good!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Heidi H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPqi1aYRjmx6_KG9rrzGmvsG4i4BNk4VF0JBm98UvOZjsahz2YwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you want a high quality haircut by the best in the industry, then I highly recommend scheduling your next cut at this shop. I took my son here in preparation for school picture day and my expectations were beyond exceeded. Barber Zach gave him an incredible cut and has the right amount patience (not easy to cut kids hair) to do a fabulous job. The owner Jesse Diaz assisted Zach and I was completely blown away over Jesse’s knowledge, attention to detail, and ability to explain exactly what direction they were taking with the cut. These barbers not only know their craft so well they are also very passionate about what they do and it really shows. The customer service is top notch 👌
They also had Disney+ on for my son to watch (unexpected perk :)
Disclaimer: please If you want to take your kid here make sure you call ahead and specify it’s for a kid and what his age is. They will have to match you with a barber willing and skilled to do a kids cut, not all the barbers there will do kid haircuts so make sure to ask first before scheduling.
Also, like a lot of barbershops, It’s cash only so come prepared 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwt82d4qv53P-pjs0CT5OCPLHW8g8DpES7-NQ4&fid=0x0:0x6e094bfc94aaba51"],"When":"2022-10-2"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Brock Pattercurdle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxjXj7ryzvyT40vN4kScbhyZxpCKfnvFt5asEISDbzVb5i6BM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alicia has been my barber for the last 3 years and every single cut she has provided has been a banger. She demonstrates excellence and deserves your haircut money.\n\n1 on the sides, with 1/4 inch trim on top","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKd3eAzUqQ2mlLy3fumZS0U-cH3m118oXqQCmU56wJwa7e8Pg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been going here for over 7 years now and I wouldn’t go to another barber if I had the choice. I have always scheduled with Lu and I always leave with a smile on my face. If you’re looking for a professional barber that will make you feel brand new, Le Barbershop is the place to go.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Will","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbBPUxLBzX3wE0hLiwsgbr5fkODBGQrtaP7gSEY1FBt4aq2LOX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chantelle is hands down the best barber in the world. And I can say that because I've had my haircut in different countries such as Germany, Jordan, and UAE. She always has a positive attitude and makes me laugh. I've been seeing her for about 4 years now, and I will continue to get my cut from her for as long as she does them. I recommend her or Lou or any of the rest of the team. They are the best barber shop in town and well worth it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Asa Borne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItYMV2nY08_O7ZEVGzwMnqd-dN0A5Aai4j4CclCkWicVlVBg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chantelle is amazing and I've been going to this place for 8 years, pretty soon after I moved to Colorado. I went to another place in FoCo and hated it. So I had to drive back to Chantelle! Very reasonably priced too","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mark McQuaid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQAw8S9Ku8qO_Yry-OiSYzSC6lVuynstOTCXW1yPEMRXVqqU1T=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owner and staff are friendly and professional and the shop is clean.  Alicia cuts my hair and is my go to person for haircuts. She’s awesome!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jay Burbank","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVl3K7JzjKcKsINU1ZEc2s86msCNY06lnmmubRoMfc-7Y154n8j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"With windows looking out to Sloans lake and the nicest, friendliest barbers in town, I wish I had had faster growing hair... or at least a bit more of it. Definitely my and so many others' go-to for a haircut and they can normally get you in fairly quick. Great ownership and a relaxing environment.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Heather Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjq8fEPGqF0I4qXieKFQuOlNyLSye-za-JkFC2ZMp5j6v9hQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My son loves this place.  Lu is the best!  He is always ready for us when we arrive.  Great with kids! Also great at cutting black and mixed hair!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Toby Tutton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBXINRGaPuV5GuNB1BbWdn_Wh9JeAVMytntMzHTFk6nft7kA8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lu cleaned me up nice!! Awesome job, reasonably priced- will be returning for my next cut.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Ian E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGTIfnWkZAG1NVptdFwSpllXW74iAHq_BBQXH-_47v--HgTwgX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been going here consistently for 4-5 months. I like all of the cuts I've gotten, and just had the perfect cut from Josh M.  One of the friendliest dudes you could get a cut from, and he for sure wants your cut to look damn fine. Quality convo and the experience was on-point. Thank you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Enoch (Lufty)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL0Npz3XDTBGHIMgU5RV8fzP2wEVodcNdYUa2TwenFqd-nfCn8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great barber shop with some XGen vibes, Cafe racer mags, cool staff, accommodation was great as I am new to Denver. Great cut/fade! I'll be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Branden Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhkYS4PQR3O1uZXfHyKzW-4MQgXMSO3lYzWu1XPebSMoqW54ld=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I called and booked an appointment for asap and was in a chair in 15 minutes. Barber was very thorough and precise. He knew exactly what kind of cut i was looking for and was friendly and professional. The place has a cool vibe and the crew is down-to-earth and vibrant. Top notch.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sam Dever","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJbPvHzDoqzZz1KJOppaYyUr0PFccQ-Q0fZXMfHncI-gqMSfg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been going to Cris Portillo for 3 years!! He’s absolutely the best!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"William Edwards","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2fp6p_VPHTukMVGamDvFULV_JjxdsFi4YCl12WhXBtqbc-a91lg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service every time. Inviting atmosphere and great barbers. Highly recommend","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christopher Scott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWEaZlVM-b_XyBCS9WfuCtjVn-_c6MTm-2vLVgqOoAFig53FdLjA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Joe is a great barber. Goes above and beyond the standard to make sure you get the right cut. It’s clear he’s got a skill and a passion for it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Luke White","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPZP1G553Qu8JmqI0YtIKyNA-wLngLYozRCjEL8hxqHy_u-5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic atmosphere. Adam gave me the perfect cut with maybe 3 sentences of direction. A wonderful experience. They'll definitely be my go-to barber from now on. Fair and standard prices that encourage a large tip, and they have beer on Saturdays 👌🏻","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dennis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPRXQvqOOwniJVuuxYiyMb7dc64lZIrNiOHhNFQZBgPvvN-jY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a man, when you're done with going the stylist route and in need of a moden manly cut, then BC Barber Co should be your next stop. I've been coming here to see Mark Rossi for a couple months now and have been pleased with my cut every time! Even if you can't get in with Mark, any one of the barber's here will serve you up a proper haircut! Need a beard or mustache trim? These guys will have you walking out the door stylin'n profilin. Located on Colfax, a couple doors down from Goosetown Tavern and across the street from The Bluebird Theater, their location is convenient for anyone to visit. They'll get you in and out in about a half hour with prices that won't hurt your wallet. A no-frills barber shop ran by a group of class act individuals. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRakqNy2TB6wj0GWDSq2WuZhWbsguOr09k7sDq\u0026fid=0x0:0x1cbd7dcb0691adec"],"When":"2018-2-25"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Matt H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUI8WnI7RBAgM09zbziRfOJ_9qw36sUzUwTiarAdKR0VDVVrm7V=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My review is specific for Alan - I just moved here and Alan has been terrific for my past 4 haircuts. He does a great fade, really sharp with his skills (a bit OCD but I appreciate that!) and is extremely personable, super cool guy with great skills. If you want a good haircut definitely request my man Alan!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mario Escajeda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLBsXCNp731UPQh9kkYwFXC9Ew3bglraBQCWUHPfM0TbFb1A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Randy is the best in the country! Hands down. Family has been only going to him for over 3 years now. If you want the best come to Stan’s Barber Shop and book with Randy. The entire staff are top tier professionals! Great environment and you’ll feel like a celebrity!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"abe lincoln","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLOiYxG3_u8EYiGQf7fQAcfwOCIxztr36f-HZ7pOOunJjCvA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a cut yesterday from Alan, mother came in for a cut from Ariana. Phenomenal work, quick, comfortable, both asked about what we wanted and how. Wasn't some outrageous price, some other place quoted $186 at me. This was the right spot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cassie Maher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkjalx2RjVOlT8FxG7mJ_FAZSZ7kN_IF7F_5FWnW_FS6_Yvw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just had randy for one of the best hair cuts I’ve ever had!!! I was really nervous to get bangs and let him lead the way and I couldn’t be happier!! I really Ike the atmosphere of the place everyone is funny and it made me feel really comfortable. Randy was so funny and sweet and if you’re a female he is soooo amazing with layers!! This will be my new spot and my new barber I’m so happy!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bryan Au-Young","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXG4dd05SQWTLdMg2AgBdp9V5cTto1mYgbDziyrRuAZQ-WdGNnq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I took the time to try and show Randy a video of my hair after the last haircut that I got and the style that I liked. It didn't seem like he was very interested in viewing it. He then proceeded to cut my hair way shorter and drastically differently than what I tried to show him in the video. I won't be coming back. However, everyone including Randy was extremely friendly and they even gave water to my dog (I called beforehand to ask if it was ok to bring a dog).","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sam Shell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYHsroP-BY9Xum3tahUBB3NXZwsyoWz1Sr4yP78BOXKUepLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Randy at the ballpark location got me right! Quick easy and absolutely the best cut I’ve gotten in Denver","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marcus Connor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-isTLY29cBxt_0PdvuN3qeealMvN8ZhAWzRSHfnD6b45UFhTM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"What a wild ride! First , Randy was very friendly! However I would say he needs retraining in listening to the customer and skilslet . I explained to him I wanted my beard squared up with the dead ends taken off and get the sides tapered down while also getting an undercut 1 fade. The conversation was great but it felt he got so far into the cut and forgot the task at hand. He also cut off 4+ inches of my beard that I didn’t want cut off!!! I asked for him to even the sides and finish my fade, he kept telling me it was the light and that everything looked great. I will not return to Stans, this was incredibly disappointing experience. Anyone who has a long beard (6-12+) inches knows how long and hard a process is and now I have to start over. Extremely frustrating! A fairly simple cut left me almost unrecognizable from when I walked in and in a bad way.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Caleb D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLO2EH1nJ4KLMym-BShcPVaEMhfiICDAvGh_jC1H-dihwxhsF7z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Sorry to say the haircut I got here from Chelo was not especially good. I can only assume based on the staggering number of positive reviews here that this was a fluke, or that she was just in a rush for some reason, but it was uneven and generally exhibited poor attention to detail. That said, Chelo was very nice and welcoming, and I felt very comfortable there. You will likely have a better result than I did but I will unfortunately be going elsewhere.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dylan McChesney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLB98JaNT9L0674q6ueWKVMTRNchK-14ZZtb-RygpjqWawg-w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best barber shop in Colorado, hands down! Anthony Craven is an absolute master of his craft. Every haircut I’ve gotten has been top-notch—he’s detail-oriented, consistent, and always knows how to make you look your best.

The atmosphere in the shop is incredible—super cool and welcoming. The whole team is friendly and makes you feel right at home from the moment you walk in. Whether you’re looking for a sharp fade, a clean trim, or something unique, this is the place to go.

If you’re in Colorado and need a haircut, do yourself a favor and book an appointment here. You won’t be disappointed!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4DPkC7VN72Wxpq2RQavKj50cftkZrO24kAXHJgiJSoPmF_I6X=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Anthony Craven has been cutting my hair here for about a year and a half and my experience throughout has been fantastic. Anthony nails my haircut every single time, is always on time, and accommodating when things have arisen forcing me to cancel or reschedule.

The vibe of the entire shop is exactly what you expect from a barbershop in all the best ways. A lot of fun banter between the barbers and clientele, good music, and an overall welcoming environment. Highly recommend Steadyhand for anyone looking for a new barber.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tristan Sticha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyjNDDbWHDjycA64xHlD3LZTIGMWmx_DaO6EkAG8HxaUxLjMOY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gabe Padilla is the man and I highly recommend his cuts. The barber shop is a great all around vibe too. Hands down the best place to get a cut in Denver.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jonathan Benefield","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIUaSiHkZQK9BKdXtzXjooeWFVovd24H8gETUszWX1vnVzHQA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time here, saw Nick B.  He was great, he schedules in 1 hour increments and really takes his time for the full hour to make sure every detail of the cut looks right and even.  He even gave me a complimentary neck shave.  It was so nice not to feel like I was being rushed through like so many corporate chains.  This is small local business at its finest, come out and support these local barbers and see the difference for yourself!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Timothy Phearsdorf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWePk3YmHaZvnbqaSe9xEN1AWWd56Kkjt-3k_WOZlEBOgooqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Anthony is the man. He's fun to talk to and the whole time you forget he's in the middle of giving you a great haircut. Guy makes it look easy! Would highly recommend Steadyhand Barber Co.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Patrick Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKv8PUEtWF8LMQyr1VtjGOnRtUIDcDaSxAX0ThGX7rPsNYdfg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thrilled with my recent beard and haircut experience! Talented professionals, stylish results, and a welcoming atmosphere. Highly recommend for anyone seeking high quality Barber!
Thanks Gabriel!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jerimie Rothwell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVPFAKmMNiNKyts3bPWT4S6gi1ZjAUFqP0T_qay4ROampeHm0U=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had never been into steadyhand barber before, but the experience was amazing. My barber was Gabriel Padilla, who thankfully had an opening last minute.

I had a full haircut and beard trim, and everything was outstanding.  He is an awesome down to earth guy, who had exceptional attention to detail. He went above and beyond to make sure he understood what I wanted, and delivering amazing results.  10 out 10, Gabriel you're awesome dude!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lance Frey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5pC14oFfJQ1QSawaj-J6hwl1Kcyr5rSQNUrXl9Qt-QRqu3w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been going to G. for my cut.  He does an incredible job and pays attention to the details.  I highly recommend this barber shop located in a great neighborhood and very cool space.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"K. L.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV14V3On0adbGceHpwJ2Gbty9rGR8VaXzpgpQ6euSrLaO8JnbVFbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wright's barbershop is a 1 of a kind barbershop, that appreciates its clients, offers reasonably competitive prices and the barbers are extremely knowledgeable and dedicated to their craft.

They work by appointments, which I personally like.  I've gone to several barbershops, but Wright's so far is my favorite!

I've had many conversations while receiving haircuts and I keep going back.  There are 4 barbers, they're all great, but the lady barber, is extraordinarily talented.  She's worth making an appointment with!!

Further, this barbershop has operated for over 50 years and is family operated.  Plain and simple, Wright's Barbershop, is the place to go for a cut, conversation, professional atmosphere and reasonable prices.

I give Wright's Barbershop an A!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Darryl K-M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOXUSVAyLQhv76Y0zCkVbwNlfIFKZbBnTvYODqo4spce3K8cot8g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Neighborhood is not that great but the people that work at this barber shop are terrific.

I have been going ever two weeks for quite sometime as it was close to my downtown office. I continue to go there for the great service and attention to detail. It's not for everyone as the neighborhood is terrible, however if you can look past the neighborhood this is really a great barbershop.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Liam Moore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6Cwapqk59VomtcCyT4_jZWdaHVL3XjNWxKNMcJR9WjTL0VbFBJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got my cut from Dave. Great communicator in terms of figuring out where I wanted to go with my look. Great conversationalist throughout the appointment. Pretty awesome to be able to get an affordable, neighborhood-feel haircut close to downtown.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lisha Graham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXffao40y6Eh1oWSC0ae90DtUms7lk_g-Er0bjHT4_VIWs8thKr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Weights Barber Shop has been a staple in the neighborhood for as long as I can remember. The atmosphere is friendly and welcoming. I enjoy the conversation and people. It makes the neighborhood still feel like home.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Luke Ferguson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFxN1azVbNPYtwQUBZ4vvbUWC-G5x-HglrgTaOjrptGqScX69j=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Local old school barbershop. Prices are great, cuts are even better. Friendly and talkative bunch, open to outsiders. Made it a point to let me know I was the first "White" person to come in their shop in years! This has now become my local go to spot!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Doug Yarn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWm3g66GTZBzteTZeVPbsKH6c9q1p965mJ7hJ6TwbWekWbREtI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always feels like the rich and family feeling I have felt each time I went for a haircut since childhood.  Having to find a new barber each time I have moved residency, I consider myself to be somewhat of an expert at finding premium class barber shops.   This one is the crown ornament of barbershops of  Denver.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pierre Wood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxVcH3ZzHJTbrvKS1vtvw0Xq5jr5J_KG9881OyH0mGeESxow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have gone here for years and i still get the best haircut in Denver","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Blair Draper","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjelFsq96pNOw-cpG52Gw1mYoD5jz0rQlEztoo26FM_yw3S3_c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Damn - this place is old school great. Haircut was solid and the conversation full of the history of the neighborhood. I'll be coming back.","Images":null,"When":""}]
