user_reviews:
[{"Name":"DeeLux Official","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnXZa-4VN5rBm8uFBeMZ8pQDXQx8oX0-oshs299qdGgdJDmT1o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Monai braided my hair and Khysin cut the sides after. Hair washing is included with the service! Stimulating conversations.. great music selections.. this spot had it all and then some. Very excited to come back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOF8_Sr-yktumA1K0D545ggXgHI10fk72Dsk5HC&fid=0x0:0x84c692940bc3ee4a"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Emmanuel Akot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJIU8_Qu7SnE2S_LgYbvyuHbYvFQt06prCN4Cq3r6GaJeKyCg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cleaned me up well before I headed back home to Sioux Falls , great service and very friendly employees. I Highly recommend for anyone in the Denver area for a getaway or a trip.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ethan Bynoe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfsCUV9D-CFidQDX_vKKf5daoT_Umpk4k_4ZqFEHB7yM9d_G8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I would do 2.5 if Google would allow that but my experience was not even 3 star worthy. There are some things you should know before you go here.

The good: My cut was good nothing above average and my barber was a nice cool guy. This was my first time going to this place so I walked in to a completely dead barbershop. I asked the Barber if he had time for a walk in or if he had someone scheduled soon. He said no I’m good and I sat down for my cut.

The Bad: Once the cut was over is when the the issue that makes me not want to ever go back occurred. I was informed that since I didn’t have an appointment as a walk in my costs was $75 instead of the normal $55. Now if I had pushed off or impeded someone existing appointment I could understand being charged a premium for that but I didn’t. The barber would have sat there with no business and make zero dollars instead of some money. It didn’t feel right to me to pay extra for filling his otherwise empty schedule. Then I found out the only way to pay was Zelle or cash. Since I didn’t readily have those options available I went to try and find a working ATM. That didn’t work out so I had to transfer funds to another account just so I could pay with Zelle.

It seems like if you have a policy to charge people more who you know it’s their first visit at a minimum you would inform them of that before you started your service so they can choose if it’s worth it or not. I could have made an appointment for later or booked the appointment through Booksy at that moment if I had been told. No one even gave me the option. Also if you can only accept limited funds that means you can’t accept a physical card so that also would have been nice to know up front.

So hopefully if you are going there for the first time at least you can learn from my experience and decide for yourself if it’s worth it. Again the folks were nice and the cut was good but not above average so paying $75 for it just didn’t sit right with me at all.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Devin Coyazo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbLYD1r3RRzIFuHizKj4KAhnY0Y0q6bE-sxzE30QAgvWvg9thE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This guy is truly exceptional. Not only does he make you feel completely at ease while you chat, but he also offers genuine wisdom and insight. It's clear he’s an honest and loyal person. These are the kind of individuals you want to do business with—top-notch service and an outstanding haircut every time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Glen Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUlSqEobLjlbLnVrtl6sPYHuAMzEmlBgItEtfbegCqvIkkug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been going to Khysin for a while now. Great barber. He also recommended shampoo for the bumps I had in the back of my head. Used shampoo 1 month and 2 weeks. All bumps are gone. 5 stars","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Where Are The Maracas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXCi2O0L3Hg3S6QWdZj4Ze1h3qmnrbJacIDb_s_61wdPYGkweM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"BEST BARBERSHOP EXPERIENCE EVER!! They killed my man’s hair it’s exactly what he asked for and he’s looking for, amazing customer service and everyone there was so welcoming it was our first time going!!! i would absolutely recommend coming here and we’ll be back for sure!!🫶🏽","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jude Ernest","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD6EPis-a0lqjea45MLvzaYbzKF52mw7TfyS3lEL7-URw7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing service. Noble is very welcoming and her work speaks for itself. She transformed my dreadlocks into a whole new crown and I could not be happier with the quality she put into the process. The environment and ambience alone is a place you want to be, a genuine shop experience with friendly people.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1wKnonXel2XzhwDR1YnC4fOIj2cVXk-lE3Vg&fid=0x0:0x84c692940bc3ee4a"],"When":"2021-9-22"},{"Name":"Herbert Collins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhT5n5A2VEnqJVDoxzVPB_DsAe473sIszxOI68VSWFuAN2W2uw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great time, the cut was great. My barber was Don and he was quick and very detailed","Images":null,"When":""}]

I'm always excited to see Sam and Marcus because they treat me so well. Grateful to have them as neighbors. Also, I've gotten literally the best haircuts of my life here, so that helps!!! You should try House of Hair out for yourself and tell your friends.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bae of Louisville","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSBatmg-HlfMABM9ibva-ExxdwSatdoNcNJDshcfPGXiWMS2yG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Barber in Da City and mhmmmm can the braider’s braid","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbHd1wOxke2YD4sHRPiulfecE9kTErTiTDilQm\u0026fid=0x0:0xad445b850a4ba1f"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Anna Harris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLKXI9PvbOF8tIm4erR2ApBuKXG15vkaH8OPh89Q-8AWoIXug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My mother (70 F) just called to get some information on a haircut. The man that first answered didn’t have any answers. He then passed the phone off to a lady that had more questions than answers. My mom asked if she had to make an appointment, the lady said yes. My mom said that’s fine can I schedule one, the lady said no you have to do it online. My mom said I’m not good with the internet can I do it over the phone, the lady then said well how did you get this number then do you have a referral to get an appointment? I took the phone and hung up because no I don’t have a referral to get a haircut. So moral of the story. They don’t do walkins, they don’t make appointments over the phone, and you have to have a referral to get a haircut.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yur'Superior Excellency UponHigh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVB7TkiSJMRgl7r-Yxuh53dR7931jTIeDJc6PauI9QVt_-8tWTKLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Looked all over this city for a black lady barber. We never leaving","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elasha Starks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUwWCFxaem6QE80bGX6-vpVFCq1WtKZpO19KhL5rLVcEKH79PhY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely conversation and beautiful spirits. I finally found this place that does. I would have never thought to look at a barbershop. But so happy I did. It’s more than just that.\n\nI definitely recommend them . Especially, Kacjae who did my hair. She is a very talented and beautiful young lady. She was very friendly. It was a great atmosphere with even better vibes with great customer service. Can’t wait to go back. Give them a try , I promise you will not be disappointed.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tyson K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxHsDQSXvFbd8h3CXVL6Lc4my8-PcTtF2hsagvmeI4etmvs3V3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an exceptional experience at Floyd's 99 Barbershop Denver University thanks to Bobby B. Her knowledge and skill were evident from the moment I sat in the chair. She took the time to understand exactly what I wanted and delivered a haircut that exceeded my expectations. Beyond her technical expertise, Bobby B. was incredibly kind and made the entire experience enjoyable. I highly recommend Bobby B. to anyone looking for a top-notch barber who truly cares about her clients.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matthew Samaha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8Xn0ENB8KAQv5YTYvx_MLe8AamXCfU7odK_fi8_lOVXTLSA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Wanted my usual head shave and a beard trim. Got charged full price, but only got a buzz with trimmers. No products, no extras,  nothing. Beard is also crooked, but I didn't want to ask her to fix it. I like Floyd's, but this one was a bad experience for the brand. She was friendly, but the work sucked. I recommend trying any of the locations first. Next time, I'll wait instead of having to pay twice.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Julia Clemente","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdYQNcn9zoShWr2VRpyUrOsrcXXp7oHezYxc5BtZ4Z8Rm-_bYrBw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I brought my two boys here, and the results are incredible. I love how the hairstylists are patient, good at making the kids comfortable and real professionals as they do a great job in such a small amount of time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Seth Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW79RaZjIWIC0XlraeO0pG_jU8mUtoRoscPWQ1Z-Dz43M7IRJgV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I don't love Floyd's. I can't. It's a blinking corporate, albeit its origins are in Denver. I also don't love that many stylists don't last long before they jump ship. However, I have had mostly decent haircuts there so until I find a barber that I trust again, I will keep going back because I really have enjoyed all the people who work there, even if I only get to talk to them once or twice before they leave. It's far from ideal but many things are so...","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Linda Raunig","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPXu4ZytqX3WlbxY5tzKyvPn1UgFHFbzM2hTryAK7kCgnaIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Angelika rocks! She's my new stylist. She was kind and professional. Best cut I've had in a year. I will be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Claire Orner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjrGOD4PnkP_3WOuwEDE_Iq6lrznq54EKrPWo_o9sTwTAMLg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jessi was very helpful, kind, and professional. She is the first person to get a haircut right for me. And I’ve paid a lot more for a women’s cut at other salons.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Javan Pohl","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGpBs56egBsv-mAup5sYo7gzGDzNfVrHzobRNYNwZb_rMLM-JWBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Basically a more expensive version of Great Clips. I've been twice and it's like they're trying to get your haircut finished as quickly as possible which includes not communicating very much about what it is you're looking for.

Often I think "well the stylist will know what looks good regardless"... which was not true on this last cut. One of the worst I've ever gotten.

One thing you can tell the staff IS trained to do is upsell you on other services (shampoos, massages, etc)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thorean Desmontaignes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiYUBIgOe2_DlaaMj8xZO_RzvOpIAz-5k0WMofvXmT4oRMDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The nice lady who cut my hair did an amazing job of cutting my hair and beard then styled it up perfectly giving me a tutorial on how to do a much better job myself. I am really bad with names and have forgotten 😢. But thank you so much I got lots of compliments at the wedding.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alexander Perez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkihfi1DeSst_tkAIusMNS-9cUz86P7Akm71LZ2VklqsAnKUe7kg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Started going to Blank after about 5 years of Floyd’s. Great location and atmosphere with lots of light. Friendly staff who are down to earth. Andrew is an amazing barber and professional. He takes the time to understand what works best for my hair and always delivers a precise, clean cut. He’s always happy to share tips to keep my hair looking its best and on top of that, he’s just a chill guy to chat with. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brian Carroll","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcFQ1M2mFnREUbT_seYl4Ik9Bo9mOGwBmr5OigCH7HARYxxiQT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a man with lots of tattoos and a beard, I always thought going to a barbershop with only men with lots of tattoos and beards would be the best fit. Turns out that has never been the case! I won't name names of these other shops I've tried: places with skateboard decks on the wall, places with training certificates plastered up of at famous barber schools in Amsterdam, places with fancy whiskey bottles on the counter, places with stalls located in trendy "food halls," and so on and so on. I've just never had a great haircut at any of these places. Sure the banter is fun, but it's all just a bit too much in the ego department, and none of these "dudes" really cared about a good customer experience, it seemed?

Which brings me to Blank Barbers on Pearl Street! As a personal aside: I recently dropped about 35 pounds, and was very scraggly looking, with a long gray beard and a thick near-mullet after not having anything done in about nine months. I just was not feeing my best mentally and physically, but after shedding some weight, I was ready to look my best again everywhere else. I did some research on Blank, and found their stylist bios extremely useful, and found a nice match in Bri Almutairi. Meeting her on the day of my cut, she put me at ease right away. I showed her a picture of my last good cut, many years (and many pounds ago), and said I wanted something similar. It felt like a collaboration from the beginning, which was very refreshing. She had a few questions but really I just wanted her to guide the appointment with her knowledge and experience, and she did not disappoint! I also had the beard completely shaved, with only a perfectly sculpted mustache remaining.

We had a nice chat, but the small talk never felt forced. She checked in with me about how things looked, but still asserted a great confidence in what would make me look my best. Just a wonderful, balanced experience all around.

The location itself is lovely. No tattoo shop vibes, nor a pretentious, faux-classy joint either. Just a clean, well lit place with some lovely cactus, vinyl spinning on the record player, and the offer of a free espresso upon arrival, which I gladly accepted. Simple, beautiful in presentation to go with the simple and (dare I say??) beautiful cut I walked out with. Highly recommend Blank Barbers if you want to feel welcomed, content, and comfortable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPu5FSsi9w6yywik7gnhVjehPcf9PEVcQHnnNeM&fid=0x0:0x2f8ba584486ea983"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Tyler Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLSafNzJWPTo-6GlvkFSWmeV3XV19nZNW1Oh3Nw2OqcZ2xAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been searching for my preferred stylist since moving to Denver 9 months ago and knew Allie was my person within 5 minutes of sitting in her chair! She is extremely personable and, more importantly, has a wealth of knowledge about her craft. She helped me articulate exactly what style of cut I was searching for even though I used all the wrong words. I cannot recommend her enough!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nick “Mcbee'z Kneez” Mcbee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUnIdoBOQ_EiadydtfD5kbl3ac-Z3orRLRM23DbnN9zaDkTxdHn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite spot to get my hair done, and my son as well! Always the most professional and best quality haircut i've ever had! Also great people and great vibes! Definitely go here!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adam Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUZVPDjxEXTjNw9VS7DeE6krsNi07c7QA4owdYKaH268v355E2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been going to this location weekly since January, and let me tell you there is one person who stands out! The light of this shop is the front desk, SHAY! She is always consistently kind, helpful, and professional. She has one of those magnetic personalities that are hard to come by. I’ve waited awhile before reviewing to have a fair opinion. I actually look forward to our weekly chats and she is always upbeat and positive! Can we get this girl a promotion or something because she is what the service industry in Denver needs. She is a far cry from the other people who work there (sorry guys). I would be remiss not to acknowledge my barber, Jose, who is by far the best barber I’ve ever had! My only suggestion is to add wine or an included shampoo with service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Gonzales","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwo5G9x1gPJ5UCd8AjWO90g7MqmzB2teJhQ8clvHjFVXnj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went in looking to change things up. I had done some research and loved the blank barbers offers a little bio of each barber! I read that Bri liked doing fun haircuts and mullet was included. I had been wanting a euro trash haircut for a while and she delivered! Will be back for follow up for sure","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"blake","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKBcg5AWyEal8876X-QATDjH1QPZYyDlOY1FQJ3l3Uiywp8MA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great barber shop, comfortable atmosphere, and amazing barbers!
Jose is EXCELLENT with hair and beards! It’s been perfect every single time and I get compliments on a regular basis! In the 2ish years I’ve been coming to Blank, I’ve needed a last minute cut when Jose hasn’t been available and everyone has done a great job every time!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Axel Aragon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkWwfK0mckUWPqpXxBeeHHQvUr0x8z_LFuegzsg1adveQHOA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This review isn't a direct reflection of Blank Barbers as a whole, as I've had phenomenal experiences with other barbers here. My main issue was with Dillon in Platt Park. Although he was about 10 minutes late, punctuality isn't a big concern for me. However, he didn't deliver the haircut I requested. I asked for a mid fade, but he gave me a high fade, which was not what I wanted. While he’s a super nice person and I don’t know if there was a miscommunication, I just really was not a fan of the haircut he gave me.

UPDATE: The owner went above and beyond by offering to cover my next haircut, even though it wasn't necessary. I truly appreciate the initiative and the warm, friendly atmosphere from everyone there. Their commitment to customer satisfaction speaks volumes. I can't recommend them highly enough!","Images":null,"When":""}]

Cannot recommend highly enough!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Drakkar Belisle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoqQ2oVUepGppobCOk7MgISfXlRmqKBYNr0tZhCaUB7wZSJyyD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got matched with a barber, did a great job, loved the environment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9edKIsulExWI_Q3o4_R1foUu4JztA7eIL-aBG\u0026fid=0x0:0xe3318f8a33892922"],"When":"2025-3-5"},{"Name":"Brianne Gollwitzer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXMlMMiQ1I7VMp6yqDBd4vdcemNmveDiyIWSms4ZKCMgXBBYa6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jenney Ruzich is the BEST!!! user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Raman Shalupau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfAO5s97CJ9F2JwpHv6SW8m5HyQ5vqd06dzy0C7hjedTbhQfwKZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"If you need a fade - avoid this place. The most uneven fade i ever had in my life. Embarrassing really. Barber showed me in the mirror a few times before completion, and i said that the back is not even. He tried correcting the back one more time and finished with "this is the best i can do". This was a $40. Probably need to spend another $40 to fix this. Sides were done okay, tho.

You be the judge:","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyMbLgjAJIytRD0VJDh7j5P8WRBNu-iyve28nK&fid=0x0:0x7f2ce235c01676ef"],"When":"2025-2-20"},{"Name":"AJ Bender","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuT8VwMAKU5mjgLLm-ESwDG-BK9oXhMnE9kI0pdx3Injp8QQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been going to Stan’s for over 2 years now and have yet to be disappointed. Stan has an incredible attention to detail and won’t let you leave until you are happy with your haircut. Best barber I have ever had in 30 years!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Greg Best","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTUntV5fInPKzMgp3hkoZUV9yti8QqT7AIHjdWRNJ3XvNsi20E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Went in for a haircut this evening. I provide very precise directions and pictures of exactly what I wanted to avoid any and all confusion.

I keep it about a half inch on the sides and 3 inches on top to style. Despite clear directions, this was completely ignored. I was left with maybe an inch of hair on top.

Yes, hair does grow back but when you give very clear directions regarding what you want and you get something very different, it’s quite frustrating.

My hair was also cut with my back to the mirror for some odd reason. Can’t say I’ve experienced that before. Won’t be going back.

Picture I provided vs what I got. Pretty stark difference in length.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDlP7fyk6PuaLyqIGaxR2GYKBBzY897MEK9TiC&fid=0x0:0x7f2ce235c01676ef"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"James Macrae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIupOwCpNUbqQIyRZaI-qcgmWqilLgtJYdoBtbWA6PQV7e2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got a burst fade from Stan, couldn’t love it more. Got a haircut from a different barber couple months ago and have honestly been self taught how to cut my own hair as I have had to fix numerous things surrounding the cut. Stan’s the man!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matthew Schepp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRNq7I5DEav8IVxANbXl8DwsB-lFn4ikodjAuV_-eS6Vby95Wd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stan's Downtown Barbers is a great find! Relaxed atmosphere, friendly conversation with Stan, and a perfect trim. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jake Pasquine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPvMma55QEa_SF3ZJ40qBIBaa0b-2mS0HeuMYLGS7hcVYSwc8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been around the block with many barbers and Stan is by far the BEST anyone could ever ask for. The classiest, most polite gentleman who truly loves what he does. Stan has zero ego, listens attentively to what the client is looking for and executes with an incredible fade/cut. I could talk to him for hours because he truly cares learning about your story and perspective on life. Already looking forward to my next cut.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rico Müller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0fmMxCjeWviyAeqE7dsbepQbmVFoacThs_eTmbKdFLo24eQsG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stan did an amazing job, really appreciate him taking the time to give me the perfect beard trim! Can only recommend","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kyle Macdonald","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVVOmmgubcAebpR1BseySWO973Q-fBGJZayONpYOoO3TkwcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been looking for a quality barber that didn’t break the bank and I got that and more at Stan’s. Stan is a very, very high quality barber and cares so much about what he does. His precision and attention to your individual needs when it comes to haircut is unlike any other place I’ve been before. He’s also the best beard guy in the city. I plan to go back to Stan’s for a long time.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Dallas Diggs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYZzLV-IE8W5521LYbNCb_0Om28a0-mP8ajDRNBXG0jGikQGY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a Barber student that is new to this location, not working but as a customer I just love the energy here everyone super cool. It’s a cool shop. It’s a cool area and it’s just Denver but Sammy is my Barber and she is just amazing. I mean as far as customer service as far as price quality good conversation and knowledge you can’t go wrong can’t go wrong. I would recommend the shop to anybody even if you don’t live in the area all the other Barber just qualified and Cool, I will be here for life Even if I mastered, cutting it myself!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5TAY6eM3xTqkbS5Z9GfqKP0YFO7WvX1LfXAkx\u0026fid=0x0:0x6418ed0b9d937402"],"When":"2024-6-7"},{"Name":"Kristelle Naranjo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWdZ5f17BOngZxXetAnp9Xm-Plk2pVsZgQu0IIsrPgJxyEPg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I take my son to get his haircut by Sammy. He has been growing out a mullet for the last couple of years, and likes it cut a very particular way. I have taken him to a few different barbers and we just couldn't find the right barber until Sammy was recommended to us as the mullet expert (and that she is!). She has done an amazing job at not only understanding what he wants/likes, but cutting it and keeping him loving his mullet. Thank you Sammy, we appreciate you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"shawn martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXp2GeZ19fWc39VGf40SEWrnM1fyy5MV8UIVRXtxt43DBeywEU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sammy is great! Whenever I need a last minute cut Sammy is super accommodating and professional.  If you want great service and clean fresh cut Sammy is your stylist.\nI highly suggest booking your appointment today!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrzDl_NSsq9vQ6nHDSUfL-0GdZCdPCnkMG_1Mc\u0026fid=0x0:0x6418ed0b9d937402"],"When":"2025-1-9"},{"Name":"Joelle Montoya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXN9tULnvywG7jfIT7fZUm0PSCoZHPVnxnDkWYMvAwRGtYXfi8j=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sammy is the BEST. She saw me last minute, made sure I got the haircut I wanted, and all for an amazing price. I love my hair so much and I will most definitely be going back to see Sammy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nathaniel Josey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWw2PeQBUzy70exZRkV44BNgG7GyvdzWpsbZznzxTE2hg5Olg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sammy, hands down is one of the best barbers I’ve been to. She lines me up once a week, and always does a great job. Took my son in a couple weeks ago (the kid hates haircuts, and is always upset after getting one) we walked out after Sammy was done and he said, “dang dad, it only took you 13 years to get me a good haircut” 🤦🏼‍♂️. Sammy is legit.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marissa Cardenas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWE1AXnlv2nZtGusaIHFOmQdZ7g8eqs69U8C_zi8p1IGowvz5A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sammy was able to get me in for a last minute appointment. And I always leave satisfied with my hair and the service she provides!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bruno Peña","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYOZx7x_AIK5yoWf5OFSjEnkOgF5yZIB_ZKoG72buNK6IY8InO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been going with Rafi (rafael) for quite sometime now, he always fits me in when i need and i really like that he takes his time with my haircut to leave it perfect hes not like one of those shops that rush a fade just to get in the next client, customer service on top all the other guys are really friendly and welcoming too","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"DeAndre Montoya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKXF7i0A9uinZGhpljyo6E7B9R_x2VqDzbYwZZCeK5IdTfZvyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came up from New Mexico just to have Sammy cut my hair. She did an amazing job and I definitely need to make a trip back up, one of the best cuts I've ever gotten","Images":null,"When":""}]

I love my new haircut! Definitely coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3wGf8Do5qzO2n0fK1QLfgiOvqL-l0o_2RbAcm&fid=0x0:0x86f4e55b72d5f638"],"When":"2023-10-18"},{"Name":"M C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI77cR_Pam8RDtXcLaWJcLF2-erG46Tgz9yTpB5HRZlx7MRWA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a great barbershop! I've been going to Jamika for years and consistently receive fantastic cuts!

I laughed at the entitlement of the prior 2 star review because it doesn't reflect on the shop at all. I’ve never had to keep my credit card information on file because I show up to my scheduled appointments. No shows are disrespectful of people's time and cost barbers money.

If you want a great haircut, don’t hesitate to schedule an appointment here!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Levi Faustino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7KvCNE--Zm8WFGEAmM74cg_aNj8reRKh1vdWO9aImlp3_1ZW6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yo, lemme spill the tea 'bout this lit b-shop I just birddogged! The vibes were straight up fire and 'vironment was the next-level whoopdy-whoop, fam. The barbers? Drippin' talent, no doubt. They blessed my dome with a cut so fresh, it had unicorns weepin' rainbows. Stepping in there was like transcending into another dimension, man. Fo-skribble. And the beats? They had me Kangaroo Jack bouncin' on 99 lüftballoons like Drizzy Drake on a see-saw midsummer nights blue light special, starring Chris Pratt. #srsly, this spot is off-the-charts EPIC BARS . Mark "DaFunkyBunch" Dafusco spit hot fire! I rip and I rhyme...I rhyme and I rip. This is da way dat barbershop spit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMEJ3hVRHR1cMu_5W4s6lNrCFuo34CSWNm1dvn&fid=0x0:0x86f4e55b72d5f638"],"When":"2023-6-12"},{"Name":"Becca Mudd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIojiDrfeBTPDEhXmULig86J5ekNBGFh0h-H4e91v7f73d9Zg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the folks at Holly Barbers! My boys (3 &9) and husband go to Mayra. She’s so good with kids! It’s laid back, they remember you, and it’s easy to book online ahead of time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rob Petrie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO8dehlrWmogvY9AEvq3B6ffR6XHnB0Y5VJGtbOb_mkC8Qbh8b=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mayra @ Holly Barbers is fantastic. She does a great job and goes the extra steps to ensure that your haircut and shave are satisfactory.  Been to other barbers, prior to finding this shop, I won't go elsewhere while  Mayra is there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Blake Jackson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIB5PNH8L5FarWoDyUlbs9Yf5NJg6H7P0XoSP-9CDliG4Og-w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was looking for a consistently good barber shop in Denver and found it at Holly Barbers. Have had haircuts with Mark and David now and all have been good. These guys know what they’re doing. Good group and vibes here that make going to go get a haircut enjoyable.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Mile High Blades Barbershop
open_hours: {"Friday":["8 AM–7 PM"],"Monday":["8 AM–3 PM"],"Saturday":["8 AM–7 PM"],"Sunday":["10 AM–4 PM"],"Thursday":["8 AM–7 PM"],"Tuesday":["8 AM–7 PM"],"Wednesday":["8 AM–7 PM"]}

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mohamed Elbedawi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKn2EZt_dVVB80-FHzNS1Zt5HxwXZMW4Mjsv40VUxsVLi2zxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of the best shops in Denver - hands down. I’ve been coming to Jenn to have my hair braided and cut for about a year and a half now. Excellent service and the shop is very friendly. The braids and haircut come out super clean every time.

*EDIT - photos are from when the shop was still under construction.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIFqaXORVt4KfVKZpnjamCZr3zLrc0kVwVTDoO&fid=0x0:0x544b47b639cf8192"],"When":"2023-11-4"},{"Name":"Lliam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXs9fTdFCLMk6TnvorjDpEAgq_IsfhQjzf_2-oFMNcYqW33umjJ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I cannot say enough good things about Mile High Blades Barbershop and their team of brilliant cutting edge stylists, especially Jenn. As a 20 year licensed barber myself, I have extremely high expectations when it comes to getting my hair cut, and I can confidently say that Jenn and the rest of the team exceeded every single one of them.

From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with a warm and welcoming atmosphere. The shop itself has a cool and modern vibe, and the attention to detail in the decor and overall ambiance really sets the tone for a top-notch experience.

Jenn is an absolute master at her craft. Not only does she have an incredible eye for detail, but she also takes the time to really understand what her clients are looking for. She listened to my preferences and offered her expert advice, resulting in a haircut that was both stylish and perfectly tailored to my personal style.

The level of skill and precision that Jenn demonstrated during the cutting process was truly impressive. It's clear that she takes great pride in her work, and it definitely shows in the final result. My haircut was flawless, and I left the shop feeling like a million bucks.

In addition to their exceptional talent, the entire staff at Mile High Blades Barbershop is friendly, professional, and genuinely passionate about what they do. The level of customer service is second to none, and it's clear that they go above and beyond to ensure that every client has a fantastic experience.

I highly recommend Mile High Blades Barbershop to anyone in search of a top-tier haircut experience. Whether you're a seasoned barber or just someone who appreciates a great haircut, this is the place to go. Thank you, Jenn and the entire team, for an outstanding experience. I'll definitely be back!

SIDE NOTE - SHE BRAIDS LIKE A BEAST!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_PYv0TocRK915PHcGwbX1HeUgtrEvh39BWgf8&fid=0x0:0x544b47b639cf8192"],"When":"2024-1-13"},{"Name":"Eun Bae","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJJ8va7C5VGxtKc-rqjRlqBfFeL6GHzvfyOUWIWwvk1dB1ASIY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been coming here over a year. Come every 3 weeks. Jenn is my barber and she absolutely crushes - her fades are on point. All the other barbers are dope too! The vibes are high, and exactly what you want in a barbershop. Never a dull moment here - love this place","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Manny Wolfe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKkv81z1dLsHCj39fr_mBguN2tBDyhaLmXE7GJQEoGgUdbdV6xF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If you want a burst fade don’t come here been wearing hats everyday. I’m not as picky as I used to be with my hair but damn. Got a bad haircut… didn’t look great for my license picture.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Derrick Lemuel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXjwREEAHt1LZgylBTpMI08AGJGIC0KB6_2Ywai52oyuf4iIk8z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thank God I located my old barber through google and Booksy!! I been goin through an extremely rough stretch of life and been taking blow after blow up until now but this just got me feeling like I can get refocused 💪🏾 He always come through in the clutch!! Appreciate ya Arnold as always my G 💪🏾🙌🏾💯","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Agin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLcgddWMu39PXzCXhdl61TsfHJnqVH13gY-VmkTSQULnWLxnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best barbershop in the city. All the barbers here will take care of you. I've been getting a cut from CG the Barber for 3 years and he does an amazing job.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cortney C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJTBWtEjzO8-jq7AkD8Op62eIAX7aNb4P2JE84plP8Lxs91Ltv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jenn is the best barber! She's been cutting my hair for years. 10/10 would recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNIqr_nOf5MsdSQYHDRGXoGttZudS2g1BlQv07&fid=0x0:0x544b47b639cf8192"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Vanessa Maestas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDq3FI1TPKpGAd-lC2Ant2T81Gsb0pNrJQLjdtbP97dUEyU3ducg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thank you so much Mile High Blades my boys loved their back to school Hair cuts. I think that's amazing what yous are all doing for the community we will definitely go back to support the business.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jason Keith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqK3--KacYRtxS8KVpJWuEb_W9DyMpu-gq6f_XGerTmgAS5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My guy is top 2 and he's not 2! If you're looking for a crispy cut you should book with Alfonso. The vibes in the shop are excellent and his attention to detail is immaculate! He's the second barber I've tried in Denver and as long as he is cutting hair, I'll be in that chair! 5 stars across the board!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Reinier Alvarez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocInhVuARlyfBIx8DVoh9TaSIsW5j8IhQcfi5MhlQPWUqM43CA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been a loyal client of Alfonso for over 3 years, and I can confidently say he's the best barber around. From the moment you sit in his chair, you know you're in good hands. His attention to detail is impeccable and he takes his time with each cut. He doesn't just give you a haircut; he provides expert recommendations tailored to your style and preferences. Whether you're looking for a classic cut or something more modern, he knows what will work best for you and always delivers. Every visit is a consistently exceptional experience, leaving you looking sharp. If you're searching for a phenomenal barber who truly cares about his craft and his clients, look no further than Alfonso. He's simply the best!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"DAVID CARRILLO","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzsJ94_BuJVQ3aOt4Gz1nJWXNMd1qlz-fFemmKL8UHJuGa5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time getting my haircut from Fonzo at the collective.  And almost walked out when I seen his las Vegas Raider apron he was wearing 😂.  Glad I didn’t , he preceded to give me one of the best haircuts I ever had… excellent skills and great conversationalist, will definitely be coming back!  Highly recommend to all, barber for life right here!\nGood job FonzoFades!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mohammad Dalloul","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAH2QZs4Ck4ZUn1CQxe3gKeEsvTl30RqZgnByIC-KXS5_98jk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I highly recommend making this studio your go to spot! Alfonso is caring, professional and always provides a consistent sharp haircut. I have been getting my haircut with this professional for a couple years now and I will never go anywhere else.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rodney Chavez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLdUrfZqNAf-jmq_2lVvsFpcTJ7Yb5ZoziHxW4pNhkg2viF6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the privilege of experiencing a haircut at Alfonso’s new studio, and it was nothing short of exceptional. The atmosphere exuded a perfect blend of professionalism and comfort. Alfonso showcased remarkable skill and creativity in crafting a haircut that perfectly suited my style. The studio's ambiance added to the overall experience, creating a relaxing and enjoyable visit. If you're seeking not just a haircut but a personalized grooming experience, I highly recommend checking out his new studio.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eli Galvan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2CHDljxfOaILID-uqbbZbVMl320-8RYFQddJJv7zEK5juyxAI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the pleasure of meeting Alfonso over three years ago. Was just looking to get a quick fade on lunch by my old job. Was lucky enough to sit in Alfonso AKA Fonzo’s chair. Saying the man is a master of his craft is an understatement! His attention to detail is impeccable! Always guaranteed a great haircut when you come see him. He’s now taken his haircutting experience to another level with his new spot “The Collective Barber Studio”. He’s new space is clean, welcoming, relaxing, and makes you feel like a true VIP!!! If you’re looking for a barber who’s miles above the rest, and offers you a true FIVE star experience than look no further than Alfonso!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cody","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJY_f1hTMLRNbYjppQIHsLss9SN8mdhecygESnGTMGKv9qPA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve stayed with Alfonso since the first cut. He’ll always get you in when you need and get you looking right in a timely manner. Very professional and also a really chill guy that will have any type of conversation with you. He pays good attention to detail so your cut is just how you want it. The new private studio is in a good location and very comfortable. I would definitely recommend giving Alfonso a chance with your hair if ya haven’t already.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"marco coria","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWVWKXXwvSh4fVhzwiuN3irmUm2w3qYgUJrr_X214XAdUaFV_7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been going to Alfonso for a couple years now and he is hands down the best barber that has ever touched my hair. He will keep a conversation going and not stand there in awkward silence. He always goes above and beyond to make sure you are happy with your hair cut and also cuts your hair in a timely manner. He will give you suggestions on what would fit best for your hair as well. If I could give him 10 stars I would.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ian Grady","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSv2JT578t6i-TzuKbgFP1X5dZQXTlyeGb_Wr6zvGtowxVvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Got a cut from AJ, and honestly, I regret it. The haircut was overpriced and lacked any real skill or finesse for longer hair. This place specializes in charging a premium for basic fades in an awkward atmosphere.
Customer service? Practically nonexistent.
The vibes? Uncomfortable at best.
Haircare products? Overpriced and not worth it.

And good luck trying to get in touch with them—they’re about as responsive as a brick wall.
Save yourself the trouble (and the money) and go somewhere that actually cares about their craft and their customers. Hard pass on this place","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kaare Kurtzke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8f9-_JQWsfMfKF2bL3BNVsCXtc8Agd8uTpK5whOfs0mrp-_9B=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Moses was great. Took his time. Made sure he listened to what I was asking for and I came out with a great cut and that I will definitely be going back for again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSWP3GDf1nF8LsAHGAg-jX1tNlCo-WoIl_B23R&fid=0x0:0x6d3cf457b93f0941"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"David Brusilovsky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKw8MXZZpDCqbJkA8Bh6HWdUAki40u_f0hLgB0b6SaCKgnYGes=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Avoid this place. Terrible customer service. I was cancelled on several times with no warning, after making a reservation. First time I showed up and they told me my barber had already left. I was perfectly on time. Second time I was only a couple minutes late cause of unforeseen traffic. I showed up and they tell me “we’re running behind” and had to reschedule me. 0 warning: no calls or texts. Showed up twice just to get sent home. Won’t be returning.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tasha Ward","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLgjZWuC52C-sK64BXqY_rWSnkxeDzF4rA9SGLfjWpD41uNI_6F=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Visited this place yesterday for a skin fade with Michael and I have found my new barber! Everyone there was so nice and I felt very welcomed and comfortable. Michael is very personable and he gave my the best fade I have ever had! His attention to detail is amazing and I walked out "crispy" haha!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andres Ravan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8JOP3JeoBeRTorAecpG-ESA5iXkAw-YSxITAC0ioN-WlMhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I made an appointment for Saturday the 25th, however, something came up and I needed to cancel my appointment. I never got an email or notification that I made an appointment for that day, so since there was no number to call, I had to email them to try and cancel my appointment, but I never got a reply back. There was no other route to cancel the appointment. Since I didn’t show up to my appointment on Saturday, I got charged $50!!! Ridiculous!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Samuel Sherman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiAtL-4cly6YqbZxlACkS9_vNLz10RgKtzc09KwnTAVF-W7gGK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I told them about a cowlick. completely overcompensated for it. gave me a different haircut and the customer service was horrible.

he told me it was symmetrical, although one side was extremely high and the other was low. It as if he thought the top of my head was where my part is. extending the fade from the right side to be very high.

he made it look like a pony tail and a strand on the side of my hair that makes me look gothic or something. really unbelievable!!!!

I tried to schedule with a more competent person but they said they would charge me again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"T Gamueda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3jnGQc2DgiJQeI2rneMbX1yGIywcZd70sGgOX2cNceUlrVA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time in the shop yesterday and it was an outstanding experience.  Moses did a great job listening to what I wanted, communicated with me during each step, and was meticulous as he worked.  Super friendly and professional.  Best haircut I’ve had in Denver after living here my entire life.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Walter Lorenzo Sadler II","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoi4JAilgQo066XMh7lVtKNki46QKuTCVQJpFq3IaE-WbdnJWUqw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A coworker of mine and her husband own this lil gem!  Michael my Barber is beyond skilled!  As long as he is there I will go nowhere else!  Super chill atmosphere and everyone is very personable.  I have been going for 6 years now and have never had a bad cut.  From longer hair to short always get compliments on my hair, even from other stylists.  I did however learn early on when asked what I wanted to just leave it up to him and let him do his thing.  Appointments are booked with him quick...a month out so hurry up and get that cut!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Heather Barlow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLumb4aKy650WIP-1Ye6SC9bPA4yvKtGggm5ETKshpdExJb5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cameron cuts my boyfriend’s hair and I can’t recommend him more. He is truly the best barber. He is so skilled at what he does and as it turns out his grandfather owned a barbershop - so it must run in the family. He is also cool, super laid back, professional, reliable and can talk about sports all day long if that’s your thing. This dude is impossible not to like and seriously so good at what he does. If you are looking for a barber, Cam is definitely your guy!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brandon Bloomston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUDyjvQeIuAFvkD_2WqG5cZ_Y24OgtXchMawWbjQS3lac4hg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I walked in yesterday without an appointment and Sam was fortunately able to see me. I received the best haircut from her and exactly what I wanted. I will definitely be going back; I got lucky with her being available, but will be making appointments in the future","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Croke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFihJ56aehachZOrNW4XK0I9cwhE0vnDK31aVGDllmpk_IwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Traveling from NH and staying for a month while we visited family I was in need of a haircut. Scott did a great job and I highly recommend this barber shop!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jon Haron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI-Ip83dwyfqK9jUJ54P7xQjt2p3pzlzqp0cXkvZ-sbIsvUUBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been getting my haircut here for a few years now and it is always a good experience. They do a great job and they are personable and professional.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Richie Brock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzvK0mseOg4cNimMZvXusoZZ_N8bLUe0nh8SiQ65SLMLpKSLF59w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time in today! As a guy with a burly beard, this is the best beard trim I've gotten so far. We kept it basic and natural, a feat many barbers struggle with. Great shop, good vibes, quick service, and an attentive barber. He listened and asked questions before he started, then moved with deft quickness. Give em a shot.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ronald Donjuan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdamsYDi4Yc0a0vbSEIyUJcb4RaSnG5TTpcHpy9udodT_46VM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kyle had walked me through the options I wanted in my haircut and once I got done with the details he went to work. He made sure I was doing well on my style choices and when it was all done, Woooooo I looked tremendous.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Scott Meyer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX49TpLrwvRWpsfJzjHt4ht8pGDnc9rt5GEJoLUkB3nhKudto1q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kyle W. Does an excellent job every single time I go to tried and true. Not only is he a super cool dude, but he’s the most consistent barber I have ever been to. His attention to detail and expertise are unmatched in the business. His cuts give me the most confidence and make me feel exactly how I want to look. Thanks Kyle!!\n\nGive that dude a fat raise!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Record Family","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5LSvOd7mZF6lVoWbqb8wl8C_FC22C8hkT6tRScMttN-fjnqDGbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always amazing service! Cam is awesome and does such a great job. My boys love the atmosphere and Cam knows how to relate to the boys and always has good conversation and remembers details from past visits.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Brooke O","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK26iIpx9ovmK9SWOM5FRq6b0wWX37dANNqdYvEKCR0x5idHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Terrible establishment...came from out of town and my dude got a cut here. The owner was present but extremely unprofessional. He was talking reckless about a client that had just left out of his chair. I felt uncomfortable and uneasy. Will not be back.  We don't spend our hard earn money to be talked about and made fun of","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU96M-523iHF2LHpkdvTxTvgptIRXNkjl2Zy3-K2NZBmOgaeiM1=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Krizpy Fadez is a clean, modern establishment. I walked in without an appointment, and they were able to fit me in with one of the barbers. The haircut was professionally done, and I was pleased with the results.

The only downside was the price—it was $45 (not including the tip) for a basic haircut. No tapers, fades, or beard/mustache touch-ups, just a one-length cut all around. If it weren't for the steep price, I would definitely return. There are other barbershops on the same street, so l'll try one of the competitors next time.

Overall, I had a good experience, and I think you would too-just be sure to consider the price before going in.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"The Printing Champs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmiAFxXXN1ZRH510sEGDCWoVc67P1TjMGbBtrGVz6MaeY0VdY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loving the diversity and the barbers are always ready to make u look KRISP.
Went to a beauty salon and the lady messed up my fade, decided to come to my first barber, they made me feel welcome and took care of my messed up fade in a quick manner. Now I’m ready to take over the world!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Keaton Wachna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYPYFwa96yrE28IDrK0_a4OVNCl3Cmz-f8Yn9OgXBz8-Fc8A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They were able to do all 3 of our boys at the same time and the cuts looked great!  The boys loved the atmosphere, watching football highlights and playing arcade games after they finished cutting their hair!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carlos VS Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFkBZklZ-NrKm60dGUtfN6nbnzioamDlEkP_UqC6Y0HaZuaSM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The sign sez Krispy Fades, and Mr. Kenneth delivered. The place has a chill vibe, the barbers are cool cats and they deliver on the Krispy Fades. Hadn't had a haircut in a minute and needed a professional. Mission accomplished. Thanks guys!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Latee Ivory","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlPvpX6kXUWBbl5J1HCLy6CFTfSRorJVkNGhGCBpoRbXfCxOg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Make sure you get ya cut by someone who speak English in there is my first advice.
Next advice quadruple check that they know what you want before the cut starts. Dude literally it my fro down and pushed my headline back. And said 60$ lmaoooo I still donated 60 ta them and just will call it charity but never again! And if you recently from the east coast you NEVER wanna step in there","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Otaku Clan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUes7Jv6HVSvwCyd2xyIRQKZ8d7a63oLev-2BI2J7pSQLbzuaU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love the atmosphere and quick barbers ready to make you look clean for your next convention! Will recommend to all our friends","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cruise Yokum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsESBne3UuoAgK370QbWn2QQ1hrOd1pad0rxzo3srUgkj19A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chaboi & Dee have one of the best barbershops in Colorado! Krizpy Fadez does all types of fairs types ! Clean ! Modern! Kid Friendly","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: World Class Men's Cuts
address: 1512 Larimer St Unit R1, Denver, CO 80202

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lance Muncy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiGkaUjTUBN7vlyx9tjXfoHnVSCtwOpLTu62zeYd-41AwqGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I’m new to Denver and was searching for a new place to get my haircut. A good haircut and beard trim is something I don’t mind paying good money, traveling and tipping well for.

With that said, after some extensive research, I had high hopes for World Class Men’s Cuts. However, after leaving with a beard accident and bad drivers, coupled  with my long drive back to Fort Collins, I found myself up in my feelings of being irritated a bit. I found it to be several hours mostly wasted with gas, time, money and a value I don’t think I received.

On to the experience: I schedule with Jordan, whom I assume is the owner. Jordan was welcoming and a nice guy when I arrived. He offered me something to drink as well. I sat down in the chair at approximately 1:24PM. After a brief 3-4 minute conversation I thought to myself “this guy knows what he’s doing” and with my research, I felt destined for success. We went and he washed my hair and then I returned to the seat for my haircut and beard trim. (I mention these steps for a reason.) Jordan did some trimming on my hair and then went to my beard. Next comes the accident, at one point when he was lowering his arm with the trimmer turned on, he grazed my beard cutting the hair nearly to the skin. I felt it immediately but did not say anything. I’m not one to cause a scene, business is earned and lost everyday on interactions and this is where my thoughts go in moments like this. Jordan didn’t say anything after the accident. Therefore, I assume he didn’t know or didn’t want to say something, either way I’m not sure which is worse. He finished my beard, then my hair and added some product. When I got to the counter to pay, I looked at the time…1:53PM. I was able to have a conversation, get my hair washed, a haircut and a beard trim…all in 29 minutes and a $75 bill w/o tip to seal the deal. Had my beard and haircut came out looking magnificent, I would have had a problem (as I eluded to in my second sentence in this review) but this isn’t the case. While I am satisfied with the haircut, my beard experience has taken the front seat. Not only was there an accident with my beard, it’s also longer on the right bottom side versus the left. Now my wife, who use to groom dogs has to fix it…kind of adds some comedic relief to the full story.

Update: Jordan did message to apologize and refunded $30.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpzFc54Y4Vbkw3he6cuWjltx_G8bBHCnAiSGAX&fid=0x0:0xe68ec9831c364e8"],"When":"2022-5-1"},{"Name":"md2128","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL4eyLO7qJQD43dEDeWd0cZjzWUCdPYQzlPrvM3-hvslKwjgA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Out of town traveler needing a cut.  The most positive easy going experience I’ve had.  Laid back and fun. Will definitely come back when back in Denver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlffTZrhzBMo1D7FrIa68LRUCm55sztIdQz16V&fid=0x0:0xe68ec9831c364e8"],"When":"2020-10-20"},{"Name":"David Pangallo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlNWoW5xINjTeP7RqFPAQCBl1M6fyIDfTM_tuEGJIui5I9Fzyu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing haircuts! Madison does a fantastic job and pays special attention to detail. Jordan's available products are incredible, I receive compliments constantly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGWblsoGQtmfTtCQpzXUTI5RLQF7Tl4xDO6g4P&fid=0x0:0xe68ec9831c364e8"],"When":"2020-5-31"},{"Name":"Morgan Kelly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxICQjMU1OcihrEQoIuxYP8ucyXKc6VftUAj15v81kjkCwyUYx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jordan is the man!!
Finding a good barber in Denver that did what I needed was difficult before I tired this spot out 3+ years ago.
Jordan was even nice enough to get me cut and cleaned up before the store was ready to go!! Hard to find quality people around here that’ll do it right. Try like i did, you’ll feel welcomed with a beer or water and get freshened up!

(Even have their own hair gel products, gel holds the longest and still the best to this day for real!)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eric Russell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4kpOhK61I6tWeKzzi9fBqG2dhVSOSrBmixMKQVmtOi0dFjzE-kg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been coming here since I moved to Denver 3 years ago. The service and the quality of their haircuts is top notch. I'm very picky about my hair and would find it hard to trust anyone outside of this team. Their location has chill vibes with great music and fun conversation. It's always a pleasure when I have to return for another haircut and would recommend this place to others who are picky about their hair and want to look fresh.

UPDATE: It's been now about 5 years and I've still been receiving amazing haircuts from Jordan. The reason I keep going back is due to the professionalism, courtesy, and the amount of times Jordan and his staff have been able to accommodate a need for a quick clean-up right before an impromptu business trip or quick vacation. I always enjoy being able to converse for an hour with Jordan and his team and it's evident they take pride in their work and ensuring all customers have a fantastic experience. Looking forward to the next time I swing into the shop.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mario D.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_M411GuTBTHnAX9T65RzS1v4U1EOE-JpZGJxG4OP_Gc_3hg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was from out of town and needed a haircut, Jordan cut my hair and did an amazing job. It definitely has to be one of the best cuts I’ve had. He really knows what he’s doing and also checks to see how you’re feeling about it frequently. If I could I would certainly keep coming back. It’s a cash only business so make sure you have a debit card or cash on you if you go. I didn’t realize this and only had a card on me but they handled it gracefully. Really friendly and down to earth staff there. The vibes were great, I would highly recommend going here to get a cut.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jared Reid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhmOSZ_JKIkl6g6QjgTpcYxohjEnbMN14B6awdeOumv73iJjc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Feel like I have some difficult hair to cut and have always struggled finding someone who understood how to fade my hair. Jordan immediately knew what to do and provided recommendations on what would work and look good. Dudes incredible at what he does and runs a great shop. Don’t sleep. If you’re struggling to find a barber, get with Jordan.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shane Wheeler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0BUt5qtgpSgUw_-xBW80gqODWEDR-C0Er-76qk2U8IM70h7I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been coming to World Class for 3 years now, I get my haircut like the logo. It’s a great cut every time and I’ve yet to be disappointed. They offer free beer and water and the music is always good too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvK6P8UcJuqzGzHSz1ZXK6zrLSji-Zdj2bEfxX&fid=0x0:0xe68ec9831c364e8"],"When":"2021-7-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Heather Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoDApJi4X3lesCEBTwmF9P1tSuS1_7ECtzr67xVmWYLVzhsdc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nina is such an amazing stylist, barber, magician! She does a fantastic job with my husbands haircut and neck trim. His hair looks fantastic after every visit and she makes it so he can style it or leave without product as he needs.

She has also helped me with my hair. She has helped me with a style that I love and can keep up on my own between visits. Ensures that I'm able to keep my length as I grow my hair out while keeping a nice style that frames my face. She is a gem and a magician!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Soraton Panyasriwanit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGJHusxP9SwAR4yDonCiY3vU9vbjXJJjv7hkp2QTdnOc7OHDzGlA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been getting haircuts from Sujei for about 4 years, and I couldn’t be happier with the results every time! Her attention to detail and dedication to her craft are truly remarkable. She always knows exactly what I want, even when I’m not entirely sure how to explain it. Sujei not only delivers perfect haircuts but also makes the experience enjoyable with her friendly and professional demeanor. If you’re looking for someone who consistently provides top-notch service and leaves you feeling confident and refreshed, look no further. Highly recommended! ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSbd99RijDqQQVIqgpTB_tUTGdfAhbGLdM1-vo&fid=0x0:0xb3b81908a0bd4b2"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Sandeep Sripathi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpljYwPvkS2kiHnpc1GSGwrk-flKF6269HoLRs74y8zcarQAYonw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nina is, without a doubt, one of the best barbers I’ve ever come across. She truly understands her clients’ needs, tailoring each cut with precision and care. She is extremely warm and has a friendly demeanor which made my visit enjoyable. Highly recommend!! 👏","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dan Shearer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKnCdCNOHQXYDxTcoyPyZjN1XWq_4Xs0NTEg3_s-_mv34EMl2c=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of getting my hair cut by Sujei, and I couldn’t be happier with the result! Sujei is incredibly skilled and took the time to listen to exactly what I wanted. The attention to detail was impeccable, and I left the salon feeling like a brand new person. The entire experience was comfortable and relaxing, and Sujei’s friendly and professional demeanor made the appointment even better. I highly recommend Sujei to anyone looking for a top-notch haircut—you won’t be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyhqo8AzgVtMHLYUMOcVC83M8frQZ3HpuvsTSn&fid=0x0:0xb3b81908a0bd4b2"],"When":"2024-9-25"},{"Name":"Guillermo P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV71odB5cLrVxId3xrxy4ifF1J5P1QvS-YHBbx83WD9eJerRxda=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a fantastic experience with Niza! She gave me a wonderful haircut that exceeded my expectations. My hair is medium-long, and her technique was flawless. She really understood how to shape and style my hair in a way that suits my face and personality. I’ll definitely be returning and highly recommend her services to anyone looking for a skilled and professional hair stylist💇","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alexis Thompson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnd1or7KbaxS-zBrHKteq4v16JfTr_EM3zO4EO2POM6Kx6k18d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband is in town for training and needed a quick cut. They got him in in the same day, did a great job and were quick. I wish he had time to do a facial, he needs a little relaxation but next time!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tim Pomeroy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgLu8tzR3hYhMiYwCVQJfA7NEHZnT7uag3_ChHxEyo_JoNzgYRRw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been coming to Niza for over a year and have to say she's done the best job at men's cuts anywhere in Denver. She goes the extra mile and provides a best in class experience","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mitchell Goldman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6euuYMSn-pRTXDEyk4MP8DPUV_GdaL1zK9DVix58xhk4GU0iR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chop Shop and Niza is the best. It is crazy to believe I have been getting my hair cut for 14 years now with her! Wouldn’t have my hair cut anywhere else.

Excited about all the new services Niza is adding. Recently had had a great facial.

If you want someone that can cut any hair right and spend that time with someone wonderful go see her!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"George Torres","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3ESc9ot_ODIGe5WN37NxhCZB5GTpOjiEkCOwOQuBhaG3fUw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm from CA here on business. I looked up the reviews and even though the first one was not great I decided to check this place out. Absolutely wonderful service. Great conversation throughout my haircut, made me feel very comfortable. Unfortunately I didn't get my barbers name but he was young, very professional and took his time to make sure I got what I asked for. Best part of it all is when I arrived there was an Asian guy walking out with a fresh cut and when I walked in there were 2 African American youngsters getting cut. Goes to show any and everyone is welcome here. When my job sends me back to Denver I will definitely visit Puebla's Barbershop again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"C S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUderF93Z_vbN7SAEMwJy0ePQBxuYxwajbKLR6iyO3XLg_oHOI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Every time I walk in here, no matter which barber it is, whether it’s one of the ladies or one of the guys, I always get a really good haircut!!!! I can’t recommend this place enough.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Esmeralda Perez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHWp5zenSCGURqFU-CZiFw49naLl44Hqeaw6pJogvHcZ82jA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Honestly I don’t like doing reviews, but this was such a disappointment I used to take my two boys year’s ago and they had amazing barbers. I took my younger brother to get a haircut since we were in this side of town, we walked in and they told me he was next and to wait outside in our car (which okay…weird but fine) after 10 minutes and seeing two men who were getting haircuts walked out I thought we were going to get call by the lady who said she was going to look for us in the parking lot but nobody came. That’s when I started my timer and started looking around for other barber shops and when I looked at the timer it had passed 20 minutes. Since I had found another place we left. If they had to take their lunch break or they had other things to do fine just don’t waste my time and let me know upfront that you will be not be available.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arthur Middleton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKPXxkauJNedkq-lrAdGWfj_b9dxy0XabCe8hTWXjH08n4yw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am from Florida and my review of this place should be considered “Legendary “ … for I am a 45 year old travel nurse and have never encountered such skill as this place has in bundles. They know how to shape a beard like no other place, and if you want a fade, skin fade, there is no better place. Call for reservation because this is no walk-in place… people that go here will not go anywhere else. I live in Florida and actually think about flying out to Colorado just to get my hair cut there lol, and if I were rich I would without a doubt.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Drew Voshen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtq5YyhTj9-Y4SeqEgaaS52SabN-uNPvoMRCo5DHWv-q3pn8ju=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Overall Awesome job on the haircut. Went a little too crazy with the straight razor and ended up high around the ears.  Also, you don’t need to press the razor so hard.

Would have had higher stars but y’all need to check your prices.  50 dollars for an adult/kids haircut is absurd.  I understand inflation blah blah…35 is the most anywhere should charge for a haircut and even that is the high end…You would have got a higher tip if the price wasn’t so crazy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Damon Daniels","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVD0Rzwfb1GgKzdnDj3sqNVEawIaloHXJob4_UzFHEQKBJ-TAtj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing haircuts! But, get there early because they fill up quickly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christopher Pickell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTd5LZdh5it3KEPE0jenCSbvXKFt1p-HrbB2cYTCu0zbMQlKVxjw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cleanest Barbershop. Cozy vibe. Quick seating (lucky timing..). Really appreciate their family business has an artist behind the chair. Plan for a wait. $50 men's regular cut. Ask for the son.
Requested a high skin fade. The son did a little different after talking with me, and I ended up with a mid-fade that looks fantastic. I will have to come back and sit in his chair sooner than planned as a mid fade vs high fade requires more work. Still the best haircut in Denver.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bryan Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIYDYJLbRxDei5NHd2Tpm8sgKoJskoK5vPxqAaZGOhGw3NV4M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been going to the same barbershop for over the pass 15 years in ABQ, so I'm new to the area and been nervous getting my haircut out of town, but Puebla's did an amazing job and I can honestly say it's been the best haircut I've ever had hands down. The atmosphere there was very comforting and the service was overall great!! I highly recommend this barbershop💈 11/10 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Kevin Vidal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0dQvF2K3itT4pAa_t2SGGFO9zKVieZB4Mw3zjZ62eV7yEYnGs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There are several barbers on Colfax, but my number 1 choice is Tank's.  Tank is a master class barber.  I got my haircut yesterday.  There were 5 people ahead of me.  I thought oh Lord, this will be a long wait.  But, it wasn't.  I sat there and watched Tank single-handedly knock out black barber haircuts like a champion!  Each person was transformed into a new version of themselves, one by one.  The wait wasn't long.  He cut, faded and lined my hair with precision.  That's not easy.  I have a weird head, hairline, and bald spot.  Tank made me shinny and new.  He will contribute to my success.  I work in sales and marketing, greeting the public actively.  This is a Black-owned business.  Support it for that fact alone, and because I highly recommend that you do!  I even engaged in old school barbershop conversation with OGs like me.  5 Stars! ~ Kevy","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyp3V2OYFInDcaZkfjK0J_dWsKfVsBbXrrKaYH\u0026fid=0x0:0xd39d33d86cc9b389"],"When":"2025-1-25"},{"Name":"Caroline O'Connell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-i19Bw4GXEOt6LQfIPoKcOGhMp6BFjN46OTqvg5tdN7HM5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Extremely nice and welcoming! They shave my undercut and do really intricate designs for affordable prices. Super impressed by their friendly customer service and artistic talent.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jamaur M. Bronner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJkfVGAj4YSxpxnhKJOElPdiTO42FBOzEpgcTXrUxQuOE0fEiGEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This spot deserves every bit of its high rating. I came here as a walk-in after my appointment at another barbershop up the street left me waiting for 20 minutes in an empty room. Macho hooked me up with one of the best cuts I've had in a while. This is my new favorite spot for a haircut in Denver","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"steven lozano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJGVpbZ4HPej2CEBAdDuCbTGcBbH9eUyuef1ozUhW8USONRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome barbers knows how to cut hair and also makes you feel like home and there prices are on point definitely come here for your cuts","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Danielle Littlejohn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY2Yam7z03F4XaCS9OwdwBkIfSTa6t53zNlZMsVC9GllCA168Skg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tank is always amazing to my 3 year old son. He makes sure I like his hair before we leave his shop. My son's hair cut is always Om point. And I love the fact that he only gives him a soft line up! We'll forever only go to tanks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORbKmbNGMEEj1BgKNYdJul_cyoiBtJRPew9-mX\u0026fid=0x0:0xd39d33d86cc9b389"],"When":"2021-10-3"},{"Name":"Alanis Wafford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOKGx3mZ91WlNuJrpMnhXuMRcXT1T1cTtH_sAJfVUbyj0NJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My boy Tank gets it done! 20+ years and it gives the OG shop feel. Love the environment","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"randy montano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuZ5OaJOGLXjnUoXCODmwpwh7MuqqBKjsmB2IuFLBf5IofVIOuYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everyone is welcome at tanks as if they were family! Everyone is treated like tank has known them for years and the barber that works with him is a great guy! Customer satisfaction is their number one priority in Tank's shop! Love going to tanks for haircuts which always comes with some great conversations and great times! Thanks guys and just keep doing what you do!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Teri Marsh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKE-jkIq50dnNlOIe8Hd_yiZEjGpNh1BustLszhDdjPKU_-Rg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband goes here to get his hair cuts. I am always pleased at the way he looks after his visit. He says Tank's is a great old school barbershop where brothers can get a cut and enjoy the daily interesting conversation. Yes, Tanks is the best of Denver Barbershops. Thanks Tank!!","Images":null,"When":""}]
