user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Abner Capili","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmlWfWBsaUWKMmZzclW8poDNdMvMTJyda0kMSsEeB0kA6TV9c_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Edgar is my go to Barber. Myself and my boys have been going to Superemz using all Barbers over a year now. We make the appointment and no need to tell them what needs to be done they already know the style and cut. We were from North Colorado and these Barbers are the best in town! All Barbers are dope individuals and upmost professional. Great at what they do!!! Highly recommend!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amanda Mac","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW7jJf5cX4BWcIfckvBSag-dqO_kheWSHSJD3bXGzSWemFz6Nvx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Edgar did a great job. He cut and did designs on my kids and is great with them.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ivan Oliva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcx8Dgei6KvTKY2ewmcLFZu_8sVgznvrYNxyjzDYFP5uAWB_Jx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Edgar is a cool dude, good atmosphere, overall fresh cutz homeboii gets down 💯","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashley Herrera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDi-8Zgzyj475xvC4CtLOyHQ1b6cfLk7okvV70RV71qbgmW7oF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Supremez barbershop is LEGIT! Some of the Best barbers in town. Yadi has been cutting my boys hair since diapers days,  now they are teenagers & refuse to get cut anywhere else. Yadi quickly Adapts to new trends & TRULY cares about her clients needs. I highly recommend this barbershop to all of my friends & family .... you will not be disappointed !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gee Pleasant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKOEVNgKi3bnZSDnhxiRGPa-JKfEbgm6Iju8ucHiuKZfzJtOUc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best experiences that I have had at a barber shop. I was traveling in for work and needed a haircut and they got me in asap. Every barber there is talented. I watched them cut different styles and textures of hair with compete ease. I have traveled all across the country and this barbershop is top tier. It is rare to walk into any barbershop as a walk in and truly be in good hands no matter what chair you sit in.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tyler M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvYKJmNz7iNoAK5vgUPwZEEqed4y0QnZXW0EesmaUcO6FoOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Supreme’z is the best barber shop on the north side! I’ve been coming in to see Boogie for about 2 years now, and I look forward to our appointments. Firstly, Boogie gives a mean haircut, fade, beard shapeup, you name it. He’s helped me change up my style as well and I love the new look. Next, every barber in the building is skilled and super cool. It feels like a family in there, and it pretty much is one. I’ve never had a close relationship with a barber before, I always thought that just didn’t exist anymore, but not at Supreme’z. Boogie takes care of me and I take care of him. Definitely consider any of the skilled barbers at Supreme’z and you won’t be dissapointed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Trevor Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsRneP8Pka2RUh7IQBe2VXp_RvIda4E925g5GboESHSKxrVddkAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Supreme'z Barber Shop, and I must say, I was highly impressed with the quality of the haircut I received. From start to finish, the barbers at Supreeemz provided excellent service and gave me their undivided attention.

One of the things that stood out to me was the amount of time they took to ensure I got the perfect haircut. They were meticulous in their approach and paid attention to every detail, resulting in a haircut that exceeded my expectations. It was clear that they were passionate about their craft and took pride in their work.

Another aspect that I appreciated about Supreme'z was their pricing. Compared to other barber shops in town, they offered the best value for money. I received a high-quality haircut at a very reasonable price, which was a pleasant surprise.

However, it's important to note that communication plays a vital role in achieving the desired haircut. The barbers at Supreme'z are skilled professionals, but they can only deliver what you communicate to them. It's crucial to clearly express your preferences and be specific about what you want. If you don't communicate effectively, you may walk out with a cut that doesn't meet your expectations. Therefore, the responsibility lies with the customer to convey their preferences accurately.

Overall, I highly recommend Supreme'z Barber Shop for their high-quality haircuts and attention to detail. With their reasonable prices and dedicated barbers, they are definitely one of the best options in town. Just remember to communicate your desires effectively to ensure a satisfactory outcome.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jeff cordova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsJQyOH63buTJsDsHwcwOaBl8AwAim98HWHJCnc5zUe1QH2UJj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lalo and female working (I’m not gonna butcher her name cause it’s unique as hell!!) we’re cool as hell, Lalo hooked it up on the fade if you can’t tell, 1st time stopping at Supremez,  will not be the last.. I recommend this place to anyone looking for a good cut","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFRlmYJGzXucPv3tKQAV4lTFqCw7rhT0JjIdsB&fid=0x0:0xfa7e34518aaa789f"],"When":"2022-2-23"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Kim Harrell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBASVfyEH7cwn_6rFf9HXGCq-NO_Us0dl6kgpWVCq2uY01pmA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dalon was kind and gentle with my head of curls. I have been cutting my own since COVID and needed a professional to sort it out!!Even though its usually men who go here, I would recommend it for anyone. Everyone is kind and welcoming and the place is super clean. Prices are so good. Tip well!❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5RXkbWPSEfNzreC9nzLUgrhffCGepz4z3_zvq\u0026fid=0x0:0x1e6b6eca486ae958"],"When":"2023-9-14"},{"Name":"James Fisher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPQQRT5S5xGFCsd960pg3r9TVBUVy_JlFrWuLce1NtkHcJAAzo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dalon and his people are top notch and very professional!\nI drive 45 min just to get my son's hair cut. I truly enjoy chopping it up the the guys and it feels like family every time I go!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matt Wilcox","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyLtC5o7A5UWIX8qt_x3sOrD5PM9S_2qyaEZbQL5tVJgymVNZT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Good service until I was taken advantage of by one of the barbers for canceling an appointment after numerous occurrences of booking an appointment with him and his apparent habit of overbooking and having to wait extended periods of time. I understand cancellation policies and people that take advantage of this, but as a customer, my time is as valuable as the person providing services.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gregory Washington","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlDRbxd9ru1jKbGOG5hE0EgGn1EEjKrMkToeQo5quq8r1PXw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Erik gave my son the best haircut he's had in over a year. The other barbers are also highly skilled professionals who can handle a variety of styles.  Time and money well spent.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"STEPHEN HOARD JR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0CZGut3GqUgdoWLRBUq1d9eKnRIrctOjyPl8HCc-2wZ1Dld5L=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My experience this evening at Precision Kutz Barbershop 💈 was clean and professional. My stylist SANAA is clearly DOPE \u0026 she full of joy and always warm \u0026 welcoming to me throughout the years. Happy Holidays to everyone!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Travis Sanders","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7bF0VNiXXGL67ULGpPsjL8Q2THFqJ4iBCQGbLMxfpcCqSJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Haircut was TRASH! The female in there needs to be trained. Neither the edge up nor the beard were sharp. I’ve done better on myself at home with a set of trimmers. Definitely WILL NOT be returning!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paul Bindel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIDI-83xG6hWIFz0lDBTWdQFph6Ls9qcKg1jqOVVP_iygmIQHU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Erik and his team always make me feel like a new man.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"BookedAndBusy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0emvwZp1vd6ZrKuTaoj-SKof3oLOZNmgXkQVBXYsdXToQ5Cl9yA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The guys were nice and friendly. Need to learn to cut and talk at the same time. I cut all my hair off and still had length of hair in the back that I for quality assurance had to cut off myself.","Images":null,"When":""}]

Easily the best barber in Denver. Every time I leave, my fade is crispy, clean, and exactly how I want it. She’s super skilled, detail-oriented, and knows how to make sure you leave looking fresh. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a top-tier barber.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carlos Caballero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhNE_Y7NATItQ1HauI2iDef76XuRAvHdIXh_yizmoL94Ed5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always have a great experience at this barbershop. Always giving me the best transformation experience highly recommend to book with her!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chandler Buckner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6RwkUt6agOteozT5dfb4fYJlpceVi60G7K40U2HgPBmjFVrr7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"All the barbers i’ve encountered at this place are cool af. Mad friendly, and also professional. I’ve been in Denver for 3 years now and Aubrey is the best barber i have had cut my hair since moving up here. Always gives a consistent cut, but also works with you to let you know what will look good if you’re unsure or just need something close to a reference. She kills it every time! Go peep the shop","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Seth Cooley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9DS_sABmZuRKAyN63yMYQgETjwVizJdd9Y0CFmC_o9I0gkAgr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It look me a while to find a consistent place to get my haircut since I moved to denver, but I’ve been going to Aubrey for almost a year now and she’s definitely the best in denver. Always great conversation and a great cut. Highly recommend","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joseph Marquez Jr.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2ym3uKZvI8Gzf19q8jaDCxXh3JoZS2VnNoeleQ3CtxW3D_zH3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Aubrey is super chill and fun to talk to while getting a cut. Aubrey does a great job and very detailed haircuts. Super cool and enjoyable to talk to as well.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Samuel Frost","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFpeF7I0ZHAonpoXqJEni0opt7b4sakpDdSy-PKB6CyxKSCw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I am really confused on how this place operates. They charges me for a razor fade but I only received a buzz fade. The barber claimed that the 0-0 setting is a razor fade. Then they charged me 20 bucks for a facial trim cause the “barber” faded my side burns into my fade. So all in all I paid 77 bucks for a horrible “fade” and never got a beard(facial hair trim) I tried talking to the front desk gal and she had no idea what she was talking about. This place is just a hive for out of state hipsters in my opinion. 75 fricking dollars for a great clips hair cut.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3BEfnqbkQ3JdELEN9ar4Uqbyy8tuNA6L8rM6j\u0026fid=0x0:0x6ee8035009dac616"],"When":"2025-3-18"},{"Name":"weston Spalding","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJq-6cRwlaOPqBR5D9PuLJI8Xu8QMBjNazo8JvyXqz9oeDpYg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Charley is the best! Fun to talk to you and really wants to give you a haircut that you feel confident with! I have gotten lots of compliment on how good my haircut looks since going there.  I think she really did a good job of paying attention to the little details and the warm towel that comes with the haircut was amazing..way more relaxing then I expected.  I had an old fashioned here as well and it was delicious! If you're looking for a 10/10 experience this is the place to go. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Micah Beatty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKC9RnFUgVOCSOU9b0fHeazaF1tGlDlaHeIg6mlKUAcNKDFgg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lars is awesome! He handles the bar and is good people! The stylist have been amazing and the experience is better than any you’ll have as long as you take advantage of every part of it. If you’re a ‘get in and get out’ person, go get a cut at Generic Hair Cut Place. If you are a person that enjoys their time, go here!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jacob miller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1gZr6-I7sZPdhJfJJZEnYXCwQt2Cnh77Ge-IjiX0spnUilw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had another great upkeep with a new barber. The front desk was super helpful with questions about my 15 year membership and setting up reoccurring schedule for cuts. Don't forget to grab an old fashioned before or after!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Raphael Barbo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUBz0WEculrjPuOpzdQAmW0S12KISkvKJgwxKyKEd-hUl0olk_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m incredibly particular about my barber and the person I trust to work my beard, and Trinity was simply exceptional. Not only did she deliver a fantastic job, but she took her time and ensured she comprehended my exact vision. I was so impressed that I ended up scheduling two more appointments with her. That’s how good she is!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kenneth James","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjURxkwCFKJrvsnVxspRMqezSaRQeEeNtv9ePTy4p8MJl_gpedE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’ve been here 3.5 times, I’ll explain. The first time was great, I had really long hair and wanted it cut short. They did an amazing job and I was very happy with the cut. I came back expecting the same person but was informed she no longer worked there. The second cut was okay, not exactly what I asked for but close enough. Third time, I was informed again that the last person to cut my hair no longer worked there, interesting. This cut wasn’t great but I didn’t have time to go back for them to fix it. 3.5, I booked an appointment, show up and they tell me I’m not in the system. Had to make other arrangements last minute. Won’t be back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alex Porter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6Yuo7SZ4YkI7vlD2Jz-vhD9mpR6jSxG22ehhMCxB0wltk71D5dg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience all around. Booking was easy, no wait, haircut was great, trimmed the eye brows, razor shave the neck, and I added a nose wax. $100 all in including a nice tip for the sytlist and bartender (you get a free drink either before or after).  Found my new spot! Caitlin was great, highly recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOnH5OEG_vTYGmNyYNkkiQxIyOmw9gGvgFNHXu\u0026fid=0x0:0x6ee8035009dac616"],"When":"2025-3-2"},{"Name":"Kayla Morris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUmDNLxKM4nRooRMmb1FQodvAV8U3D47-aNro-XSUncFovYAcV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Haircut/neck shave/shampoo was fantastic. This was my first time here and I was a little nervous because doing a masculine cut on a woman can easily go wrong but the haircut was perfect! I have come out of barbers before with a high and tight cut which is the opposite of what I asked for.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Daniel Maldonado","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfCsySN1tXrjtT_tSF8tG_Z8eqouipjQZzYMuMnZ_YZmaTfuyz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Albert gave a great cut and was great to chat with. Perfect fade and good conversation. Two thumbs up and I will be back for sure.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alex Hernandez (Alex)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYxNViJwagvc-RY7MLfOq5KCKNyr2M6nH1hraVeW4qo9sx-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Made an appointment, got there and barber took in one of his friends on my boys time! Wasn't even late, worst barber shop cant respect peoples time! 0 stars.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anna Straus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLkK2CT4xxI-DPO2bDcFeT-4YozpMNqQHJggf2KCmqyCn9swQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Went here for a shape up (I have long hair with an undercut). If you have longer hair do not risk going here. I just pulled clumps of my hair out of the shower drain. I felt the person cutting my hair messing up and he was unbothered when I told him. To be fair, he was a kid, but the barbers in the shop who have more experience should be helping him out while he’s still learning. The other two guys completely ignored me when I walked in and one came over only after the kid admitted halfway through that he wasn’t able to give me the cut I wanted. Overall the vibe was unbothered and unwelcoming. Will not be returning.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bob Saget","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8MSIV3gs-1hSjSqoH0kDl6SKLc6g_PkkpYvbxXDRqbqJCMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Great haircuts but always complaints about ownership and management that can’t seem to keep employees happy. Fish Rot from the head down, the revolving door of barbers is a reflection of yourself. I only recommend 2 barbers that work here if they’re still even there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hoorain Truong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfDlTYrQtiHZeQUGs-QPx19gjUOz8VCgZNRY_pqjmMwDyc-HM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am blessed that I found this barber shop. The one who cut my hair is skilled and professional with a friendly attitude. You are definitely paying for the high quality haircut. The atmosphere has a fresh, trendy look that makes it feel welcoming and inviting. I encourage everyone to have this place for a perfect haircut. Thank you so much!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Josh Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJQBfTDLjvJ3QVCW0FR7U932G4z3UheaIvhSM2Zdamda5mvA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Good cuts but the worst customer service in a barber shop I have ever seen. If you want to waste 2 hours of your life trying to get a haircut this is the spot for you. Edit; Yeah I made an appointment friday while I was getting cuts for my boys. Which came out great. Dude told me I can come in at 9 AM the next morning, said he only had 1 appointment. I walk in 9 on the dot and he's cutting someone up. All good. I sit down its about 15 minutes go by and another customer walks in. Its about 9:30 when the haircut is done. This man looks at me and says "I got my appointment then you next". WTF man your gonna do your 8 am at 9:30 and expect me to wait at least another 45 minutes? I sat in your barbershop for 3 hours yesterday for 2 haircuts. Na I'm cool on that man. Like I said great haircuts. Work on your customer service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"MR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVymhiHlOoA9U1lTqQMqckMEbqhBUnNccDCFVYb6ys_0_q8_otm0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Whoever's phone number is listed here is bad at business. He's out of town and doesn't answer to refer you to someone else. There are a host of other barbers in the shop that could get this money. I made an appointment with him my first time there. He showed up 2 hours later. Another barber was gracious enough to cut my hair and did a great job.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIL0tjnhluuA3dZNZKqzCwSI6asgpHD3LOo9gbs1VerQXmBZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I wont be coming back and absolutely would not recommend to anyone
This haircut is jacked up, he told me he'd fix it, but was impossible to work with to reschedule to get it fixed.
Dude told me to come in between 10 and 2 on a Sunday so I found care for my daughter and drove all the way down from Aurora only to be turned away at 1:40.
Maybe you should redirect your focus to real estate and get out of the barber game for good G","Images":null,"When":""}]

Brother Herman is crispy with the cuts as well, go check em out!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ask Shaneequa Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWfVkONBLWmvPiNPtqYilr-z5UB2QkmlgpT5wQ3mDOwB6WDEbj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am so thankful for Sayyid Malik and Supreme Style Barbershop 💈. Thank you again for fixing my sons hair. #AskShaneequa","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSsxWCfw3lhTwnISlqWWh9pabIhhDW6TQPP7vI&fid=0x0:0x49e3f84228f5e061"],"When":"2022-1-16"},{"Name":"Natasha Trujillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKfzVo0-HsplM3mi1Xc_7QXCs-Nd_LZG7z9D9EhBYru4pC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Environment is great, The barbers are great always such good energy in there and my boys absolutely love going there for their haircuts they always do such a great job. I will come back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"shakk12","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKg2U36CupOW8zKAFQPeECtYWAXg2nOWMn1tH44QYCcBNmb3w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best shop in the Denver Metro Area! I’m","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert Jacobs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfSIiJ1nFVemmrUGGMw8VKo5ID36YAzKN4msKy5Kt1I6fgz5Ff=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stellar cuts and Service. user_reviews: [{"Name":"Kaiya Swenson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRCr_SViYAb62AJkLHHL0esmk_hq8zclV1qWdl9Du81Q8IjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My experience at THE GLAM HOUSE was absolutely incredible. I’m generally one to shy away from talking to my hairstylist as I always find it so awkward, but Zoey maybe me feel right at home from the start! She offered her expert opinions in consideration with my hair goals and what would suit my face shape best! She first showed me pictures of what she was envisioning so ensure we were in the same page before ever cutting or coloring. I really appreciated her taking the extra time just to double check with the client. The conversation was comfortable and the environment was fun and energetic, not to mention the incredible head massage that comes with the wash. I also had the pleasure of having two other stylists work on my hair during my appointment; both of which were personable, extremely knowledgeable in their craft, and made my experience here even more memorable. I will certainly be coming back and I would trust any of of these ladies with my head a thousand fold! GIVE THEM A TRY!! I promise you will not be disappointed! ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPs_0vWfxcx6ffT_nO3blA9UuyQVH9hsb4eB1t6\u0026fid=0x0:0x974cc303bef1c58f"],"When":"2025-3-6"},{"Name":"Jianellie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXw-GJ6i_YTMb0nbZ-IQ24s9lbyNPF8q3jOn1x2yie0Gq_71jrZ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sandy is my stylist and she did a fantastic job. She helped me identify and achieve my hair goals. She also educated me on my hair and how I can better care for it at home. She ensured that I was happy with the results! She’s also just very sweet \u0026 warm. Which makes it easy for me to communicate my needs \u0026 wants. Highly recommend going here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0DU8T9IO89DVOqTdYSyk9D3igRk1pEwwQH338\u0026fid=0x0:0x974cc303bef1c58f"],"When":"2025-1-28"},{"Name":"ryann ross","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwNPR8X_BPFnFMItiEo_-qHi3gu_r5R_vqiq90HECecxib8w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love Daniella! Came in from out of town desperately needing someone to grant me a miracle on my dry and lifeless hair, and Dani did just that. She was so so sweet, kind, and extremely talented. Would definitely fly back to Denver just to see her! Thank you so much xx","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLwN5aJ1CH6mnT-3v0EZBgRko5MXsZUxyZeSdV\u0026fid=0x0:0x974cc303bef1c58f"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Derrick Roberts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeVE7ZuU1_5erpy-cxqQjg60rucNqbmNbJ9p6sbcuhK1yeUCiS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience getting my hair cut by Rainie today!\n\nAs a guy, walking into a salon can feel a bit intimidating, but Rainie immediately made me feel comfortable and welcome. She has a great personality and was super fun to talk to throughout the appointment. On top of that, she did an excellent job with my haircut, couldn’t be happier with the result. Highly recommend her to anyone looking for not just a great stylist but also a genuinely enjoyable experience. Thanks again, Rainie!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPD09wf94O8c1JRgLnrR5CqzPcX4m5jOTagVrHc\u0026fid=0x0:0x974cc303bef1c58f"],"When":"2025-1-19"},{"Name":"Lauren Manke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLRfcht_fB8f853H5sCkUrlPkmXXOIFNAaS8DMMR6ttsjsuAg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to the glam house in Westminster for a long hair cut. Yesenia E cut my hair and she did an amazing job!! 11/10 recommend her. She took her time and really made sure that I was leaving loving my hair cut. She made me feel so comfortable and I am in love with the cut that she gave me. If you go to the glam house in Westminster make sure Yesenia is the one to cut your hair you will not regret it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"K Essentials","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_u7vPQ8NtF_OjmVCBOp6GZaVCYNsGV1LfQ77MUxqnJ7NeouOZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was looking for a last minute hair cut! Thank goodness the Glam House took me with no hesitation! I think waited less than 3 minutes to be in a chair! Kat was amazing!!!!!!!! The vibe in the salon was just so relaxing! Kay made em feel so comfortable and took special care of my hair! I went from long locks down to lower back to a big chop! And I’m in love! So clean and professional and all the products used weee explained to me and as well as tips and tricks for hair care! I’ll be back for trims and any other impulse ideas I have for Kat to do on my hair!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMmVIReiDg_UJIjKPdjJEJROVVFcvGGc8_HveE\u0026fid=0x0:0x974cc303bef1c58f"],"When":"2025-1-14"},{"Name":"Meredith Tomassi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNVMfWOzmFzMXqhMvI3WwIUA9xFyeJKekpwzwALMFAT4vni_km=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dani did my partial balayage and GLAM refresh this morning. First time she’s done my hair and it came out incredible! Such a fun energy the entire appt as well! Highly recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPM-aGfMQnyDTqnBwC5O-S9NeCCxc4ckrOBLERd\u0026fid=0x0:0x974cc303bef1c58f"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Jennifer E.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkMiqel2BMCTJ8H5iOrKh8b8P9aOkhHVjjAmV6MD0vEAF6hcEt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time going and I will definitely be back! Yesenia took great care of me and I love my new haircut!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPn85qM8k753fRH-waMqVwxLwB6ruiPcK1tVeFW\u0026fid=0x0:0x974cc303bef1c58f"],"When":"2025-3-15"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"gabrielle pack","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpBGc6lzvL6BLzYsDUaeaEMAdDolIy-iaxxngUa-Nrd-SZPM4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time at Clementine, and I am so grateful to have had an appointment with Alyssa. Not only is she an amazing hairstylist, but she is incredibly kind. She truly went above and beyond. I am 21 and moving to NYC to pursue my career, and Alyssa did an absolutely perfect job with my hair. My blonde highlights look so natural, and the color is beautiful. Even when I put my hair into a ponytail, it looks perfectly blended. I feel so much more confident now. I highly recommend Alyssa!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jaime Bankston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0uTvD__0RX2WfNqz8PTx-g3kH1H4rON8MqovlNKHldDdEX6jiyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been going to Clementines since 2020 when I moved to Colorado. Abby is amazing! She really listens to what I want with my hair and is excellent at all she does. I'm in a transition phase with my hair, and she has been able to blend my layers in a way that doesn't look ridiculous.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica Wassmer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWypwQuEqnFh73mXFMREyXX1QjeRC8FiCP2ZBKFWYzifK7m5xPUyw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always love my experience at Clementine’s. Abby is a great stylist and I always leave with my hair feeling refreshed and it looking great! The space is cute and clean and I love that one of the stylists dog, Sundae, patrols the salon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jana Florian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIzXPk4ucuX_PIn50ipM5Inl2t8UP0PZ3hgExEcu2Tw3EUqg1c=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time at Clementine's. Kayleigh was so thoughtful and really took the time to understand what I wanted before we got started. I immediately felt I was in experienced hands in her chair. She went above and beyond, fine tuning and making sure the color was just right.. and she nailed it! She gave me some great recs for hair care, and walked me through color ideas for the future. Can't say enough good things, a great first visit and my new home salon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leigh Ann Taylor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXl2LnCBmEI-clXDEASnZ4I2tJb-5jeUG1YzDWwu7gt2IB1h4G3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time visiting Clementine’s and I had an amazing experience! I will definitely be coming back to Nicole and everybody else at Clementine’s!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Autumn Haag","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFRTYjhedGgXiYHAbb1g0dIpRgvS4oSXGV3FwGsiuW6T-XNxw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a such a great experience at Clementine's! user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Brenda Hubka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMMGaDFCwMTjRCaPnmWJM42UYd3sZmvXb63Z4qnGg-BP2jx8Yrsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Outstanding color blending by Whitney. I am very pleased with the results. I have had a hard time finding a stylist with this talent. This place is laid back and occasionally you get to pet a dog.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvlEzz4UjUuS8dQCGk9ufzN3Ian1_TwPwWEIbX&fid=0x0:0xc8fbbeebd4d5036b"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Sophie Bui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcSGoXkHhtn92OiFIFCvU_CseJv3TXYHv3xh1AEBBBHHnsY7Vn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best salon experience I had. I had Heaven as my stylist. She was super kind and accommodating. I wanted a pretty big chop and Heaven cut off close to 5inches off. I scheduled the appointment the night before as well. I 10/10 would recommend and will definitely come back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cherie Piccone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5_ExoxmVlqC-1FFOtIchkXcQ4e5KvdG6lnfI4hEQPcXz6KQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I see Olivia for all over color and haircut. Always so pleased with outcome. Olivia takes her time and listens to her clients while offering insightful suggestions and ideas. Very thorough and checks in often to ensure I am happy. Always happy when I get out of her chair! Thanks Liv!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"LeAnne Reed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXv_1LjLxDqEpgU22azX-kPbhb86wELaCG6uFZI8tu912qeoOIG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Color House Denver has a laid-back, fun vibe. I always leave feeling better than I did when I arrived. Lizzie is a great hairstylist, both in her skill level and her ability to listen to what you want, ask the right questions, and deliver. I'm not someone  who knows all of the hair terminology and so to have a stylist that asks enough specific questions to understand what I am truly asking for makes all the difference. I'm to the point now where I go in and say, "just do whatever you think is best," and she hits it out of the park every time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bergen Ahrens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfB6sOWEpFLn3KCVvfvfqR-UyRWhHLl-0p3KBJT_xMhWrkTc1AQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I really wanted to leave 5 stars but I'm so upset with my cut.. I wanted an all over brown which is what I got, I'm happy with the color and the girl who did it was super amazing. But my hair was already cut straight across to begin with and I asked for just a touch up to make it even and it looks awful honestly. The part underneath is longer and it's uneven. I waited until I washed and straighted it to see what it looked like it was hard to tell in the salon because of lighting and I was wearing a dark shirt but this turned out horrible unfortunately. It was my first time getting my hair done in over 2 years and so I had high expectations and this place had great reviews so I drove almost an hour & a half to check it out.. again I love the color but this cut is so disappointing:( Also it was an additional $70 I noticed on my emailed receipt. If I knew it was going to be $70 I wouldn't have done the cut.

Having to edit my review since no one will email back or return my voice-mail.
Hello this is Bergen Ahrens and I visited back in July now and am still waiting for a refund for a botched haircut I received. The cut itself was $70 and I've only gotten back $40. I've called a ton of times and even left voice-mail too. Can someone please help me?????","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsYpKLP-fp0jINOqZt7K3WfCZ0ufR0bstqPDQ-&fid=0x0:0xc8fbbeebd4d5036b"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Henry Simon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL6aWHegtWWKtPgOdjPDU3jDs09h53ieKCv-8Ka5n_aW3nUOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an awesome first haircut with David. He is a thoughtful and experienced person with impressive communication and attention to detail. My visit was fun and easy - and my hair looks wonderful! I could not be happier. Will definitely be returning again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joanne Cowan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUYANikac8Z7RApXxMU-vNrB5epHDL2UMBxy_79q3tfE9vlXHJ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Whitney was so professional and fun to talk to, It was a pleasure to spend the 4.5 hours with her while she expertly fixed my botched up henna experiment! Haha  The salon was clean and professional and they had such a good vibe. They are pet friendly and I had 2 cute dogs come by to say hello. Loved that! I highly recommend Whitney and this salon! Happy Holidays!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPbBQD19wtH66JvgquC-gBYlKtiifm2_iugGI0&fid=0x0:0xc8fbbeebd4d5036b"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Rachel Merrill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfqIQiM-MOb4PtqNVLNsAhUsm6dtAqwzKfODo8sAt4lk63ZPcILA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amethyst is an incredible hair artist! I always love seeing the results of her work. And even better, she is so fun to spend time with chatting and laughing.  I love the spiritual ambiance of Color House. Can’t wait to see Amethyst again!","Images":null,"When":""}]

All around a great experience and will be coming back in the future. Highly recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFpa21BPoEiuHG2co2rIzYhiLc-iM8cHeZsLLk\u0026fid=0x0:0xa49ede212c88e39b"],"When":"2025-1-21"},{"Name":"Alexandra Himel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKalISSW-1_IACqSdmCMY94pbZECyuJY6kTw5qpibRmScHUJg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shout out to Addison for being both an amazing stylist and conservationist. She truly went above and beyond to get my hair looking the way I wanted. It came out fabulous and she provided so many wonderful tips in tricks to keep me looking phenomenal :) not only is she good at what she does she is very fun to talk with.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8iGzKSPjICot1rmG102YP3k_bXPgK-9JjEgfS\u0026fid=0x0:0xa49ede212c88e39b"],"When":"2025-3-1"},{"Name":"Nicole Ritter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkiVQSoFRB-1MMg6xLpYv4S-aMUT0uwAI8_n1g35ooaaY0J11d=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely GORGEOUS salon with the sweetest and most talented team of stylists. I got a trim and extensions from Tara and I LOVE them!!!! I honestly can't even feel the extensions, the process was quick and painless to apply them and I just love my hair!! Photo is a little blurry but I am obsessed. I will be back - highly recommend this place!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIphNOuedIuY83qUJi461SrXyyxt0DIhmF4mur\u0026fid=0x0:0xa49ede212c88e39b"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Yasmeen B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfu59fQgoIdpkaiBv_zh3V9niMns4irP0BkxVYpM9aTsi-dK1YCA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend 303 Salon and specifically Ashley for a blowout. She was so detail oriented, efficient, and kind. Easy finding parking for LoHi and the studio is gorgeous and clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzCjNcz91s8gdJ4eU46mrQmc6VraRXWV5MYKaC\u0026fid=0x0:0xa49ede212c88e39b"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Alyssa Gonzales","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkeY8WFrrWdeU25X52afH02e5yDm1qgZmKi4OwVcFmIXr78g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ashley was incredible! After years of not getting my hair colored and having poor haircuts, Ashley gave me an amazing experience. She was welcoming, sweet, and did an outstanding job. My hair looks and feels great, and I will definitely be returning to her.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnmgOVvv-bqyxhdL13qA_uv5N6XkfmEmpHwMbI\u0026fid=0x0:0xa49ede212c88e39b"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"holly McGrath","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILS7D1axUmbdMd_Ey5SSfUsQaFmujrI97koN6KrJOEVarrAg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ashley has been my go to hair stylist for 3 years! I’ve only ever done solid blonde and today she took me back to my natural roots!! Im obsessed!!! Such a good feeling 😍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNThgU9xcTw_DgeZzBXWm73vERj4tblX5KsW7yB\u0026fid=0x0:0xa49ede212c88e39b"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Taylor Bailey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9gdYeVnRhZ7G0zqLw25RcG8xRhxDCUt8XkfgVDOn9CNJuw_5o=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Im really sad to have to leave such a negative review because my stylist is amazing but this salon has serious issues. My stylist told me what the rate would be when I booked, and when I checked out I heard her tell the girl at the desk how much it was too yet they proceeded to overcharge me by $75! After noticing it on my statements, I reached out to them and I even submitted them screenshots of the entire conversation with my stylist to show them what the rate should’ve been. They told me that because my stylist is no longer working there (thank god) that they wouldn’t fix it. I’m so happy my stylist isn’t working there anymore after finding out how awfully they treated her too! They proceeded to completely ignore me after denying my refund and haven’t answered since. They literally stole money from me, have evidence of my claim, and refused to fix it. I’ve NEVER had an issue with a salon overcharging me before and then being unwilling to resolve their issue to make sure the customer is satisfied. It’s very clear the owner doesn’t understand good business practices because she couldn’t even take time from her day to entertain the idea of her being wrong after I showed CLEAR EVIDENCE! Oh and then she has the nerve to falsely accuse me of rescheduling my appointment multiple times when again, I submitted her evidence to show I was never the one that rescheduled!  Again I’m so happy my stylist doesn’t work here anymore because I definitely will NEVER return and support this awful business owner.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rachael Deckys","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJV7-agRVdiiFezwlTyqtloeK8BfFimjLb8_2CmShGutORCvq8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hugggge shout out to Ashley!! She gave me exactly what I was looking for. Would definitely recommend especially if you have any red tones in your hair! I had a problem come up a few weeks after getting my hair done she helped me fix it no questions asked and also helped me find new products to avoid that problem in the future. The salon is also very cute and has lots of parking:)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTYYCc0mAzA__Wl5ebTLrQVi35jC_BUYaf_ZRb\u0026fid=0x0:0xa49ede212c88e39b"],"When":"2024-9-5"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Katelyn Wagner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJz2-ZTP6BqTnTyBlEl7EB75NMTHLsu5eH7cFfaDWKgyVK6Aw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Left the salon feeling good, however that was only because it was styled and curled out on the bottom (blow out). The blowout and the service was fine, but after washing out all of curls and product the next day I realized my hair was thinned out significantly More than necessary and the cut itself was very uneven. I was not shown my cut before the stylist began putting my hair in roller brushes for styling. I called the salon and asked if there was anything we could do to correct this and the only option was to return to the salon within 7 days of the original cut to have the same stylist fix the cut at no cost. I find it unfair to be expected to go back to the same stylist after such an unfortunate result, not even considering it would be 2-3 days before I’d be able to get it corrected. My cut and wash totaled to over $110 plus tip, not cheap! The picture of the female in the mask was a reference picture my stylist was positive she could execute. Unfortunately I was left down $110+ and much less hair, and an uneven, straggly cut that will take months to grow back and fix.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMA0R99fFR-neRS1P2TfxAFlzoRhB2nfrksLU_x\u0026fid=0x0:0xf344a9e8916c4328"],"When":"2025-1-25"},{"Name":"Morgan D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrdAlWgTXCDMwhGkiSjTmLAfow_zoUDmkyK1RbqXi7bwZY3fch=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a great first experience here with Jessica! She helped make my daughter's vision come to life. The entire staff was very friendly and professional, and the salon itself was very clean and beautiful. Would highly recommend and will definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOalWmJ__qFvB-DzrFY4tsnxc51IHou333kIej0\u0026fid=0x0:0xf344a9e8916c4328"],"When":"2025-3-6"},{"Name":"Alison Alter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwNNPHc7FKHzyPJa0iRwxy8wlbCrmLb4r9JsJNUNTOy2QAPg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is quite an overdue review, but undeniably deserved. I first started getting my nails done with Ash for my wedding nails a little over a year ago and haven’t stopped going since. They are always so welcoming and friendly. It didn’t take long for the staff to start recognizing me by face and name making a customer really feel special. The owner is always present, familiar with every single customer, and fully involved in operations, and as a small business owner myself, I can see the love and attention to detail she puts into her salon. I could only aspire to run as smooth of an operation, from the outside, as she does. But don’t even get me started on Ash. She is meticulous and creative in her nail construction and design. She is a true talent. When people ooo and ahhh at my nails I can’t highly recommend every single person possible to her enough. If you’re wondering if this is the right salon for you, make that appointment. You won’t regret it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXGr6JQZSudM1XjK21keRi_hcn0Y9rO-W0g_BC\u0026fid=0x0:0xf344a9e8916c4328"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Keifer Mansfield","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmxdpziyV8IUod73MiEkkueNzQqa_HTG6_riPmT-Kf2vRsdJv0dg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ash was INCREDIBLE.   Super nice, and very talented.  I wanted a no nail polish look but still with polish and she NAILED it.   The woman hosting at the front desk was warm, lovely and welcoming as well.  The space is very spa like and enjoyable.  Definitely recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPqtOsvjLhQJiMOUlnr4EEHak6Uac4IRhA5Bo-\u0026fid=0x0:0xf344a9e8916c4328"],"When":"2025-3-14"},{"Name":"Isabella Wanken","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxbwoTxH17a_Ve0VgWYlEZj4vxK1Z3TzAE1NoWDUzsGBRS-g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved this place! it was so cute and they give you free beverages with your stay! your guests too! Lauren was so sweet and easy to talk to, and she made sure my haircut was just right. She did a great job! love it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Melissa Gray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMlJLSZdSA0zadI5Vhp1KMKM9M2TufnxrXa6r1ouqayioblyfMsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A beautiful nice place!! From the moment you walk in- you are welcomed by the nicest person! Offered complimentary teas/coffee. My hairdresser, Lauren was fun, personal and absolutely amazing! I just let her do her thing and my hair came out amazing! I’m so happy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOosIWKC9BlZpMVOPKD3KOzlPz9OeJJ046GU_gH\u0026fid=0x0:0xf344a9e8916c4328"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Jahan Evren","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVH1WkBjy_f7jZexP9WST8kXbGSJGWd56cR1f1YVzIvi9T1fW4JKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m thrilled to have discovered this hidden gem of a salon, especially one that offers Milbon Japanese hair treatments! Joel has a fantastic personality, impeccable taste, and a gentle touch when working with hair. This was my second Milbon treatment here, and I’m just as impressed as the first time. The salon is spotless, and the complimentary drinks are such a thoughtful touch. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for quality hair care in a welcoming atmosphere!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipME0RSYxCl9Ijbb53FWoyXt3kGgSlWoPQwNQ44G\u0026fid=0x0:0xf344a9e8916c4328"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"cristen barber","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMV-TbSfwvKT_LPa6kDh8pZnWBx72yCIhHRhJ0fGo1oni4CifH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I waited a week to review anything about my cut done by Joel... only because my hair looks great for a day or two after it's been styled by a \" master stylist\" only for me to wash it and it's difficult for \"me to style\".... Not this time ladies and gents!!!  I'm literally obsessed with my cut.  My best friend told me it's so flattering and looks great (after I styled my own hair). Not only that; Joel is so thorough with his initial consult, has great style, asks for inspo pics, and guides you to what will meet your wants and your requests. Not to mention he's so much fun to chat with.  I'm so thankful to have found him and this salon.  Please don't hesitate to make your appointment!!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"BRANDON STEVE CAMARILLO GONZALEZ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJeDuopPNIk2YmF7TWP2rOJlrDaONvSarmwXmx4QoVLdfoYgg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"A week ago I had a date here, I was really excited to go! I had problems with the location of the place since it was my first time and I'm not from the city. Unfortunately I arrived late and I was waiting for them to give me a solution, his receptionist was rude and told me: "if you want to come back you have to pay again, you will not be refunded" so I, as a customer, felt offended and felt the bad vibe. The truth is that I left a little disappointed because I thought the place would be great, and it wasn't like that, they charged me $50 dls that they never refunded me, they just wanted to schedule me again, and it was already very late. Terrible experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNLJzwLxISlr02xycWpM2Py9dr0DQ4oRcEcsbZz&fid=0x0:0x7dd2449b83bd4186"],"When":"2025-3-15"},{"Name":"Kathiryne B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvzP1YfF-60H7wXlyb3a3OEJ3QiBrLHC2Daj0Jfx1YejnvQ6tT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"No matter who I get for what service, I know this place will take care of me! Everyone there is professional and knows their stuff! Christina is my go to for everything hair related, but I also have enjoyed my cuts with Danielle and Jafette when she isn't available. Jo, the co-owner is a whiz at everything brows and other beauty services!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lee Harrington","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVINM2bHjROf5ekp_7hTyuzzVt9ybOG8CLFVIjPzB8_hu5tjNki=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gabie does such fantastic nails for me, from intricate and creative to classic and beautiful. I’m always so impressed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNliHCF22g4BYjlf9HoMwYgkcaNUBITyvPCzTop&fid=0x0:0x7dd2449b83bd4186"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Yen Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzlwaT8INjGBqVqr2qsUIPDgOchIr71NIY9NdMn4SioSnruo0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This was my first visit to Joa so I requested a consultation in the notes section online. So I arrived 10min before my original appointment at 10:15am. During the consultation, Son took about 5 seconds to look at my reference and started cutting. I was hoping we'd have some kind of dialogue about face shape, hair growth, or even my usual way of styling my hair. He's the first Viet barber I've ever had so even though we didn't have these conversations I thought I could fully trust him. There wasn't much rapport before, during or even afterwards. I'm not used to barbers not checking in with me or making sure we were moving in the right direction. There wasn't even a recommendation for products or tips for styling.

We were done by 10:52am. I get it, my hair is/was long, thick and stubborn and not easy to work with. I was honestly hoping you'd get it too. Or at least ask me at least one more question about it. Previous reviews tell me that their biggest pet peeve is late clients. Time is money and I am sorry for being 5min late but I also don't think I deserve this kind of treatment for a fundamental issue the salon seems to have around timing for cuts.

Green shirt is what I asked for...and this is what I got.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODBsy7EcTzzJGFP67mIU12gy6gutqfPr9dAEk-&fid=0x0:0x7dd2449b83bd4186"],"When":"2024-5-31"},{"Name":"Mike W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJX7zcyZYJGKi7bka7wkl0tRalZsyRbE3Qcw2WqBKuH92qolw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I walked in without an appointment and was asked to come back another time. However, I was graciously welcomed by a barber that overheard, and he helped out with a quick cut anyway! I'm very grateful for the service and friendly professionalism. Thank you!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dino Cizmic","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUm_ni9bwzcIduGTo2KbUD5kY-rFQ-9xPK_lwWTokcNOYEyRzq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I highly recommend both Hoa and Son. I drive over 30 minutes just to get a haircut from them, and it's always worth the trip. They are professional, and after seeing them for the past few years, they’ve become more like friends.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ellyn Stimac","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_n77L2JDqCNkAPszKGJWX5K3NtvGfDbV14ql4r5KUssgl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here on a whim today and set an appointment with Danielle- omg what a wonderful experience! She gave me an excellent transformation level hair cut (went from really long to a lob) and was super friendly and fun to talk to! The salon itself is quite spacious and really pretty inside. I will definitely be coming back here in the future for any hair/brow/nail needs! Thanks again Danielle!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Courtney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMhZeteTm289CgdECk5Dc0j6818IUKl35tu8tsCDYVf95L3iS8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have curly hair and have trouble finding stylists that cut my hair properly. Usually, it's left laying triangular, so I'm very choosy about who I let touch my hair. I've been going to Danielle at Salon Joa for some time now, and I always leave happy. :D If you have curly hair, I definitely recommend Danielle!

UPDATE: I was a faithful client for hair and sometimes nails for years with salon joa. Due to an appointment time mixup, I was running late to a hair color/cut appointment. I thought it was 10:30am they had 10am. Because of this, they called me with an attitude, canceled my appointment, and said that from now on, I'll have to pay half of any service I book up front (including nails).

I was paying quite a lot for my services there and had stopped getting my nails done here because

A. The artists were always venting about personal and inappropriate topics
B. While my nails were amazing, I never spent less than 4 hours there.
C. I booked 2 people at a time, and often one of us was left waiting because only one person was available even though we booked to be done simultaneously.

They now have only one nail tech. I've not returned since this change.

After my appointment mix-up and following treatment, when I'd never been late or no showed a single appointment I stopped going to salon joa.

I'm so happy this happened though because for the past year I've been going to a new place that only charges me $25 for my curly cuts. LADIES! If you have curly hair you know how much they upcharge. My new place does the same quality I got here but for literally like a quarter the price! I'm never going back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvXuLf4fxWNzese8LiVPaYl_REFU2tZqFAZ4Yp&fid=0x0:0x7dd2449b83bd4186"],"When":"2022-2-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jana Holmes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK9m5Dn2e4KmM0k2HuP1ax9RQ6uxGP7b13GWbO5yRoMj_FsZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got my hair cut and colored with Katie, and she was phenomenal!! She is definitely an expert in blonde hair. She does amazing color, but it’s also so low-maintenance, which is hard to find!! It’s been a long time since I loved a haircut this much too. I wouldn’t trust anyone else with my hair now!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0IgoeAb2hLrqqhjBAR5cm_g5lT6W6Wbdnes8Y&fid=0x0:0x4d03760e33fb2040"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Kaylee Rauso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8zBIF1aJn_nAZDMPigs-OL8Vi8bZNzHW8nQu2bl4PkeZkEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been going Krista for years across multiple states because I know she will deliver! I come to her with a general vibe, and she executes artistic vision every time. My color is always vibrant and beautiful, even when I ask her to switch from green to purple to blue, back to back to back. If you have a bob, you KNOW that the cut makes or breaks the look, and I have gotten the perfect cut every time. She embraces any ideas I have, and we have so much fun every session.
The salon has great energy. All the stylists and clients are always so positive which makes it such a pleasant environment to receive services. Plus, there’s a coffee shop in the building. Who doesn’t love a little iced coffee in the chair?
There’s also a ton of parking available if you’re like me and scout parking availability before you go anywhere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRntiu7KR53s9LpAKcjEsLsR4eu_vHXGRDYHI9&fid=0x0:0x4d03760e33fb2040"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Lauren Penn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUptZ6tbqhXFPgmwiXO7ZK5TbxuZG97mJ7dhESyd60td_q2g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ellie absolutely killed it! Not only is she so talented, but she is the absolute cutest. She gave such great information about products to use in between visits and my hair has never looked better. If you’re looking for a blonde specialist, she is the way to go!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFQ23-9260jEds62GhaiDM0-o-7glk-4MDg6Sq&fid=0x0:0x4d03760e33fb2040"],"When":"2025-1-6"},{"Name":"Sophia T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ90PtwK3hyYepINCZEhyI4tdmpcUh1wm-GlwCbrIeNjT0G3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Elly is god tier! Worth every penny and more. Turned my dry, lifeless, stringy hair into voluminous, lush, vibrant hair. Not only is she the best hair stylist/magic-worker but she makes the experience so fun and chill with her bright and welcoming personality. Warning!  May boost your confidence so high you might actually walk out thinking you are a hair model.
The whole environment of the salon is inviting and relaxed. Extremely inclusive vibes...I used to dread going to the salon but Elly has made it become such a treat.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Meg McCroft","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCPExNpGSaq8Iz-ns7Qu8IRNZswyYnywQuZ1rD82n7GrPC6ui0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The moment you walk in the salon it's top notch, clean, great atmosphere, and everyone was friendly and welcoming. They offer water and selzer etc.
My stylist was Robin who did such a fantasmic job with my color! We ran through some ideas together and came up with this color combo that I'm obsessed with! She talked me through each process and steps of bleaching, washing with products, and the color brand. The Mr. Smith made my hair shiny and soft to brush through made my hair feel really healthy. She has a natural and easy vibe that conversations were fun and light. I had a great time here and I absolutely love my hair! If you need a vibrant color session, Robin's your girl!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCLAidnguFsdkQoy4mp8JysNGF7iBcSK3t2Sz6&fid=0x0:0x4d03760e33fb2040"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Meagan Harris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9hu4efpeUytp7GynqWW8J_SCb6q21S5JPp-2mdPAsSnWJKOed=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I see Katie Huffman at Goldie x Bob and the whole experience is amazing!! No one does blonde like Katie! I love the way she creates my “lived in color” so that as it grows out it still looks naturally great. I just finished a hair appointment and when I got home my husband said it’s the best hair cut I’ve ever had. I loved all the personal touches at the salon - they even offered an heated blanket while I got my hair washed!  Everyone there was so nice and took great care of me. I’d definitely recommend Katie to anyone looking for a colorist. Even though she’s extremely experienced she’s constantly training and educating herself to continually improve and it really shows in her work!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5UJf9JmN7wsicJTAP__B0BsNyJHc_6kK17KiR&fid=0x0:0x4d03760e33fb2040"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Emma Friesen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5MzT2Fq_xCMzSpNdUykk6UCdldHW2HmaKFSTKDRxURdpPF80=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time with Molly and I’ll definitely be coming back! I am a new client with curly hair and was looking to change things up with my shape and she totally understood what I asked for. She was so knowledgeable and fun to spend the appointment with. Can’t recommend enough!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeune Mortenson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxuj5EbfSpx6n4lrfEuKz71-PhYIn4yFSHTlp6D2ANSGcQUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is by far my favorite salon in Denver! Such a fantastic experience from the moment you step in, you are warmly greeted by Ashlie, then taken back into a well lit and gorgeous salon. Krista colored and cut my hair and fulfilled all my hair dreams. Krista actively listed to my poorly described desires, looked at my photo inspiration and executed the goal perfectly! All along the way, touching base and communicating with me about the process. My hair is now everything I ever wanted it to be and more! And without any damage! I can’t recommend this salon and Krista enough.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnZV2LUXUE2nhmwcjWTHNGJ5OYHHjLQVfvZPqQ&fid=0x0:0x4d03760e33fb2040"],"When":"2024-6-2"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Becca Hall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkGTF4WacRdxLgaUUpcitmVLYk9LNMC8uRXAJHEPoa_kpt1doe=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jennie Morris is the best! I really can’t recommend her enough. She understands what you’re describing/asking for and completely nails it every single time.

I came to Jennie a year and a half ago with a terrible haircut, and wanted to grow my hair out. The treatments, cuts, and product recommendations have completely transformed my hair! It’s never been softer, healthier, shinier, or longer! I never want to let anyone else touch my hair again. I got my mom and niece to go to Jennie too and they LOVE her!

1,000% recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aaliyah Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMPVUyxKEnsydIsbj6VtdmrHrwFBSspJtBP7FPqUQ5G2amIA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been getting my hair done by Alexis for a while now, and I can confidently say she’s amazing at what she does! No matter where she goes, I always follow her because her work is just that good. My haircuts always come out perfect, and my color is consistently flawless—she truly has a talent for creating exactly what I envision. Alexis is not only professional and skilled, but she also has such a warm and fun personality that makes every appointment enjoyable. I highly recommend her to anyone looking for an exceptional hairstylist!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alix LaBelle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJzLcOsLZQSC0DRSZiS6Egsy-VlIjH7wznQy2xd51lQ3riEAw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Maeve is absolutely amazing! She was able to take my horrible red box dyed hair and turn it into the perfect copper I was looking for a couple years ago. When I told her I wanted to go back to blonde she got me back to where I wanted within a couple appointments, keeping the hair health in mind! The pics are the latest blonde and I can't wait for my next appointment. She's such a good listener, which at this point I don't even tell her what I want, she does ~it~. Also, the girl can cut hair like no other, she gives me the best layers or really whatever I want. Thank god, I honestly don't know what I would do with out her. Also, the whole team is just so friendly and welcoming. Pierce at the front desk just knows which drink I want at this point. Definitely would recommend to anyone!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQuxfVA-89WMXkcn3TuK7BAogIve0dP8kjW2Ve&fid=0x0:0x9977242fa1ac73d8"],"When":"2024-5-31"},{"Name":"Audra Roye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBg-qqbK71oYvrIABY4Fb-cN0sFbI_u1zomU_ZBuE7eJY4WdUy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love going to Matthew Morris Salon! I see Madison, and she is amazing! I told her what I wanted, and she delivered that and more! I’m in love with my hair! ♥️ She listens to what you want, makes recommendations based on her knowledge, and delivers beautiful results. She’s super sweet and fun as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9N_genVlMkly1bNb0oG7w9bWKRPSuRk0uQFgu&fid=0x0:0x9977242fa1ac73d8"],"When":"2024-2-15"},{"Name":"Cassandra Ray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsXWfWo808yXZ9vfwOv3YLjfiLTwFFsA1MHoF6Yp10mUXKPW-I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have seen Connor Lusk for haircuts, color and blowouts and he is absolutely amazing. He is great at what he does and makes my hair look fantastic. He listens to what I want, but also gives me input to what would look good from a professional standpoint. He is very personable, kind and funny and makes the time fly by. I am grateful that I found a stylist that I can build a relationship with for consistency. Thank you Connor!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"William McCalpin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQG3r3eh-Wj9mCXyl_MjqlE4RbT4V3QGki1ZG6muRax4R_sBw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amie Rau is the absolute BEST!  She is a true master of every aspect of the craft and knows my hair better than anyone.  Her haircuts SLAY!  I couldn't be happier with Amie and Matthew Morris.  She's a real bright spot in my day and I look forward to every visit because I truly love seeing her and I know for whatever I have coming up, I'm going to look great!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jessica barrett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUm07OxMORKspqg5iO7nya7CwO0jMo87mME4Avlc7dbxy3CJ504uw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just moved to Denver and I usually have a difficult time finding a blonding specialist,  but got so lucky finding Gracie on my first try. She knew exactly what I wanted and my color and cut turned out great. She's also very sweet and funny and I felt 100% at ease. Highly recommend her, especially for blondes!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"JellsWorld","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBZ1Nx5xNi9fLM0geNBxdykPJrIq1338TPmYf4fJlUSr2WOHc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Janelle is absolutely AMAZING! I fell back in love with my hair, it has never been so healthy! The layers she put in fall so flawlessly and I am obsessed over the fact that I can roll out of bed with a fabulous bed head I can wear up or down without brushing and styling. The way Janelle takes her time and listens to what I actually want is the top tier She is a true artist and I am so thankful to have her!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFdvqvhL72-8-mhp6veO636YIbtc3wgNHpyuFG&fid=0x0:0x9977242fa1ac73d8"],"When":"2024-7-12"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Delyce Collins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWIGOV9XED_hfYoaUIiMOpK18rs14WcSwtMMX65vEBFmDYyNZPj0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! Gorgeous salon! Inviting space and beautiful spirited women welcomed me, offered snacks, wine, coffee… and then I met Harper! Harper exceeded my expectations, listening and executing on every detail I desired in my cut \u0026 style! My hair was cute when I walked in; but when I walked out it was perfection! 5 stars for The Factory! 10 stars for Ms. Harper!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_B9k66JwsuqLbacgLRLe5e3Fzg_L8w8RjyFiq\u0026fid=0x0:0x7d36d743745bfe03"],"When":"2025-3-12"},{"Name":"eilen suarez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVR6bwsJUqsF-VEWa72PHznbdUJH1bCirtBXNWZFl1BCBEqVdbTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love it, is all an experience and the best experience, since you enter to the salon everyone is super nice and kind, my stylist Jimena was amazing explain every step and also give me recommendations to keep my hair healthy, I really love everything and the result were amazing, I’m going to recommend this place to everyone, really thankful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMi8isaZ-BVDnfWMxM5IRqPV5MA-tiybmmxphZn\u0026fid=0x0:0x7d36d743745bfe03"],"When":"2025-3-13"},{"Name":"Lily B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZjb7yXcrvU8SOCadX_gOB3I53fLO-CGuzPFuDSgfU0__7V3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an absolutely amazing experience with Harper as my stylist. She was so great about listening to what I wanted but also sharing ideas. I felt so comfortable, and honestly spoiled because of how much time and care she took with me. My hair came out better than I could’ve imagined and I already booked another appointment to go back! The studio is lovely and I would recommend it to anyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aisreal Blank","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwOFkxAh2QMiLeM2pELUt-lXW7Vyar7skrzt1E6vtJAoAg1A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience. Shanel was my stylist and she made all my hair dreams come true and that’s incredible bc I haven’t let anyone touch my hair in 4 years since a bad haircut at another salon. The salon itself is such a relaxing welcoming vibe, all their stylists are well trained and you can choose which level and price works best for you. Shanel is a master stylist and she did a dark root with a copper bayalage and full haircut/wash/style and it was less than $300 for everything. If you’re looking for a new home stylist I highly recommend hair factory \u003c3\u003c3\u003c3 :0)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-k8SYteEn5VAdAnzleXVpHQOrq10qJKsVWSbr\u0026fid=0x0:0x7d36d743745bfe03"],"When":"2025-2-13"},{"Name":"Suzette Montera-Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9xKqZN3Fbm7znvkMuYZvnztEChpCP5gNmmn6DGxFZ0wkcA7g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can’t say enough great things about Harper! From the moment I walked into the salon, she made me feel welcomed and at ease. Her attention to detail, professionalism, and creativity are truly unmatched.\nHarper took  the time to listen to exactly what I wanted and offered expert advice to ensure my hair looked its absolute best. The end result was beyond my expectations—my hair has never looked healthier, more stylish, or more vibrant!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrea Bailey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJucM3Cym7bibf8Et66x9eg2xi-k6PEOpJravv7Zxba_G73MQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Harper took time to talk with me about ideas and provide realistic expectations regarding a photo I brought as a starting place. She seemed to have great attention to detail, and made sure to review the cut at the end to make any last adjustments. She checked in with me throughout the process about the length, and used a variety of techniques while cutting and styling. Blow drying my thick hair can take ages, and this has been rushed in previous experiences at other salons. But Harper sectioned off my hair to thoroughly dry and style each part without rushing the process. She also gave a great head massage at the beginning! Really pleased with the whole experience and outcome. Thanks!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqbDcWj6TrbSfHTeOm91BEhmZjUz14ZGzN_CDC\u0026fid=0x0:0x7d36d743745bfe03"],"When":"2025-1-3"},{"Name":"Breanna Hernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrFP622sAnTN5x5BS-AofvWkxfgDy9ZEIG5aYLLrFhXenpnAQN=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved the vibe and Erin’s personality. Everyone was so nice today and I thought everything was pretty reasonable. Thank you so much for everything factory team. Also, the factory has the cutest pup roaming around. Cherry on top of the visit!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDHS5-Ols-XYt_jtsr497ZGlyTy_KGOfTKHGk\u0026fid=0x0:0x7d36d743745bfe03"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"cece “Cece Verde” Verde","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLAXsRyo4n-dTkJ9F_OksIWlDA0Z8yETS1kGwiFOa1848SiL4A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After a long time, I had my best haircut, and I adored the way it looked. Jimena was excellent, She is very welcoming, and professional. It was my first visit, and I was quite impressed with the stuff and the work that they did. My hair got the nicest blow-out from her.\nI was so happy and excited with result of my look I gave her big hug. Thank you thank you 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPBS1BtWNlfcVNZ1ZhCm5yU6-zBZRI6DLY4iP5e\u0026fid=0x0:0x7d36d743745bfe03"],"When":"2025-1-10"}]
