user_reviews: [{"Name":"Michelle F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIeBMBWf6_foNc6SgXAlWtVNMuB-qVT793_IZSXK0Q3jLj1yw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chris was THE BEST. He listened to what I wanted, made suggestions, and gave me a cut and color that looked even better than I could have imagined. He was up front about pricing and confirmed cost before beginning, and his overall positive attitude throughout the appointment was infectious. I’ve never gotten so many compliments on my hair - I would recommend Fox and Jane Salon to anyone and look forward to my next appointment with Chris!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbDXqWwmlbWyykezgwn9EzYC8MTcQnrigtbTNV\u0026fid=0x0:0xe674950da1622f59"],"When":"2025-3-11"},{"Name":"Heather Newett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyTcjFj5ltoTtdr8C7MMz17VDWN5KBoQnQLpm6gHOzY1TlusNbsw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Victoria has been my stylist through a huge redhead transition and I COULD NOT BE HAPPIER with my hair!!! Good things take time, and my appointments tend to run long, but every visit has enhanced my looks and has developed a style that I’m really excited to be moving forward with!\n\nThe salon has an open, airy atmosphere free from harsh smells. It’s very sanitary and the employees are really polite and accommodating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0HVCY9XWlvTc64vkKWAS3Au5688KPzDedaS3R\u0026fid=0x0:0xe674950da1622f59"],"When":"2024-12-26"},{"Name":"Jade Martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjXpSIWYcUKZQzqp28vt1UbvQhCA-dphOCMDoVRRose3Vjnolp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely loved everything about Fox and Jane. My stylist was Mel, she is fantastic. Extremely friendly and knowledgeable. She made me feel comfortable and listened to what I wanted and gave me exactly what I was looking for. All the stylist in this establishment go out of their way to make their clients feel comfortable and safe. I was observing them while I was waiting for my hair to process. The end result was amazing. This is now my new salon and Mel will be my stylist. I  recommend this salon to everyone. Prices do depend on the skill level of your stylist and the services you request.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emily Buis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkeJHZyEOE6eQXtAJVBKW7QFz8hpzAlQ3g0XnCEEWWbHtUoGo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chris had me leaving the salon feeling so pretty and so refreshed! It had been 2 years since the last time I got my hair done, so I was very excited and he did not disappoint. I have already recommended him to all my friends and sisters, haha.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOtviX2cpPSvhMnbraUWLZ1xlUZq-SyR4rgV803\u0026fid=0x0:0xe674950da1622f59"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Courtney Evers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVIJf0b7R_62lxGB608IhboMlxgxcFzz_80celu01yCanP8AKj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chris did an outstanding job on my cut and color! I came in after getting a terrible bob style cut and he was able to completely fix it and color my hair to perfection! It’s been a couple weeks and I am still loving this cut! Definitely go to Chris and you won’t be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQiCdW9lqpK7aIixQTWNivpBnaBS2o0xum-8Qa\u0026fid=0x0:0xe674950da1622f59"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Aurora Ruckle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKH7AmctJQdtBrMddGr1fm4lcreIwOl2CDWjwnsxbe1WLp4gw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I I highly recommend Fox \u0026 Jane! They are absolutely fantastic!! I was going to a fantasy themed ball and needed a beautiful hairstyle to complete my look, they absolutely delivered❤️!! It stayed the whole night though dancing and my hair look amazing for a long while after! I felt so beautiful! Thank you so much!! The ladies at the solan worked so hard and listened very carefully what I wanted and continued to cheek in throughout the whole process! They are an incredible team, and very kind and professional! If you want a a great solan, beautiful hair and a very great experience go to Fox \u0026 Jane!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjIuHfmhE_7g0ZG26aBJCZ3AmNXzPNw4RU58a8\u0026fid=0x0:0xe674950da1622f59"],"When":"2025-1-7"},{"Name":"Luna Beale","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUD3hm3wFwssP6qwgzcf3yKQkwq5YvSHvrRJvYSS4FZToyh2gIUJw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Maddy was amazing!! She took the time to talk through my hair issues and goals and walked me through her plan before starting anything. My hair was dull, dry, and straggly and now is so much bouncier and shinier! She was super easy to talk to and offered great recommendations for maintenance and healthy hair :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMLXRB3JZThnqegTDZDorhAIz9kd2Cxtd1JShbg\u0026fid=0x0:0xe674950da1622f59"],"When":"2025-2-25"},{"Name":"Amelia Giordano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWESQXYKuM6ULKu42Dt8MFoZTPO86hskMCG_V7CIcBoXzyHCtN9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Four years ago, I visited Fox and Jane to see if they could save my hair after a bad bleach job. That’s when I met Chelsey — not only did she fix it, but she made me fall in love my own hair! She was so funny, kind and professional that I’ve never looked back. I’ve seen her loyally ever since. If you live in this area and you’re not seeing her, respectfully, what are you doing?? 20/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_BQpgYnGyX-B8D32yAd8iTjKla4G5g6G6tIKX\u0026fid=0x0:0xe674950da1622f59"],"When":"2024-8-1"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jazzie Vaccarella","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMq3GSfwj98l0nQcNSl-sZC88MFrk_fyvUNJw0GT8rxW7Ayg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good location, downtown Denver area. The studio has great amenities they have a coffee/ tea station, water and some candies, the waiting room is small but cozy, their decorations are really nice and clean, very welcoming place with their staff that is very engaging and attentive. Definitely we recommended it and we will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlwvn7-KvqlzYN1yp3UsVXe0h71DEnl2BNnDlX\u0026fid=0x0:0xdd1986e9560540af"],"When":"2025-2-12"},{"Name":"Emma Foster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYqI6b-02AdwxUuUKbmGaWDFMlOMBRbToSwN03aseWIQA3Zin8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I came here in December for my first curly cut. I have wavy hair and I thought it would add some volume, but I really just wanted to learn how to style my hair. The stylist I had was amazing. She was very thorough and took her time with each step. My only wish was that she would have asked if I ever wear my hair straight because I do about half the time. I didn’t realize if you got a curly cut it looks terrible straight. I asked for very minimal layers as I was nervous. The first time I straightened my hair after this cut i was in shock. It took 2 months and 2 hair cuts to fix this and it’s just disappointing that this wasn’t clarified because I would have never gotten a curly cut if I had known this would be the result. Maybe this is a me problem but I definitely think the stylist should have asked “do you wear your hair straight” because I would have said yes and then we would have avoided all of this. The actual hair cuts when styled wavy looks amazing and she did a great job. The picture with the bright blonde is what I walked out with and the darker is what I have had it fixed to look like.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcObDudXrE-3qYr8MX4vK1Zd9VHIRkB5rS-2BY\u0026fid=0x0:0xdd1986e9560540af"],"When":"2025-2-7"},{"Name":"Becca Kemple","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIchXk66g6B09vrabV5JeppEmQmn-QKoYxvYoKtPYbQTrmgGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Robin was amazing to work with. She helped me feel comfortable, explained everything and was so kind. She did the most amazing job cutting my hair into the curly cut of my dreams! Can’t wait to continue working with her. Highly recommend scheduling an appointment with her.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Abby Mussack","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLdxDj3ayTXWBCZ6xKVCsWfF3gAhIsElan6wxomrCO3YpRGyA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you have curly hair The Station is the hair salon for you! Their stylists are curly hair experts!\n\nMarissa takes the care and time to ensure your hair is the best it can be. My hair needed a revamp and that’s what she did! After my time with Marissa my curls are back to their bounce and my grays are gone! She blended the color and highlights that work with my natural color. We also had such a fun time chatting and getting to know each other.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Angela Blackwood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxc2zw9FrpCqaTM_K5KcU0LrgdVOFrqCcdqi9JuxtGRkkyi_8s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Station Salon is amazing for any person out there with curly hair!! I have seen 2 of their curly specialists and I have not been disappointed!! I started my curly journey almost a year ago. Robin is seriously the best! She’s knowledgeable and passionate about curly hair and her clients, she always makes me feel comfortable and I trust her so much with my hair. Can’t recommend this salon and Robin enough!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"C H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWliaPxBql0ykOrzD4mUPHXmw_JxnenU4-vVx-yicR5-ZH_lS0KOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been getting my hair cut and colored by the same person my whole life and desperately needed a change, so I found The Station after I moved to Denver. There’s a reason that Robin is the most mentioned stylist in these reviews. She is fun and professional and does everything in her power to make sure that you are thrilled with the cut you get. I left the salon happier with my hair than I have ever been, and have stayed happy with it even as it grows out. The pricing seems a bit much at first glance, but I can promise that it is absolutely worth it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jess B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLz3DiNJqqNYkvTA9BQFfmEduzdrgmYCx8vQDmKHVbfUkir8A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fellow curlies, can't recommend Crystal enough!  If I could give her a 100 star review I would.  She taught me everything I needed to know about curly hair, and always does a beautiful cut and style.  Bonus she is super nice!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Esranur Usta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgxTJ_fpNnxLAIiSvvZvbgmzT4Lg_ZA7WNpaTXqfE7bd1SiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you are looking for a short and perfect haircut, this is the right place. Crystal cut my hair very recently. I was looking for someone who could cut my hair straight because I have a sensitivity to symmetry and I love my hair right now. I will definitely come back for Crystal!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Felicity Atkinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbfkrdDoqt-u5ChXaoCAXH8mLwWS1iO0FS814wJmYgotYKPg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If I could give more than five stars, I would. This salon is hands-down the best experience we’ve ever had. From start to finish, they treated my daughter with such care, patience, and artistry—it was beyond anything I could have hoped for.

Riley did her original butterfly cut about a month ago, and it was absolutely stunning. My daughter has always struggled with her hair, and Riley gave her something low-maintenance yet beautiful, boosting her confidence in a way I can’t even put into words.

Then came the color—something my daughter has been dreaming of for years. Now that she’s hitting the big 1-0, I finally said yes to a little rainbow magic (just not all the way to the roots), and Raegen made that dream a reality. The blending is flawless, the tones are vibrant yet soft, and the level of detail she put into every strand shows how much she truly cares.

But what really sets this salon apart isn’t just the talent—it’s the heart. When my daughter had a last-minute change of mind and we couldn’t finish in one session, Raegen, out of pure kindness, came in on her day off just to make sure my daughter got exactly what she wanted. I know how demanding this industry is—long hours, little rest, standing all day—and yet she still went above and beyond for us.

I will never take my daughter anywhere else. This salon is the perfect mix of luxury and warmth—a place where you feel like family while still getting a high-end experience. Thank you, from the bottom of my heart, for making my daughter so happy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOscJlfvvgHS4f0Rd5oo929frAK2lCyLFDmXx1O&fid=0x0:0x411ec2c5ed806a7a"],"When":"2025-3-2"},{"Name":"Candace Lartigue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8pAuE0dGl8797W1tbd3cQTHmH48AUNI_PGOi7Sx-xd08HwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I cannot recommend Josh at Deseo Salon enough! He is absolutely amazing. He has taken such great care of my hair, and it’s healthier than it has ever been. His expertise, attention to detail, and genuine passion for hair care make every appointment a great experience. If you’re looking for someone who truly knows how to make your hair look and feel its best, Josh is the one!

Come here, book with him, and spend your money—you won’t regret it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Terri Mayoral","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK76YzFE_dpd_CuM236Nr3BcVHM-pnUIOCLYul7cdfeIsWPiw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After moving back to Denver to retire, I was looking for a salon and found Deseo fairly close as well as great reviews!  They set me up with Maureen for my first visit and boy did I hit the jackpot!   What an easy transition.  Maureen is fantastic (made me feel like I’ve known her forever)  and what outstanding talent she has in hair color , cuts and style. I’ve had many compliments on her work.Thank you, Maureen for always doing a great job!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nicole Trujillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfQiy7BVJbGQE70zRg7bVjzIndUwkaDfIpjgitzNk95k1i5oU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was looking for a highly rated salon to give me a keratin treatment. I called Deseo Salon on Thursday afternoon and let them know I was on a tight schedule as I was flying out of Denver on Saturday afternoon. They were able to accommodate my schedule, got me in for a consultation on Friday and booked my appointment with Hayden for Saturday morning.

Hayden did an amazing job. Knowing that I had limited time, he wasted no time getting to work. He was friendly & thorough. He explained the process to me during our consultation and also provided so much helpful information about what products to use on my hair. Because we didn’t have time for a full style at the end of the appointment he gave me an adorable fishtail braid.

The salon itself is clean, full of natural light and they played great music to accompany the 3 hour process. It was a great experience and I would definitely recommend looking at their salon for hair services.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Laura","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGGi-io_J39rJRJFv23GulYI3l6R_2VmdqqRzQhzfZwVicwKop=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I saw Margaret who did an amazing job! As someone who has a lot of hair that is thick and wavy, it’s hard to find a stylist. She knew exactly what I wanted and made me feel comfortable and incredible afterwards! She also recommended products for my specific hair needs as well. Already on the books for my next visits!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPmTfJlg6Mo4Kv8tCjbxyLFCqoWSdbJsR1ccfl&fid=0x0:0x411ec2c5ed806a7a"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Badamkhand Bat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJIHRw4ZlU3VAmQETK_NskSBucLRJyHySNfUcqvLUHIerMpQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been going to Deseo for a little over a year and always see Maureen. She  is amazing at what she does! She definitely nails my hair color every time, and her cuts are always on point. Can’t forget mention that her cool vibe makes every appointment enjoyable. She is truly talented—definitely the best for all your hair coloring needs!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashley Ortiz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrt9jrsXS-7BkzG2Mtwet7N6IUaB77lSQuQ65hELnhvw42Yz9YEg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am so so grateful for Deseo Salon! I’ve been coming to Alyssa for years now and love my hair. It’s such a big thing to trust your stylist and I absolutely trust her! She is kind, listens, and has a wealth of knowledge and expertise. Thank you so much for everything Alyssa!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cassidy McAllister","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwTlW-cGdPnLtTk56J7QM8D0tJv1luN65FKFJVm7myPJGSlUU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been looking for a place to get my curly hair cut since moving to Denver in 2021 and after some tough experiences elsewhere I am so happy I found Deseo, Maureen does an amazing curly hair cut and is now the only person I trust to cut my curly hair. The rest of the team is wonderful as well as I have also come for the occasional blowout with other stylists","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"gabriella Turnbill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGaQsxLPBOYfCXuzolTunt4qmIsDoS3R-RXDqaSuaxqV51xA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kayla was incredible! Easy to talk to, easy to explain what I wanted. She made my baby bangs dreams come true. Definitely will be going to her for all my hair needs from now on. Thank you Kayla!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0A7ftE22CRtBh4R6in-bQcAQogfcLNczAnAxE&fid=0x0:0x3b58f8eeb4eef112"],"When":"2025-2-20"},{"Name":"Sharaine Peoples-Paulek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjQjLiaz7qt3osR3HUsL8Z_vkpvdd1HIU09ArGjfywCCfiEeD1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Elli was amazing! Super nice and helpful. Listened and Asked questions. A fantastic head massage when she was washing my hair. My haircut looked amazing! I will be returning. Thanks Elli! You are amazing!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hannah Boyd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbAu2KTHz1Wy1n9g5BiQ-yqQjDogqpR4l8pJ-pixPExHkvNrju=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I haven’t been to a hair salon to get a cut in over 10 years and I was worried, but based on the reviews of this place, I booked with Jodi. And my God, she blew my expectations. She was super sweet and listened to exactly what I wanted and her work came out better than the pictures. 10/10 recommend Jodi & I will definitely be back for her. Thanks Jodi!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sky Davies","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZKS6Jp1wiA_N_rY8dnNQGPvtumlF-VjxxzRVCwWwQpajNsU8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love Birch Salon. This was my second time getting a haircut here. Jodi has done it both times and I LOVE the way she cuts my hair and layers it. She gives me exactly what I want. She is so friendly and just overall have had a great experience at this salon!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jackson Maring","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKspmksSgueZiZkExqvHhrhnH-l1rOIB20KcJyGA-1feKyQtg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amanda.   Been having her cut and color my hair for over a decade now.   Absolutely fantastic.  10/10.   This salon is absolutely awesome as well.   If you are looking for someone new to handle your hair, go here and ask for Amanda.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Reese Quinn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzWI3rOuTetoD_72c3UKYqGDeHMrS4y4MBiJd-dAbizdHvwoY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love Birch Salon! Been going here for 4+ years and will never trust my hair with any other salon! Kayla is such a wizard with vivids, keeping me hot pink all year round without damaging my hair! Easy to book and a great atmosphere too, highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVUJMZoadgz7kDwG678oXnEhxuryHsksL4SH8&fid=0x0:0x3b58f8eeb4eef112"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Allie M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWVLHkTtYJIS6ybFTGkV8oNT2hBYEKD-XClHP39DfYfZOdgBzs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kayla always does a great job with both my husband’s cut and my hair.  I’ve had other stylists in the past who didn’t want to work with me on big changes (I think out of fear I’d regret it) but Kayla always listens and gives good feedback and then gives me the cut I am looking for. She’s a delight!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kelly Kriwko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWoKrSTywzEkWVeas4g9PMQPPx_h2chYGtFoCuIWIbUJUV5ykRb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Disappointing Experience with Balayage Customer Service

I recently visited the salon for a balayage and cut, but unfortunately, my experience was quite disappointing, and I cannot recommend this salon.

To start, when I arrived, there was no one at the front desk, and neither of the two hairstylists on duty acknowledged me. I was left standing around for about 10 minutes until the receptionist finally appeared. When she did, she was not only rude but also seemed uninterested in helping.

The stylist who did my balayage and cut was super friendly, but I believe she may not be well-versed in working with blonde hair. After shampooing my hair, she remarked, “Well, it’s definitely not going to be as blonde as you wanted. I would recommend not waiting so long to color again.” For context, I’m already blonde and have previously transitioned to even an icy white blonde without any issues.. through balayage and foils.

During the blowout, the stylist mentioned that her blow dryer was on its last leg, and it showed in the results. My blowout was far from what I expected—it was flat as a board. While the final color isn’t absolutely awful, it’s very brassy and not what I anticipated or we talked about. Please see final hair right after it was done and reference photo.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMN4_xcpkWAElr-rr1NCJbKC29msjBFDUBvWB73&fid=0x0:0x3b58f8eeb4eef112"],"When":"2024-8-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Alyssa Haskel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJITNtWvWsUvq2D-TLZFejOEAEK0fSVWneByxi3riv6ie5_jA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Words can't express how great Sydney is! It's like each time I go I get my new favorite haircut. The most recent appointment, I decided to dye my hair for the first time in over a decade after letting my grays grow in and the color she mixed was beyond perfection. Sydney is hands down the best hair stylist I've ever had and is so much fun, and the space itself is warm and inviting.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carly Schellenberg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOD5S9BAAhop7mssTCR-e1npGpkA9eEMF162npEVgy3FoELw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the best experience at the Blake! I have gone to Sydney every time that I have been, and I have never been happier with my hair! She has always listened to what I have to say about my hair and it comes out exactly how I hope it would and better. As someone who has never dyed their hair before, she made the experience amazing! I absolutely recommend booking with Sydney.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMQQYzWKPIFmVllJji2PFWz7ek1g5CdmeKPRWc&fid=0x0:0x5dc09760ec444809"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Christine Calder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-BpBXDkKIc5d0DsBSWKpzuGYQ8zrAbTWeb60E1zU5OJ436zrYNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sydney did an absolutely AMAZING job on my hair. I am absolutely blown away. She gave a great consultation and really listened to what I wanted. On top of walking out with beautiful hair, she was super sweet and attentive during my appointment. Highly recommend her, and everyone else getting their hair done by the other stylists looked great too!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Erica Tran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2uNLkmdw4m81MGC_1lfpPZ5gV_bVVic0YncrpGNaAWVGO0R1QTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of working with Kristen at this boutique salon, and I couldn't be happier with the experience! The studio is intimate, clean, and modern, with huge windows that flood the space with beautiful sunlight, creating a bright and welcoming atmosphere. I came in looking for a dramatic change, and Kristen delivered—cutting off 4 inches and giving me a stunning layered bob with caramel balayage. She handled my thick Asian hair with ease and confidence, which made me feel reassured from the start. Throughout the process, she was informative and checked in regularly to make sure I was comfortable. Her warm, friendly personality made our chat enjoyable, and she patiently answered all my questions. Even as a last-minute booking, Kristen went above and beyond. I highly recommend this salon for anyone looking for a talented stylist who knows her craft in an inspiring, comfortable setting!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUQiR6d0btXvC69zzfBtiAch-7dyjzP8kX8H-W&fid=0x0:0x5dc09760ec444809"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Chavone Burke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIbbKXP-yzLAC4VGxRs5Cu3i_6t_f_de585Y2uuQnGzxfPDVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited The Blake Denver and had an incredible experience with Shyer. I have 3c, relaxed hair that was severely damaged and desperately needed a good cut. Shyer’s expertise and patience transformed my hair entirely. She listened intently to my concerns and delivered a cut that not only removed the damage but also brought new life to my style. The salon itself is gorgeous, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere that made me feel instantly at ease. I left the salon feeling rejuvenated and confident. I highly recommend The Blake Denver and Shyer to anyone looking for skilled, thoughtful, and transformative hair care.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Caitlin Arnold","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlNJIyzrOTqvw9GDyDq78efJWmsyQMlvaR1_8YEYs4S5UdSg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sydney is a miracle worker!!
I came in for a color correction after a bad experience at a different salon. I had pretty low expectations on what could be done.
Sydney listened to my concerns and asked all the right questions to make sure we were on the same page during the consultation. During my appointment she explained what she was doing and was so knowledgeable. I knew I was in good hands and had a great time chatting with her too. When she finished and I saw the transformation I was THRILLED! She turned a mess into a masterpiece, my hair looks beautiful and I feel like myself again.
Sydney is amazing at color correction work, but save yourself the pain and just book with her to begin with!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpUvpNB7XWH2d4LX6SvRYdJjcdujDn_iiaqTiZ&fid=0x0:0x5dc09760ec444809"],"When":"2025-1-8"},{"Name":"Anne Daugherty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLRJnXMUPDOJMGatWzGObKVURcKWBkyeCrxU3m2JAUw3VRwbg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can’t say enough about Sydney and the beautiful Blake salon. I had really been wishing my ginger hair had the same pop and vibrant color it did 20 years ago, but the maintenance of getting full color or even highlights just doesn’t fit into my lifestyle. Sydney encouraged me to try a gloss instead since there is no awkward grow out phase. She really listened to what I was going for, absolutely NAILED the color and made my wish come true. Just stunning. She’s such a professional and a true master of her craft. She is a delight, takes her time and gets it right, even if that means re-touching because my hair didn’t behave with all the gray coming in. The salon is always clean, comfy and has such a fun vibe. Highly , highly, HIGHLY recommend getting in Sydney’s chair!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rachel W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpKEoPVFrIjZEI1HlUwCu7yxsJJgdTEWGjj9Ttzt5gae6sndy0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had my (waist length!) hair done by Shyer, the owner of the salon, and it was PERFECT! She is clearly a color expert, highly professional and very talented. I don’t trust my hair to just anyone, and she did not disappoint. 5 stars!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Callan Kelley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLMFI5lOo16kIKARaG-PSGwem5Ky3oTCothh50ZFgkroYwE2yoFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Adorable salon, everyone there is so friendly, the place has fantastic energy, and Kate does an amazing job with my hair, and is such a great human in every way!!!! I have a roster comb and sideburns, and they cut them perfectly every time. Kate definitely understands alt hair styles and knows how to execute them perfectly. I will absolutely be booking them for my next fashion color, too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kaitlin K.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLB6OsHTKJmOai_b-VDMF63eU9xI_579c_d9IX_3fLPTsCb14=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"OBSESSED!!! Nessa (@deathbycurler) did an amazing job at giving me my dream fall look with my copper hair. I am naturally dark brunette and she transformed my hair into a beautiful red. Her coloring technique was so on point. We didn't have to bleach my hair to get this. She also took great care to tell me about maintenance and how to keep up this look at home. Affordable prices. Haircut was also great, just a light trim, but she nailed it. In general she's a great time and a wonderful person. You will love her services!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSIJw3jDZHXd_4UwO8F1tx3KJZa0X00S7I470p\u0026fid=0x0:0x30dfb6e85da1f6f2"],"When":"2022-10-20"},{"Name":"Samantha Bolick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPcBvyeSsn-Js8eEnN_mT6X-tSL40ETwzM5k5kzSg_roftigkD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I saw Milla today for a partial highlight and a cut. She took great care of me, from start to finish I really enjoyed my visit today. She gave me an estimate price based on an hourly rate and it turned out to be cheaper because she finished sooner than estimated. I have definitely paid more for my hair before because of dishonest pricing and was very happy with the price and the results of my hair. Thank you so much, Milla! I will be scheduling again :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkHSgY0N1M4PUaDmGUhN-8gnYws3yIiOauX_MH\u0026fid=0x0:0x30dfb6e85da1f6f2"],"When":"2023-11-8"},{"Name":"Kate Demolli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEfcjIQMeXTggpNylBxlE0kRD8q4PULdoDmohnTRxS3wgjBEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nessa killed it. This was an amazing experience. As a neurospicy person hair cuts are the worst. This was actually a fun experience! I look FANTASTIC too!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoRKOdLIsuK5N67PzMECqdRVesWQdoJ8QjA1Gl\u0026fid=0x0:0x30dfb6e85da1f6f2"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Michael Jimenez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmylLSiYYRtZ-bMJAzf9vvXRLCtIoefeB0lN_FqTfcYKEtsNY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kate Kutz creates true magic with her vibrant colors and hair cut designs. Luxe De Vil salon has such a personable atmosphere where unicorns are born and has the best vibes. 🌈❤️🦇🦄","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-Hwqx22jcqhJQnbZq0n2_6TXLQ0Uq2SnoWLGw\u0026fid=0x0:0x30dfb6e85da1f6f2"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Saray Brunette","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVRhRrEEWRGw-uNanUMZjuOnX0FJhOU0ylLGIyGKzwmOziYSZ3zA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nessa is a vivid color guru! She always comes through in the best ways for me and I definitely recommend making an appointment with her if you want to have the bright color hair of your dreams 🥰","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNek1jgMMi6MykPISyhy2qjzPs77W4sCRsU9ZHk\u0026fid=0x0:0x30dfb6e85da1f6f2"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Raven Scholefield","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuwtQfO9IcRMOCX-oV4Ynn0G2I4kwNAJYdsu_ug3H-hhGJ9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Luxe de Vil salon is the coolest and most unique salon I have ever been in. I have seen Milla multiple times to get my hair done and I am always impressed with her work. Color, cuts, and styling she has such a wide range of talent. I love how thorough she is and takes her time. You know she cares about your hair and how you feel, leaving you walking out feeling beautiful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYl72pzkgF2qTDLemLrodoe_OUOj2wrbh8v9sb\u0026fid=0x0:0x30dfb6e85da1f6f2"],"When":"2023-3-15"},{"Name":"Angelina Haro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS_KzWyUpEBOvG0BCqpjiFVA4qBVo_0aqaWlu4yyA3XsS5gYE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recommend coming to this salon! Jenny did a great job making me feel at home and comfortable for my massage. She welcomed me with a big smile and offered water before we got started! This salon has great vibes and amazing people","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Gabrielle Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJUWXUo3GnEzt_Bm43VwJQnioV_5tgk83hOLlWz1CXCQ4rbnwA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I hadn't had my haircut in six years after a few bad salon experiences, but Van made me very comfortable and was awesome!  The haircut and style is beautiful and prices are very fair.  Definitely recomend him! The salon itself was very clean and friendly with beautiful decor.  Will be coming back to get my hair colored!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cassie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2Zl9VD8SYuyDYyLKMB_l5r6Z17JkU32_cU9skRuDtMKmV0eeS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Feel so disappointed after my style. I'm standing in my brother's wedding today and my hair is flat and looks unstyled. I'm going to try and redo it but still so disappointed this was over $100. Photos are from within the hour of leaving the salon and without touching it yet to try and fix it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPv6mnAqkC5x5IpEone7ykIehrDbtvscJKTJLsS&fid=0x0:0x2201156ad333d627"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Catherine Portillo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHMMmUZWrIgj0crhorpgJmYC-lYwQ6sbF6n1TbmUCKTk705g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Anita hooked it up! I do this thing where I think I can color my hair at home, and end up destroying my natural color.   I went to a salon near me to get my botched Baylage fixed but was underwhelmed by the results.  The other salon was very kind and did a good job blending, but my hair was still brassy and orange.  Thankfully, I found Anita who considered all my concerns and knew just what to do to get my hair looking more natural and vibrant.  She is very kind and made sure I was happy with the results.  I will let the photos speak for themselves!   Anita, you have a customer for life!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEkSGc7lr_sELTylQ2t_LlwTEy7Ho8EPDsja4N&fid=0x0:0x2201156ad333d627"],"When":"2020-6-3"},{"Name":"nicole green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnTDx3Hb7-sdSl7BvWgu8TpEWs4qwG9zin0q4biZnNuo2VfkRL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Book with Van. Exceptional cuts. He is not afraid of thick hair or natural curls. I’ve lived in a few countries and over ten cities. His work is the best I’ve seen.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtDEKUjOwch_Ky9F43CIL_ucsk-RS1hqxs8omj&fid=0x0:0x2201156ad333d627"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Amanda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmqUNsFXTteZjBThydOahQtzcOxbU-6-AH-fEberyJJOBbcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My hair appointment yesterday with stylist Van Allen, was an absolute turnaround from the bad cut I walked in with (another salon).  The cut was thoughtfully done, considering my hair texture and volume, and the much needed restyle.
Very pleased. Thank you again Van!
My salon experience at Moda Capelli was perfection too!
I am definitely coming back!
-Amanda M.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kimberly Kiefer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWFKbksepb7xQiZj3onOSzIejoyPrGzou5XEJ1AHctnLLzMic2JDg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best color since I moved to Denver in 2005. I finally found my place! Amy was my stylist. I went to lunch after my appointment and two strangers complimented me on my hair. The salon is beautiful and the entire staff are amazing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"KAREN RILEY","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLgGQazUwn2GDYfc_JyVc0NuMuqjqE-P6hjywH1CSrFje7q_g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My beautician, Amy, was awesome.  She took time to go over how I wanted my hair cut and she was incredibly sweet.  She made me feel so welcome.  I will go back and will recommend this salon to anyone.  The location is perfect, too!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Josh Colky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjUfHzGYwQBwiZIAPRJuEeeUcMQ9MlGfDnPwDUmyQx8oD1woz4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been going to Moda Capelli for years and Amy always does a fantastic job. I just got my hair cut yesterday morning and I love my new cut! It is perfect for the spring. Amy is super kind and knowledgeable, I always leave happy! Thank you Amy!","Images":null,"When":""}]

Super personable and she’s very efficient with time of services without sacrificing quality :) I got a cut and highlights from her both times, she does fantastic work!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Qamar Wadi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVhKiQ4KmG-SlD9TZOx2intZ7ybb3duhRU4YF_SCoclD6YRUGh4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Brandon is the best hairstylist I’ve ever had!!! He gave me the exact haircut I’ve been wanting for so long and did it with such ease. I will 100% come back here with him for all my haircuts, he’s so friendly and such a great person to converse with. His energy and his work was top notch!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chrissy Richter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcRga3j45yZ7N43xQamUOsmD8hUQniUz4YGiMyCRw_2_m-MIUgTw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This salon is my happy place! The owners and staff are welcoming and inviting. The space is bright and airy and Lacey is a true professional in every sense of the word! I look forward to my time at Define every 4 weeks.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kaylee Keim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQbvqlW6LJYbYKEv55fLMy9D_D4hJmiv8pWYBB3JKlv6RHz5fr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very beautiful salon with lots of good energy. I was super grateful to get a last minute appointment the day before and took a chance with a new stylist. I got a great cut from Lacey and will def be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"lisa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWk5iuByq3QWk7HHFIrH-_Vtc5YRO9dDdIko6QvUwU0N6PS-SlsLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I took my daughter here, it was our first time at this salon and I plan on coming here from now on. Everyone there was so nice and helpful. My daughter  had a balayage, toned, cut,  layed, thined,  and curled and it turned out better than I could have ever hoped. I highly recommend this salon,  we will be continued customers from now on! Thank you so much for doing a great job. Pricing was very reasonable , Amazing salon!!!!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGaOYZOBCAX0emmkfb9FtWx8dGt6JFXe-2vEpF\u0026fid=0x0:0xcf3184f6bbb65936"],"When":"2021-8-16"},{"Name":"Amber Scott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIkOgn-OGVSAlDf87hLz0SOfhf87E3tBYE-CFZugIqKQgkrZA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Van Ott is the best. Amazing stylist and colorist,  I have curly hair and from day one, 20 years ago, he has given me the best hair cuts/styles, from really really short to long styles. He's always booked so plan ahead.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Darina Murashev","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVL2-tacp2sGzkevQKIqVl_ZKJYy2KbguX5C249r309PVtHYs0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jessi has been doing my hair since 2022 and she’s always done such an incredible job. She’s truly the only person I trust with my haircuts. Highly recommend Jessi and Cult of Mane! Great prices and experience every time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Heidi Hemmat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0vpV7L91JwagKu5JPLyHbb_KZHpRWaTJefq3tUAfRmCfF2hKY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shannon at Cut of Mane is the best stylist! I thought my hair was beyond repair when I booked my first appointment with Shannon in April of 2023, but she is a true miracle worker and it looks and feels better than ever. She is also professional, on time, a true business woman and she’s very responsive. See my before and after photos. I highly recommend Shannon and her salon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO77Xv0lxUm4QGym9SNu128U5ESKON3-RLXFtC7\u0026fid=0x0:0xdb704cfa1f7a48e0"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Jesse McFadden-Brennan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUt5eGRtBqIdZE-IkO40n1LE0hguRX8p9kkAAz1QxaiAlhfkLA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Luis and the rest of the Cult of Mane staff are fantastic. Both my partner and I have been seeing Luis for years. He does such a beautiful job with my short hair as well as my partner’s long hair. Even while we were traveling for several years, we made a point to see Luis any time we stopped in Denver for a cut. He is the absolute best. He’s been so flexible with our crazy schedule, but I would highly recommend scheduling with him in advance as he books up quickly.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maddy Martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVI1rAw3RgvWjkWNy6haaOaPRWCkC-c-jWRPAZUgfww762PMl-m=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I went here for a curly cut. I would not recommend. I asked my hairstylist if she had done a “curly cut” before and she said yes but I left with the most frizzy hair and not the haircut I wanted. I felt very uncomfortable there. Maybe they’re good with color and straight hair but as far as curly hair goes I had a not so good experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rebecca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXyTZTb-nWlK2iTlG84KB-jM1AUvmpkguWZb6-4wNjGdfBWJIO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Emily is amazing! gave me the shag of my dreams while still keeping volume (fine hair girlie) and cut my bangs in a way that no one ever has out here esp given I have a cowlick or two... they are SO CUTE. highly recommend booking a razor cut with her. Will be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Zawacki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNfbViNxaWve3gyImSQqe3V1-0iGOUNXgfenFHej4TLbDZX29O=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have seen Eden twice now, once for a trim and style and most recently a drastic chop from almost waist length to shoulder length. I feel like a rockstar every time I leave the salon! Eden is a great listener and a wonderful person to chat with. I would strongly recommend for anyone looking for a reliable, high quality salon with reasonable prices!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Madison Littleton (personal)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILqXBz46KyUT8nimDEVGvZ082i9vNKmlxMEORX2TYcc6ENhkc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been going to Alyx at Cult of Mane for years! I send all my friends. The stylists are professional and talented and I have always received great treatment no matter who I am seeing.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"B R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYpC8aAxsLW-RPJodyuGPQf2SxMlrypEtZPVF3P1mRTYZwgA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kat is amazing at what she does and so much fun to talk to","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_jjPy5LGscmYzrp3oUJbdIvqeuv0dzMjIHuNJ\u0026fid=0x0:0xdb704cfa1f7a48e0"],"When":"2025-3-13"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Courtney Ambrose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0e3ZlVFO6U5yEA96voyJTNo6m8oXVGRIEbRbG9Hpprfaw1g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always have a great experience at Fluer Salon with Joshua T. He listens to my request and is able to replicate hairstyles I find that are within reason for my current hair color/style. He is the only stylist I trust with my hair! Thank you!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzvLPyXkCLCAHheOSJb09O2WvK3yuqOx3CaABn\u0026fid=0x0:0x14c301ad66da04c6"],"When":"2025-1-17"},{"Name":"Quinlan McFadden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZA5N0yzlpudlB3HEqrm-Jj546ZGmOZfreTM77UVe-9w2pOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can't say enough great things about Joshua and the amazing staff at Fleur Salon! Joshua always goes above and beyond to make sure I feel confident and authentically myself every day. His attention to detail and understanding of what works best for me is unmatched. Whether it’s a fresh cut, a color update, or just a little styling tweak, I always leave the salon feeling like I just stepped off the runway. Joshua has a true gift for making people look and feel their best. I’m so grateful to have him as my stylist – highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cheryl Marden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSm0Jm_ztTEKotJW1HMmIB53HnFPT_RxBK9BtKLmG2x080FA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been going to Fleur Salon for 3 yrs \u0026 seeing only Brandon for my hair. My hair color \u0026 style has never been more chic \u0026 stylish. We worked together to create the perfect color for my skin tone. I love my time at Fleur Salon it’s modern, clean \u0026 the staff are happy \u0026 very friendly!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lissette Grigsby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5OHvvCw81qAe7ik9OXIukF4rx6f5gNxEyLMmivZzcV59TGFI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this salon! Courtney is my hair stylist and she is so wonderful, kind and talented. I have very long, thick red hair and she works miracles every time whether it’s a simple trim or a full set of blonde highlights! Love the products they use too. :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Julianna Fedrizzi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJM-W-iV9FJ_NZg91PiaeWD3KkcRZMXAeluOz-UD-ze5FMb7w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really happy with my experiences at Fleur! Courtney is great-she takes awesome care of my hair and is so fun to talk to. The salon is bright and welcoming and a great option in Cap Hill! So glad to have found it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1unnP7p9eL6uJtK3wW0nKiyMMdGlbaQszG3e_da44Qxi8oSig0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been going to Fleur Salon for years. The atmosphere is professional, comfortable, inviting, clean, and cute. I see Brandon as my stylist and I can't say enough good things about him - he is superbly talented as a hair stylist and I always leaving feeling 11/10. He does a great job of working with me on the ideas that I have for my hair, supporting me and giving me his professional advice. Beyond that, he is such a joy to be around - he is kind, thoughtful, insightful, and has become someone that I consider a close friend. Similarly, all of the staff are congenial. I always feel so relaxed being here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"sam lang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAHCdhTeq9-FHo0ctuO2Snyq0yLEm4rFhi1ebqKsp9zgRsFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve lived in the neighborhood for 15 years was never happy with my haircut. Its been like 4 years at Fluer now and they all do a great job. Everybody is so nice and welcoming, place is s real gem. Shout out to Courtney, but they are all great.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maggie Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlYZqi-XKwv8XITPvyOWyuTOWtfeVP3cWbcj18S592MSUhjRJJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a fantastic team - from the owners to the newest stylists and staff. It has become my happy place over the years. I appreciate you all so, so much - you’re all a breath of fresh air and I always look forward to coming in! 🩷","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Laura C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3jPP48zuIhvDEFMYLPjwp7DsTv4Ge7cLaiuu6aVkKuiZsKA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm so thrilled with my haircut today with Kate. She really listened to my concerns about my flat and super fine hair, suggested ways to add movement and volume and gave me such a great cut that really flatters my face shape. She even offered to style it with some waves to show me how the layers would move. She is really precise in her work and incredibly talented. So glad to have found her!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"KurlyKay Cosmetics","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjvBhzbLlQb93Q_mARKmaMpjXB8zg4iMKFPJ0XsQIJMMmgVxM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience with Alex. My balayage \u0026 cut came out beautifully, and the blow out was perfect. The atmosphere of the salon overall was very pleasing - Thank you ! Wonderful place !! Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hannah Mitchell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaAL-QTX012-edtmlOFIesbpdgpbTiplr_BX1JWXQlymOnzoSn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Skyler did an awesome job on my cut today! Definitely recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Debora Wise","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWNNx3Ot67-P5yObm-wQ23wIflMOBKVwW4BNGldJDkCgl40AQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of seeing Katrina for a hairstyle, and I couldn't be more impressed! He is a delight and we had a great conversation which is always a plus! Will definitely be back to see Kenton soon!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniia Giliazeva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIllLCNy056BQ8VNXiGFgA8H_c6GNGsmOnULJUEKjKhbW1iR5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a fantastic experience with Kate! She is incredibly skilled, attentive, and truly listens to what you want. She took the time to understand my hair type and preferences, offering styling advice while ensuring I felt comfortable throughout the process. The end result exceeded my expectations—my hair looks and feels amazing!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ewelina S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7HUvLYl3OT2wONj7OIHFljzD2vgIyUOFYyTIN-Y_4txc9Ng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kenton is great!! It was my second visit at 3C and I left the salon very happy both times. He did haircut \u0026 color and I love how my hair shapes after all and the color came out very nice. He listened to what I wanted to accomplish with my hair, and made it happened. I highly recommend Kenton and 3C. Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Lara Connell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIYFWczSIyymvRt6Ube8m29MhynC9WvF6EZ_KesKPpfwlB9AK0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alyssa is such a professional and my facial was amazing! Thanks to Alyssa and entire staff at Three Cutters salon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kime Cieszynski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZ7GN12Dw5MdhInk9rLKH5sT9SV7LppKHEWrvh5k_0Ip4aMgMC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Meghan is absolutely wonderful! Her blowouts are amazing and every time I get my hair done by her, I feel on top of the world!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Courtney Hedrick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWA74fwH9dfm9pAsja5CxaPLAsgDIrDbCX8UCnLJnlFyPBZ7R2X=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just had my long, very fine hair cut by Meghan and she did a fabulous job of keeping length but still adding some much needed layers. Will definitely be back to see her!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marcella Shepherd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWiMavjWY4OUoXsZmoZeZwse0t_WfgA0mv0soLHiAyh9bcSKZN-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been meaning to post a review for a long time and finally getting around to it. Kate did a fantastic job cutting and styling my hair back in May, she made it look so luscious and lovely! I think she works at Wash Park location now, but highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM35iyR52ewaZi6Xs7rnnP-lrlDmr9PFPRZlGp3\u0026fid=0x0:0x6a2e25e6e27554da"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Ela B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQ_7aKH4bAB2qJb7tNyLjbG7XJxYljw4q3C-IiKaMNsPuynzg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Carmen was incredible: super attentive, knowledgeable, and helpful.  I love what she did with my long, wavy hair. I am referring her to family members and will be back for regular hair cuts. The salon was lovely and everyone was\nwonderful.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rebecca Bestwick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIciHWGnN2tqnTz_6R-pthdKt1pEKNuh8-8goppb_WAyu_Yng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'd leave more than 5 stars if I could. Thomas was absolutely perfect and is a master at their craft. Feeling like I finally found my stylist is always a good feeling. I gave them some reference pics and they were absolutely taking everything step by step like an artist. The passion and energy was on point. Perfect experience, super happy with how my short look turned out!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephers Jeffers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUt-ynoBW1t8IiT9P8SKnCSFVwD2YMCnSJ_WeDr8NFi3Lv7lW4c=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved my haircut today. I appreciate her attention to detail and time she spent on me. I didn’t feel rushed out the door. Thanks for curling my hair too. Not often do you get that anymore ❤️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shelbey Kreamer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJEjtJwQnYta8B3B02mKJAmJEMuePTAvuew5fLBceGbKkN81w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kendall does such a great job with my color and cut! Will definitely continue coming back to ThreeCutters.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Rachel B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIw0upejsffz16xUKrWh9aYx_vvKjvHpFu6jjxtTIfEnsJbMA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As someone with short hair and who has kids who love fashion colors, we have really struggled to find a hair salon for all our needs.  After years and many tries we have found the most amazing place- Indigo Salon!  The people are so friendly, the products are great, the stylists are amazing, the prices are reasonable and the colors last!  We just love Emmy and Robert and all the folks at Indigo Salon.  If you want a great experience and great color this is the hair salon for you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYwg_8YJoGEO9qZxWXOjguvRCmddSVxx72qXTw\u0026fid=0x0:0xb276cefcb668dcc7"],"When":"2023-5-30"},{"Name":"Stephany Stone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJy50f4VxAJOipBAY0RMx4ZsveE1zW7cMuEo6xFXCqZoGCvJw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you want absolutely STUNNING vivid hair colors I can not recommend Noa enough- they are such a delight to spend time with. I get daily compliments on my hair and I literally can not stop looking at it in the mirror!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrI1iPrYXpOk4t8WegEgACpUZr0h8MbxmevnuH\u0026fid=0x0:0xb276cefcb668dcc7"],"When":"2024-1-12"},{"Name":"E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8GrIelZ6HkVk-lRBogwnjlho4vbLMKI9LtDqAkasOtG6JRHhA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an excellent experience at this salon! Emmy did a phenomenal job with my hair. I have hair that’s really processed and dry. She made it feel brand new as well as gave me tips and tricks to keep it feeling healthy. It’s also always scary going to get long hair cut bc some hair stylists really chop it off more than I want but not Emmy!! I left feeling really good about the way my hair looked and felt. The environment was also just very friendly and inviting. I will definitely be going back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jenny Kramer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLihixSVd_fy-KuLQvFTOLlQvHQws8ELtByHdyQs51bJj4UQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a great first experience at Indigo with Emmy. I left with the best haircut I’ve had in years, and will definitely be back. Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Colleen Adams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImAvAx85e5LLHwBqy2WiT0Rx1azSwtPdLSvFryfF9MxBZGzxM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Noa gave me a great haircut! I didn’t give a ton of direction beyond cutting off my split ends but they intuitively knew how to cut and style my hair in a flattering way. They also gave me some helpful styling tips. Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"V M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgunrFhRH6G_fD6ROCdCKe2-ZprtxKaahVih3cDEyF9f8mwFTS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Harris did an amazing job with my hair! I showed Iike one photo and a vague description and magic was worked, thank you so much I will be returning frequently!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKld1I9OLJhqlapjMUx4ZjxR1131n08IGnhYg9z3lm84K7jcg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Noa is incredible! They take special care to understand your hair as well as your desired end result. They have a wealth of knowledge on curly hair- I learned so much from them! I would highly recommend Noa, I will certainly be back :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cassidy Malk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIlcDGsjm_hjQY-uznDAqd-z_3hWXpDmfFhS-EHM8ud04jOBg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Noa helped me create the curly hair transformations of my dreams. We cut my long curly hair into a short round bob with bangs! I love it and recommend them to everyone!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOR_PvxC9dWcDVMcwuC56QqI5_rn_v7YTjtfzsz\u0026fid=0x0:0xb276cefcb668dcc7"],"When":"2024-3-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Abby Bradetich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVBBrEiQUDOa9Pjcs2EbvAcAIF2AXgwcE1MQPrQ8Esqv2okbvf2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this salon!! The location, the vibe, the stylists - 5 stars all the way. I go to Gabrielle for haircuts and balayage, and she’s the best! So sweet and really great at what she does. The time there always flies. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZZ8RpJRHrhUjXLDeRA33mkrKShDicGchFeZpC&fid=0x0:0xf0b70f39b3e94067"],"When":"2025-1-25"},{"Name":"Kaytlynn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQQT3hNJjPvVm86re4Q-D17O_KkUgy4LoMltYQhHo0cqU6pT4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I saw Tori for two years in Ohio and she has since started a career at Deco in Denver. Tori is extremely talented, a warm and welcoming spirit, down to earth, and is the best hair stylist I’ve ever had. She is the embodiment of a warm hug on a rainy day. I’d show her inspiration photos and somehow she’d make my hair look even better than the photos after dissecting and discussing what I liked about them. My hair was consistently healthy because of her artistry and her at home styling/protection advice. If you want strangers to compliment your hair on a daily basis, go see Tori!

I will miss her dearly and know she’s already a valuable addition to the Deco team!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"hazel Le","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqS6FyBzSj5L6km44LviDplDzBq1zJT1kAU5rfMoaCnDSAMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I spent $300 here just to get my hair ruined! My hair stylist was Sarah. I came in for a test strand because I had black box dye on, which I understand takes time for me to go from dark to lighter hair. Sarah told me my hair lifted good enough for a caramel balayage, and that was the reason I booked an appointment with her to get my hair done. I showed her the picture on the left, and she said my hair would turn out close to that color. The right pic is what my hair looked like one day after I got my hair done (I did wash my hair with the purple shampoo that Sarah told me was a good shampoo). She turned my hair from uneven to extremely uneven! I texted her about it, and she said because she got too excited, she toned my hair lighter than she should have and told me to come in and she would fix it, but she would have to tone it to a dark brown with warmth. The fact that she told me it was going to be a caramel balayage and then proceeded to ruin my hair, and now she wants to tone it dark? I am now paying more money to get my hair fixed somewhere else, and this salon will not refund me my money even though their hair stylist ruined my hair.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOanusIBJkRaK6bf9Eh9OEoTh0kmXbHbQgHeSu&fid=0x0:0xf0b70f39b3e94067"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Colleen Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhRufphHclm-ewH5_FvF_fGhWKeZKllo-g4pPi1-GErSIKRxBw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vincent was SO wonderful. Professional, informative and sweet. He did an amazing job on my hair and I would absolutely book with him again. I 1000% recommend anyone who wants to feel pampered and seen, book with Vincent. The salon is clean and cute (plus 2 adorable dogs!). Overall it was a wonderful experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Samantha Doust","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwderiz72X6o4ZD0yEXSkCB2zLOeMgUnwYm-vY72ZzOzy-QVeF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been going here for years, have seen a number of stylists and will say this is a fabulous salon. They exude a chill, professional welcoming and creative vibe! Sarah is my current stylist - she's rad and does incredible work !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"julianne hoeflich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgcwB4Hjlhl1KmTfpN0gylDeVIbbPcjnwtx8ZZzo0iz4AGaw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I would like to start off by saying this salon is very relaxing and the staff is absolutely wonderful! With that being said I wanted to give a review about a balayage + cut service I got (for my balayage girlies that want a comprehensive review).  For some background, I use to get a balayage in California every ~5-6 months but have since let my hair grow out to my virgin state. I was pretty nervous about visiting a new salon so I paid extra to book an appointment with the owner/top stylist. For my service at DECO I showed a picture of my first ever balayage (pictured in grey sweatshirt), and I left the salon disappointed (pictured in the red jacket). The color was nice, it just was not even close to what I had asked for and I was a little disappointed to pay so much (~400 $ with tip) and not get what I was expecting. When I expressed that my hair was not as light as I had wanted during my appointment, I was told that AVEDA doesn't use bleach so that my hair will be more healthy, and that I should just keep on booking appointments because it takes a couple sessions to get to the correct color. This doesn't really seem worth it to me (given the price of each session) and I'll probably look for another salon to get my balayage done.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVOO7pMMdX1OYUYSePIdVNwvYDGRRyOiRBiGEW&fid=0x0:0xf0b70f39b3e94067"],"When":"2024-2-28"},{"Name":"Laura Van Dusen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_Z8dVE5Yc-jbIgsYsv5R3keRkPfXl27prwwB2XBmjVp8FEsM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Panda is a true gem! I have been seeing for over 10 years for my brows and she keeps me looking fabulous. I get so many compliments on them.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Laurel Cassidy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIq3yaqIG9Kpz6CV_5XVtETV8xXaN6Prm98J31-AEBijTsU3y8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kayla did an incredible job with my highlights, and was so wonderful start to finish.

Great, cozy atmosphere in the salon too. 10/10 recommend.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Angela Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHaVIURuk4DAqxFxarsSRMBve7IITPStgxXI0a7CapjkRdjs1QKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kelly is an absolute gem!! She takes great pride in her work and I always leave feeling like a million bucks! She gives my curls some TLC and they always look so bouncy and vibrant! The vibe at the salon is so relaxing, calm and chill. Kelly is so fun and breath of fresh air! Come check this salon out and support this small business!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephanie Sponder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQ0WXQ7pKIbuxIVQW8uxiQkmSZ1KvVSDAiaju6OUUDY70xYZYC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you haven’t tried Let ‘Em Have It yet, you’re missing out and need to book your next haircut here. They are by far my favorite salon in Denver. They are a team based salon who I’ve been with for years. Kelly, Shae \u0026 Janessa are genuine, welcoming and fantastic at what they do. They go above and beyond every time I see them…including letting my 8 week puppy come with me so I didn’t have to miss my appointment! Next year they have some fantastic community events planned as well. Oh and they have delicious cookies to enjoy after your appointment! Highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnqD8EqlxEOtlqGVqjSWRqsgMF4mmTv1ZeATcK\u0026fid=0x0:0x1bf6a7207aa30fb4"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Kayla Tormohlen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdiBKouSbTRW5hPj3TWOCN9erPO7hMPRQsYUK6BiM7BWgbwbo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love LEHI so much. Kelly provides an incredible curly cut and my hair always looks and feels so much better afterward! The salon is also such a welcoming space and everyone is incredibly kind. I look forward to all of my appointments and always enjoy my time. I would 1000% recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"M A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_g6jOvhVTk4pCHrP-yrkxgj9YeACCaq3Ru3uln6V99_04hQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kelly is the absolute best at hair, business, and connection. I always leave feeling renewed from our conversation, and so happy with my haircut and products. You can feel extra good about going to Let Em Have It because the staff are taken care of, and it shows!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Theresa Charleston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIAKwDbMGw-IICieK4G6xyoy5VzoL5inx9jhNs4KgB6AHeR_1uzg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yay! They have fixed my hairs! :D I don’t have to wear extensions anymore. They also use vegan product, the vibe is good, and I’m always getting music inspiration from their playlist. These ladies are the best. Thanks Shae and Kelly ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpJyj3Hp2WlAEl0EbC1wyRruUUcx9551wH-fGi\u0026fid=0x0:0x1bf6a7207aa30fb4"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Lucy Daly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJaphK5iRURXt0gVQx4oJ0SlZCDur_zfcWP2wEHnf4IroPjSA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve gone to Shae a few times and each time my hair turned out perfectly. Everyone in the salon is super kind. They always offer me something to drink and a warm cookie. When i’m resting they also offer a warm towel for my eyes which is so relaxing. The salon is clean and everyone is sweet and knowledgeable! I love Shae and let em have it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Meghan Mahoney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyuifvfXJd1dSVBPirmFoCxsvbDcAHYU2DNv7HxuOECdP05To=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kelly is fantastic! I have been getting a curly cut here from her for several years. She has taught me how to easily style my curls and keeps them looking gorgeous and healthy. Also love the salon’s sustainable practices and products.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marissa Nunes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJI3ykTvXe9Vp-xvvzOXkUhT2-qcuQSY82MSRv3p0DgyjWV2U9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been coming here for a few years. Kelly is my go to person for curly hair. The space is comfy and cute and they always have sweet things going on - tonight I got a cookie and valentine. The team is clearly thoughtful about the details. Finally they are gender affirming and queer friendly 💛","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Savage Mcqueen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIQGTbzVW0Q-r-OnvG93OAcDvL3loIwUh8SNBPWbWDh9QwjdiM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They guy whom did my daughters hair is amazing he has the coolest tricks for curly hair my daughter hair was so beautiful it made me cry when he was done. Also they were very quick on getting all three of our daughters in I will drive from Wyoming to Denver Colorado just to be seen here again the place is super cute loved the vibe and how welcoming this place was as well this man deserves nothing but the best","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcz2ZPcgRr7N-B5KvjrNQ-GAyqxloF3NZ1aClv\u0026fid=0x0:0x90456498d9f41172"],"When":"2025-3-12"},{"Name":"Anthony bieber","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDdw2xbniNwh9pn7Hm0M9bdBqExS9ifmEC0rut6PyfOOLJeXFP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"By far my new favorite salon! The atmosphere and energy there was great, staff were all extremely friendly and most importantly the fur babies were so welcoming and adorable! Very affordable compared to many other spots I’ve been to get my braids done. Would recommend to anyone whether in uptown or elsewhere I’d chose 3 Little Birds!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sofia Porcelli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLu9PA3r_bKCcHZcqf0Gn3Pv73nanBwOzkQwTnWHSV15iJy3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came in to freshen up my bob and to hack off weight in the back and Maya did an incredible job! She took her time and checked in to ask if I wanted to fix anything during the process. Genuinely one of the best hair cuts I’ve gotten in years. The salon was so beautiful and inviting!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jenny Charron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVa1Ycd1H32aMDS3Q0nGgIFPoniVjqRaudh-p07pVSsEQwszNi1=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely love coming to this salon when it is time to get my hair done! Such a cool vibe in here. Very down to earth, and highly professionally staffed.✨Susannah✨has been my go-to expert for about a year and is fab! My hair has never looked better!!! She takes the time and care to ask questions to suit your needs, provides detailed educational explanations about services, and delivers beautiful and professional results! I’m glad I found her! 😁~ Book in with her immediately if you want amazing hair ❤️💇🏻‍♀️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amanda Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYPG1x5luUi5tdwnsXFUN2eua_TNs9ofqMYW9Wikh84gjMJ-XkBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kaitlyn is absolutely amazing! She completely nailed my blonde—perfect tone, dimension, and brightness with no brassiness. My hair looks and feels so healthy, and the whole experience was fantastic. She’s professional, friendly, and truly an expert in her craft. If you’re looking for someone who knows their way around blonde, I highly recommend Kaitlyn!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jamie Stafford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQ_hZIG2iK6V7abOyM3SkLWO4R3_Gt9GlRRFoBHpgfityzPWM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my first time at this salon and Maya took what I was looking for and made it a reality, tailored to me! She was detail oriented and very gentle during the process. I’ll be going back to her for touch up’s and shape up’s from now on! The salon was nice, had a good atmosphere with many plants, and very cute dogs! Would recommend","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashley Dupre","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ4fk9-3AK07JODKGyEf4B1E7hFhI1ASxCaREPpZyLjXuQqcg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Comfortable and magical experience every time! Wonderful vibes. Meryl is incredible and perfectly creates my requested vision each visit. So grateful to have this lovely salon in my neighborhood.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jenna Levy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX05hJRDhVOHjvqOr2gC_nTZxW8LqcFMvvwJ-qQmJXw4S_0JwrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I literally could not be more thrilled with the haircut I got today from Meryl. I have an undercut I’ve been growing out and it was time to take the plunge to merge my long hair with the short and Meryl somehow managed to make it look awesome. She has such a good eye for what will look good and listens to your input as well. I never have had a haircut I actually loved at the end and this changed that, I’m obsessed! 10/10 recommend, thanks Meryl!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3yiZgwjyHRW9WL8iHoUEgURrnCz3qscwGjufD\u0026fid=0x0:0x90456498d9f41172"],"When":"2024-4-11"}]
