user_reviews: [{"Name":"Kari Ann Garriga","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdlM9mLyAt9tWduKTStsoCp1Yk8vqGBB0_MFtvaYIl3K33OJw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rachel is the best! My hair was in such bad shape and she brought it back from the dead. She is amazing at color and super professional. The salon is in a great location and parking is always easy. I’m so happy I found Rachel and 5280 salon","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Erika Kulbach","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWiHc71vksIxsb1LdanFNPitCU8PvGpvE4TVjHa5WQeCTWAnTpRNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rachel Ulberg absolutely nails my pastel blonde with a bleach and tone. She listens to the result I’m looking for and is open to any questions/preferences I might have. The boutique salon is chill, polished but no fuss, and super convenient in Cherry Creek.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSBMvNKsXMlnpSTedjmnU1bE8rKzDphRxIaqIL\u0026fid=0x0:0x4191c98a32559a0e"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Trissa Melnychenko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJscji-xylFlQvBu-qMGjON0fBP2_XremUopHyc-0secd0eJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After my stylist retired from the industry after a decade + relationship, I bounced around from salon to salon looking for my next hair savior and had almost lost hope when I finally found Alex at fifty two eighty and was saved! The salon is beautiful, the vibe is great, and Alex is an amazing listener and technician, she was even able to color match my impossible auburn hair, a total lifesaver!! Alex, you are not allowed to retire ever okay?! I live here now :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carol Cohen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3ccVEe-gOjHactan-Oj7xd6e-uiFTKyR-jHU3LuHpOYA7v4Xg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was in Denver for a family event and following a thorough search booked an appointment at 5280 Salon. What a wonderful experience. Shane was delightful; kind, welcoming and so very competent. He knew immediately what to do with my shortish very curly hair - it looked fantastic!! So many complements. I  highly recommend this salon and Shane. The salon is very chic, and carries a large range of products. When you are in Cherry Creek, treat yourself to an appointment at 5280 Salon where I am certain all the hair professionals are superb! Thank you Shane!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kelsey Durall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIALjcBq44M5YUIIYIVijHnW8MTboMch5rJBXMyruK1augOJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alex has been doing my blonde since I moved to Denver 7 years ago! I’ve even had a few friends come see her for color as well. She always does a fabulous job. The studio space is beautiful \u0026 parking is easy!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Patricia Berger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWT0u3QluPFLMuoquBn7cBqrFsfd2yNk2BkNX6UXj-O9khkt-0B=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After losing two stylists in a year, I was lucky enough to find Scott. He listens to what I want, makes excellent suggestions and does incredible work. I was in the process of letting my hair go gray when I had my first service . Because of Scott's artistry,  I receive more compliments with my natural hair than I ever did when it was colored. That is the mark of a true professional. As a bonus, he is also a loverly person. The salon has parking which is rare is Cherry Creek, and the salon itself is bright and clean.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Melissa Lunsford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRwqTx-4PEmZ_50caX5YNJ5KvFR1AoopKVs6W2OKEbZXX7uTkY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just moved to Denver from Dallas and finding a new salon is always stressful, especially when you’ve been with the same stylist for years and like your blonde a certain shade.\nScott has been amazing! He listens, offers multiple solutions, and helps me pick the one that’s going to give me the results I want. Not to mention his color work is gorgeous. Highly recommend.\nSide note. The space is clean and bright and parking is so easy which sounds silly but I appreciate it :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emily O'Shaughnessy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIiLQhfhY-ioCMZ96O1byuntNS_XON8K0dzv5LTzTFJQwv6Iw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Heather is a blonde expert! I don't trust my blonde with anyone else in Denver. She has been doing my blonde for 7 years. The salon is clean and everyone is very friendly. Great Free parking in front and back. Her Instagram is modern.blonde. Check out her work!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Angela Green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmIK7ac7N44i8mkyaspjDmvwmCONb4Yl3ApL9b3fIwUHPC7Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nicole is more than a hair stylist, she is an artist! Good hair gives you confidence, it reflects how you see yourself. Nicole gets it, she gets you, and she takes pride and genuine joy in making it happen. All in a lovely, comfortable, airy salon bathed in gorgeous natural lighting. If your looking for a top quality hairstylist you found her!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7IUtnsQJKkBOQ3GvHEYqsQK3abalZNAIEa7x1&fid=0x0:0xf1750cdd0ed5faae"],"When":"2025-2-24"},{"Name":"Nina Marie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUvhYCvsyTkM_CpwfZaJqBHrmiJhDfJD4zx9gfZ8IwnobtfrpQt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nicole is a rare gem. I have been trusting her with my hair for a couple years now. She really listens and delivers on what you want! She is a joy to chat with and a killer head massager to boot. 11/10!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ailer Kochan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiL24rXUlL_xXkVP2J-seIjZi_6DVWhKn0eTDkGNJShrjmOO62=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nicole is such a great hair stylist! She only uses high quality, clean products that work for any hair type. Bonus, she’s the sweetest! I drive an hour each way to see this gem of a woman because she’s worth it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Renee Salipante","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJCkRfV9CYZzqfFlAg7xy4N4vfFC6jcRHtawzgBzhanTvYzxw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nicole is Amazing and has the kindest heart.
She makes you feel at home and love to pamper you!!
She always knows exactly what to do with my hair!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Asako “Mandy” Jackson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-Xd9N_OePi6Ex3FC9FrYUONON1k7JNdbJ24lklcb2qnNFiw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nicole is a gifted hairstylist, an excellent listener, a counselor, and has very intricate scissors techniques. I LOVE to visit her every time, and I am grateful for how much I'm fortunate to bring her into my ‘hair beauty journey.’","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marjorie Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUPblxeJjEwSXAxXubT5rwzEsbMzoJ8jq75JqFPOMG8-qav4_YX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nicole is a fabulous stylist and very engaging pro when she updates my look! I recommend her to anyone looking for
‘The Best!’","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lynda M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY0JUHjhUBZqDXkbnCpQBYW_usJJp8aFTKQTzQ-5f40CtKSCWuDA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a gem! After a very choppy job that was done on my hair in Miami, I decided to research a salon in Denver during a trip here and this place popped up as the best salon in Denver. They were not lying! Nicole did EXACTLY what I wanted, she explained what she was doing, made me feel so comfortable and also broke down the details of the organic products she used on my hair, which made my hair look so beautiful and shiny. I have extremely long and thick hair so not a lot of stylists are comfortable working on my hair, but she really knows what she's doing and more importantly, she loves what she does. She is amazing!!! I drove 1 hour & 45 minutes to get my hair done here after they squeezed me in last minute (on a Saturday), and it was worth every second of the drive. Everyone was super friendly, the salon is cozy, inviting and designed with cool art. I'm so grateful I found this place. Thank you Nicole!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUOAbayfuAyep_pfGR4j3fyq5PIWPIjyku-6UJ&fid=0x0:0xf1750cdd0ed5faae"],"When":"2019-10-25"},{"Name":"Katie TenHulzen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOhtj806E8__-KdUkp8MIN_v_V44gh41pPC_WZxI2pGFTJehAD=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nicole is the BEST. Very kind and professional; Ive been getting curly haircuts from her for years now, and I always get the cut I’m looking for!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Lyndsey Richard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4QimuFqRBM_uX7PdgyGw4WpKsFxB0JYjYo0DfchiGpbvhj3u7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am a new client of Janelle, but I hope she will cut my hair forever. I have complicated hair (combination of loose and tight curls, blowdries straight beautifully). It tends to be difficult to cut skillfully. Janelle gave me the best haircut of my life- my hair has never looked this good. Also, Janelle is lovely and very personable. I am so grateful and cannot recommend her highly enough!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ron Kordof","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3Id9mVt2qOlC4GkpiDX1hXaD9nH9qP7Nsxzp4EZtXUOKo8g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So thrilled to finally find someone who really knows what they are doing with cutting my hair. I look forward to a very long association! Ever since John Rund passed away 7-8 years ago I have been unable to replicate the experience he and I shared for over 20 years, trying a variety of salons and hair stylists. It's such a relief to find someone that finally compares very favorably to that experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yena Collett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVsb1K27uGG5ehi96Q_KZIyAexoCfSraMW9PeR5RMJ7C8iNXE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time at this salon and it was a great experience. Get there a few minutes early because parking can be an issue.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Martha MacCormack","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdRBl46d11vM-HyIz3YJ6Fr9rBeBk1na_8eRJseUUlsBPwIpso=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm a new customer and called this morning. She keeps me looking great 👍🙏","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"amanda handke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8ALZcc4bq7omQAfg0ykdtylmH4ijEXEOeh2NbLG1tIhOPuh_j=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Giselle was the most lovely human, enjoyed our conversation. She was a perfectionist in the best way. She did an amazing job with my long A-line cut, was awesome at getting my bangs right, making sure everything framed my face nicely.\nI will be returning to her permanently.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sofia Christofi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXsbeDLd2roKNCfv2kDe44Z9yv9HJ9aXMoWZZzPaNVlQOTW7dUDzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I don't know where to start but let me say this..this place is amazing. I came to this salon a long time ago( a couple months ago) wanting to get a big chop and I got a nice big chop. After a while I got inpatient with growing my hair and Sarah educated me on getting extensions and gave me all the good info.
A couple of weeks went by and I decided to go for it . Best decision ever. Sara has done such an amazing job helping me maintain my hair and giving a fan look each time. ❤️ Also everyone in this place is super sweet and the vibes are awesome .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fiona Reynolds","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbqh80ZrO-XaYnsy9xEbFLhKRdd2vxyqMZTS5iRfbY8slTV8-i=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Before coming to Revolver, my hair had been done by only one person my entire life, and after she retired, I was nervous about making the jump to a new salon. Susan and the entire staff at Revolver is beyond friendly, and I was so impressed with the cut and color!! I got about 6 inches cut with a partial balayage, and it was similar to what I’m used to, but the color was a little more modern, which I loved! She was super communicative and sat with me beforehand to figure out what it is I wanted, and delivered perfect results. She’s also a great conversationalist and I enjoyed our few hours together. It’s safe to say that I had nothing to worry about, and I’ve found my new go-to salon!

Also- the music/60s vibe kicks ass! So much fun!
Thank you Susan!🤘","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Lynn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlaLWOTYyR-sFpSynsEAYkFr8c1SgGhDG_qODH2ivLjnImI0M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was nervous for my trim because I didn’t want to take any more than about an inch off my hair.  Sarah was a great listener and did exactly what I asked for.
If you’re looking for someone who is a great listener and is “long hair” friendly…she is your girl.

Good vibes, as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Evan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGT8ObmwSyqQW8sVFnBwpDMPXi9p3WY1Ofe53gXSBeR3-sr8hFFg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to get my hair styled, been coming here for about 4 years now. I am utilizing the services of Ryann Amara, who is amazing, she does really great work. Very friendly and inviting atmosphere, especially with the retro/modern design. It's a good vibe. 10/10 would recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jen houser","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWT5si72W8mMXiXfUdDi5D-69NS7rzGYqoTK5ROAW6JFMWg33kT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Revolver is a fantastic salon.  Clean, bright and everyone (stylists and clients alike) is friendly.  My services were priced appropriately and the product lines they use/sell are very high quality","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"tia salter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUvZ4D-5oelaQz6UJ9XkRDyqOE7U7h_qTwTjBev4zgLzYFfg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jordan does such an amazing job. She is always great to be around and takes her time with my challenging hair. 10/10 experience. This salon is STUNNING and such a vibe.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8MqSnXaBEtDo-PV8zEFrZvyiCe7c0Puk5gQU5&fid=0x0:0x12ae06042ab3506c"],"When":"2024-4-22"},{"Name":"Amie Langus","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXj5CxgeVEXeqUb6jMZdRP8GX-OdQ_71zos3XpRPc9tPWUn6AL3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I randomly walked into this salon one day when I was in the neighborhood. Whomever was at the front was awesome! I explained to her what my needs were and she paired me with the perfect stylist for me. Day of my appointment, Hayden was wonderful. Totally understood my vibe, my curl-texture, was patient, listened well, and was overall just nice to hang out with for a few hours. Also, the prices were super reasonable considering the quality of service I received. Hayden is amazing!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tess Gallegos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvBr79YRP-21ShbeM0sjYO8KpEYgGb1hZrMbL0PgqIwwzZdw-i=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been searching for a stylist that can do a bangin’ haircut AND color. Thank goodness my client recommended Hayden! Hayden has a warm, calming demeanor that puts you at ease in his chair. He has now given me one of the best haircuts I have ever had, but last night he did my color and I couldn’t be happier with it. It looks totally natural and he did exactly what I asked, while using some of his advanced techniques to make sure it was perfectly natural looking. LOVE it! Couldn’t recommend Hayden at Revolver Salon more!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jordyn Wellbrock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBtnVn47GCHajTRPet8XZ3_B6lJZ8BAkfUh7Qff3Km2F0SGi_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of receiving a microneedling treatment from Vanessa, and I can confidently say it was the best facial treatment I’ve ever experienced. From start to finish, she was absolutely incredible. Not only did she take the time to chat with me and ensure I fully understood the procedure, but she also made sure I was comfortable the entire time, checking in with me regularly. Her warm, friendly demeanor instantly put me at ease, and her expertise truly shone through. I left feeling rejuvenated and confident in the results. I honestly can’t recommend her enough—she’s the nicest person and a true professional. I can't wait for my laser treatment with her in April!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Josalyn Filkins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyp5fLo7_5uq-f0u3WpWkNKoiOHacESj6Y_q-jA-8mfLYL7nma=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The is probably the best salon in Denver. Only because they have so many incredible artists to choose from! Dani and Alex for extensions, Corey for color/cut and even Joe at the front is always so professional and efficient! The artists are always honest and consistent with what you need or don’t need!\n\nThey also have facial services that are great! This is a one stop salon that will guarantee a 5star experience! Don’t hesitate—book!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNj3XQh1vg_LjNHptqTcEJfM8pomincX3Mdk6nT\u0026fid=0x0:0xe95f7c0a1ae1a298"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Nancy Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzS-vUgwYj2b0z8z_KzQznIr7-8J_kkwNlCOid5SMlpYUOQ5Rl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a facial with Vanessa Wojcik and she was terrific! She educated me on facial care and first asked what my concerns were with my skin. She then told me what she was going to do to address my concerns which she did with a professional excellence unsurpassed by my previous facial providers. I really appreciated her input and recommendations! It was such a treat to have her do the facial on my birthday! I’d highly recommend going to her!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sage Springer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyNbVvCgvw_GAJfLL28tNqZswaJfIYCYR-AbAp4mk8Orjztg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The space at Grand Salon is super nice and inviting. Bekah G. has been transforming me with fabulous cut and colors for years. She’s the absolute best at turning my half answers and shoulder shrugs into something beautiful! She also gives great scalp massages.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jacob Budde","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIdx4oAEoKIBrPYsKEiAoEOWpK02dqO4bwYycbtHZwLXDT67A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I cannot recommend Bekah more highly for a haircut! I’ve been going to her for years and don’t plan on making a change any time soon. She gives helpful guidance on styling and has helped me get a better sense for how my hair is changing over time. Also, the whole staff at Grand are welcoming and supportive— highly recommend visiting Grand if you’re looking for a solid location that will take care of you month by month!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lance McElhinney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWi7SfOZCrce5ivh1JQ2KXCWAiSXpXHp7fpWL9cmoBDurCKvu59=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alex H is the best!! I went to her for color and she did a great job. While I was there I talked about how self conscious I was about my hair, how thin it was becoming and how damaged it looked. She recommended extensions and I voiced my concerns on why I had never considered them. She took the time to educate me and answer all my questions. In the end I decided to get the extensions and am so happy I did! They look natural and I’ve never gotten more compliments on my hair. Alex was patient and thoughtful and helped me make a decision she knew I would be happy with!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEybXCykHhQOVTZ5Ve1LL8RjtMpUG_AgvdwjxH\u0026fid=0x0:0xe95f7c0a1ae1a298"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Charlene","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUmzQmnQoWeWxVVHljcVxzEWGgCqWVH_G3eEVzJSGwjPXWH06Xy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m so glad I found this place. They do everything they can to make you feel welcome (and even give you a gift bag of goodies when you check in). My first time coming here for a facial and I had Rosann. She was friendly and gave me a lovely facial. I left with glowing skin and just feeling good overall. I will definitely be coming back here to see her again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Julie Sitzmann","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXt7WpPCHxuPw8E7Pah0Wmn4YkyuayaXWi_WVQOeZuTLoDO3AA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been a client at Grand for years and have always had a 5 star experience! Their customer service is phenomenal, from scheduling or changing/confirming appointments, everyone is always to pleasant and makes every attempt to accommodate. On the hair side, I have been a client of April's for 10 years and she is just the BEST. She knows me and my every-changing hair so well and I trust her implicitly. She takes such great care of me! Finally, I decided to utilize Grand's Med Spa services at my last visit and I'm regret that it took me so long. I had, hands-down, the BEST facial of my life with Roseann. I'll definitely be scheduling another one soon. I highly recommend Grand and all of their services. Keep doing exactly what you're doing!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kat Granville","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJnUQd5HvIQWTErPeWA352jT1JLhjH2NwAiOAwMbzRpBXzhlYU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been going to Star Salon for about 5 years now and have had nothing but amazing experiences. I first started seeing Jenny but when she moved back to Ohio I was given the chance to have Laura as my stylist. I can now say we have been together for 4 years now and my hair has never been happier. :)

She is very consistent, honest and amazing. She knows my hair really well and does what is needed at the time (winter versus summer). She continually grows her knowledge on hair products and only uses the best product. I have referred many friend to see Laura and we all now talk about how much we love her!

The salon is a very relaxed yet professional setting. There is no drama and all the stylists have been there for quite some time, which I love. Highly recommend this space and highly recommend Laura!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnKsLGCz6Kfjp768zml_hEes4Dz_cDN5GwfY0z&fid=0x0:0xbd6a383557adf6c9"],"When":"2019-12-6"},{"Name":"Erin Durgin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwyPueK3aHEQJYYPmm7TkBHr_nTKV76MabxD78wuK4Cp5o4Fg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I found Star Salon less than a year ago after moving to Denver. I've been so pleased with Andrea since finding her! I usually don't know what I exactly want with my hair, but she and I talk through some things and she just knows what to do. I've never colored my hair and she was so great in how she approached my first time. She just knows hair and is so knowledgeable about everything.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emma Nolta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYdg_yywiHAJBAiKvFROThUN2bI7UausbNZcYCjV_8Qr5npt2MzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! I have never been so happy with my hair, ever. Andrea listened and talked to me for about 15 minutes before we started as I tried to figure out exactly what I wanted (blunt cut, toner, and some brightening partial highlights). She KILLED it! The cut and color I imagined in my head is exactly what she gave me. Not to mention it was incredibly priced. Great conversation, very clean salon, and really good vibes.

Thanks again, Andrea. You rock. ☺️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Quynh-Chi Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyDRl7WX54uX3jjGvULw4cu7qDtnF23xo9fqdiW_SGlJ5NL5Ac3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My previous salon closed down recently, so I was on the lookout for a new salon. I gave Star Salon a try, and I'm so glad I did. I had an appointment with Amanda to, quite drastically, get my hair cut a lot shorter (and with bangs), and I couldn't be happier with the result. I showed her a photo inspiration, and she talked me through the entire process checking in with me to make sure that I was comfortable the entire time. I can't recommend this salon and Amanda enough!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"amanda russcol","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW5al9KvA4T89QPbsyUZu_Aui7CF5MxO9OxYavn213pFZUGLb7FHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just got a great curly cut from Amanda. It was pretty fast (I didn't time it, but defintely under an hour), but still relaxing. Great haircut, I liked that she saw a clear vision of what to do with my hair, because I did not. She was also really open to my ideas and needs.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUN7XGyb26eqBVH9okicIJOSh3VBb4J8NoCrqkQKU_9N-dk21IY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm newer to Denver and as I was searching for a place to get my hair cut I came across star salon. I worked with Andrea and she did a great job matching the type of hairstyle that I like. This seems simple enough but I've had many people mess it up before. Andrea really listened to what I wanted and I provided a pic of how it used to look to help her see what I meant. I'm definitely going to come back to see her again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chelsie Kappius","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKXKJRDmgTquZe_CTdG503b-2XCwycwFJw4IKg8_-nWC5H6eer=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been going to Star Salon to see Laura for 5 years!  She is so talented at color and always respects that I want to keep my length and keep my hair as healthy as possible with being blonde.  I get nothing but compliments on my hair. Probably because she always continues her hair education and takes classes to stay up to date on all the latest hair color technology and techniques.  We definitely nerd talk during my coloring sessions if you can’t tell!  I highly recommend her, she is sweet as can be and so awesome at what she does!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Whitney Van Cleave","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVq5tVxg5c75pNbD65d5NUlVyjmOlRn3WOf7cMR9as_AtW4ij8b=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have always struggled with multiple cowlicks and swirls in my hair and haven’t been super pleased with my cuts. That changed yesterday. Andrea gave me a wonderful cut that hides all the wonky bits AND walked me through some easy styling “cheats” since I have no idea how to do my hair. Tried them all this morning and loved how easy it was to do and how it looked. She is a hair maven!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Nick Naranjo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7nfXASYYZPC85ZyLYIJUsdoXrP1qVVxmqJgL60BjwJMjxzomB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Top-Tier experience! Selina gave me the best facial \u0026 back wax with great results that I have never experienced before!  Great atmosphere and welcoming! Must check out!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Enrique Moctezuma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlS5AstoFpf8CTC__LFw7karGNcl1l0W1I-jenhamGgicm5A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Carlos is great! I was greeted at the door by Carlos and right away I was offered a drink on the house I enjoyed the full service and the amazing conversation I made with him while he provided phenomenal work! Great location with great  surrounding restaurants! I already booked by second haircut here!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carla Marquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVD4l_9wzrUTspNOqpGjs9ZVCCWUGlNmgodZB65hAu1pFUQK5s5=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The salon is beautiful, very clean inside and lots of natural light. My daughter and I both got haircuts by Sky and my daughter also got fun hair tinsel or “fairy hair”. Sky was really great with my daughter, she’s friendly and easy-going. She was also very professional and accommodating. We enjoyed the entire experience and will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgUn0isQ6_SNdSq8fBI2hpprWJ-ypxETcH0y_y\u0026fid=0x0:0x24fa89fa7b8b9748"],"When":"2023-10-18"},{"Name":"Xyla Dawn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWc_TenWmcCOPJLd1vxG74t_mxvRy_n_QUFHgAYHVAbHs7LfVzODw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sky really knows what she is doing. She is fun and upbeat but also very professional! She did amazing with my baylayage, I highly recommend getting your hair done by her! (Before and After pics)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIE0pNNAm7jnze1lKrEAMh3q52gxSnrRIg0VRD\u0026fid=0x0:0x24fa89fa7b8b9748"],"When":"2023-5-24"},{"Name":"Megan O'Connor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5oYlOzuMzsxfZ6__RS_0qBSJco5HkxE7Yc33lB-NPtpsDo8Ed=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience with Eduardo. Online booking was easy. Salon was clean and positive vibes all around. Great price and happy with my style.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGojVViFLl783xDhY6Z-Th1WnLLymSgUhcdBVS\u0026fid=0x0:0x24fa89fa7b8b9748"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Stormie Holzer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8p_yn-6dw04QIiAZDynje4-ilvNvnm20mS3WJk0ggRANNhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been seeing Sky for bang trims and blow outs for a little bit now, and she’s been more than fantastic. So, after having a few traumatic experiences at other salons I have been scared to let someone color my hair, but Sky made me feel so comfortable and safe I was ready to bite the bullet. She was very knowledgeable and honest with me when it came down to what was possible and what wasn’t with my hair. And the end result is TO *DYE* FOR. I’m obsessed and I feel so confident. I haven’t felt this great about my hair in quite some time. Not only did she accomplish a color, that I didn’t even dream of being in the realm of possibility, she gave my hair back some life. I felt beautiful for the first time in a while. Sky is literally a magician when it comes to hair! I keep getting compliments on it, and catch myself stopping to look at myself in store windows and mirrors! The color is stunning. I cannot wait to come back again. If you get a chance to book with her. 10000000% do it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbKV7E4sD3dnn228kZg99U5FUKxmSaRnKZ-ic6\u0026fid=0x0:0x24fa89fa7b8b9748"],"When":"2022-3-6"},{"Name":"Phillip Ibarra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUP8wn_pai2ZxFJIa-OEWWEIGKlYGmsm7s5HnHW4wwUTN8KqQOh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Scott was so amazing, he made me feel comfortable and relaxed. His attention to detail  and care for cutting my hair was one of a kind. One that I have never experienced till Rita B, his staff was also top notch.  I highly recommend Rita B to everybody.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNR4d4kfNMOVqV22-u6PSyTpgFRiEoLhceMqP4\u0026fid=0x0:0x24fa89fa7b8b9748"],"When":"2017-8-28"},{"Name":"Alyssa Holland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwS13rdxkOIV9NKzJlkCBLfmDiclFp07yQD29HMOJgIUFxIw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jessica is THE BEST! She just did my teenage sons hair today for the 2nd time. He likes to change his style often. She always gives him exactly what he wants! Would recommend 100%","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Nicole Zamora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6gDgYgkJwcQcpR6SqSZw_0waJHV_ORg_jc6CAHfJ4_g6Hn_05=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this salon!  The team is super welcoming and widely talented.  Vibe Salon is a Green Circle Salon meaning that they are easily diverting 90% of their waste from landfill.  The neighborhood is popular and there’s tons of art nearby.  I highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO276jFQbs9e1wmQacHy5b36XddqMbsu7ojBAOF\u0026fid=0x0:0x2ed2c856601e26ec"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Jessica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKcUGBA7fxDzRnp9_2ZpycWylOXOZHE3d4I_0KsHRu-jZzR87k=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're looking for an unforgettable hair transformation, Taeylor is your go-to! I’ve never left a salon feeling more in love with my hair until she worked her magic. She took me from a rich brown to a stunning blonde, using a low-volume developer to safely lift my hair and achieve the perfect shade without compromising its health. I was so impressed with how she balanced the strength of the products with the desired result, keeping my hair in amazing condition. Taeylor is truly a blonde specialist—she knows exactly how to bring out the best in your hair. Not only did she give me the perfect blonde, but her sparkling personality made the entire experience so enjoyable. I was laughing the whole time, and her positive energy was contagious. She’s a whole vibe! Highly recommend Taeylor for anyone looking to upgrade their look and have an amazing time while doing it. You won’t regret it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ada Maldonado","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQDiG6Y-4A0PuyyW03O1NLJ3qd3KIxlUL62IH4Bg6DT-ovxkfg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am absolutely in love with my hair transformation. Though Alejandra did my hair,  the other stylists here are all fantastic! One can really tell everyone is passionate and skilled, no matter who you book with :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Derek Valdes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIuDIh53znSwbQOcLQUAWTT5f4ZfLXEDDP0QjAhVqKYKzseLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is amazing! I needed a haircut and originally booked a men’s haircut but unfortunately they did not have anyone that could do it but they worked hard to find someone that could do a mens haircut for me but upon finding out that I had longer hair and didn’t need a barber they were able to book me on the same day as I originally requested which was amazing. Josie was my hair stylist and she was awesome. Super knowledgeable and friendly and I felt like I was in good hands after switching from a barber for so many years. She showed me a list of products that would work well with long hair as well as a bunch of tips to style it. Would definitely recommend this place. Will be coming back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shelby Phillips","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIgKQRz6Iec9wVkNDTUXY0AUWDzkTPNUWKl0s6TS7ST6iI37w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Woooow! I felt like I was at my besties house getting my hair done when I went in! It truly was a vibe! My hair transformation is absolutely insane and beautiful!!! Antonia was amazing and diligent at her work! She definitely has her profession crafted! She made sure I was always happy and communicated everything with me so well! This has been my favorite hair salon experience and I’ll be coming back every time for Antonia!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLH71u_MGmqEAmDOqzBtabmwqPQTiribriVQA2\u0026fid=0x0:0x2ed2c856601e26ec"],"When":"2024-4-6"},{"Name":"Amada Rodriguez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKD7LGE56kWCDY3B4zIXZm_JHBzwWtS0U3GAyCOQnvkYnFCXw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Walking into Vibe Salon has always been a wonderful experience! I have been able to witness the many positive changes at the Salon which have made the place that much more welcoming and pleasurable to be in. All the staff are friendly and great you when you walk with along with always offering a cup of coffee, water, or refresher. I personally always get my hair cuts with Josie but I know that everyone there is very talented. It’s always exciting walking in through the door of Vibe salon knowing that I have an appointment with an amazing hair stylist like Josie and that I’ll be treated kindly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJKsW_Q0n6FcTXtxpk-S8a437TphOxXqmNH0YI\u0026fid=0x0:0x2ed2c856601e26ec"],"When":"2022-12-27"},{"Name":"Holly Paranto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3R25kXlYwmj4x4Z324bai3BHzrf6htQhfHrjEiXAeSOiYSA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Woke up early this morning with a smile on my face knowing today was the day to visit Josie at VIBE Salon! Not only does her skill and attention perform miracles on my long, wavy, silver hair, her warmth and integrity are matchless. The experience in this great salon always exceeds my expectations.Thank you, Josie!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtx52kfcCvDo9DswZPbg7PN5-cps3qSi7_MfLZ\u0026fid=0x0:0x2ed2c856601e26ec"],"When":"2022-8-2"},{"Name":"janina vabo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSgIWlWh1un7KQsCNBQJ1MORKUGyMn2KeWmY-WaBYUwRriYfr8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Its been 3 days since I got a gloss and haircut from Alejandra, and I’m still LOVING this hair! I came in for a consultation without a clear idea, and she was super helpful in getting to know my hair history, style, how I need it to function in daily life, and making great suggestions for what to do.\n\nThe salon also has great vibes, and I love the dedication to sustainability.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Hannah Haines","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW555huzCmHMcsGoOwGqf_z6AtOBWonE6oTFbB2XSxOnmrhwSdG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everyone at this salon is amazing and welcoming, but let me tell you about Krystina….she is HANDS DOWN the best hair stylist I have ever been to. She always listens to what you want and EXECUTES while keeping the integrity of your hair. She is easy to get along with and could not have asked for a better hair gal","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-rAD03hZwfNZ8-2rpgJw-r9gyZ69JCVwvtll5&fid=0x0:0x217ab28ee0a9f34"],"When":"2025-3-2"},{"Name":"Alena Arnold","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWO4o7PK-0OE1ePpsBNiWInqv0mOvsw5bjhCrrMfVHQG1SWKbo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been coming to see Juana for all my hair needs for about 6 years now and every single time I see her, I leave 10x happier and more confident than when I arrived. She’s always in such a good mood, makes me laugh, and just enjoy my time at the salon. She’s also extremely knowledgeable about hair and hair care so I really trust her. She always gives me really good advice on washing and caring for my hair, which I really appreciate. Every time she’s cut or dyed my hair, I absolutely LOVE the outcome! She exceeds my expectations every time!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shayla Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVygTfjgTn5sYmQ0eU3ktqlsitnjk1O10G0_Fl_7y0oClscTeY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Juana is SOOOO nice. She did an amazing job on my hair. I got a butterfly cut for the first time, after cutting my own hair for 2-3 years since I didn’t trust other barbers (they always cut my hair shoulder length) but she did the perfect length and made sure I liked it.😁","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kaitlyn Gulock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrH9aO4R0acUTUQvDzsN7xjomegk5fP7E8Uc7BXgJSypxps2X40A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely adore coming here!!! Miyuki and Juana are my favs, but the whole staff is stellar.

I have dark, Asian hair and get it colored/bleached, which isn’t easy. Where I’ve had to get multiple color treatments in the past, they make my dream hair come true in one sitting.

I always feel welcome and have the best conversations. Come here to find your forever salon!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"maria cobarrubias","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzzZGsnsoSUDzCv9nynWt_8VK1MHNwOvkdFNs6jsjZKhoEwqkW=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely amazing Juanita is just amazing. She gave me exactly what I asked for! Her vibes omg her vibes are just wonderful if you’re having a bad day she will make sure to turn your day around. What I love most about her is that it’s very important to her to have your trust overall, she makes sure you’re happy with the results. She is the best and absolutely recommended 100%","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alejandra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXC-XR9aOL0ald2NnNoUnJyLK1W9OLl_UlKiThwUQBbFUr1rHzRFg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This review is well overdue I've been getting my hair done by Juanita a few times now and let me just say she never disappoints. She always makes me feel comfortable and explains every step to me before doing anything to my hair. As someone who is very picky and has a hard time trusting others with my hair just means a lot to me. She definitely makes getting my hair done a great experience. Plus she's such an amazing person I definitely 10/10 recommend her!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jacqueline Hernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKkLfLRjmKKvWrFEgZaP1aXvTeq9eQghNOZdzUNt8b00lEkDLI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was looking for a salon that would help me find a stylist that’s would guide me down the right path. Juanita was amazing! She not only gave me the best hair cut but helped boost my confidence. The salon energy was great, I would highly recommend getting your innovation with a Juanita.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dillon Turnbow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXeJfBmWHSIf2M7J0DKV-sj2FpP6p1hvX_6jAkA-k8E7mzjXWHt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pulse is absolutely amazing!  I've gotten haircuts from Vernon, Juana, and Kiki, and they have all been better than I was hoping for.  They gave me great ideas and have been great about trying different things.  Plus, the atmosphere and the whole experience is fun.  I highly recommend them!","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Libby Kern","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXD9_Sf_uacTM_Vv2z_ECpgchgWFTJph-EfwTkr09danyLAimc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I loved getting my haircut with Mai. The haircut was straightforward; she took my inspiration photo and ran with it. She knows exactly what she is doing, and my haircut turned out better than I could have imagined. As an Asian woman, it was the first time I've felt seen in a salon chair and got exactly what I wanted. Will definitely be coming back and would highly recommend this place for anyone with Asian hair.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yifan Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxycEXWVA6ajobutPOJgHMOYlLosTL8vAbW7KQL1jP2T6FYWY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had to find a new stylist for Brazilian Blowout because my previous stylist no longer providing this service. I want to say I really appreciate Salon Vo’s work and service. They offered additional service without additional cost, just to make sure that I felt comfortable for the whole process. I recommend this place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sara Moon Murphy (Mooners)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5f1j409XWwgtNRXy-PwIcgr0ExKjSUdfM5tq_yqj0-JvSCdB4VA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vo is my only salon! 3 Generations! My mom, my daughter, and myself! We love this salon! Vo is amazing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPeAQzaVMd7KViiaerjfxGLqAc586AyE9_0fkO4&fid=0x0:0x9ba7c7cb397cb0f8"],"When":"2024-5-5"},{"Name":"Rose Stechmeyer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKi_bDHMoIEuN0Ki4w9Ts7AVdX9GRFADYo7VpNbr7P_NOQecBeq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came back to Salon Vo because Thanh did such an amazing job the first time (see pics of blonde balayage). A before and after shot of my most recent visit. This is the third time I've dyed my hair and my second time at Salon Vo. I love my new hair color, cut, all of it. I can't give enough positives about how it turned out and how much I trust Thanh to do my hair. I'll be back in the spring for a touch up and a trim!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTOct34TNrkdx9vzEDxW9kD36uec0cStGO9vCO&fid=0x0:0x9ba7c7cb397cb0f8"],"When":"2021-5-12"},{"Name":"Mi Vo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9q3a3M0NwDkWwvwDWvopQ1rdEReLKm4MdP-VM2K36MPhHf6Mk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came to Salon Vo for the first time and have now found my favorite hair salon! For context, I have fine, straight, dark, Asian hair and have always struggled with having brassy, orange looking hair after coloring. I came in for a color correction and ashy balayage and got exactly what I asked for. Meryl did my color treatment and was amazing. She is attentive and very skilled. Thanh Vo gave me a hair cut with long layers. He took his time and I ended up with the best hair cut I have ever gotten. He is extremely detail-oriented and cut my hair to fit my color and face. He really listens to what you want and it is very clear how passionate he is about his work. They shampoo and give you a full blow dry, too. An added plus is the convenient location and beautiful salon. I HIGHLY recommend Salon Vo. Book your appointment!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGSywHiPH7BCDh6qDCRZmgZPkcYKPx5i_06PFt&fid=0x0:0x9ba7c7cb397cb0f8"],"When":"2019-4-6"},{"Name":"Stefhania Aude","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0s1nptUHqHOe_z0BogIQD40ReswNnTCU8BuS7QaX5Zov_U5o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Im obsessed with my haircut! I had an emergency and the customer service was so amazing they help me out last minute.
I absolutely recommend this hair salon. Top 1 in cherry creek !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Colleen McGuinness","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2fc9cUQHMnXeZVjR7Ud7KH6FVode4z8Whs6zSRd8sZbVvmLIU0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a brand new first time mom, it had been quite a while since I had my hair cut.  Thanh was amazing!  My hair feels so much healthier and has such a great style.  Definitely recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORZwzniPaQT4UeLYNBHsVdJkFZuofJOdnSvWkz&fid=0x0:0x9ba7c7cb397cb0f8"],"When":"2019-11-17"},{"Name":"ADMiRAL MILKie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRQsL44tHABL6zjGMqvzAKqKBElPxUE-TTX0poAJvkKl3Ce5Us=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Salon Vo was an amazing experience for me and my brother. I had Mai, and she was so friendly and nice to talk with! She immediately knew what I wanted when I showed her the picture and my hair felt so good afterward. I have Asian hair and the hair stylists in my town can't grasp the concept of my hair. The old salon I would go to in Denver closed, and I was lucky to found Salon Vo.

My younger brother had a really long hair, it went down to almost his waist. When consulted with Vo that we want to donate his hair, he showed us how much he would need to cut. My brother was on board, and Vo even made a TikTok video showing the before and after! It was a fun experience. The price was also good and not as expensive as they charge it in my town. We will definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZs6N49iukjSLj2oBd0h3kL-fWWxBjcWUiJ2QE&fid=0x0:0x9ba7c7cb397cb0f8"],"When":"2023-5-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"HP Pippin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIuWiCz3QDpdCkZRit32xtBd4YxFKM8rXH7tmlvYDAgLzvnqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"JESS you're the BEST!! My daughter surprised me with a salon day so when I sat in Jess' chair and said "I have no idea what I want" her immense knowledge and just being really skilled at her craft gave me a cut perfect for my style, weird hair texture, my life. I look so hot! We had a great time, great conversation. To top it all off, later when I got sick and was in bed for 3 days, even then my hair looked good! 😆","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Darian Hornaday","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvY1A_pagxvAfUyEtPRNOXI6lgfa2w0BogsVMDq4fQxOV_qg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I followed my stylist, Izzy, from her previous location. This was the first time I’ve been to her new spot! The staff and atmosphere of Sage + Serpent were both amazing. Thank you, Izzy, for slaying my hair per usual, I love it SO MUCH, and thank you to the rest of the staff for being so welcoming, social and cool! Can’t wait to come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyC58MIoG-V3wR05rKxP4A4wZgh26AK2WoQzeF&fid=0x0:0x622e863c95d00b02"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Garnet Glaze","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_Tgil27D_ARfW_t5HOVVeOcERmnF1n3ZdfdznJIFIhRWFK_wT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Whitney is hands down the best hairdresser / barber I have ever had. When I first saw her, I came in with a pretty ragged cut and she cleaned it up so well. I spent a long time researching someone who could get me a more fun queer style, and Whitney has delivered every time. We have done everything from undercuts, to fun A-lines to cute pixie cuts. She even gave me a step by step on how to style my own hair for my wedding.

As a queer person, I really love Sage and Serpent, it’s a safe space and super cozy with a funky style.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPPrfQqebGuZUC7E9fNLeX76sm5MLc2VfaNzu1&fid=0x0:0x622e863c95d00b02"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Joy Ringold","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8uxpjbtTKU8A_FhiwAHKKo3LcPhBWKqI2BG3UajesO-p_q8Xc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came in from out of town. They got me in same day and I’m blown away. I had a haircut that needed to be fixed from another salon and this is perfect! This is one of the best haircuts that I’ve gotten in years. Venus really listened and I’ll be back for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPy3pfA4Dty_Rfb_pppNVtbs30yBYMvKZHEa_uU&fid=0x0:0x622e863c95d00b02"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Jacob Keeling","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIHKHt03-rkLRBADtn_DQg30acGgnd61YcYd1J_HtVq-7ORJw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This review is for Whitney Martin:

As a guy in my 30s, I'm particular about my hair in the sense that all I know is that it's brown and I like it to look good. Whitney came highly recommended from my prior stylist when I moved to Denver. Since then she's been the only person cutting my hair for over 2 years. I sit down in my chair and Whitney makes my hair look good every time.

On top of Whitney's skill and professionalism, she's an excellent conversationalist. It's a treat to myself when I go in for my haircut. I only hesitate writing this review because it might make it harder for her to fit me into her busy schedule.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"stephanie pinsler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBxHAWtKg5r_vXoepqWYROKqCjzntqYKrreXsGU-Ad5-sGJEvc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can’t say enough about my experience at Sage + Serpent! Aly absolutely nailed the color, tone, and style I had in mind, making the whole process look effortless. Madison worked her magic with the cut, tying everything together with detail and care. The salon itself is such a vibe and full of energy. If you’re searching for a place where the team knows their craft and leaves you feeling your absolute best, this is your sign!

THANK YOU ALL!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brian Dorsey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCIRq51DDrkEFqQC6eC1LOJrGO9-IETDpxnImxrVj1xv6WOkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Valerie Neva has a gentle touch with a straight razor and swift hands to get the job done well! Great conversationalist and makes the salon cozy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGynCtKc1eZvMTE9JUekcs4_QkmWErF6_5BCQe&fid=0x0:0x622e863c95d00b02"],"When":"2025-2-13"},{"Name":"Chealsye Bowley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVf3ezcY8oIzfWyx0d-z9yZM7ITQqDNQQV3y7WWhYOrLpUgwg7qqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The salon is beautiful. Izzy was FANTASTIC doing a bob cut and adding texture with a razor. She was so, so detailed while she worked. If you're looking for a new stylist - book an appointment with her!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Liz Holland","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULIoysbUpi5VqddyRhIxFwnFqGzrEyLpKza1rNE52R3VuLABCL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place! I was referred to the salon and Ariana after a friend spoke very highly of her. I had a consultation with Ariana to make sure I was a good fit (which I love this practice because as a curly girl, I’ve had my fair share of cuts that didn’t work (including a deva cut at their flagship salon). We talked about my texture and styling preferences and agreed it was a match. My first cut from Ariana was incredible. I was able to maintain length/hair health while also creating space for growing into a new shape. I just had my second cut with Ariana this past week. I am telling you, I’ve never felt more empowered and in my element with a hair cut in my life. The shape is incredible, it was able to maintain length again (several people telling me that my hair looked longer!!), and it looked great with minimal styling. I am so so so grateful to have found Ariana.

The salon also! Is super aware of your time and money, which I really appreciate. They have a rate system which I haven’t seen at other spots. At the end of my cut, Ariana asked me if I wanted to finish the appointment then and save money or do a wash and reset. Because it was a curl cut, I had already washed my hair before the appointment and opted to not rewash to retain moisture. Ariana then refunded the rest of my appointment, which was huge!! If you are considering checking out Organic Salon, I cannot recommend them enough.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRuSEWhAENcJEIxN3qegN4u0wf3qFYt22f17Vt&fid=0x0:0xf6cf0041ea769e56"],"When":"2025-3-3"},{"Name":"Kailee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUV0VlA8cahOhh-j7AviumDZkwGIR_b3t-6v-ON1aWH0mz-rxwhlg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Olivia is absolutely amazing! I needed a new stylist when I moved states and I am so lucky to have found her! I like a low maintenance blonde look and she nailed it. Olivia was communicative through out the entire process and answered all of my questions along the way. She also gave me great tips on how to grow my hair out and keep it healthy. She curled my hair before I left which I loved :) Olivia is so fun and easy to talk to which made the time fly by. I can’t say enough good things about Olivia and the super cute salon :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cait Piska","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjmTSXu3AwdRvVZIfLw-m2B0VSCGUsbfG4-zYGnT2iVfnWo0zT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Organic Salon is exactly what I was looking for. My stylist Britt is funny, kind, and extremely talented. Every haircut I've gotten from her is my favorite haircut so far!!! She's magic with a razor and gives me the shag of my dreams.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4PkH0cJNvKaiISRrYhY5jDPwNVZAlXB_PbNFz&fid=0x0:0xf6cf0041ea769e56"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"Amanda Moon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYqkLnQ53bwGflPnqxw4AqllZg3Y0nTKUZayit1jPJsopsaXElrw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Briana’s ritual haircut service is such a beautiful way to weave magick into what might otherwise be mundane maintenance. Briana creates a solid container where change and transformation are honored and held with intention and grace. The scalp treatment and massage are deeply nourishing and facilitate an opportunity to drop down even further into the layers that accompany personal transformation. No matter how much intention I set for myself around this ritual, Briana’s ability to hold allows me to go even deeper to access my own inner whispers of wisdom. For all of my sister priestesses, witches, and women of spirit walking the path, reclaiming your hair as a spiritual tool begins here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Julia Bresner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfncsdmHZEyr-n3yO4Mug0lXYvzPJVv2HYhDgfnRJeVNnOFQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been coming to this salon for a few years now. When my initial stylist left I was turned over to Brittani and I could not be happier!! She is not only an amazing human but she is such a talented hairstylist. I always go in with an idea but tell her to do what she thinks would be best because I trust her so much, and I always leave super happy. She listens to what you want and makes it even better. I love the edginess she puts into my hair and how focused she is on her craft. I’ve moved an hour away and I am still seeing her! Thank you Brittani!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alyssa Lantiere","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhymJD2RAdaCO-N9mJkhmYBc_Ea3gHh4poyCgAZt5fTT72Mmf-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Life changing experience with Briana’s Ritual Haircut. This earth goddess works with you to set intentions for what you are letting go and what you are calling in. She lets you take the first cut and provides a ceremonial like space for your hair ritual. I highly recommend this for anyone who wants more intentionality in their life.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Natalie Grimes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-s7-TN5Bj_fYoHw8Jir0ElFrfRvMzc6BWYYAq31-IGJKI6OqT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stylist, Ariana Marie-- I’ve never had a consistent hair stylist in Denver because I’ve gotten cuts that require more daily work than I’m willing to fit into my morning routine. I waited to leave a review until I’d seen Ari a few times, and after three appointments she has not once disappointed me! My curl pattern is a super subtle loose wave and gets weighed down easily by too much product or not enough layering. The way Ari cuts my hair, I can air dry with no products for everyday wear. If I want to do something more polished, I just need five minutes and two products. She’s a texture magician!

Venue-- The salon is always clean and bright! Full of plants and sunlight, plus cozy decor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCHyh0mafKngb_TgTFav3xI2jbmBCbrX4AXNQq&fid=0x0:0xf6cf0041ea769e56"],"When":"2022-9-9"},{"Name":"Olivia Servaes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEEEwlMlEV4FohYR_SjG5zR3Om1xhSxv47xZIBM8hZ4wjaovQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Brittani is a curly hair extraordinaire! She has been cutting my hair for the last 3 years, and I always leave satisfied. She guides you through the process and takes the time to understand your hair, suggesting new ideas if you're a repeat visitor.

If you have curls, you know your hair can be a bit of a surprise when it dries (or if you're too lazy to diffuse it every time 🙋🏻‍♀️). Brittani always lets me know that if there's something I'm unhappy with, I can come in and she will tweak it. So far, I haven't had to do that, but it's reassuring to know it's an option!

The salon is clean and relaxing.

The picture with the orange background is from the day of the haircut, while the outdoor photo was taken a few days later.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPraagdwhAOyuY5BDsdG_CSZtGID3vGsXKN_c_g&fid=0x0:0xf6cf0041ea769e56"],"When":"2024-6-19"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Kelli Hale","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLfUDtTUMb_L-GSNub6oT3GOsY5MCI1_yC8wYLYejADcSBfkA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kim does an amazing job!  I’ve been going to her for over 15 years and can’t say enough about how she has helped my hair become more healthy.  In the past year, she has been doing extensions to help me grow out my hair.  I absolutely love how natural they look and get so many compliments!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJovhvPjMF7N2-xvi43N9dsNeLm4uANQRxXquz\u0026fid=0x0:0x93cf5dbe2ce77ea4"],"When":"2024-2-2"},{"Name":"Nicole Zamora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6gDgYgkJwcQcpR6SqSZw_0waJHV_ORg_jc6CAHfJ4_g6Hn_05=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a wonderful, friendly and welcoming group of gals!  I've gotten to work with Iris, Kim and Tiffany and I'm both impressed with their kindness and their killer hair skills!  Being around experienced gals like these is motivation to always level up!  Located next to a fun coffee shop, I recommend grabbing a chai and checking these ladies out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPL73qXRbHwcvoxRz5euFPAH-MrKVnKV7p5DWAR\u0026fid=0x0:0x93cf5dbe2ce77ea4"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"Merry Reasons","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQwEtRuGxJtFKx13ZBdfz--OmNMf6ev4L8J2hV6xZ9d4DPvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Iris became an immediate expert when she decided to expand her services to hair extensions. I was one of her first clients to get them over 2 years ago, and have had them ever since!. She is incredible with identifying the perfect color, length, and style of hair extensions. I've watched her perfect her method of installing the extensions, and the great care and expertise that goes into making them appear so natural and smooth. I absolutely love the time she takes to make sure I'm happy and comfortable with them. Anyone that has ever commented on my hair has never believed me that I have extensions - she's just amazing!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Veronica Chacon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXMmHRhY2LaYse_eIQ98csl3W4vauBBsLog5OnC74AMfzDwg8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this salon! I am beyond satisfied with my experience and highly recommend Elsewhere Salon  to anyone looking for fabulous hair and fantastic service. My daughter and I have been coming here and going to Tiffany for years because she's really nice and does a great job!\n\nThe whole staff/ladies are so nice, friendly! They always make us feel comfortable! I love all the ladies! ❤️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"LP-Light\u0026Power","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNCr_0mwnwnXqasaFBbHWXCdjso9tE8IrbcbvMgfwTeHKoX8_MYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This salon is so gorgeous.  It was light, spotless, and decorated so beautifully and hip. Amazing products to shop, talented, smart and sexy stylists. Easy to park. Loved it here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNunzL6YkDq9-3kNBlIymq51SXsdHV9P7Z1mGuu\u0026fid=0x0:0x93cf5dbe2ce77ea4"],"When":"2023-6-12"},{"Name":"Valerie Cron","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHAbYHbw_pg2pY2pwYZvO9YtxJk3CIVikJxZUdbCNiAeC6Qs8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been going to Iris at Elsewhere for about 8 years. I’ve loved watching the transformation of the salon into what it is today. Women owned, environmentally conscious, always evolving. The warmth I get from Iris and this salon are what I look forward to. This is more than just a place to get your hair cut. It’s having someone care about you and the health of your hair and the environment. I have and will always recommend Elsewhere/ Iris  to anyone who is looking for a great salon to go to. I ♥️ Elsewhere!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"allison gentile","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLyeCrW2Xoo2xCTX6yvBVV6WcANoJORVrVhmP51HAhUM7_ldw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went for my first real hair cut in a whileee and I fell in love!! I won’t ever go anywhere else in Denver. Iris is amazing and I can say I left with one of my best hair cuts I’ve ever had. I feel super confident and I’ll definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMqeKhImppO_zF1sodqWMPU2_1Qnf4F93xEcmxR\u0026fid=0x0:0x93cf5dbe2ce77ea4"],"When":"2022-12-22"},{"Name":"Leigh Ann Hill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1yGcnnybL4QkhatBeelRETvK4b0fpfologradaH9iCvy92g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Elsewhere Hair Salon is the best!  I have been seeing Iris for years and love how she has transformed my hair.  Her commitment to finding the cleanest hair styling products is not only beneficial for my health, but the health of the planet.  Best pixie styles ever!  This salon is such a special place for community, connection and gorgeous styles!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"francie kinney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0B9AG9fX3ikiJxlnZgPM9-cE638jDmjfGSpBhB5-__EqTaW2r=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Emma always does a PHENOMENAL job with my fine curly hair! I alternate between the Aveda Botanical Hair Treatments and haircuts for my appointments and I cannot believe how healthy my hair has become! Starling Salon is a cute place with loads of friendly faces - I've been going there almost 3 years now and HIGHLY recommend it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Miss Shells Beauty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRE2ELAUXHfHoYLSZi2znQN50j_8pILoMTgwUmjmRRXNzWRXCb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience at Starling Salon. From the moment I walked in, the staff was welcoming and professional. I loved all the product placement and different types of cute and beautiful jewelry displayed. Sonia listened carefully to what I wanted and made sure I felt comfortable every step of the way. She worked with me on creating a style that suits my face shape and hair type perfectly, and the result is better than I could have imagined! The cut is clean, stylish, and so easy to manage. I highly recommend Starling Salon and especially Sonia if you’re looking for a fresh, beautiful haircut. I’ll definitely be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Erin Haegele","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbjBOcdY00A9pyFsVLdOQmygC4USz7dAZIYv9_BwybnH4qwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been to the Starling Salon a couple of times long ago, but my most recent experience was with Scott. I went in with an idea and some very basic knowledge of how to continue to style after the cut. Scott taught me so much about hair care that I had never known and perfectly/easily addressed the very things that frustrate me when styling at home. So not only did I walk out with a cut that looks better than any I have had in a very long time, I’ve been able to keep it looking as good as it did when I walked out of the salon a week ago. I am so impressed and highly recommend this salon and especially Scott to anyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brittany Irlanda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEjoGnP_F9PzXfueUSgNYCum79ir4cMAlMgzblaRDE6kL8p8XT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love Starling Salon. All the stylists are very kind and engaging. I came for an all over color and a cut. I was given the K18 treatment before my color application and my hair after the color feels healthy than before I had it colored. The cut was quick and she gave me exactly what I had asked for. When I was waiting out the 40 minutes until my color was done processing, the cap my hair was wrapped in started to fall a bit and another stylist came over to help me out. Two in fact. I was offered beverages by my stylist upon arrival, and was offered again by another later in my visit. They were very attentive and my color turned out gorgeous. To put it plain and simple this salon is worth the price and if you’re a bit “alternative” I highly recommend Emma as a stylist. Thanks Starling!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"AnnaStasia Yoshida","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLqVoZTaOKq4CGZRzMX9G2JrbI6TyRq514woVEa42-AYNg67A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really enjoyed my appointment! Abby did a fantastic job asking questions and figuring out exactly what I wanted in my haircut.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Becky Heavner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmHhz_coAMvuzID8XKwRfPTz_9xcc4HmOD8wgiqm5szlzd5jXh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amber is an expert at blending color with my gray/white hair! I never have a white line with my grow out. The color fades in such a natural way that I get compliments in between visits. I highly recommend her for cut and color.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kim Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVKokggWtlqisau7MuR_KLyL9ZaZpW60W0zDG9dZrsvLwYTfE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sonia is amazingly knowledgeable and talented as a hairstylist!!!\nShe is also an amazing human being and makes the salon a wonderful experience!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"lauren wirth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKIMm5UAXVdvksAEcMt6EulAvAysJdxt1rG9ot5jJMGWOOEhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kayla helped me figure out how to get a more natural yet darker blonde look that I’ve had other hair stylists struggle with. Great salon!","Images":null,"When":""}]
