user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marcia Santana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKWNEUz4XXagXmQ_1r58ooRabfaj2DWm6O1eJvAA5uCDntgpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"My stylist was Rebekah, she definitely doesn’t know how to cut curly hair; Rebekah cut my hair by pulling one ringlet at the time without measuring for evenness on Dry,  Uncombed, Unwashed hair; just as I came in. I had a gut feeling that it would not come out good; but I figured that different stylist did things differently and I was going to be impressed when she finished. I read the reviews online that the salon does a good job with curly hair; but didn’t know which stylist was good for curly cut. I  saw other women in the salon with very similar hair texture as mine go to other stylists; and I knew right in there that I had picked the wrong stylist. The first three photos you can see my hair is very uneven with a hole in my right side,  the 4th photo after I applied mousse very uneven bangs, the 5th  photo is what my hair looks like through out; the 6th photo after I styled my hair the left side is longer than the right side; the 7th and 8th photos is what my hair looked before Rebekah cut my hair; last photo is what I asked her to do with my hair and I showed her that photo. I will return to the salon because I felt very at home at the salon; and every body was very nice; but I will not book with Rebekah again, she may be good at other things, but not for natural curly hair or haircuts.

Reply to Rebekah: I did speak up when you first started cutting my hair; I asked you if you were going to wash or comb my hair to check for length; and you replied “this is the way I cut curly hair, I just see where the curls fall”.
About Cut Cutters, I did mention that I went to Cut Cutters for a hair cut; but that was two months ago and my hair was getting too long at the bangs. I told you that Cut Cutters did a good job with my hair; but now I wanted a hair cut like the picture I showed you, because my hair was looking a little boxing; photo 7 was taken 4 days prior of getting a hair cut from you.
When I left the salon; I did like the hair style; but was not happy that it was not the hair cut or the style I asked for.
I changed my rating from 3 to 1 star because every time I am around my friends; they asked me who chopped off you hair like that, she must not had like you; and every time I wash my hair; it is very difficult to style my hair with so much uneven hair.
I didn’t return to Cut Cutters because I wanted the salon experience, and the community that salons offer, and Cut Cutter doesn’t have that.
I left this review, so other people can read about my experience with you; it may help other people pick hair stylist accordantly to their need. I didn’t call the salon to get it fix, because I will not let you near my hair for a haircut; once you cut off the hair, there is not way to put it back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2p5o4FMl1HcENlJw3RftwHMx199yn-QCzrXrt&fid=0x0:0x5e006fd9e9bf685a"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Joelle Rudder","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyVrj1SzsvzH7klZQJnAUrMVqsSfPAN56GoS83QyHvlDNKrwCL8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mae Jones is not only a curly hair expert. She is also professional, punctual, kind and extremely knowledgeable about her craft. Mae was the first stylist that cut my hair while curly. Every other person I saw before Mae always needed to straighten my hair before cutting. Mae was the only one who gave me a beautiful, natural hair cut to show off and celebrate my curls. She gave me confidence where I never had that before. Mae also gave me expert advice, showed me products that would work best with my hair, and helped me realize how special my hair is. And on top of all of that, Mae is a wonderful with color! She strives to make her clients feel beautiful, and she succeeds every time! I can't say enough amazing things about Mae, because she's the real deal. If you make an appointment with Mae, you won't be disappointed! She will deliver excellence, all while making you feel like the most important person in the room. ❤️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sara Adams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-MFLb9imASrH9Kev2bHCEO2de6AZWEG5BGO4aWm41yg6dbA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For starters, this salon is not only adorable but it’s also full of hairstylists that make you feel welcome from the minute you walk in and like friends the minute you walk out. Everyone is incredibly talented, fun, helpful, and kind. Special shout out to Ivey and Mae for being rockstars in their field and also sparks of fun! Oh, and I can’t forget being treated to the cutest complimentary drink upon walking in! They truly know how to make self care days even more enjoyable. :)

Mae has been my go-to hairstylist for a year and I trust her more than any stylist I’ve ever had in the past, she has worked wonders on my long hair with her balayage skills and expertise. She understands the assignment and exceeds expectations every time. Cut, color, style… no matter what it is she does for me, I couldn’t be happier with her!

Pics are from my visit with Mae yesterday. Another knock-out balayage with some purple underneath! 💥 Thanks Mae!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNF6hVmmG2qh2SNOsteVSVJaGxQAt6UPZX2NXAY&fid=0x0:0x5e006fd9e9bf685a"],"When":"2025-2-17"},{"Name":"Anahi “Anna” Goluba","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnqCGpe5TXbFndYfXPJhM4DN4LO77V_av5wZzW9MJe_M5QdK-T=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love the energy in this place! Everyone is so positive and welcoming. I got my haircut from Mae and she did an exceptional job. She took the time to make sure it was all evenly trimmed and I am very happy with my results. My hair has life again! Will definitely be coming back for all of my hair needs!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"mariam amrich","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUC39kTemP-ArjaWHPaE8jb8W8dEtZJrbepaEzy5pN8lZ6EARd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"if you ever get the chance to book here, book with Mae!!! I’m so happy I found her :) she truly listens to what you want to do with your hair, is very attentive, and cares about your hair! She gave my a haircut that I actually like and feel so comfortable and confident with!

I’ve always had trouble finding someone to specialize in my hair type (curly 3b-3c) and it was so easy with Mae! She’s truly a gem! Will be going back all the time now :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"sushma v","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPBDPPCrcEJnbaLrqQMJS_EgH3xHe5bXbW8TpFfbKieZtK1w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely Amazing Curl Specialist & Salon!

I had the most incredible experience getting my curls cut and balayaged by Mae Jones! As someone with naturally curly hair, finding a stylist who truly understands curls can be a challenge, but Mae Jones exceeded all my expectations. She took the time to assess my curl pattern, listened to what I wanted, and gave me a cut that enhanced my natural texture beautifully. The balayage is just perfection, so seamless and dimensional, it looks effortlessly sun-kissed! Mae also took the time to educate me on how to properly care for and style my curls, making sure I can keep them looking their best every day!

Beyond the amazing hair transformation, the salon itself is such a welcoming and stylish space. The attention to detail, the friendly staff, and the relaxing ambiance made the whole experience even better. If you’re looking for a curl expert who knows their craft and a salon that makes you feel pampered, this is the place to go! Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ruby Simon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDSU7tx_HLVmtPxTqK1jvd2vjbswbKPRT-2RO4ebDCy39VNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m so grateful I found Dani! I walked in feeling pretty frustrated with a haircut I’d gotten at another salon, it just wasn’t right, and I wasn’t sure what to do with it. Dani was so understanding and made me feel at ease right away. She listened carefully to what I wanted, gave me some great suggestions, and worked her magic. The transformation was incredible! She turned my messy, uneven cut into something I actually love. It’s exactly what I was hoping for, and I feel so much more confident. Dani’s not just talented, she’s warm, friendly, and genuinely cares about making her clients happy. I couldn’t recommend her more!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Lindsey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIO15fjR6uTK0_LC8U9lyhKmqED6uxCTPlFLZgzCDFF6bZxsg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved my experience there! Felt very comfortable! And love love my hair! Mae did an amazing job! Honestly though every one that came in and got there hair done there walked out looking great and happy so I think all the ladies there do a great job! However Mae will always be my go to!","Images":null,"When":""}]

descriptions: Upscale hair salon offering cuts, styling & coloring, plus Brazilian blowouts & other treatments.
about: [{"id":"from_the_business","name":"From the business","options":[{"name":"Identifies as women-owned","enabled":true}]},{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Outdoor services","enabled":true}]},{"id":"accessibility","name":"Accessibility","options":[{"name":"Wheelchair accessible entrance","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair accessible parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Wheelchair accessible restroom","enabled":true}]},{"id":"amenities","name":"Amenities","options":[{"name":"Gender-neutral restroom","enabled":true},{"name":"Restroom","enabled":true},{"name":"Wi-Fi","enabled":false}]},{"id":"crowd","name":"Crowd","options":[{"name":"LGBTQ+ friendly","enabled":true}]},{"id":"planning","name":"Planning","options":[{"name":"Appointments recommended","enabled":true}]},{"id":"recycling","name":"Recycling","options":[{"name":"Plastic bottles","enabled":true}]},{"id":"payments","name":"Payments","options":[{"name":"Checks","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Debit cards","enabled":true},{"name":"Credit cards","enabled":false}]},{"id":"children","name":"Children","options":[{"name":"Good for kids","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews: [{"Name":"Rachael Deckys","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJV7-agRVdiiFezwlTyqtloeK8BfFimjLb8_2CmShGutORCvq8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This salon is very cute and everyone was very very kind! I came in looking for a semi permanent color close to my natural color, but a little darker, while still maintaining my red undertones. I also needed a trim. I ended up getting a very blunt cut (my hair is usually cut in more of a V shape - see my before photo) and the color was a bit darker than what I was expecting, without any of the red in my hair at all. Overall the experience at the salon was great but I paid close to $300 and didn't feel I got exactly what I was looking for. To reiterate my hair does not look bad -it  just wasn’t exactly what I was expecting at this price point.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXjFr46b3dtGQMDISf0ecVuif-Ym__Phow-keF\u0026fid=0x0:0xb4e7e79b6093f879"],"When":"2025-2-1"},{"Name":"Kalista Ruoff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLjuiD-2BA6yCWA5I1mw1Hj9q0zvT3_iigAePsbq35spJXqjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vanessa did such a great job on my hair at such a reasonable price. I love my new hair! The salon is adorable and was very welcoming. Easy parking, I will definitely be coming back!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNr54RSgRXFS3IBfA4LixfE-Z4NrxoDjP7A8JiR\u0026fid=0x0:0xb4e7e79b6093f879"],"When":"2025-1-23"},{"Name":"Tess Hughes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfDj8N8yAA4UkRQp05PQHRZLHuNP_YwNwxPFtRRwyX6c0FLjE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had the most amazing experience with Vanessa, the blonde and balayage specialist! I have very high maintenance hair and Vanessa delivers the most beautiful results every time- she customizes each treatment to what my hair needs at every appointment and has amazing bedside manner. Forma collective also carries some amazing products that Vanessa has extensive knowledge of. I think I will stick with Vanessa for a very long time! 🩷","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Syd Hopkins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2_xF5zQt2NH3Tx5H-qkzp4n4CzwhUQETZcirftm8AwLNTw5k=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I highly recommend Vanessa. She is so nice and knows exactly what you want. She’s been doing my hair for years. I had to go to someone else because I was desperate and in another state and I’m crying because I hate it so bad. No one can cut my hair like Vanessa and make me feel like a million bucks while doing it. Take it from me don’t waste your time on anyone else","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kayla Mateer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXq13MgcKcIS0_iSQB-7cXoD6Y5IvbiQ6fbYF8E5LuNF3wasrl0Ow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing experience I would rate more than 5 stars if I could. Bella was super awesome and my hair feels great. This place really helps you regain your confidence! They genuinely care about you and will take time to make sure you’re getting what you want. Definitely come here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiwPzLh5VgYKfjhGJQxwr505FSqTeLOi5mKgr_\u0026fid=0x0:0xb4e7e79b6093f879"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Quinn Junge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdWjw1_H2rxaqUwc4DZmgRY1MKGTTknIhWh02DUUJMIdLmZGo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vanessa is hands down the best!!! She is a blonding QUEEN! My hair always looks so good and I always get so many compliments! Can’t wait to see her again!😊","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michelle Brooksher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhDPWWaJqlEzMmXTHYmhaI-uRgNS7bISLKkYWDDzrQJO6xdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bella has been doing my hair for a few years now. I met her at her former salon and when she moved I wasn’t sure I’d want to make the drive. I’m so glad I decided to follow her! It’s worth the drive to see her. Her skills keep growing and I can tell the salon values education and training, and the vibe at the salon is just so fun. I laugh the whole time I’m there (the Owner Chelsea is hilarious!). I can’t say enough this salon and especially Bella. She’s a total sweetheart and I’ve never gotten so many compliments on my hair! Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nemo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLgs3SPRZikNzfsXxelC2F4YdaHHrAnGRqSKBbkLSm3X3G9fA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here in desperation after another salon had given me a haircut I hadn’t asked for (think lord Farquaad from Shrek vibes). Id been trying to find a salon that could give me a more edgy haircut and had been having terrible luck (my regular stylist is bomb but not as comfortable giving short haircuts, I appreciate her honesty about that). A friend had told me about her amazing experiences here and I was not disappointed! After telling my stylist Olive about my bad experience she worked together with me to create a haircut that made me feel like a badass! She even took the time along the way to stop and have me look at my hair to see how I was feeling and if I wanted any alterations. 10/10 coming here from now on, HIGHLY recommend","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Sara Miller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBhEssZMzgzmsMeLpeVwbRmdDoWb7CJWz4ATKiGRpxEgIUW-fNqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was hands down the best salon experience I’ve ever had. Kate took the time to really listen to what I wanted, and took extra time to fix some past highlighting mistakes. Not only did she nail my cut and color, but working with her and Kayla was so fun. I can’t wait to come back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brooklynn Phillips","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-YbusD3YnXq_oLtd2YkGjdr1wB7bAAHqTbBVt1dn7KM-2gKZk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sydney is the best hair stylist and colorist I’ve worked with in Denver! She’s very detail oriented and does a good job with natural looking balayage and highlights. She’s thoughtful and always answers all of my hair care questions, and gives me product recommendations that have really helped. I highly recommend working with her for haircuts and color.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPg-4g_aC0035MSbtvuT9nOCaaRaG2MNShiXr29\u0026fid=0x0:0x5006e13c82b53d3a"],"When":"2024-3-2"},{"Name":"Lizzie Lilani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbb4hoXB8NnAKv83IxB5xyJ46Y7GnJhruOMtKWiDAngON3h56hfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kate is a hair magician! Her attention to detail is unparalleled and everything she touches turns to gold. I’ve gone to her for cuts, color and glosses. Not only is she a fabulous stylist, she’s also a fabulous person and will make you feel like the queen you are! Spread the word!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emery Steinweg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWF6POknxl4tNT1v4TAE5i-5FVVV96Gg2Oy6CHciuKQ8U0iJjia=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been going to Cedar Hair Studio for 2 years now and seriously love the experience every time! I either get balayage, a glaze plus a hair cut and leave feel amazing. The hair stylist are professional and really good at what they do...I'd trust all of them. Highly recommend this spot in Denver!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNL_srMJjsPRSkLPYzwVmiQI46Xfzqki9sjZ4Bz\u0026fid=0x0:0x5006e13c82b53d3a"],"When":"2021-10-1"},{"Name":"Marlene Pierce","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFonff1O82T3_krxMbVJI8P5V8oPiEyE0nOlr7Qol-wuDYQaE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They know what they are doing and have created a relaxing and easy hair experience in the hustle and bustle of the city. I have had some terrible hair experiences in the past but trust Leah with my locks wholeheartedly. Super affordable for the service as well!\n\nThe before and after speaks for itself!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvgxo14lDMKPnxbxQXckN4z_MpEc0CFoehGdyV\u0026fid=0x0:0x5006e13c82b53d3a"],"When":"2022-9-17"},{"Name":"Libby Thompson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfyrhI2CRWo2VLHljQNVMxnj2SesSVysPph-6KtaQ_3WRBGms5kQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beautiful space, calming atmosphere, and excellent service. This was my first time in and it's already my favorite hair salon in Denver. Hannah lightened up my hair for springtime and added so much dimension.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8r-awvaM7SoKAAlJQ46GYdoz8OS7uTMrCoDZK\u0026fid=0x0:0x5006e13c82b53d3a"],"When":"2022-3-16"},{"Name":"Lillian Hanson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_yIJWIsg4M3dR_bHWe-QjDlNU-JZRhVi7Dls5F6Oe-OOciC_q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"working with cass to shape a shag cut that fit my lifestyle and face shape was such a lovely experience! she was attentive, kind, and talented at her craft. i ended up buying a hair product from them as well, and was happy to hear that they have a 30 day full refund policy if you don’t like the product.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maria","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7UONlhEQXFLOW22PHOH2BSjFQhLGB0N8gs-CmB2AzR0eZDg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time at Cedar Hair Studio, after many referrals, and they did not disappoint! The atmosphere is gorgeous, the girls were very friendly, and its location is easy to find and park. My stylist was Kimberly! She was so thorough and knowledgeable. I gave her my haircut request and asked for her professional opinion on how my hair could pair nicely with what I was looking for. She was super sweet and took her time. We all know we love a good scalp massage and she did an 11/10 job. I can't wait to see her again and revisit Cedar. I'll definitely be recommending this studio to all my friends. Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Holly Bradley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZWFwLUOMUAhCzZ7r6U3i1-XwLzEvo5qE5nee02yQD6Zr0Yw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This salon has the most amazing vibe! There is plenty of parking and it is centrally located. The music is awesome and everyone is so friendly! It is always such a great experience every time I go in! I always feel so pampered! The owner, Krista, does my hair and I always get tons of compliments on my color! She does a phenomenal job! I would recommend this salon for everyone! Amazing!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mitch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLg6ZbZ7a7JPfsPE4GP24HFpZOLv4ii03zG2-905NKNTGFLHg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been going to Brittany for over a year now, and I couldn’t be happier with her work. She gets my haircut perfect every time, and what really sets her apart is how great it looks as it grows out. Even weeks after an appointment, my hair still looks sharp. Brittany is a true professional,\nshe listens, knows her craft inside and out, and makes the whole experience easy and comfortable. If you’re looking for a stylist who consistently delivers and makes it easy, Brittany is the one for you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Melinda Kelly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxR-sAbCpavJ3hq8F_TLnvlNryJThYzgQpHnqZFYmwC-aSjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been going to Elizabeth every five weeks for three years and I can wholeheartedly say she consistently provides high quality service and skill. She’s mastered her craft, is honest, will make you laugh, and I always leave the salon with a smile on my face. I am so grateful to have found Elizabeth, she’s truly the best. I’d recommend her to anyone and everyone and would give 6 out of 5 stars if I could!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Breanna Hume","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaquIIRgAvPVKmtcuN7lurU5dn29efqaGoKvBnlXMm8KXl6K1FDA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this salon and cannot imagine going anywhere else for my hair. It's a drive for me, but totally worth it. The staff is so friendly and professional. The owner brings great products into the salon for retail, so when she uses a product I really love it's great to be able to pick it up to have at home.\nStyles and techniques are always cutting edge and I *always* get compliments on my color and cut, even weeks after my appointment.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zachary Epps","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVW38bJi4mT0Ok1oFYFQTaqwXziGqXbByG_FfFlJSjNAUSIA_mFKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"top notch any way you look at it. wonderful staff Dena always does an excellent job for my daughter who seems to love to experiment with color. We’ve been coming here for years and will keep coming back. Such a nice vibe and a wonder patio area to hang it (like for a dad waiting!) complimentary beverage, comfy seating, great tunes, and a full line of take home products. We love Denver Hair Design and we love Dena!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2XwvMQR2bLdaie6jZKmyWCI1dMkS6xIZ8sOhW\u0026fid=0x0:0xdb4b55f50a4e4869"],"When":"2018-9-30"},{"Name":"Alex Rotzak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlE6v06jTd3NvqLktLVVjQQ_sa0me504-yTSOVsDlWr4zMlzYk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The work they provide is great, but I was recently let down, twice. I had a root touch up appointment about a month ago , texted my hair dresser to verify that I was going in, she never responded but read my message and i got the typical automated message that my schedule was the next day. I show up, wait an hour, she’s not even there, and I had to have other hairdressers try to contact her because she wasn’t answering back to me. Find out she wanted to reschedule. That’s ok, whatever, she mentions to move the appointment out 4 weeks. 4 weeks pass and I realize I never got an automated appointment notification like I normally do, so I reach out to her in concern and AGAIN she reads my message and ignores it. I’ve been waiting for my hair appointment since NOVEMBER 5th, my last appointment being in September so 3 months now. My roots have grown out, and I was supposed to have my hair done for the holiday season. The staff is friendly and wonderful and helped me out by getting contact with my stylist when I couldn’t, but this is highly unprofessional. Even after doing everything right, reaching out multiple times to verify my appointment, and still not having said appointment, I would recommend to take your business somewhere else that values your time and money. You can check out the photos attached.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzT3Xt40_mqQuuaOTQU2lWxOoMjJUtTGnvlUjZ\u0026fid=0x0:0xdb4b55f50a4e4869"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Shari Brooks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMbmnG8rpJVhHP6C0WKSEPKb1z-gnZ8qZqc0RMyd346nSwwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So many great things to say about Elizabeth!! I had moved out here from Vegas in 2021 \u0026 had been traveling back and forth to get my hair done. I was refusing to let go of my stylist, but I new I needed to find someone here in Colorado. I found Elizabeth on Instagram \u0026 took a risk. I LOVE HER! She is beyond sweet \u0026 will make you feel so comfortable in the chair. I am not much of a talker, but she keeps the conversation easy \u0026 makes it feel as if you have been friends for so long. My hair also came out amazing \u0026 even made suggestions on what we should do for the next appointment to achieve the look I am going for. I see her again in a month \u0026 I can’t wait for her to work her magic!! Love a great hair queen!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rachel Kuhn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-9poeMLR9hVHQIzsIOuvqyzewCjKUC4qNI21UDXY2yBa5BO0p=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve gone here for a few years now and Elizabeth has done such an incredible job with my hair! I always get blonde in my hair depending on seasons (less highlights in Fall/Winter than a more all over look in Spring/Summer) and I’ve truly never received more compliments in my life. Highly highly recommend!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Kimberly St. John","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqtH-KJGmezddHPlTMaC8iEohdPlhO6sHiFK5LG0tYLTtGiYcp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Aaryn at Fluff is extremely skilled! I always LOVE my hair (cut, color, style) and get tons of compliments! I did not get extensions but I hear they do a great job with those. When I walk out of the salon I feel like the best version of myself🤩","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOikTrVqYphk5ZH2GQ2EO5Fh1LUit9VUcsEIurL\u0026fid=0x0:0x428f79ba8fc88804"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Vivian Duval","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIgB399_VADTjyGM59z--YvVrL_dkpgqiOqUYgvjHQfydO3bw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fluff bar has excellent staff and upscale ambiance in a historic building in the heart of downtown. Haley is the BEST hairstylist I've ever had the pleasure of doing my hair. She oozes talent and delivers the perfect color, cut, service experience every time!!! Complimentary coffee, champagne, light healthy snacks. Products are top quality. You can even do cigar service in their gorgeous courtyard. Usually parking is a breeze, too, as lots of parking around the building.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJ8aYF2Mk63Ojqti2rPtUGHAL1jFvQwr6N2Hfn\u0026fid=0x0:0x428f79ba8fc88804"],"When":"2024-4-6"},{"Name":"Katie Vina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKM3x532-NueCDlF8LnHwUb8Zwzl-k8nwT1J9fcxabXDLs5ZtP=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to Danni for a big scary step! Leaning into and adding more grays, a cut, and a style. Not only did she do a phenomenal job but with spending a good 5 hours together (the color was PERFECTLY matched to my grays and perfection takes time) she was an absolute delight to work with. Danni was kind, fun, professional, and i left looking stunning! Thanks, Danni!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFmnJztfjHxHLwEy8EUFiAarcDbTPSbgKvMgvl\u0026fid=0x0:0x428f79ba8fc88804"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Gina Gardner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXC_ldnM9PrDn90EPLWMhOXY0M2Fe-VagWoB0gnn7A2Wn3evUiK=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had Dani as a new talent stylist for my extension install and she was amazing! She gave me great suggestions on toning, haircut styles, and extension care. Really nice and friendly and a joy to spend hours in the chair with! I love the way my hair turned out, highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adi Leifer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIiMy2r1N9DQPIsJ9S376iF1v2JW63ZTlXi0aN9Vtaf54esmA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got 22 inch hair extensions done here by Alix, and she did an amazing job with them! I would highly recommend her, as she is extremely sweet and talented at what she does. The salon itself is beautiful and the entire staff treats you very well!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kristin Grimes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnHrsfVLPUzsyO6pINX1XndDMzMce-zBihC2cYVz8d4wh-ixyG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been here twice now for a color and cut with Ashton. Both have been a wonderful experience! You can tell she really cares about her clients and works with you to make sure she knows what you're wanting before starting. My balayage has grown out exactly as I had hoped--no maintenance required (aside from my weekly purple shampoo). I came in for a cut and was wanting to add a subtle bang and she nailed it! She went above and beyond to give me a stunning head of hair. It's definitely on the pricey side, but you get what you pay for. 10/10 recommend Fluff and Ashton!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNc92iW6jH1Wzpp83BVUKR_yMw_ksV8XZNCf4Ab\u0026fid=0x0:0x428f79ba8fc88804"],"When":"2021-10-16"},{"Name":"Peta Mullens","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUpgK53G03GHnyeiP9NTjx_nZjypzLZaOgcjyxwLZo7Q04DuaBe=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was visiting from Australia and desperate to get my matted I-tips moved up. Great communication before the visit to work out my needs, and then flexible in store. Gentle with my hair, good treatment advice and great chat. Also got some highlights and loved the colour. If I return to the area I’ll be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Monica Hable","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-h1xWpsSyI6OfNjV2XoMXc6QYpgKiOLWnUJpGt7wQL0oZr6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love going Fluff! It’s a beautiful salon with amazing service. Danni has my hair looking healthy and got the color I wanted perfectly the first time I went to her. Wold highly recommended.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Lexy Rinehart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUWtV9sFAQo2cGf23MatlQVikxzKS7Evj0dtvLoZ5XaCm9rA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lauren is absolutely magic with hair!\nI had my hair done by another stylist (at a different shop) and they completely botched it! I went to Lauren for a color correction and my hair turned out so beautiful! She also explained every step in detail and made sure I knew what was happening the entire time. I will be recommending Lauren to all my friends and family, if you’re on the fence or haven’t been able to find a solid stylist she is your girl!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPGzsnYIX4_GzbAhfgfRSqBTpkfomVQJpsOOG1\u0026fid=0x0:0x22d10d49aedd2116"],"When":"2025-1-31"},{"Name":"kristen sanchez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJztEJlRWUMPc-jiPNnPsYf6np4tDQhh-iWN0hABZcoC2nFTg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Liz is just amazing! I am so happy I came to her to fix my hair from a different salon. She did such an amazing job and worked with what she could without comprising my hair even more from what had happened at the other salon! She was so genuine and knowledgeable! Everyone at this salon seemed to have great talent, I’m pretty sure you are in good hands with anyone here but Liz was amazing!! Thank you guys for making me feel better! ❤️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marrisa Lafreniere","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLZmgIUm_ajg9nGVXoSm3LHhbsoTn_QeO-UM97vg3gDS4Bi6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been going to other salons and have never been 100% happy with the color , but I’m so glad I trusted Liz for my hair coloring before my wedding, she gave me the PERFECT cherry cola hair color I was looking for!! She listened to what I was concerned with (it looking too red) and asked for reference photos and absolutely nailed it. I’m OBSESSED I’ve never left a salon so happy! So excited to see how the hair looks in my wedding photos 😍 the salon was also really nice and parking was easy! Highly recommend Liz for your coloring needs!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvVHILgjP_pc7d0JUEVrztqzpgvEbk_rjYBn7u\u0026fid=0x0:0x22d10d49aedd2116"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Meg Byrne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHVlMG5GjKILuXYc5V3-jsBi9bopDJRWI0TJVdubAxtgYm5xk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Liz is amazing! She transformed my color from a muted, non-dimensional tone to deep brunette with balayage dimension that glimmers in the sun. I am in love with the results! She also made sure to cover my greys that are starting to pop up and gave my hair a lived in cut that has grown out really well. Highly recommend her for brunette magic! :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO8XS0Rz5lD0Bv4-Lp0MharQiIr8xh8wW9zOxSj\u0026fid=0x0:0x22d10d49aedd2116"],"When":"2025-3-19"},{"Name":"Morgan Frankel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6jT_AO7XSmXvMzgpETP1hiM6_xJLgRw5zGY8cU76F1jpWSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Y’all MUST see Glory for the glorified hair of your dreams!! She has taken me in, restored my confidence, and truly helped me to be able to better care for and style my hair. This was my first time coloring my hair in 10 years and my first time trying any sort of extensions! My hand-tied wefts are blended perfectly and color-matched seamlessly. I get compliments every single day from people I know and strangers on the street! She is your girl. Commit to your own beauty goals with Glory and you won’t regret it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDWhr5fZFetMtiUTY6uyCw99rQLYq5sxiI6Lz6\u0026fid=0x0:0x22d10d49aedd2116"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Alisha Self","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWA0qYwAGJJpSq9hdr4SoNf83UD4DyxJ7VU0rYpOzcLVMDOB6ON=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm so happy to have found Sara B at Craft Collective West after searching for a new stylist since I moved to Denver. Sara is incredibly talented at what she does, whether that's cut, color or styling. She's versatile, authentic and truly cares about how her clients feel. With Sara, I'm always confident I'm going to walk out looking flawless. She takes the time to listen carefully, making sure she understands your vision. Not only does she deliver exactly what I ask for, but her talent and precision always exceed my expectations. Can't recommend her enough!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Annmarie Carafa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQnGkrnVfY9jk-SKRTzqIDCvYlJDv6kTxucJosW_69gNoIpfih=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After so much searching for an extraordinary hair stylist, I finally came across MOLLY and knew I needed to book her! Her portfolio on Instagram speaks for itself. My first appointment was entrusting her with the biggest chop of my life AND she cut and styled it literally to perfection! Molly is so sweet and so responsive and you literally want to just keep coming back (plus the salon is clean, aesthetic, high end and you’re always well taken care of). Trust her and book her. As long as she’s around, she’s the only one I’ll be trusting with my hair. Thanks for making everyone of us feel so beautiful when we leave your chair. XOXO","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP37ph7HqFKM3K-s6NTlkSTRech6fdMA82s3i3T\u0026fid=0x0:0x22d10d49aedd2116"],"When":"2024-2-21"},{"Name":"Emily","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKxQ4DE8t0WscT00zjW9FKIgzkiitrBuUMJk_a5ehHNSxJLew=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Liz was great! She took my hair goals and made them a reality. Very informative and educational as well as I just moved to Colorado. Highly recommend the salon - very clean and professional.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Dolin Salazar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUf72z-N591Ck3bfKkqv3SiUkRZf2exg8lZpSuAXcQQ8rXmG5I4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Paul is absolutely the best and most wonderful stylist ever. He has had quite the job with my crazy color transformations but he nails it ever single time!\nI will be coming here for all my vivid colors for the foreseeable future 😁","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnK9xMnMD-2GKLvFlqT45FYMIH0Ure43dzZV-d\u0026fid=0x0:0x5abf615fa1f6e7e2"],"When":"2023-9-15"},{"Name":"katie Hamilton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqTpeIWtdiYqjqT83zhaLiZSEkNBZkbe7b7ObWFS2qvbPTFLGd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Aimee is absolutely amazing, she listens to what hair style, cut, color you want. Not only does she listen, she has an amazing intuition to work with the up-keep you as the client are capable of following through with. Dana is the most welcoming, relatable person. I don't know her outside of the salon, but I feel like we would be friends just from the chitty chat we've had there! When I am at Revolution, these ladies make my day!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Akhera Unpa Shepsutera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyR-puVuOwGo3amDRrELq7mF_yQjR9h3AaTNUCocTbENRQHwwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Paul cut my curly hair and he did an incredible job! It's been nearly 3 months since I got my hair cut by him and it's growing out beautifully. I love it now just as much as I did when he cut it. It's hard finding hair stylists who really know what they're doing with curly hair. Paul REALLY knows what he's doing! And he's so pleasant and wise! I went in for a hair cut, came out with a great cut and great advice!! Highly recommend! 10/10!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKHonGrIsmAHdwKZs8c9moAo2KSQMjbDDtMeLD3KlvN7KxDOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went there June 5. The first photo was the hair i want and the second one is my hair. Paul did an excellent job. I love it. I got a lot of compliments on my hair even after 3 weeks i still get compliments. Thank you Paul.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPKwmqzt1Yk1bZ3J-rAa1Izve3j81KoKDeoIUf\u0026fid=0x0:0x5abf615fa1f6e7e2"],"When":"2022-6-26"},{"Name":"Lindsay Paulsen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ1kjBrLlaecyWxpuusAY5JsxoqjHknnej7yGW837gIKOhP3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Aimee is truly an angel. She listened to my girl and gave her the haircut of her dreams. Ren skipped all the way to the car and spent the next hour calling all her friends and telling them about her cool new haircut .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michelle Gray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVW4wHBlzpVUI8C-juhbDzSANMoDrllsTRjqcK0HjVkYZGI9Ah0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Came in a for simple blowout for a wedding I was in town for. I saw Paul had good reviews for curly hair so went ahead and booked. I have 3b curls and have had many blowouts before so thought this would be straight forward. After blow drying my hair bone dry, I looked crazy and he tried to continue with a flatiron but he didn’t even part it and was grabbing huge parts of hair in the iron. When I asked him about what was going on he said my hair was too ‘dry and frizzy’ for the style I wanted?? Take caution if you have curly hair. I went up the street to another salon and got the style I was looking for.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Matthew Dunmire","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWN_gC2TN5g-vU4OhI-BYYZZKVCoWEFqY9QLWXNiO4pXCPm8lo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always love coming here, such a great space and such talented stylists. Marco is a color genius, Maria does a killer beard trim, and Dana is a talented artist no matter what she is doing. I can’t recommend them enough!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMPzIHKTZVPgQtKi23ZHgyzZXTedooVo_9Z8Exx\u0026fid=0x0:0x5abf615fa1f6e7e2"],"When":"2019-11-9"},{"Name":"Carl Riedell-Reynolds","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmis8Sz9OZLrzPT-t8F1eJOeaHeeCKPFMEvBqcr8qiSAoZoUk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been a loyal customer of Aimee for almost 15 years, followed her wherever she went. She is not only a great stylist but a great person. She does quality work for a reasonable price and is accommodating with my crazy schedule. I wouldn’t let anyone else touch my hair. As a side note, she works with a local animal rescue which just proves what a great person she is.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Lynna Staggs Sampsell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkN65jUWmlh2jBebdDw_3bFiK9Yl9_VCg_L_lCsve7OZyqYAij=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rylie did an amazing  consultation and cut on my 15 yr old daughter transitioning her into a more teenage, workable, style from  very long hair. SHE LOVES IT ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlc_757empud16_u2xRM-dJLg2HSNkK39MrMMT\u0026fid=0x0:0x633eb7e2757dbea6"],"When":"2025-3-13"},{"Name":"Elana Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLj31-SS4gOIYaQm_1uS2G-ieFuieB2N7zsj2JESSbIY5ZAHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Frustrated with my frizzy, dry, old hair style, a friend recommended Salon Bohdi. Nervous because I have gone to the same stylist for many years. I came in, sat in Stacy Jo’s chair, she patiently listened to my chatter and proceeded to give me an absolutely beautiful hair transformation. I was not used to having a layered cut after years of growing my hair out. After my first wash, my hair was bouncy, my natural curl was back! But, I wanted my long styled hair back….After 2 weeks, I tried styling the way I used to style. It was much better than before. I was receiving complements on my hair. I absolutely love my new hair cut!!! It is easy to maintain. It is healthy!! I look forward to going back soon to get a trim. 😊💛🙏🏻. Very thankful to my friend who recommended Salon Bohdi, and Stacy Jo for being patient with me. Pure gratitude 💛💛💛","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Monica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULbH2scQeJPpHxGgpijEEPju6qkT2UflCq6JpyP2sSDvltOFRl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an amazing experience at this salon today! The staff was wonderful! The salon was clean, cozy, eclectic, and really felt welcoming. Parking was very convenient. I worked with Rachel and I highly recommend requesting her!!! She was SO knowledgeable, funny, engaging, and helpful (she also has beautiful hair!!). I’ve never been happier with how my hair turned out. The prices are far better/more fair than anywhere I’ve been. Thrilled I’ve found my new forever salon!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rabies Babies","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX6uAFHVIoovXnnR1VQr-VT8gbMxdh2l9gIdHxzZkVO33CgeE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rachel did an amazing job on my cut. I’m a guy with long curly hair and she not only gave me an amazing cut but she also sent me away with a bunch of helpful tips on how best to handle my styling. After a very comfortable experience I feel so confident in my look and I received a ton of compliments after my cut. Great experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Montana Sand Music","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWUIzY2mAacmr9PS729q911ehwu-uUxcw-7DmhiKRQAPDA5B2R-A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rylie did a great job with my hair! I went to great clips last time and she fixed their errors. I got my mullet cut off which felt nice. The shampoo was relaxing","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Angeline Cole","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjymOMyQh6uB0yYxv_i2iyf0egDxSxuXsc_SIfwoHg4hZvMw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Riley is very friendly and attentive.   She listened to what I wanted for my haircut and went above and beyond to deliver a hairstyle I am proud to show off.  Great experience from our neighborhood salon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Veronica Bond","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLNg9Y6Aubr0OAi2heQaRt-4Uthrb1XY2DgNuQRGHn_85ZlggB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"About 10 years ago I had a bad cut and went to a Ouidad stylist for the first time to try to correct it. I've been letting my hair grow since then and decided it was finally time to get rid of the bad ends and unevenness. Rylie was fantastic throughout the process. She really listened to me about wanting to keep as much length as possible and mostly got rid of those scraggly ends and added in some shape. The result is that my hair looks like it did before, but ten times better! Even though I can feel that it's physically shorter, the way Rylie managed to just get rid of the parts that were growing unevenly makes it look not that much shorter than it was before. This is exactly what I wanted! Thank you, Rylie!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hannah Ritchie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVEyazvX1GaCJAnGX_mH3pe0uJOHeCdDgjUAF7jXfNL_XcuU_8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Rachel was the sweetest! Freshened up my color just like what I was looking for - considering flying to Denver regularly just for her! Highly recommend (:","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Marta Granda París","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOSpPKVLMFmd4RsKENy4h1fFRpRI0227aAZ-aXsJfze39nfmibmw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Emma is by far the best stylist I have ever been to. She is fantastic and thouroughly knowledgeable with coloring. She listens to what your concerns and expectations are, and she magically delivers. My skin picks big time on hair dye. Well, not once have I left her chair with dark stains on my face. That is to show how meticulous and careful she is about her work. She is friendly and so easy to talk to.\nThe salon is very cute, all in natural tones. Deeply focused on natural products.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHlZZOeD1PdEBwHcBRWBfbKqIsuxPD3C76SbRn\u0026fid=0x0:0x8648c92d0ce2fffc"],"When":"2023-10-12"},{"Name":"Joshua Berendes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkbI1Up4Muf8nddnIMYCEOGdFOWckisi3-i5kiIcT9yMucRpwl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been getting my hair cut by Amanda since she started Habitat three years ago. Shes great!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alyssa Sturm-Mathieu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_PIGJ9DICMoAqa9twt229FYtHuBaWCf_eyxxz0Nv-vHIxBC9CZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Emma is my go to for everything hair!  I have been seeing her for years and I always leave her chair feeling amazing.   She's an expert at balayage, color, highlights and always gives me a fresh cut!  We started six months out from my wedding to get my hair exactly where I wanted it for the big day.  We progressively lightened it to keep it healthy and added dimension and length with extensions.  I couldn't have been happier with the turn out!  Emma is the best!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvSLuk_5MswWCPx7sMjDXeoTnwTq7hEsePByOo\u0026fid=0x0:0x8648c92d0ce2fffc"],"When":"2023-2-24"},{"Name":"Donna JUSTBE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUozSusyzmdWnd_0GFPA4uidSD4Jo2mPNrS-pIxlyJEJfaR6YFy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Not only did I get a great cut but it’s a clean salon in both ways! When I come to Denver, I love to schedule at Habitat hair to see Jessica! 💗","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michelle Swager","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKiRgkP8so4g5dld30eFIXiv1d7Q6b48E6jznX7EC9_DiPRoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jes gave me the first haircut I’ve ever loved in my life. I told her what I wanted, and that most of the time I won’t style it and will let my hair air-dry and then she made some suggestions about what would work for me. I loved it when I walked out of the salon, and still love it after I’ve washed it and done no styling. Anyway, Jes is lovely, my hair is better than I hoped for, and the salon is cute and comfortable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Apurva Bhogale","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWC6CrMpJk1PvhgctCVjU6s0d91JStCL_feVN-zLva1pgOVur0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After trying many salons in Denver, I was really excited about habitat hair. Jes, the owner, listens to exactly what I want to do with my hair and what kind of products I like or don't like in it.  She only uses clean, natural products that aren't super invasive. She's really friendly and the salon is beautifully decorated. I live in the neighborhood, so being able to walk to my 5-star haircuts is a major plus!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carlee Easton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXM5FL2Y_aFuz3-rdoOe3To7Vp-mTWwgd6jB1jXLk0SNxjUnE0V=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jes is just amazing. I have been her client for years - she is special and so is Habitat! The vibes are always accepting and uplifting. I prefer to be pretty low-maintenance with my hair, and she’s always honest about what will work for my needs. She’s awesome at color and cuts alike!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amanda Field","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7R2AHRKtyHRzV294YKjoeoys84ofTbN7ldedWKL1yJSVDa2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Habitat is such a beautiful space; comfortable, friendly \u0026 always a fun atmosphere. Everyone working here is extremely talented. I’ve been seeing Emma for a couple of years now, she is the best! I always get compliments after my appointments. My hair is thicker, but she’s always patient, takes her time \u0026 pays attention to the smallest details. So happy I found her.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Lily Sajbel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINxj5rgOzVcJfLf7oGcISxOYT44uAs6EGOfW_WzE-FlFKROw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve only had wonderful experiences at Berenices! Everyone is so friendly and welcoming. I know when I book an appointment I’m going to get exactly what I need for my hair with their expertise. I have been seeing Tori for about a year and I look forward to every appointment. Not only does she work with me to make my hair goals a reality but she is always a delight to see. I can’t see myself going anywhere else in Denver for my hair.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kailey Helgesen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqhlxW8rL0tKVuZhMJgyo50ZYbIpkKH7DteYLVXaDrUjPPonKt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tori is so sweet, talented, and knowledgeable! The head and neck massage was such a nice touch—I'll definitely be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alicia Rae Parks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSx4gOj20tnbniJ5w7shWL-JpxD4tVyIFfrPpWLf26nYOwNw7w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kaylee gave me an excellent haircut and Aveda experience overall. I really appreciated her intentional care and focus and her years of experience shined through the service. The scalp massage was especially amazing. Thank you Berenice's and Kaylee for a wonderful service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Allie Lynn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUngccenqAwL_6DCgv1kkPhSJ7gQpAnZdKvvHLD29J1u1pKl7c=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tori is absolutely incredible! Not only is she talented and knowledgeable, but she genuinely cares about making her clients feel confident and beautiful. She creates a welcoming and fun atmosphere, and is always friendly and approachable. Tori is the first hairstylist I’ve ever felt completely comfortable with—she listens attentively and encourages open communication, making it easy to talk about any tweaks or changes you’d like. Her dedication to building a great relationship with her clients shines through in everything she does. If you’re looking for a stylist who is skilled, sweet, and invested in your happiness, Tori is the one!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elnaz Navid","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuAT6V0wYe7t6DBj1q8mxnONBgDbimUhu597t02Z1u1Gjhy0M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time getting my hair cut at Berenices, and I had Tori as my stylist. I came in with an idea of what I wanted, and she absolutely nailed it! Everyone there was super friendly, and I had a great experience!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wyatt Donnelly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4H2AZEWcuHBL29QbXWryXWUSD8bSr7j-YlHiI3NbKORWligou=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Melissa and the whole staff are incredible. If you are in the Denver area this is the place to go to get a haircut! Everyone is friendly and Melissa is world class!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessie Fleming","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRAgkQOsT44JbYSZl_WKkkS9rQJwsDBe7vhFdnds_PURJi-QQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got a last minute appointment with Julie while jet lagged and with my hair in terrible condition - she was great! Very communicative and knowledgeable with recommendations for a flattering cut. I’ll be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ginger Baldwin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6towU7brZ41NBCWy5pw3hKzBPi2-2Q5uaXzrxU_G3RHur0G9i=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Consistently fabulous cut and color services.  The staff are super friendly and personable, salon is clean, and always leave loving my hair.  I see Marcella, and she gives me the best blunt cut ever as well as the perfect blonde color.  Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tasha Ness","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWc4fTpLqdCkPJCOSkn_a1L8mGlmzd-Ci58MHWegNXEdDyViPHrAA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is AMAZING!! Heather is by far one of the best in the industry. I had multiple salons from Cherry creek to Loveland that couldn't do my hair right. 1st time she did it, she fixed it and made it look amazing and back to what I wanted. I can not tell you how extremely happy this made me. When you look good, you feel good. I struggled with my hair this last year and today I can finally say it's fixed and AMAZING. The salon is decorated so cute and is so inviting. I highly recommend it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Betsy W.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhR1WZ2oMapM2cLEJUNfeiLt-cumg_WMOD6t3WXVoYNDPkiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Adrianne is awesome, I've been going to her for years. Lots of friends go to her and other stylists at Adorn. Haven't heard a single complaint about any of them and everyone continues to return!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jaime Kronick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUvOceLw5eD_9L-y8pcGGVSSjBppjyJNLHEfqygu5x961cYpVN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shannon Chavez works magic on curly hair. She takes the time to learn what you like and totally knows how to get the best from your hair. I prefer a modified Deva cut with a boatload of layers; I’m so happy that Shannon’s approach is not one size fits all. I’ve been seeing her for the last 7 years; she’s my stylist for life!  My curls have never looked better and her styling skills are on point. I’ve referred some curly-haired friends to her. Seriously, if you have curly hair, Shannon is your girl.

Adorn Denver is a bright and chic salon conveniently located on Broadway. I love Alcove products and they carry my fav curl cream.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQzO4rNiJuNdkdJJck6SgWLMv94J-AfKdQOSWe&fid=0x0:0x8eba0ec7d112c122"],"When":"2022-8-12"},{"Name":"Brittany Hicks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfQw-99Ng90jiF3gbfIokvtJ2JYecf5dMktueVlbE9Vh7gnyFJ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you are looking for the best cut, color and style of your life, I would highly recommend visiting Marissa at Adorn! She magically transformed a hair travesty into the most beautiful hair I have ever had! She is highly skilled and a total sweetheart! Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtlVX8g6fqzWM6DermcnoFNfUV7qeZhdZtaf5H&fid=0x0:0x8eba0ec7d112c122"],"When":"2019-10-10"},{"Name":"Charity Weishar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWn3naJydsfXQhgdoGQpbGQ9shLkIM4V4L6XwEAaipgDtgppY9N=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shannon is a curly hair wizard! My curls have been struggling for months to the point where I gave up looking and started cutting my own hair. Ends were frayed and curls turned into scraggly waves.

Shannon made my hair look even all the way around and brought my curls back to life - so happy I found her and will be sticking with her from here on out.

Thank you Shannon! 🤗🤗🤗","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jade Arms","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoAGh599D8tmlgZh3p0Act954L1M1nY_ADucbAfvFd3jrtQIKnaw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As the neighboring business, Jaded Beauty, we simply have to give a big shoutout to Adorn Salon! Their dedication to providing top-notch traditional hair, nail, and spa care is truly inspiring. We've seen firsthand how their talented team goes above and beyond to ensure their clients leave feeling amazing. When you step inside, you're greeted with professionalism, genuine smiles, and a fresh beverage. We're honored to stand alongside them as a supportive, not competitive, business next-door. If you're searching for exceptional services, Adorn Salon is the place to be!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tabatha Carrera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_mwKqnGPMVw9TpR-7MZ2AcodUl7UHbsahican2VxHtREt68P9rw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shannon did an amazing job on my daughter's hair I had no idea her hair was this curly! She brought my daughters hair to life 10/10 I highly recommend her.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYuJzVSNvmzDYgsi7ABgQ5L724pxV6F1j4d9pz&fid=0x0:0x8eba0ec7d112c122"],"When":"2023-3-22"},{"Name":"Amber Mellick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocInbp1nmU54n9r5XrWfe3ippCNcYm7sg1S0YYI7pZVWVze5OQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my firs time visiting Adorn and I can't find words to describe what an amazing salon this is!  From the moment you walk in  you're enveloped in warm, inviting and friendly vibes.  I've read so  many reviews about what an amazing stylist Shannon is with curly hair.  Well, I have short, straight hair, and Shannon is definitely a boss, regardless of hair style.  She takes the time to talk to you to find out exactly what you are looking for.  I didn't even know exactly what I wanted done, and she figured  it out in about 5 seconds.  I'm very impressed with her scissor skills and awesome personality.  After 2 years of living in Denver and many failed cuts, I was beginning to think I'd never find THE one..but I found her!  Shannon is absolutely amazing  and I love my  hair! I will definitely be going back and will be telling my friends about her.  I've read reviews by people who say they would follow her anywhere and after today, I understand why! Thank you Shannon, you absolutely rock!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Colby Marks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmf0hn1peDfJV0iTFSy9YXM9b1Py8L8TopXvWE5botAYNKt6zb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ashe has been my unwavering, one and only hair stylist for 10 years. No one understands how to deal with my naturally course, wavy and unruly hair better than her. She is particularly gifted at translating trend and inspiration to what will work well with your hair type, face shape, and personal style. She is also an incredibly kind genuine person who gives world class hugs!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Starlight","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-s2k0DtZe8oWNUSg2nF3fG-c3GDqiXVapfCjUSTLsmx-Lmu1U=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went to Above Ground not sure of what I even wanted to do with my hair, took a shot in the dark, and booked Ashe. My experience with them was incredible. I felt safe, seen, and protected. They walked me through my cut step by step to help me achieve my goals. The shop is clean and welcoming, and I felt like I was being taken care of by a master of their craft. Ashe was very gentle, confident, and lighthearted, everything I could want from a haircut. I highly recommend not only Ashe but any of the other artists at Above Ground.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPef568CL2tlUnH0HmYVG_GSRi-8eFyQ1aezgCE\u0026fid=0x0:0x5eefe4683c7cceb0"],"When":"2024-4-17"},{"Name":"Evan Schillinger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKrO-I7YCX_tXjXT6boJNer8T9LtLcE-Oc6DaRRa873fw1ybQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been going to Shaun for my hairstyling for 10+ years. His professionalism and attention to detail are unmatched, and his experience with the craft always has me leaving the chair happy. He's kind, funny, and a blast to chat with during our appointments. Always listens to my requests and isn't afraid to think outside the box to keep me looking fresh. Couldn't imagine a better stylist to visit.\n\nAbove Ground LoDo is also one of the best shops I've had the pleasure of visiting. If you're looking for a great stylist, Shaun is the one you're looking for!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Amanda Cobb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6Ub-3HYTnHHAY1rcJkYhnksDsg9-y7p_OfjhnmA1SOK5gNA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've visited Above ground at both the LoDo and Colfax locations. Both stylists I've been to took the time to understand my needs and I always love my haircut. I always leave feeling my best. My stylist was Ro. She was amazing! I got a significant style change and she was able to understand what I was looking for exactly even though I could not describe it perfectly. I would recommend Above Ground to anyone, but if you are a queer person with a specific vision for your style this is the place for you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"john riggs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCOotmSkbYa-OKfTM3F8mAMkJMyWjLI1Igao-eCgsZJPtFjU41=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This review is for Shaun Slaughter: I’ve gotten lots of compliments from ppl on my new haircut (even strangers)! Also, I normally feel pretty awkward about haircuts and Shaun made me feel super comfortable. He also has a quiet haircut option that’s pretty cool if you don’t want to yap it up","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"chelton berliew","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPm1IQMZHmNnHzwHie5bz-KkpJDSykS5oTFIWAKx2g-xCqow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Incredibly welcoming, professional, and talented! I dread getting my haircut and with just one visit all of my anxieties have been washed away! Jonathan did an incredible job on my hair, not only did he listen to what I wanted, but he executed it beautifully! I walked out feeling like a new and better version of myself! Thank you so so much!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashley Conner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQiZZQL42Y4jTei1wRRvQHHeP_QXo2D-dWolIUBFB12TPkZmU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely love Above Ground. Especially my stylish Shaun Slaughter. He has been doing my hair since 2019, and there is no one I trust more with a simple cut or a bold color or style change. He is extremely knowledgeable and always so much fun to chat with through our sessions. We have done everything from a classic blonde balayage to all over pink, and I always leave beyond happy with my results. His haircuts are perfect, and I even cut blunt bangs for the first time this year without an ounce of worry. 10/10 recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"April Hunter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKk-NMqtyzxflYAr-aEP73vdfpVwaw90KtHJVTjUGUodnZpRvU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First timer with Liv (Olivia) today… and what an amazing experience! She’s great, listened to all my requests, was patient and kind, came out LOVING my choppy textured pixie cut - super pleased I found her after noticing a friend’s new “do” and getting the recommendation. Super happy with my cut/style, Liv is a true artist!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Sarah Bruss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSnMMhN6lT4FLPofO8KAmlbnFThk3nNHVH9FQMb3ZNye46anA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quirky, artsy vibe. Carrie did a really good job on my hair - excellent, “laser cut” short bob. Thanks Carrie and Lora!\nUpdate two days later: I have never received so many compliments on a haircut! 😍🙏","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML08GR9h8r0YDSFgypJ2d15jlcyBZeGGxN-130\u0026fid=0x0:0xcb79b667b99c9b8f"],"When":"2025-3-8"},{"Name":"Cassie Geremaia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVLVAZkq3N9gopjYaufbvA85uThi7ReMD8Te2K4IZSw7abY7X4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow, came to the Bad Kittie Salon to have my fashion color changed. Stephanie did not disappoint. I had the kindest, most colorful, happy experience in Stephanie’s chair. Stephanie was thoughtful and meticulous. They have product lines that are all natural and environmentally responsible. All of the staff in the shop was so wonderful. The ambiance is quirky and loving, a true Denver gem. They are clearly an incredible group of artists who can smile and laugh at work. It makes for a magical place and I will definitely be returning for many years! Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnaWhzCggKyZr0rCSieGj1vCLqCBvENZ5f2wSQ\u0026fid=0x0:0xcb79b667b99c9b8f"],"When":"2023-4-23"},{"Name":"Shannon W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKy5OCI06iXWCvDvr17Bw_ReY9yraGYZRMtFkkmewf4l0hMwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am OBSESSED with my recent cut! I always get so nervous with bang cuts especially since I've been wanting a more shaggy look and I haven't had much luck with other stylists. Kari knocked it out of the park! I'm so so happy about bangs and my entire cut. She also is one entertaining lady! I enjoyed our conversations and will definitely be back! Thank you!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrhRBjau8qYpC8NbGIxj-xyR6p9MUKprWXl3z9\u0026fid=0x0:0xcb79b667b99c9b8f"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Noelle Chaffin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1BCaIS2w2CBEi0dZS9gyXdRwaDw8EX_8u4y0CnbtyI5rD3mli=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kari was able to cut my hair exactly how I wanted it. I previously went to another salon and they barely touched it. I would definitely recommend The Bad Kittie if you're looking for a great stylist!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Samantha Welter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJC8NB18BeGTbS-4cesnlGtB6cT_rLh5ACuFHvkBsgYb_AQ6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been going to Lora for almost 3 years and I just love this salon. Very chill, down to earth vibes and I always leave relaxed and refreshed with amazing hair. The vintage jewelry and clothing is always worth a look too!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nicole Zamora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6gDgYgkJwcQcpR6SqSZw_0waJHV_ORg_jc6CAHfJ4_g6Hn_05=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just love this boutique salon and the girls working here!  The Bad Kittie Salon is truly unique and has the BEST crystals and fun vintage clothes to browse!  Getting your hair done here is an experience not to be missed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUbCbygidUN7qncejymJGq7sB9Etx53b8jhTSW\u0026fid=0x0:0xcb79b667b99c9b8f"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Subdued Bonsai27","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcNu2b7HQ7GkhAfsHWxB1xa3prEyJ4h_NDGkdGdjPYThKgpl_N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They were excellent and knowledgeable at both cutting curly hair and working with me to give a haircut I enjoyed, as well as recommending products for me to use! The salon was full of character and personality, but booking my first appointment and making an account online has been more challenging than it needs to be.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Erica Epstein","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFUth2EMD6qjZW4BlNv15P8brF4LXXkx84L_l0cxSowI8Sng=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had such a great experience at The Bad Kittie Salon! I went in with long, dark brown hair wanting to get my hair dyed blue (and for the first time ever). Lora and Hannah were both super friendly and worked with me to get the best results for my hair type. Hannah did an AMAZING job with the color, and Lora with the cut and style. Their COVID protocols made me feel safe while in the salon as well. I would definitely recommend this salon and will be going back in the future. Thanks again ladies!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPaz6FH-HyyUDz0j0gKvYEkVxUq3n45Ug0PMgF\u0026fid=0x0:0xcb79b667b99c9b8f"],"When":"2020-11-9"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Gurleen Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJNZ58_qf4iGkZMmqDjb_lFpMebylj0UCPGd6KrksGRRNMDIA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a wonderful experience at Hair People this afternoon. Maree was able to get me in for a cut on short notice. She listened to my needs and goals for my hair to help develop a plan. I was given layers that revived my curls without removing much of the overall length, which is exactly what I wanted. We also discussed doing a curly haircut for next time and I look forward to the experience. Overall, I got exactly what I was looking for in a cut and was met with great kindness and warmth along the way. I’d recommend this salon to anyone looking to get back into their curly hair journey. Thanks again, Maree!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNO7eQbZfSHigDgK88DhyhKw8CrNrdsjzAg6REp\u0026fid=0x0:0x7613fa809736f205"],"When":"2025-2-28"},{"Name":"Megan Rulli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAkP8-4aeR9rfzxNPls06aegFUx0dQvpzajCgvPlL8pSDg3w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have had previous curly hair cuts at other locations and none felt as collabortive and knowledge as Hair People. Emily gave me a wonderful curly hair cut and provided education on styling curls at home. Highly recommend for anyone needing someone experiences with curly hair.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jackie Harvey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXz7HZg8-_3VbNipsiUFs4BkFbQuC-2-pNLsdzF_VyBfAYgat4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Huge shout out to Maree! I submitted an inquiry on Saturday about getting a perm after doing a google search for “best perm in Colorado”. She responded on Sunday and got me in on her day off the very next day, to accommodate my work schedule. The salon was beautiful and the story behind it is even more awesome. Maree was very personable and took her time explaining the whole process and after care to me. Her experience and love for doing hair shows the minute you meet her. I will be back in a few weeks for highlights but 100% recommend this salon to anyone looking for the best experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"mic koster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHFnU3fUI0e_oxDMf-SHQFXrqgsKiwRJt_7o-DB67Y0AyAFA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They say \"old age aint for sissies.\" I can agree, especially from the perspective of letting my hair transition to gray. The process is lengthy and unsightly, especially as I equate it with getting older. Maree Chavez, owner/stylist of Hair People, provides a consulting service for people like me. Lucky to find \"silver seeking\" on the Internet, I booked an hour of her time. She is enthusiastic, kind and brimming with practical as well as creative suggestions for letting my hair embrace it's new natural look. With her encouragement, I felt like I was embracing right where I am. I felt very comfortable and positive. And, the salon has a homey vibe too. I highly recommend this service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michelle G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLaG3BrBkDsX2H5IB-5DHfcXp47lfZeO4UstupkY2W5gX9D8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Maree fit me in pretty last minute for a haircut to fix some uneven curtain bangs another salon had given me - Daressa was really kind and attentive, and did a lovely job on my hair. Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Beau Carubia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEZ2vVBBhGpAgPZs0f30DN5GB-fRMUPyv-UnUoVTXCVhT1mb0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shellie is fantastic. I have been getting my haircut with her for over 5 years. She is a fantastic human and I have never walked out disappointed with my haircut. Incredibly flexible and responsive to my challenging schedule needs at times! All the other stylists are very friendly and, overall, a fantastic salon. You get what you pay for and will continue to be a customer at Hair People.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marissa Tabak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpsW0EGnTfkFhCDR2hwB8MaaNviAVjSBpSBeHVGdAZWT34H93r=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I called several different salons in search of the perfect stylist for my particular hair style, a Bob, since past stylists couldn't seem to get my cut right.  Shellie, known at Hair People as the \"Bob Queen\", was recommended to me.  I gave her a try, and since - I have been very satisfied - and I've gotten my hair cut and colored by the \"Bob Queen\" for several years now.  I always leave the salon pleased!  I even receive compliments about my haircut from strangers on a regular basis. Highly recommend Shellie at Hair People!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Giulia Kramer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQucVk8AGQ1Rj6eqE65Y_BYTA32NZuxnPBzwTICclp_Q_eFmf9Yg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shellie is my go to!! I first came to her after a disastrous bleach job at another salon, to which Shellie spent hours color correcting and restoring my hair. Fast forward a couple of years, she's my gal! I absolutely love her attention to detail and care for healthy hair! She's amazing, her work is amazing. Hair people is the place to go, you're in good hands no matter who you choose.","Images":null,"When":""}]
