user_reviews: [{"Name":"Tamara Brady","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUy6QdVtxZQaIi6YqwO-nL8s_i7Ziw8Mmt-BjwM8vLDnBmhxpljZw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can’t recommend Juno Salon enough. 5 stars seems insufficient. The owner, Lisa, runs a great salon with a beautiful vibe. It feels like a spa. Brittany is my stylist. She is a true stylist, with artistic and professional approach to her work. She listens to her clients' desires and works toward the perfect style. Her work with color is masterful (I have probably 50% or more grey hair). The products they use and sell have transformed my hair to a soft and healthy state.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSOLhncAiqy7borJooEX53sQ8OhQpyTegR8uBk\u0026fid=0x0:0xde3ba08a31270385"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Jack W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrJ0YUxbLXLzOu6HaFNEK4uioq9Hh_GSzg3abkkBuSeayDuEww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Juno Salon is the best salon ive ever been to. They do hair right. If you're looking for any kind of hair service especially color, I wouldn't go anywhere else but here. Lisa does an amazing job and couldn't recommend her more.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Samantha Frazzini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUC0O705Dgkjy-Fd_jKMD8UWoZ458TiKejwGLcgcQzrZuhPrk3X=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend this salon for any hair needs you might have!! The entire team at Juno is so friendly and professional, they all go out of their way to ensure they're creating the best atmosphere possible. I’ve worked with solely Destiny and happily followed her to this Salon as I will never go anywhere else! Destiny creates my dream hair and more on every visit. These have all been my hair within the last year - STARTING with the cayenne red, moving to bright orange and working our way to a blonde. Destiny is a hair magician 🪄","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUZk8TVR6nE4yUDHD2EB43o2jcyvpfpmw49d1G\u0026fid=0x0:0xde3ba08a31270385"],"When":"2023-6-16"},{"Name":"王羽希","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJpHeG9DyySDyedavPDeDGooOdSKCPOBUmEuVRIYYlgdaqoIg3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time in Juno Salon, and the best hair experience in state. I traveled to Denver yesterday, and decided to dye my hair this morning. I called Juno salon to see if there’s any availability, and I m glad that they have one! So I came at 4:00pm. My stylist is Destiny. She is amazing, nice, patient, and has done a great job for my hair. I had my hair colored and also the deep moisturizer treatment. Now, my hair is so soft and glamorous! I’ll definitely come back to Destiny if I travel to Denver again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAuHluzpZqdrekVbnPF_izJQ7PkT2VP0qHIbkn\u0026fid=0x0:0xde3ba08a31270385"],"When":"2022-5-19"},{"Name":"Gabby P.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfoDT2W_-lgy34SRppjA2YDvUXGPGvqOnCZ6XaUWA_6Bcm2SU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My 1st review was almost 8 years ago, so I think I earned the right to post a new one! These ladies right here are the best! I took my autistic 5 year old son in to fix a bad summer cut and they were absolutely amazing with him! 😊 It takes a village and for the short time he was in the salon, they all went out of their way to make him feel special! Thank you!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNktkqyITYPmSvHw6YfBgmM3FCJBkbKS-uF_uBY\u0026fid=0x0:0xde3ba08a31270385"],"When":"2023-8-8"},{"Name":"Haleigh Hager","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9QeM20feZv0oQMYO6myAh6ReBrNKXbqlDjjPtK03Vqcq_Lw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down the best Hair Salon I've ever attended. I had the amazing opportunity to have Destiny work with me, she is the most talented, respectful, \u0026 friendly person I've every had work on my hair. Destiny made me feel like my beautiful self again, I highly recommend letting Destiny work her magic on you!!\n\n100% will be getting my hair done forever from Destiny at Juno salon!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Catalina Reddick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6RZcuGqDGkJjN5VXvg7S5dAB_7IosSICe_Brt29RWtP-bkPjK=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing salon! The quality of service and love is felt the minute you walk through the door. I love Destiny’s work. She is truly talented at her craft. Highly recommend this salon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jesse Baiotto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzF6bkCIZdbhI6d91kBmMJs5MgEbqDW7pLgeJn4oWQbpHaoA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I couldn’t be happier with my cut and color. Destiny is an amazing artist and is very passionate about her job. Love the salon and my stylist! Can’t wait to go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQRQvkhZdfNzElJGFvWwPZbYdytLuD3yxgNcc9\u0026fid=0x0:0xde3ba08a31270385"],"When":"2022-6-24"}]

[{"Name":"Jay J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHChOMvOT3BFoIWUW6dGHixPBSvk2D12WfnlstAOrOas3Zilm2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is awesome at night and is known best for its pickle shots of course!! Besides being an awesome bar they also have pretty great food during the day. Amazing prices, great service from Tiffany (ask for her) and drinks are well they do the job right. Ordered the green chili fries and wasn’t disappointed. Less than $8 .
10/10 recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfqHtTV2LfY5hoKrD3bsnbyRhTanh2ejr7KXe1&fid=0x0:0xdd3f0c891ab674b5"],"When":"2024-1-19"},{"Name":"Alex Castaneda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2pURYhK7TAnNg3pz4qhBzxzLtCXFbOILDJ31SFBeStgSU9h09=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A beer and a burger for $7!? Don't mind if I do! Really enjoyed this spot. Next time I'm in Denver for another Dodgers game I'll for sure plan on visiting this spot again. Btw, not sure why but those pickle shots were the rage.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtn_HyQ3bXH-an39cHvK1PattsWBaNQoY2hEIF&fid=0x0:0xdd3f0c891ab674b5"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Jeri Romero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4O4jfdaX-QsRCqLui09rKEZ3DEJe5Xv7s376us0m37RfkaDfd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Retro room is a fave of mine! I always appreciate the staff and even though they’re always busy, they’ve always been friendly. Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alexa Lange","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0pmDfjSPFUAyXKgSwrmxTE_xChgRxqhp0AHLrBMaHA5EdPdl8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"$7 burger and beer combo is the beers knees. Try the breakfast burrito $8","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4sXLXRUAHVO-y_tT9x5AIvPc1HqHISFrSLPrj&fid=0x0:0xdd3f0c891ab674b5"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Cecilia Silva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXxzbKaWuzFZrVEDztCOTUrb3rTJRUt1Jbo7tIpT3ji8KSq7kM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We were asking for help and they couldn't bother to help us out and were very disrespectful about it. Don't waste your time at a place that can't give you a time of day.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Reeve","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpmYOb3jrkuYEcei3MQMS2blLNP9JWWMGqdiMuhD5qsYrmrE3L=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place is a hoot! Highly recommend","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Frances Pool","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIpb2OcqT-NRMQacqStfWPiHGhcSa17V7FJBDVHdTh22iJm9Qh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shannon is an artist with scissors. He listens to my concerns and offers suggestions with pictures that help me choose a style. I walk out feeling fantastic. Prices are very reasonable. Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Megan Walsh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK2JKwQqsabodXHrr3M6DQXCjC-cRQzfcljaL79gPrMzVxoGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shannon was amazing, informative, and very accommodating. I've never felt more comfortable in a salon setting then I have here. Definitely will be returning.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stacey McDowel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaZbxttoxl6Nxko8Bg1EJ2Ng6YCwPMuF-r0dGmwiaMTGF-r6rsbw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I don’t live in Denver but often visit Perfect Cuts when in town visiting my mom. I love this salon and everyone who works there. I was able to make a last minute appointment today with Michael for cut and highlights. I don’t usually take the time to leave reviews but he did such a great job. I LOVE my cut. I have very thick sort of wavy hair. He took it from blah to awesome! It looks adorable and super bouncy. He understood exactly what I wanted. Thank you Michael and Perfect Cuts, y’all are awesome !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nicole Martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoOOvOWyz-0_U-NlBwzuhxqZPn3sEw5nzdoyP06s9qqMQq1A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is wonderful! The staff is super friendly, thoughtful, and welcoming. Yung cut my daughter’s hair. She was very informative, kind, and made my daughter feel super comfortable. Highly recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rebecca Cook","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQCXNa3v2Hza77_LaZ1Vkrpmk33H8ZEHaqAojrIsgwsobp2TIM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was having a hard few weeks and needed to do something for myself. I live up the street so I called here just to see how much a cut was. You get shampoo, small hair treatment, cut and dry. It was well worth the $45, cost depending on length cut off and type of hair. I have fine hair and get a bob inverted, not a beginner hair cut and have had many people mess it up and takes months to grow out and try again. Michael did a perfect job exactly what I wanted. He was friendly and nice and made me feel important, at that time something I needed that day/week/month with personal issues happening. Didn't want to talk about it and he could tell so made other small chat. Think I finally found someone to cut my hair again. Thanks for all you did.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shelby Kinlund","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIW4GmmeOMZouaqyZJJGdu-aGfp05xhz_hA2kZORA-kTnH8jQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect cuts is clean and welcoming. I felt very safe when I entered. They took my temperature and had me fill out a questionnaire before sitting down. All the stylists wore masks and gloves. Was able to make an appointment for the next day and received a really good haircut (I had six inches cut off).","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCbLRudemnpX6mEfJwLLSXA0wUBmQcUosedtwW\u0026fid=0x0:0xe7cdc90a9c5583e"],"When":"2020-12-8"},{"Name":"Heather","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLSUfAGx4Cy9bO2E1Ya7RhSFkAfW7ezj_NN8DMM0zbMBOno6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I just saw Shannon for a cut \u0026 color and I could not be more thrilled!! He fixed a dye-job gone very wrong and my color is so beautiful, I just can't believe it! He cut my hair in such a nice way that compliments my difficult features \u0026 now I just love playing with my hair! Everyone there is so nice \u0026 this such a wonderful place. I absolutely love it \u003c3","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Scarlet Salon

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nataliia Shevlin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKMTfl-PpVOL3yQ-59faVesrYq6PkzIaV7ya2VqboRhsyAeBA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I had very long, thick, outgrown side bangs (see my picture before). I wanted to do curtain bangs this time. I showed the inspiration picture and asked if the stylist could do that…I’m going to let these new bangs (see pics) speak to the service I have received. Not only it looks absolutely nothing like what I asked for, it’s also way too short and uneven to get it fixed now. It’s going to take months to grow out. It is just so awful. The damage is done. I feel vandalized. My beautiful hair is ruined. If you don’t have the confidence in your skills to do what the client is asking for, just say so and don’t cause damage. Do not let Zach touch your hair under no circumstance. I originally booked with a different stylist but got moved to Zach by the receptionist for some reason.
I guess I won’t be leaving my house for a very long time with these bangs.  What a nice cringy hairstyle for the holidays 🥴
No apologies from anyone.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4Phjdc9XqlMboi1WbAYoEo45qPKBYFROK1CQG&fid=0x0:0x74ffbe76a447cc5a"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Kris Mitzner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVM8MR3L6jRUkYzn6GZ4ba13M0mM8Otw2cFj23PJft_ZwzXwchQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mary did a fabulous job on my highlights and haircut. She takes her time and it shows! It was my first time to this salon but it was fantastic all the way around!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtIjhChizfJ0exO-VV3ld_99j3SdUxLtqGOCkl&fid=0x0:0x74ffbe76a447cc5a"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Rachel Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_sExYN6oQjGlMJVkFxODLAeosExQbY0maIx3vaDWMcdy-PvEotg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Update: 9 months later and I am still trying to fix the banding that was done by Zach. I have spent over $2k and have been seen by 3 different stylists. I finally decided to give up being blonde and have dyed my hair dark brown in an attempt to cover up what was done here.

Original: When I called and scheduled the appointment, I told the receptionist that I was looking to get a blonde balayage done. However, when I had my hair done at the appointment by Zach, it was done as a full highlight and root melt (which he asked if I wanted, I said yes, but did not know it was an additional cost.) So anyways, it was not what I wanted but I wasn’t aware of this until the end. I even showed Zach photos of how blonde my hair used to be and that was what I wanted it to look like (I’ll attach the photo to the review as well) before hand and showed him that I had a good 4-5 inches of grow out as well. By then end of the session, my hair did not look much different. I wasn’t super happy but thought I would give it a try and even scheduled a follow up session. However, when I got home that evening, I began looking at my hair and lifting up sections and seeing what it looked like and I was baffled at how bad it was. There are huge chunks that weren’t even highlighted and really bad “banding” where the grow out was. Very dissatisfied and disappointed. I did not reach out to the salon for any kind of resolution but found another salon who fixed my hair and cancelled my follow up here. I will not be returning to the Scarlet Salon which is a bummer because their stylists show photos of their work and it looks amazing. Not sure why mine was so bad. I paid $160 for this and then had to pay another $250 a week later to have it try to be corrected  elsewhere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNywvBwm7q506VvvXxXYNxqJsrrE2jgO3TFkh9r&fid=0x0:0x74ffbe76a447cc5a"],"When":"2021-6-6"},{"Name":"Yoanna Orlaie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtz4CFAtZ8rl9I2xhDIlklNtNoSaHHZ-FaF_x2Q8eyZDGaUqSo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alden gave me my dream highlights! Even better than I ever imagined. I wanted very thick and light silver highlights, and my hair came out much better than expected. He had to do it in two stages, to achieve the extra light color I wanted. So happy that he got rid of all the orange I had (as you can see in the “before” pictures). And absolutely no damage! In love with my hair.

Highly recommend ALDEN!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_1fgH_tsoZyze7tp7dPMQ1GYMIk4dY_bLm33N&fid=0x0:0x74ffbe76a447cc5a"],"When":"2023-3-18"},{"Name":"Lexi Long","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtoVLvb6PYUMVcT30BEBuDW9DCD6oqJnpTxRX4fc0BXWnVxOpE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jessie P did my hair a couple months back and did an amazing job!  I got balayage and a cut - I have been dying my hair for 12 years and she really helped to even out the color and make it look more natural.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephanie Freeman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9l81RDjryWLvgRPT_S11DSwdP3NkI0S2QyIqDMp8oBglqVg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I want to give a huge shout out and recommendation to Jessie at Scarlet. I've been going to her for almost 10 years now and consistently love what she does with my hair. She is highly experienced and her technique for both color and cuts is impressive. Only a handful of times have I tried someone else reluctantly, because I was traveling or had scheduling conflicts, and the outcomes did not even come close. She's cool, creative and cares deeply about her work. She even helped care for my hair during cancer treatment when I was using a cold cap and did whatever she could to make me feel beautiful and safe. She's without question the best Denver has to offer and I would absolutely recommend her to friends, family (my mom, sister and friends see her) and anyone here reading google reviews.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cheryl Bradley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqFIAHXSFmAVv0wEwke5UEuAfrsQVklmeDpIkDgcQjuOorWWnIuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fabulous salon. I have lived in Colorado for six years and have struggled to find a salon that lives up to my experiences back home in Southern California. This one does in spades. Fun atmosphere, talented stylists, great location. It has everything. Rebecca has been a master with color. I came into her for a consultation with a mess that the last stylist created.  (You can tell how much I liked it by the picture.) Rebecca didn't let me walk out of the salon until she fixed it and made me feel confident rather than embarrassed walking around outside. (I can't get the "fixed" picture to upload, but my hair looked great.) Since then, we've gone on to some fun stuff with reds (first with a red-infused ombre and then kicking it up a notch or ten). She's killing it. If I could give more than 5 stars, I would.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjZhTo9oqORsCbEgC2IbHh4laTMv964nkWexzC&fid=0x0:0x74ffbe76a447cc5a"],"When":"2017-3-7"},{"Name":"Kate Hinton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIpNmClA27BSrA_WPhCMNtRyCpv0Qx4aVLP8d3LxuLx7MTZ5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been going to Jessie for almost 10 years now and I've never been disappointed. She was recommended to me by several friends and I quickly understood why. She is an expert when it comes to color, cut, and styling. I couldn't recommend Jessie more! To top it off, Scarlet Salon has a great atmosphere and makes for an enjoyable experience.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Bryce Hill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvQy_j_CUD18sJHnlbx1Ao5W4sdKJLUwYMQd-k4ZfOsOmS2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great work, Abigail! First time at The Parlour, didn’t know before calling to book that it would be an educational session. Appointment started a bit late, but it was fine and Angela offered some wine while I waited. All good. Abigail was great, she asked me for confirmation on a few things along the way, she had a few check ins before starting a new section, and communicated well. Overall, very happy with the experience. Abigail took into account my personal requests (prefer not to use much product to keep the style, bike so I need to be able to helmet on and off throughout the day, etc) while also making sure I felt refreshed and looked cleaned up for work.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Patricia R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBHhWnMCA_dMGfcMajkm5oI2rW_Xw1liiGU61vrrrkrBl_pI7t=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely love this place! My stylist, Itzel, is incredibly professional and talented. She has been doing my hair extensions and color every three months, and I’m always impressed with the results. Itzel is meticulous in her work, taking the time to explain every step and answer all my questions. Not only does she deliver beautiful results, but she’s also a pleasure to talk to, making each appointment a great experience. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsLuBWqDHpE-jm_rEyFe71KtKACG4GNqOdfiOo\u0026fid=0x0:0x427c4ddd0ae45a92"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Elizabeth Bluemle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFXbTnveHBb7p6QE2Mq4-Afd-NnL4b-ICTz6QSy94INTderzPy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In town for a conference, I desperately needed a haircut. I chose the Parlour because of their website and helpful staff profiles. Emma not only gave me a GREAT haircut, she also shared helpful tips and information about my hair that I’ll take with me forever. Everyone at the salon was friendly and my partner also got a great haircut from Janelle. Highly recommended!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Melisa Baldwin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcMCxRJl56z1cJCkaAbhQHTI1f2mAhrWbwQUxe0KB5pa4j_AM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Parlour is an amazing salon experience.  From the moment you are greeted at the door and through your entire experience, the atmosphere is warm, welcoming and professional.  Emma is an incredibly thoughtful stylist with outstanding color and cut skills.  Emma takes time to listen and to assure the cut and color fit your desires as well as your lifestyle.  I highly recommend Emma if you are visiting the Lower Downtown location!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"lee Bono","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJf32u8-oPRjK2g584G_1Qz-kU2NBwTMmD0SCDnjl3dvv9YFg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First, he listens to what you want. Really, he actually listens. And he follows through. Second, he gives you his own input, which is based on years of experience. And he puts them together and you come out looking beautiful. I’m 74 years old and he gave me an extraordinarily stylish cut. On a scale of one to 10, Jason is a 16. I will definitely be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jude Buckholz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoXJYcSf2W0wjLVMoc9M5e8f7U2HFK_ueEmdUbLqJXTM-AVEI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Emma was great! I’m super happy with my haircut! She really took the time to explain the different options for my haircut and which directions we could go for my length of hair. Would highly recommend her to any guy with medium to long hair.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kari Knutson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVuG4Db4j9NpI8AsLqRw6DpxIVDmGapdHIEvdxud-0VCWsScFI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Janelle is an amazing stylist!  My daughter wanted a professional cut and style and Janelle listened so attentively to exactly what she wanted, asked great follow up questions, and made the entire experience so special.  My daughter felt like she received the star treatment. We were so impressed not only with Janelle's talent as a stylist but also with her kindness and attentiveness. We both left feeling great about the entire experience! Thank you Janelle!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbSo8eaAlMxm8NHJ0azzBIicjhfAyKxiaYUVei\u0026fid=0x0:0x427c4ddd0ae45a92"],"When":"2024-1-10"},{"Name":"Colleen Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWehagm7LJNtL2z8DcivrEdOeMpti6buNd-HsAgGXaZJ8RiHzI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I saw Kim at the Parlour today for the first time and she was fantastic! She immediately understood what I wanted and how to manage my very fine hair. I would highly recommend a visit.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rowan McBurney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQiJBK71EmYxlthdJoL5yRYHVdasq2zaCemoEP9FXsYai7GQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mia was fantastic with helping me get the style I wanted! She gave me tips on how to get the thickness back into my hair and she was friendly and made great conversation during the cut as well!
The shop is eccentric and smells really nice! Highly recommend","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maya Willey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIOnt6r1IRe8F15kHww_nMchRmiRBCdhpwJ1wkLqGYLBrJ7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went in on October 12th, 2024 for a typical long hair cut. I had been going to Cue for over 5 years and had even brought my daughter to Babooshka to have her haircut.
I had shared a personal experience 2 appointments ago with Cue about being harassed in my neighborhood and since then, she started acting really phony.
When I mentioned it again to her at this 10/12/24 appointment she washed my hair so violently at my temples that I ended up with a severe headache for 3 days. After she did this to my temples, and I sat back in the chair for my haircut, she had the nerve to tell me, “you seem different….”  When I was just trying to deal with her bashing in my temples during the hair wash. And had not said anything or acted any differently from how I normally act.
I had considered Cue a professional until this interaction. It’s a shame she doesn’t respect long time, loyal clients especially bringing my daughter there.
I’ll never bring my daughter there again, and I’ll never trust Cue again for a haircut or anything after this abysmal experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike Denman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWisTXvWuJJSCE7t7mdIhIxl19kE9rOJxx6KKhLVxuMwB-lVUk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Can’t say enough good things about getting your hair did at Babooshka! Kait hooked me up with some of the most cosmic fun hair I’ve ever had! Very cool atmosphere, great staff, solid value for the price. Plus, entertaining time even considering the lengthy process. Well worth it! Park on Cook just north of Coldax! #BetterThanAwesome","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM-ICl5fn4GT9DF3AAFpI-YWvcinzAlp_vVLz2E&fid=0x0:0x9b062ff472ed08b7"],"When":"2021-5-8"},{"Name":"CJ Jasklos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKBl_odwzjA6K6PBbQwfBS9cMlFn4nTY-DrJgLAQ7HfkFtUfw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The owner of this shop is very unpleasant. If you want to be insulted for absolutely no reason, then deal with the owner. One thing I would suggest to the owner, is that if you are going to drive around in your car with your shops name on it, maybe you should not run red lights, break the law and then insult someone. Videos are on social media.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaXS3AFwUfH8LtaVuSpbcImPtKACtu9Blxn12OizWyOlYBViD5pQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always amazing! Kait always goes above and beyond to make you feel not only comfortable but to make sure you leave feeling better than ever. More than just a hair cut the staff is very personal with every client.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPr6Rg5SThHMYs-UqyRCP7KWiPLU2aoG0sE6QKQ&fid=0x0:0x9b062ff472ed08b7"],"When":"2021-5-3"},{"Name":"Paulina Piekarska-Léveillée","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhPxR6pBZ99NjNm446eV4RLn8Zjf_5fM8KP8t0o71Cys2wfbT6cA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently relocated from NYC to the Denver.  In NYC, I had the same stylist for 4-5 week color touch ups for more than 6 years.  Therefore,  I was looking for a new salon to call home and my expectations were high.  Babooshka did not disappoint.  I was paired with Nathaniel, a wonderful stylist who really took the time to understand my needs and goals with my color and overall hair.

The team really took the time and were very thorough. One thing I really appreciated was that the owner checked in often to ensure their process matched the color I already had and kept it as natural as possible.  Additionally, I noticed the same type of detailed, thorough attention for any other customers who came in for a color.  They really know what they're doing.

I've already had two appointments and am scheduled for my third.  I am really happy to call Babooshka my salon in my new home of Denver!

FEB 2020 UPDATE:

I have been faithfully going to Nathaniel at Babooshka for a year and a half now and cannot say enough good things. Nathaniel loves his craft, from the relationship with his client to the technicality/science of his work. He has transformed my hair/look/style from long gold blonde, shoulder length more natural blonde to dark major pixie cut and today, our favorite look, an ash blonde pixie. Wow just wow. Cannot recommend enough. You are in great hands with the whole Babooshka family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoMiH4TAGe3dIRwpy1ZJeTOxz_wyq4iqcrqn8m&fid=0x0:0x9b062ff472ed08b7"],"When":"2020-2-16"},{"Name":"Laura Salcedo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdu8A6-_4Xsg495rYMZvVPzmrN6DMpYj-uaISabrxmHdfHXOrZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a lot of hair cut off,I did not have a style in mind, I  just wanted it cut, was asked many questions to make my haircut practical and to meet my needs. So happy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOM08Pi0nrE9ATpqNOAa8aXrwa7w-Ez1mZlacnG&fid=0x0:0x9b062ff472ed08b7"],"When":"2020-3-3"},{"Name":"Jordan Warmath","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbSjNZMF_cz4VMezwczFIGNMYmoyQVNmxih4x8bMhl_NqHO5I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really great haircut and dye. Super cool decorations. All inclusive. Queer friendly. Easy street parking.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Maggie Anning","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLyu11PriCauD3X1u9CYZt2A_YhUgV97mlmQWBT7p8ROWtgw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been going to Natalia for 2 years now, and wouldn’t recommend anyone but her! She has given me the perfect “lived in” blonde look, and I couldn’t be happier. She does such an amazing job every single time!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Deb Kipp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYx0b82DhOJwjwQ4j7JixcF3cXtBcneJEkn-reRfIz3Pmqb2Wr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Natalia is AMAZING. She was kind, personable, and honest. She did exactly what I asked for and helped me feel more secure making decisions with my hair! I love what she did and highly highly reccomend. Worth every penny ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM35V8E5ih8Qcp_u8hAksOSgDi3xxY9kQvtjHdE\u0026fid=0x0:0xc8e117dd418dc222"],"When":"2022-9-7"},{"Name":"Jessica L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEH7SFFgonzKPztxCJhRVBbPiJ4rcNUg-xSiIAOn5WALScfNam=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I LOVE her!\nRecently I went to a salon and spent over 400 dollars on what was supposed to be a balayage from a \"balayage expert\". My hair was ruined. The girl killed my hair from over processing. My hair was orange dead and brassy. I was devastated.\nI reached out to Natalia and showed her how damaged my hair was.  She sat down with me and gave me suggestions on how to help the state of my hair weeks before my appointment. After my first appointment she made my hair look alive again. She has so much knowledge about what she does and is the most kind hearted person. Instead of promising me unrealistic results she actually told me how my hair was really going to come out to be because of the severe damage that had been done previous to seeing her.  After just one appointment she made my hair look gorgeous again! I asked her opinion on what kind of color and cut I should do and her face lit up with excitement as she threw out some suggestions. Not only is she amazing at color but she is ridiculously good at cutting hair. She is such a talented woman and will forever be my stylist from this point on!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKSTAIWaXasz2tQQ8rw-HSS7A6QMyVEQUJ0dgY\u0026fid=0x0:0xc8e117dd418dc222"],"When":"2017-7-25"},{"Name":"Emilie Lorden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIV1eUEw3dLGErhF5Buk7vbkD1jRtoBnwrrP5NBJtbyDWmPw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Natalia is incredible! She does the best blonde in Denver, hands down. My hair is the healthiest it’s ever been, thanks to Natalia and I always get compliments on my blonde. She’s also super sweet and professional. I cannot say enough great things about her and her work.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Haley Foutch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJbn4PqHgTF463FgtmOsmcG3IQ--GNbYapCTpzUIZRkrZSQvg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Natalia is an expert blonde stylist. I have been to a couple of hair stylist in Denver and no one was able to achieve the color I was looking for. Natalia got it during the first session. I would highly recommend Natalia!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nadya Knysh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJkGX2Yjez4FxiNfggBmo1IlHc4C4FtOc8PrLwcTRpdgSq1dRUkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Well, my best experience in Denver so far! Really love seeing Natalia! She's an outstanding professional and knows how to deal with blond hair. She's great in her techniques and I really appreciate she's always learning new things about products and coloring and pretty much everything. I feel very confident every time I go and my hair feel very grateful with very gentle approach to coloring and sophisticated treatments right after! Been a client for almost a year now and keep loving it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Krista Barthel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKWHaCPTVdPg6pgNu9LHD-XJAN53RT3Y5VIgbE_y2ZsLy7V-g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m so thankful that Natalia was recommended to me! She is so amazing at what she does. I can tell a huge difference in how she colored my hair compared to previous experiences with other stylists. The amount of attention to detail that she pays with coloring and cutting hair is incredible; and the fact that she does it all in a way that is still healthy for your hair! She made amazing hair care recommendations as well! Can’t wait to continue my hair care and coloring journey with her! HIGHLY recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Roberts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-xKqzeStQNWSCx6y3TrATGoWaWMiktXOpPFi6_t6b2Ky4Xg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I moved to Denver about a year ago and happened to find Natalia through online reviews. Specially, I was looking for someone who was known for blonde highlights. Coming from living in LA the last 5 years, I’m super picky about my color! I honestly can say that this is the best my hair has ever looked, and it’s a plus that Natalia is so clearly passionate about what she does and is such a professional. I would highly recommend her!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Crystalle Guss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWjzekdnwA_VHwJCfPmtlNsg3cXVDTrSNRB4IvV0MGC9zTC_TQa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cute location Everyone is friendly. My stylist Tiana is located at Extended Strands and she does an amazing silk press & color.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNL2QFc0l74H1tQ3odZdF5h8dYy8m92Z1Njf8Jm&fid=0x0:0x9440b70755edba96"],"When":"2023-10-6"},{"Name":"Caitlin Price","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJLOa2rcRud8ujzeLSy8gNm58sBoC1T8scaPGzkssnrvbklLg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been a tenant renting a suite here at ULS since July 2022, and as a first time suite-user (long time independent stylist), I have to say it’s been such a pleasant experience! Everyone (staff and fellow tenants included) has been super kind, welcoming and supportive. And some of my chief concerns opting into suite-rental have been non-issues; there’s a full-time support staff to greet clients/offer beverages, an ample & comfortable waiting area and they even help with towels when they can. The owner, Lindsay, is a gem and truly cares about curating a supportive experience for her tenants!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO7sCa7nki4s3dol7SkaG3eclifz4iNqvxBd9j_&fid=0x0:0x9440b70755edba96"],"When":"2023-2-11"},{"Name":"Rachel Krupka","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQFT-HGYXW25jZhNr5CsulvML9VA6KLU0rkqNlg7_qYzlFQf-Z=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"TESSA IS AMAZING. A miracle worker. My hair is living it’s best life since Tessa came into my life. From blonde to brunette, Tessa has done it all for me and she exceeds my expectations every time. If you’re looking for a new stylist I would highly recommend going to see Tessa at Marley & Co.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHEcva9iACbDaNgwNhSXCffIZrVmMRM2TM7nv2&fid=0x0:0x9440b70755edba96"],"When":"2020-7-9"},{"Name":"Omeama Whitmer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdR3Pd49duaO5XrLQkn5fFvuopAYbE0YHrWMAxQRK0JYSlsqGt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is such a cool concept for a salon. I found both my new hair stylist and lash tech here which very convenient! I see Caitlin (Caitlin Price) for my Hair and Caitlin (lashedbykai) for my lashes. One of the best haircuts I’ve gotten in my life and the best lashes that are exactly what I was used in Chicago! Definitely check them both out. The salon does validate garage parking but I’ve parked on the street easily too. Two pictures to show my bouncy fun hair and my perfect lashes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXmhb0ZFfNPd_SXHl354OsShMnjzhDeAwOW5Cz&fid=0x0:0x9440b70755edba96"],"When":"2022-8-19"},{"Name":"Brad Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXTCsX2oBakJxc3cgTE5_4L8wkkGGnfuLrVZAfSRFKClRUnqFrk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good morning,

My name is Brad. I am a frequent customer here, coming a few times a month for nail, hair, and facial services.

Let me tell you a bit about Salon Lofts. This location offers a wide range of health and beauty services. We have the best master stylists, master barbers, and hair professionals in the industry. Our team is comprised of independent business entrepreneurs. The salon itself has been serving the greater Denver area for over 10 years.

If you are looking for walk-in services, you can visit the Salon Lofts website to book appointments and find answers to general questions. If you are interested in starting your own business, please reach out to our dedicated team at Salon Lofts.

The 16th Street Mall is a great location to network with other businesses, attend conferences, and enjoy various other activities.

I hope this information is helpful. Please let me know if you have any further questions.  Again thanks for taking time to  read my review.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-KRiuqH57gWRISS0jDBKusSENfdW1p3ZU-Pkh&fid=0x0:0x9440b70755edba96"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Beth Grigg","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKkI1HBllkvFa4Gwlpuj1pcH6hIsdh-SCZHvl1emXK6_vblYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I saw Caitlin Price for highlights, a cut and brow dye. She was FANTASTIC! I have never had such a great salon experience. She truly listened to what I wanted and expertly guided me to a brand new look that I'm thrilled with. And she is a warm, caring person--I felt I made a new friend. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Genesis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKnQaFvYNDim2dClRro0cWJfFcZ2qIN8VHJeYmhxlCc_TE7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got my hair cut 3 weeks ago, and I'm coming back to leave this review because she deserves it.
Sarah Hoerle is AWESOME, She is kind, fun and has such great energy, most importantly she is skilled!! If you are looking for a place to get your hair cut or colored I'd highly recommend this place/person. You'll leave with an extra pep in your step!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan Devers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUa4ZY3p2VoXAb5HMsIMx7lcuA9GY78iN1_Y7h0hNvTHKstxrw2EA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After 10 years, I can 100% guarantee that Tiffany is one of the best I've met, both professionally and personally. To validate this review, we had zero form of connection (friend/friend-of-friend/etc...), prior to my 1st haircut with her. I would never post or review someone without 100% certainty. I highly recommend Tiffany and the team she works with to everyone and anyone. Pure talent, relationship driven and amazing value. Everything you could ask for.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Kelly Dudenhoeffer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXe8Yv1Rk2SMevS0dOr5Nf8PX3clGc8hWRXWlOybM_ILoTsCzjK=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been going to Salon Thirty Eight for 1.5 years now and I LOVE it! I was worried moving from Boston to Denver that I wouldn’t find a salon \u0026 stylist I loved as much as my Boston Salon, but I found Salon Thirty Eight and couldn’t be happier! Everyone at the salon is extremely friendly and welcoming - it’s such a warm \u0026 inviting place. Chandler \u0026 Sophie do an amazing job with my hair every time and are so kind. Chandler is always so patient answering all my questions, especially when it came to dealing with extensions which I never had before Salon Thirty Eight. (See Before \u0026 After pics of extensions! 😍) I’ve recommended the salon to my friends \u0026 will continue to do so - highly recommend if you’re in the Denver area!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOoPEeoB1FFGredAMVCfdKnLxIEw7JlI_cxpqL5\u0026fid=0x0:0x40f5ba195fc56c11"],"When":"2025-1-9"},{"Name":"Melissa McNeilly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWePwqRemU_0coIGA57qZOp7Rk0JCi7D4cpw6YVl6Fiw5hZK8gc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I started going to Caitlin through a referral and wanted someone who could transition me from blonde to copper red. I’ve NEVER gone red before and this was a big change for me. I felt so comfortable, was able to thoroughly talk through the process and get exactly what I wanted, as well as some recommendations to maintain the red. The salon itself is also very cute with great products and has a “salon dog” that will keep you company even on your lap. Overall really happy with the transition to a new place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSDWExfAe5o9ovGEyqeHbtEJvLzzBV7eALuCe4\u0026fid=0x0:0x40f5ba195fc56c11"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Tiara Streng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKpXfKqUOa3ANCmh-gocDzFGXvE6NgPk1XdbX5O56xiOqO1ISuXA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Elora is the best at what she does! I’ve seen her for haircuts, highlights, and coloring and I leave feeling like a cutie little snack every time 😍 I recommend her to anyone and everyone that is looking for an amazing and detailed stylist. Salon Thirty Eight also has the most welcoming atmosphere and cute aesthetics. It’s truly the best.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"McKenna Botts","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcLNI9Eebp16galbkZlMhRMl6eZLgBlFKb_AUUuGE8ZjoqjqU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Salon thirty eight does a great job with hair blowouts! I have gotten my hair washed and styled there a ton and every time I get the perfect blowout. They are perfect at the large curl/beach wave blowout.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"linda Foster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocICLgpcrleZnYGRESLwyVfSMcqxWx30f9f2dLIHz5Bu5kqZbg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Summer is the best hair stylist I have ever had. She’s so knowledgeable and helpful, sweet and so very optimistic. She knows the latest styles for a mature woman as well as the younger set. It is always such a pleasure to go into her shop. So glad she is here in Denver.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rhilee Baker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUWCvqbCp3jBeLGY0iqsgNsObFFgrPuYaFWktPW-pgmQ8h4tXX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Salon Thirty Eight is the best! Everyone here is so nice, the salon is super cute, and the products they use are amazing. Elora has been doing my hair for years. Definitely go see her for your color - she is so so talented and you won’t be disappointed! I have brunette hair and she always does an amazing job with my balayage. Love this salon and Elora!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Madison Mooney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyuMES6Lgck-IuF1ahvQ32MMTvoCfCszOeAlnDky-9jo45AnnmYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I moved to Denver from Chicago and was so worried I wouldn’t be able to find a salon that could do my blonde the right way- but Chandler is absolutely incredible. My blonde is bright, my extensions are always incredible, and salon thirty eight is literally my happy place. If you’re on the fence go get a blowout from literally any stylist and see for yourself- vibes are unmatched!!! 12/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6JgRVf0AgZSUVDi4H67PFEmB0ZUyWylDl2StD\u0026fid=0x0:0x40f5ba195fc56c11"],"When":"2023-4-5"},{"Name":"Alix Jonusas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVjGFyFv70fqUpK7DFkUdWxC-oUOmXx50MwVfzvHxDHqDf7yliE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Elora is the absolute best! She listened to my wants, needs, concerns, and effortlessly walked me through the process of how to get my hair back to a great place to focus on growth and health! My cut and color was exactly what I was envisioning and more. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Sydney Milham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQU4MAX7yuUar9iUVRlWixmOahXch836UV3IfDAcSAJ4DuvOs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was born with naturally blonde hair, but over time, it began to darken. For two years, I resorted to box dyes before seeking professional help at another salon. Unfortunately, that experience left my already fine and fragile hair severely bleached and damaged. Thankfully, I found Shay at Dew Salon. As evident in the “before” photos, my hair appeared lifeless, discolored, and unhealthy. After Shay’s expertise, my hair is now shiny, fuller, and, most importantly, healthy! Shay is approachable and truly understands my hair needs. I am so committed to her services that I fly from California every three to four months just to have my hair done by Shay. I eagerly anticipate continuing my hair journey with Shay and Dew Salon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsrP4MfNXEybgTA1-56fHwaZO5zCjuTLWWjATP\u0026fid=0x0:0xd90325f41531227f"],"When":"2025-3-19"},{"Name":"Alison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjViM1tNADd58-cA3uZyB7ukpBrjfq8gE7yK_gd5omnbaq8jARGrzg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing!! I am so happy I found this wonderful salon. They taught me how to do my curls for the very first time (I’m in my mid-30s) and it feels like such a powerful reclaiming of my natural hair texture. I also got a color service and it came out beautifully, even better than expected. I had never gotten my hair colored before but I trusted them and their super clean products. I’m so happy with the result and will definitely make this my go-to salon from now on.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbEYunDQqoSri4orDyYlwZFJsviV0dYAzPrHRG\u0026fid=0x0:0xd90325f41531227f"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Angela Golinvaux","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXDv4BLdBRSZJkOCQ0r6gAsRXD1n_PyVUFzF_F8qd7cM_PP83P=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cindy is absolutely amazing!!!!   I always leave feeling relaxed and refreshed.  My hair has never been healthier.   Love her condition treatments and curly hair cuts are wonderful.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cabrina Rojo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKXqQckhRUm-qqR7Z4259gCQvczUnrfDz10Paar86GcZsvrSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had very good experience at Dew salon with stylist Cindy Koder . She was very attentive  made me feel as if i was in good hands from the very  beginning.listened to my wants  and gave suggestions. She is very personable sweet and kind. Cindy was so gracious and didn't debate with me when I questioned Cindy and didn't think she did a specific service on my hair and i  later did realize she actually did do it , and even though I was in the wrong, she never got rude or testy with me and handled it with true professionalism! I highly recommend dew salon and Cindy Koder.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica Press","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6jYcdSkghtH_D841N68Bkd8bewf1Xzve8880IM1bh32_g2ZBRfA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love going to Dew Salon. I recently went for a blow out with Amanda and she did a great job! I always feel great after being amongst the ladies at Dew.  Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lori Charette","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXECpXe7Uj9oWFY0POplXl-Iv1XsR8sT2PHkLs51AV1OpP_qb0_6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"All I can say is, Amanda is a phenomenal hair stylist! I have been following her for the past 15 years. Basically, I can't even consider going anywhere else. I have thin, fine hair and she not only knows how to cut it so it looks it's best for me, but she does an Amazing job with my color! I have never had anyone create such a soft beautiful blonde before while KEEPING MY HAIR HEALTHY! These things matter when you have thin, fine hair! She is always such a joy to be around (the best personality) ... I always leave feeling beautiful \u0026 pampered♡♡♡","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Madeline Brik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDHHpgFPbLrydpUrnjhkKGckaziECroUjbnOQRdKobYUJjmEAX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"love getting my curly cut with Cindy! she's a great person to chat with and always makes the experience very relaxing. I find the prices to very reasonable and always feel like my curls are refreshed after the appt","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"R. Eldridge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJPdBR9nYpp0OETRa1ANePCJqE0kcDGiJ_idYH9KesiyvXTLmzo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cindy is the consummate artist in hairstyling. She takes pride in what she is doing. user_reviews: [{"Name":"Taylor Lynn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJlSlDEbTU6jSDlcDqSNAp9RNsic-ISOKFEmGAnGAMMGJmgXPw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"LOVE IT HERE!!! I see Elizabeth regularly for my haircut and colouring needs. I have been seeing her for almost 5 years and I will never see another stylist. She takes wonderful care to listen to my concerns, wants and needs during our appointments. I always feel welcome and at ease. Pricing is always very clear upfront and in my opinion, some of the most reasonable in all of Denver. I never leave the salon unsatisfied which is really saying something because hair is so particular to identity and Elizabeth and Soko Salon really understand that. My hair looks healthier, prettier and fuller thanks to the care and advice of Elizabeth. I have been to other salons in the greater Denver area and I’m telling you, it’s not worth the time, money or tears you’re going to sacrifice going somewhere else. I would highly consider giving the salon a try if you’re looking for beautiful and healthy results every time and to leave with a smile.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"catherine bonta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmqOrgKBgT3yggrHRNLkjZuP3Kj_C4aSKbseyj-QeBkpMXDL21=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Probably one of the best salons I’ve been to in my life. I am absolutely obsessed with soko and all their hairstylist. Olivia has been doing my hair since I moved to Denver and she is just an absolute SLAY. Not only is she just really good at what she does, she is such an engaging stylist, she has good input and great style so you can trust her with anything! I also have to give curls for their impressive time management. Liv literally just floats around the salon and makes it look so effortless. It’s female owned, female run. You feel so at home as soon as you walk in. They just have the best vibes. Love these girlies!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Courtney Stanton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUApgJXWBrcp0SExMyDrTOv7HfNLc54Vrqt0ro6S9ejzJMv77c=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been seeing Liv since 2017! She is the first and only person I have let color my hair! I went from seeing her about every 5 months to every 3 months! I love that every time isn't the same service and she truly caters to what my hair needs! That has ranged from baby lights to a full balayage! She has given me the perfect low maintenance blonde! Liv is truly so talented and now that I live out of state, I will still be traveling back just for her services! I couldn't recommend her enough!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwe6AlA1XHnXZ7hwYPdGJfzlys7byClMvbKeUb\u0026fid=0x0:0xa42ae5fef52363db"],"When":"2022-8-13"},{"Name":"AZIA JUAREZ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUfQYVRwG-PV-v3ZAXETcmILXH14S68j_MCwx5ZipLocxTw1w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Can't say enough great things about Liv! This was my first professional haircut in years and I was in for a huge chop - after researching different salons and stylists I finally found Soko and I am soooo thankful I did. The salon was so welcoming, Liv was so friendly and amazing and of course, I'm totally obsessed with my short hair!! Thank you Liv! 🖤","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kori Pothour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjXfYkPVghr9Mwoy8zw01qLuHtmA0mNpVD9oBJNIMosVFYuA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Elizabeth always makes my hair feel and look amazing! Not only is she incredibly talented, but also makes the whole experience comfortable and enjoyable. Highly recommend! Soko Salon has such a cute and cozy vibe - the shop dog, Maple Syrup, is an added bonus!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chloe Hampton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIalIIOCSlItuL4SBf79-MT86aVrmN0pM1BqVb6h1jF2g4x-hwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Liv has been my stylist for years now, and I could not be happier with her and her team at Soko. I started seeing her as a broke college kid that could only get a couple of basic haircuts a year, and now we hang out every 6 weeks while she maintains my platinum blonde color. During that time she’s seen my hair through short and long phases, bangs, natural color, and low maintenance balayage. It’s cheesy, but my hair has grown up with Liv! Whether it’s been a quick trim or multi-hour color appointment, she’s never failed to make me feel at ease in the chair and confident with my hair. Book her now!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2enp6oPqb1MkVStqM4l8fYAicfy8PGjFo3Ws5\u0026fid=0x0:0xa42ae5fef52363db"],"When":"2022-8-13"},{"Name":"Christina Herrera","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6hINHzQz_eAOKRzDghg4fEW9e_kPlrRZv39PkT2H7lmC9sjiM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Liv is a master at what she does. She took my hair from over bleached and over processed to healthy and a more suitable shade to complement my skin tone. She’s knowledgeable and invested in her craft, keeping up on the latest techniques and trends. The salon is bright, airy and comfortable and located on a super walkable street with ample metered street parking. Can’t wait for my next appointment because it’s magic each time!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fabiola Yanez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpLs-Wf-RT2H1_6f789OZcwOg2YzVg2fabrhInpiReqG1rbw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a great group of people, very nice services! Liv has been my stylist and she does an amazing job.\n\nAnd now my hair is amazing and is exactly what I wanted. I will be a forever customer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHcqWxDAV-kzojcCH_roMLlTazkjM0mnk9Bq2L\u0026fid=0x0:0xa42ae5fef52363db"],"When":"2023-6-27"}]

Elle did my hair for my wedding and did a phenomenal job!! I also got my extensions in pre-wedding and they’re absolutely amazing. The best extensions I’ve had. I’d highly recommend for color, extensions and bridal hair needs!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYuFCgFD-Smb7Osvch1z24Ek3WUnYIcQOWQ3I2\u0026fid=0x0:0x1b84d65c41b203a1"],"When":"2025-1-24"},{"Name":"Em Thurby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7Co_zK5cgbcxJH0xVhRQF6P1njiihrgMwpnmHyUtvsmPQHA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Elle was AMAZING! Perfect communication, showed up at my house on time and ready to go, and just blended with my bridal party perfectly! She made the morning so fun, stress free, and our hair looked STUNNING all day!! Can’t recommend her enough!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnwPOOlpUPazEQlH9yOfFkDQNU-g48mDpcezqv\u0026fid=0x0:0x1b84d65c41b203a1"],"When":"2024-10-21"},{"Name":"Danee Arevalo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3xBMJo20hLZbidBk_iEMRaL0lk-3EpQTcBuoOlN9nJ3hY1o-w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Elle was AMAZING! I was recommended her on instagram after searching for someone to do my hair for maternity photos. She was so easy to book with, has the BEST personality, and she did an amazing job on my hair! I highly recommend her to do your hair for all your important events 😍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEjQIwYX1m5WVJkNK6QYvkxNLKwX78VJnnLtuM\u0026fid=0x0:0x1b84d65c41b203a1"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Yubi Ventura","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVqLgMXbrYw1p9snhzr55gDIUBo9ovLNXr_PhPRtqhlCZhUSbtY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m so happy I found Elle, best hairstylist and colorists in Denver! Elle takes the time to listen to your hair vision and brings it back to life! I can trust her with my hair touch ups and cuts! I highly highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_cs7SNU-vt-DA16nydRtEpKoQtXXdlSN99vb9\u0026fid=0x0:0x1b84d65c41b203a1"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Zoe Ray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKklPjg6xkLludyHtwXtJjnwO-EGgddqCFnOHLx5YxGce-VFw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In the realm of wedding preparations, the significance of a skilled hairstylist cannot be overstated. My recent experience with ELLE, my hairstylist, exemplified, how professional expertise can enhance not only one’s aesthetic, but also overall confidence on such a momentous occasion. I was immediately struck by her warm demeanor and meticulous attention to detail. Elle took the time to understand my vision for my bridal hairstyle, engaging in an open dialogue that allowed me to express my preferences while benefiting from her seasoned advice. Elle’s execution surpassed all expectations. Her precision and artistry transformed my hair into a masterpiece that harmonized beautifully with my attire. The compliments I received throughout the day were a testament to her talent. I wholeheartedly recommend Elle as an exceptional bridal hairstylist, her professionalism and passion for her craft are evident in every strand she styles.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNS825fnXdp3x_t5n1wAzS7-OkyRYUUj8kcItbA\u0026fid=0x0:0x1b84d65c41b203a1"],"When":"2024-8-12"},{"Name":"Ashley Gunson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJO1W8HGuB0pc_IHH9prFzkTqZ-UMlvD7S68f5f2P_7Amkn2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Elle is absolutely amazing! She did such a fantastic job with my color and cut. She took her time and listened to what I wanted. I haven’t been this happy with my hair in years and have received so many compliments. Elle is an excellent stylist and her salon is so comfortable and friendly. I left my first appointment with the best hair and felt like I just chatted with a friend for two hours! I honestly can’t wait for my next appointment!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gabriela Santillan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQcF0LGF8RuvFrDva2_KitvQpvlcCNjLI02IQA9kXThHxOKodG5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Elle has such a great personality! Always take’s into account what you want to do with your hair along with tweaks she thinks will work best! Every time I have concerns with my hair…heaviness, buildup, dryness she knows the best products to recommend.\n\nHer facility is always clean tidy and she has great style. And always sticks to her schedule. Wouldn’t go anywhere else.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nick \u0026 Taylor TZ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKH2tahMfL1Xu4gW-lJtYC8KaxW0uneXH9L_Mx5pylbPAowTg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am SO glad I found Elle! I am newer to Colorado and i was looking to get my hair to my perfect blonde for my wedding. I was recommended Billy Salon via a Facebook bridal group, and I am so glad I was! Elle was immediately excellent with communication leading up to my appointment, and talked me through everything so well. I have seen her twice now, the second time was right before my wedding, and she outdid herself. The perfect cut and color for my big day. Not only is she excellent at what she does, but she is SO fun to be around. Our conversations are so good, and she is an extremely good host. The studio is so cute. The parking situation is incredible with a lot in the back, I’ve never had issues. The photos are from both sessions. The one with my hair down was from my first session, photo with my hair up is about a week after my second session on the evening of my wedding day, and then a photo from my wedding day Please go see Elle, she has made me so confident with my hair. You will not regret it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPw9Qw2-sTEml09iPwDxDHMrTxlLCVpvvYoDNfr\u0026fid=0x0:0x1b84d65c41b203a1"],"When":"2024-5-27"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Alyssa Haro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKS6bLA-LJRV_v13PV2oTvcmKgtYYcrHJGzJ6qgsbHfu5P7gw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Savannah has done my hair for 2+ years and NEVER disappoints me! Not only is she great at her job, she is so welcoming, kind and really cares about your hair. Her balayage/highlights are the best, she’s taken me from brunette, to blond, pink and back. The whole salon is great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMCOY9l8NJZIyVVye6vLwU9sDFY6FOYV8P3b51h\u0026fid=0x0:0xdeb0c07c41a0f388"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Kayla Major","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvqAozlIuRxcP44c47HRAKf5M386vY-_NgVzSslp_P-HzxYrHZ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve had the pleasure of using Savannah for years, and I can confidently say she is an exceptional stylist. Each appointment is a wonderful experience; she consistently delivers beautiful results, no matter what I ask for. Her attention to detail and understanding of my preferences truly set her apart. If you’re looking for someone who genuinely cares about your hair and provides outstanding service, I highly recommend Savannah for all your hair needs!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNia83SLL8xok4XsGa6ve5QzhsIErME_mGxipuW\u0026fid=0x0:0xdeb0c07c41a0f388"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Maria Cline","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdgYyfwt12chPBLqlWkB3ID7uoLyeAuz0ljPmI2S1-ub9_uO0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time at this salon and it was a great experience. The salon itself is beautiful, street parking was easy on a Friday morning, selection of great products, and the owner came over to introduce herself which was very sweet and comforting.  I saw Grace for my appointment, who is absolutely delightful, I am so happy I did because she nailed it. Listened to all of my wishes for my hair and elevated it with her expertise. I tried a pastel pink for the first time and was nervous for the change but Grace was very confident and assured of the end result, I couldn’t be happier with how it turned out! Thank you so much Grace! Would recommend her and this salon to anyone. 11/10\nSo happy to have found a stylist I can trust as a newcomer to the area.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Caroline Cooksey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL30dTxwmMOQyLfbNekcErJnKIY_l2bOCobLt4Rr-hk4tY9iw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been a client of Grace for 3+ years now, and I am INCREDIBLY happy with her professionalism, attention to detail, and uplifting attitude every time I see her. She not only delivers what I ask for but makes the entire experience so fun when you sit in her chair (time flys by with her!). All the girls at Envogue are warm, inviting, encouraging, and feel like family! Book with Grace!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Allison Suzanne Herman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKw0e3hvUCgq3Mu6lIHh_orz9DMPgRflHxYmBRITSrf2CnweA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love this place! Not only is their entire staff extremely talented, they are friendly, professional and welcoming. I have been coming to En Vogue for over 5 years. Sylvie is fantastic for blondes and does amazing work on all kinds of extensions. Calli, the owner, is one of the most professional business owners I have ever met. She is nurturing to her staff and creates a bond and network of professionals (both in and outside the beauty industry).","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jade Allen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILHO365zMdHY-B5lqfLGWTqQt9kkwrqaOiRtY5mWE0GWCd-g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Envogue, and I couldn’t be happier with my experience. Having just moved from Ireland, where I had the same hairdresser for over ten years, I was quite nervous about finding someone who understood my particular needs, especially for my blonde color. Grace was amazing! She listened carefully to what I wanted, reassured me throughout the process, and the results were fantastic. I also appreciated that they use Schwarzkopf products as I have been using their products for years. I’m thrilled to have found someone I can trust with my hair. Thank you, Grace, for your attention to detail and skill! Highly recommend Envogue, it’s such a lovely experience from start to finish.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"suzanne west","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7KLgksSo6T8CvByoevQZ4jt-3jLHZPTzEdkARZoZBpv9CHgDZ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been coming here for years!  Sylvie is a pro stylist and excellent at color and extensions. I love a very bright blonde color and she nails it every time!  100% recommend going to Sylvie and Salon Envogue Salon🩷🩷🩷","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Debbie Gonday","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLd63zKYHRW8Jh3nSiRrotur8espudcYEPe1vaUrC4zfncztQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been going to Savannah for 8+ years and she is my one and only hair magician. She has transitioned me from a dark brown box color to a beautiful silver/gray and my hair is always vibrant and healthy, never dull or brassy.  She has been able to color/cut/style me through all phases of short-medium-long hair and is spectacular with my curly and unruly hair.  On top of being skilled she’s also genuine, friendly, caring, focused and passionate and I always look forward to seeing her.  She is an artist inside and out and I highly recommend her.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Renee Alexander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMdv92jg3PhtRNasHVAU66UNDUUMCPko0SlYZD3YCmgkzzQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kelly is incredible! I’ve gotten SO many compliments on my curls ever since she started doing my hair! She’s super knowledgeable and will give really helpful tips throughout our appointment.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Cohen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiLJ4s9HLkE74NRn7mX7JJBcX1bMoNdaA0PHc0hwxPXVeHR4yStg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My daughter had the most incredible cut and style with Cierra. This was the first time she’d been to someone who specialized in curly hair, and it was worth it. It was night and day from going to a traditional stylist.\nCierra listened to her, and the result was beautiful. My daughter was in awe of her curls. We couldn’t recommend Cierra enough.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVXOvK6rFFw4fVtjijhxFoOXABW-CBCViFKDoa\u0026fid=0x0:0x2dbfbc648fc8e44"],"When":"2025-1-12"},{"Name":"Paloma Chandrachud","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVu8TGZn3Rm0dv2sTNiffmLBKDzjBC1fOuFd9voknThkhSeQYqR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely loved the whole experience! Kelly is an absolute goddess when it comes to curly hair! She was amazing and made me feel so comfortable throughout the whole process! So glad I finally found a place!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rachael Ardanuy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIu6ca7PPeqPAF9DMlPnfFW2mj0GGX-qvauC1Z6H4vIRltFeA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been seeing Erik for curly haircuts since 2016.  Seeing him create his vision for Devana Salon has been an inspiration.  He has a professional and welcoming crew of curly hair experts.  Even though I moved an hour away, I still come to Devana for my curly hair cuts.  Very grateful for Erik and Devana Salon!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Victoria Mattiuzzo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLzFULNMCmjcDnCu9fo1GJWD6pP0xgVDeDtGNrRUvS60mvzZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Without a doubt and without exaggeration, this was the absolute best curly haircut I have ever had in my life! My hair was so damaged and Cierra brought it back to life. Thanks to her magic, I will actually wear my hair curly from now on! She is a wizard and hair genius! Erik was also so kind and welcoming and it was an overall lovely experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Melissa Wood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUx3ay1aJTE4rkjAlFKdIJvjncGIn5Y_zsNSxrVEtG-8X20Pf-9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my first cut from a curly-only salon and what a big difference it makes. Cierra was able to coax out ringlets that I hadn't seen in years. They looked fantastic and healthy, instead of frizzy and stringy.\nI'm able to replicate the results at home and areas that weren't previously curling have joined the curl party. I haven't had a bad hair day since she cut it -- and for us curly girls -- you KNOW that's huge.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMF978R8FsvyBPV913IWDaMa9gIXJyp7dpi_D5w\u0026fid=0x0:0x2dbfbc648fc8e44"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Kendall Barger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCdAeAYHgDC5P0ynWQfsp1ViqGOszYvn5sdMMu9MqLyeMea8NN=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got a curlyprint cut from Yasmin a couple of weeks ago, and it was amazing!! She did a phenomenal job - she walked me through her analysis of my kind of curls and hair density and my part. She created great frame for my face shape and adding volume through the cut. She's super friendly and communicative and attentive. I'll be so happy to go back to her when it's time for my next trim / cut!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOs1vas-qZ22WAOujgXFJ0QPr_z4CZEbjIDHbgu\u0026fid=0x0:0x2dbfbc648fc8e44"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"R P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuE1IHV_E-k8OAXqNJ0dDKZ08c6vpbaXlrKhLYhHhxF-D3mMo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It is a pretty salon with friendly stylists. I got a beautiful cut and my hair was taken care of pretty well with curl friendly products. I have to take one star off because the highlights were too dark more like a brown tone versus what I initially wanted, a light blond color. Erik approached the situation in a very professional manner and agreed to refund the money partially. This won’t change the color of my hair but I think it was very fair to offer that resolution to a client.","Images":null,"When":""}]
