user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Stephanie Loy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6Sb7cFQ-smTICvrqepPvbf-3LxQfbC-p9eH1Ha8AHSW7XPg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sharon is a fantastic hair stylist, I went in for a simple hair cut and she got me out of my comfort zone to try something new called a shag. The haircut came out so beautiful and she makes her clients feel good and beautiful. Thank you for the wonderful haircut again. I pray that this business flourishes, she really does care about how a woman looks and feels about a haircut.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Juan Barrera Barker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWPWsga6tFpqJF4hsTNCgAcWONRYtUd6ROgk-ncWNS1PHhSrAX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Awful haircut. Do not come here if you have curly hair. Hair dresser doesn’t know what shes doing and practically cuts away all length and volume and leaves hair a wreck. I showed her a picture as a reference and it didn’t even come close to the image. Please stay away.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrew Karas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwskYUF39Ar3TdYDYm-AwREEhwQHiypARPeFedfsoUFXmmZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sharron was amazing! Excellent customer service and a haircut I’m beyond happy with! Thank you London Alley Salon!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"SHBoudek","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVF7elwh_wPFksyTK1LKeSf8KEX1Rm4NSKQ6Bp1NFGOfug8-PP-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have short, fine, curly hair (which many have a hard time with), and Sharon did a fantastic job with my cut.  One of the pros is how she started with a dry cut and then washed my hair.  She listened well to what I wanted, which included fixing some things from a previous haircut at another salon, and the end result looked great.  I also really liked how cozy the salon was and how friendly her staff is.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashley Fox","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUm4JXyFrNrm8NhqLWaY91IC3Z5bE24p4eqbBPESvm1RhJo0mD0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owners of London Alley Salon are extremely kind folks. They saw me for a walk-in and everything about the experience was positive! Very talented and professional.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christoph P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXD5saHX80ILJir9z7DyhxNzhThqyr9S1ViriWPZDezh34dbgI4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sharon is incredible. We had to reschedule due to a snowstorm and she was amazingly accommodating at rescheduling as soon as possible. I came to her to help me find a new, more feminine hairstyle while I transition and Sharon was both supportive and helped figure out what was right for me- she is a great hairdresser and you can tell that she cares about the people she serves.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nick Eiler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXvENHcTq7I52aNlxK8eav1RKWp4881-nwoeMnZxNvUGMTQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Krista and the crew at London Alley are incredibly nice and welcoming. I was recommended from another friend and decided to give it a shot. I got a great cut from Randy and felt right at home in the friendly atmosphere. I’ve finally found my spot in Denver for hair care. I can’t say enough about this place or the people and I will recommend them to all my friends!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Linda Cecile","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSGWjdyPZbnNPvsqhZbRMYdO2JhcoKvHChm10lOg8Yhl8LPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I happened on this salon

about 3 years ago. I will never go anywhere else. Sharon is the owner and amazing stylist. Whether you have a vague idea or pictures, she knows how to do your do!!
Warm, friendly small salon
I'm a loyal patron

friendly poace LllSAdditioAddition this is a warm","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Edee Anesi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXurhbAqJraz-YsO35MAD-fJSWzrCiT4NCcW7mzoxtDW6Ryk8iR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely LOVE Trademarc Salon! From the moment you walk in, the entire team is welcoming, professional, and incredibly skilled. Thomas is an absolute genius when it comes to hair – I always leave with gorgeous results and feeling totally confident. Highly recommend this salon to anyone looking for top-notch service and flawless hair. 10/10!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Hicks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3RolKtRAup8TH32xg2hJyvk8agU5hqytgJlLGqAHXUAy0masX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been coming to T for years and he never misses. He’s collaborative with my ideas I have for myself but puts his professional touch on it effortlessly. I always leave his chair feeling like the best version of myself. Could not recommend him enough as a stylist and good human to surround yourself with","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Barb Dowski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGZKdeQFpWNy0Ms1-ak_Mt81VRfKOovzQLBp1bBZ3GrwsaRg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Andres is the best there is. Can’t say enough about how talented he is! I’ve been his client for six years now and drive three hours from home to get my hair cut because he does such a fantastic job with my hair. This is the ONLY salon to go to in the Denver Metro as clients rave about all the stylists.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emie Friedman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4O4_cmYmVT5JGxkfYk_lrQTo1_tGh9MBWAM1ACKEUfm86HEpr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Andres (Andy) does a most meticulous job on my unruly curly hair.  I drive from Boulder to this salon in Denver.  Andy takes his time and really has an eye for shaping my curls.  I do appreciate his ability to take my hair and make something manageable.  5 stars for this salon and Andy!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Ezzat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX449FJtxsKAEugangqPjiBfre1vbBK_zhnldO4YLrWM1jgE7M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Marc offers a wealth of knowledge on hair; from complex hair procedures such as Japanese hair straightening to stylish cuts and vibrant hair colors. His new studio is sleek, welcoming and incredibly comfortable.  His conversations are always fun and intelligent, and I always leave feeling satisfied and confident.  Keep up the great work Marc!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Megan P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFLJhmzyaC82RyenI_fMV4RG5xBs3_pwb1GfwHY_wDMs-sSS5y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hannah is the very best! I always leave her chair feeling beautiful and loving my cut and color. It’s hard to find someone who can lighten without making brunettes look brassy, but Hannah knows what she’s doing! Highly recommend going to see her for all of your hair needs :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVU2ImxRemohLbZ2b25LxI1DMZ21cqWh1kYZfT3Icx4Og0jCgE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lisa is talented and an expert at her craft. She’s been cutting my hair for 8 years and I now drive almost a hour just see her. I love my hair every time and always look forward to chatting with her during the appointment.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrea Fedele","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMMUE_NUPlfTqtAr_hclURx2a-sbUfXFNBr707SXFnIJWnwAS3mA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lisa is a pro, super fun, and listens but adds her own advice which I have learned to always take 😊 She always makes my balayage look natural but stand out fab. So experienced and talented.  Highly recommend!  I drove to Boulder for many years just to see her so very happy she is in Denver now!","Images":null,"When":""}]

open_hours: {"Friday":["9 AM–7 PM"],"Monday":["Closed"],"Saturday":["9 AM–7 PM"],"Sunday":["Closed"],"Thursday":["9 AM–7 PM"],"Tuesday":["9 AM–7 PM"],"Wednesday":["9 AM–7 PM"]}

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Madison Zeinert","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTvLQB3oN7grl0TXL9j1sNTo0kYArEIMIgxfBMyjiAmpLbTvC_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Austin is amazing! Truly one of the best stylists I’ve had. I started seeing Austin almost two years ago for cut and highlight services and every time I leave the salon I feel so pleased with my hair. He has always listened to my hair goals and requests and consistently delivers. He is incredibly thorough too - his attention to detail is on point. Isla Salon is an overall great experience with a beautiful space, hospitable employees and awesome products. I would recommend Austin & Isla Salon to everyone!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jade Kolb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEIUHtD_8Oo6N_L7qhu8yDLKA8lZ5pZKAmaAGjjhvJQL0pT-a9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Celia is truly beyond incredible in every way. Not only does she bring warmth, intelligence, and kindness into everything she does, but she’s also an absolute color genius and extension queen. Her talent for transforming hair with flawless color and extensions is unmatched, making her a true artist in her craft. She has an amazing ability to make everyone around her feel seen and valued, always bringing positive energy into every situation. Her passion and creativity are inspiring, and I’m incredibly lucky to have her in my life.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzocf2RyXu8GPFtropKw92cwhozKqZdJCeHQ4&fid=0x0:0x693d2383e0200309"],"When":"2024-9-18"},{"Name":"Alyssa Noelle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKL6Iw9ojEaGMe0Bd4sdkD_-Mdj6Vd03_M0MFRwkAV8Fk0uSw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an amazing experience with Tania! In just a few hours she changed my hair from this awful red color I did at home to the exact shade of blonde that I was hoping for. She also trimmed my hair exactly the amount I asked for- I'm growing my hair out, so I really appreciated that she was careful not to cut off too much. My hair was terrible and then she made it look even better than I thought it could. Very grateful I booked with her!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Brittany Steggerda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOe5lnu8HSr6aTd43Vk_sqIReX0LifHSVpfB-0oDlgtJ7YvsDb2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Emma is the best there is! Don’t be fooled she doesn’t only do Blondes! She was able to take my hair from almost red to a neutral brown in time for my wedding and I couldn’t be happier. I won’t go anywhere else in Denver. Would highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSXqJdD6OucAI6bq6dYt4AcIIBjjXyu7Mv_rVe&fid=0x0:0x693d2383e0200309"],"When":"2024-9-14"},{"Name":"Cammie Heale","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6YyFtyzkWlRPw-79R8U_FXR3uq2cgdB3uG6PzPf8dJrKTwg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Run as fast as you can from this salon if hair extensions are what you are seeking! This may be a beautiful salon inside, but it is not a reflection of the quality of their hair . I have been getting hair extensions for four years and the hair that Isal sells and offers is complete garbage! Two sets of hair were completely ruined after just two washes. They first tried to say that maybe the toner was left on too long. Then they tried to say that maybe it was dried incorrectly (should be able to rough dry hair before using round brush) and they said this blew the cuticle after 2 weeks!  All I know is if you are looking for good hair this is not the place. I spent so much money replacing hair here. It is absolutely sad. They also do not stand by their product, so if their hair becomes ruined for no apparent reason after just a few weeks, they will not replace it. The website indicates that their hair is not Remy human hair. I have since moved on to a salon that offers Bello Haven remy human hair extensions and I am happy to report that they are completely different and the best quality! I could say more about this salon, but I am choosing to keep the focus on the horrible hair quality. The image is after 2 washes, all I did was sit in the car to come home from dinner. It also looked like this when I arrived at dinner and had to keep brushing the tangles and matting out throughout my dinner, it was embarrassing. It just clumped into balls constantly,  simply by breathing. My new hair and other hair I have had in the past has NEVER done this, and I rough dry before smoothing. I also want to add that I used all the recommended products and oiled my hair as instructed. I don’t have the money to just not take care of my hair I buy, so I’m very good at doing what’s right to keep it healthy. I also want to add that the first stylist I had indicated other clients were complaining too and they were also dismissed. The new place I go also mentioned that they get a lot of Isla’s dissatisfied clients. Don’t judge a book by it’s cover at Isla, what you see and what you get don’t align.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTJ1oxbEtAGknBhqy6qf-ReAzqcDmo7c19Jy4H&fid=0x0:0x693d2383e0200309"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Molly Matelski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtSgzaCECMDEI3pJgXm68kRyvRGfm40ZzdpZKYz30Cfc5lEhWU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lacey Ham was my stylist and she is awesome! My color is perfection and I love my cut! She listened to what I wanted and helped make it my reality. I will be back!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jennifer bhikarry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLKMfwlT843hUX_-UiNTWaosl1bzxSp9yjjzCRyhvJK4F7qOQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First of all, I am glad that Isla salon even exists. I called with a lot of reticence. I showed up and was amazed. If, we, Black girls/women are looking through the windows, we would not be able to give our natural hair a chance. GEt IN AND INQUIRE. Heather did a phenomenal job with my hair. No need to tell you how worry I was. I met Heather and thought I was taking a chance. What's the percentage of a White female do yo my hair? Did I say that? Absolutely, I did. I had a haircut ( my hair was falling out). She saved most of my hair, shampooed and styled it. I was calling the whole world while she was doing my hair and I guess my friends and families were happier than I was.
Thank you Heather for taking care of my unhealthy hair.
Diversity rules. Pure talent. All inclusive. PROFESSIONALISM= HEATHER

Thanks Isla for having a stylist such as Heather.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Morgan Boyer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI5NsGe9ZJ7X_Sl7MauBdTVLYwWDqMtgCQ7NK5X1WjRUqfgUA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I started going to Asher about a year ago, and I am SO glad I did. He is so attentive to detail, and always makes my visions come true. My hair has never been happier and healthier! I recommend him to all of my friends!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tamara Dunn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhzBqsi2CjHq8DnTQwP2sIXKWZNk52L1D5_5TwfdLjvE64aTVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Diana does a great job with my curly, coily hair. I feel great and confident after each haircut.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsxc-Oxy22Y3HrBRKClDIp6HbluhUd6lWFNz8r&fid=0x0:0xf27aafbc1a3dee11"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Lacey Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXe5fwPnl-1cIHwGY9SRLOkCDgNcYmHeCbpnhQwSxMMM4jT-J_y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update! This salon is such a gem. All of the stylists are absolutely so talented and so sweet. (Darcey, Katie, Erin and Diana)  I have had a service from every one of them.  I love the new look and feel of the salon. Erin the owner did a great job! I can’t wait to book my next appointment, I am long overdue. ❤️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Erika Dehmel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIgzWjNqBUqNFUTswXO-fz5delHOzaZMtTjISBX-0SXqnDLVw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to Lucky Lu's for the first time this past weekend. I booked my appointment with Katie based on positive reviews I read about her. The salon is comfortable and parking was no problem. I had her chop off maybe 8-10 inches of hair. It's now a very short bob which is what I asked for. I love it! I've been complimented so many times I couldn't even say. She took her time, was friendly and professional. I'll definitely be going back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Micheline Figel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYSdiOaWw58YASLbFF_WTouaKukg9TbcUZbQ-EpFie9kyWy7TO3w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lucky Lu's is a great salon! I had a wonderful experience with Diana, she did an awesome job! The studio was also very helpful with the questions I had before. Can't wait to go back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ranpreet Anthony","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlgUviilZ_IGfKa_xhmjS9OuXxlvHq4t8CddHMVwCfTOu2zRW_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lucky Lu's is a retro, cool vibe, friendly atmosphere and 100% green salon in Denver's Highlands.  Lacey has been my one and only hair stylist for years.  Incredibly personable, authentic, and down-to-earth, Lacey is gifted in her artistry of hair and color and very passionate about her career.  She stays up with the current fashion trends and listens well to your desires, making sure you are well cared for and happy with your results every time.  Go see this gal.  She is absolutely amazing!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Slayton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUeh5njLfQEl3N2DNfg-hh1dbxJlplIN1WA1DGCXqQ2xQzKKNyKLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Deep condition / shoulder length cut. Ashlynn did an amazing job, it was such a great experience! I highly recommend her! Weeks later and I still love my cut and plan to go back for a color! Affordable with a bonus hand massage while my hair dried!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lindsey Rhodes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3J3V_NfhhRd-Mj5dTxCw9WHJxPDlX7a_zsmtmSFEZmHiZ4g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am very picky about my hair and this is the only place I will go! The salon has a really cool retro feel to it and sells some really cute jewelry and other accessories. They offer products that I have not been able to find anywhere else. All of the stylists there are very skilled and do great work, but my hair will forever be entrusted to Jessie. She works hard to make sure I get what I ask for but with her professional input to make sure I get the best results possible. I have never left that salon disappointed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jonathan Lester","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYqsNvFwV1ReLjtLerfD_X09UFLEonKq0XLh65QgSWgyMFcez4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been going to see Lacey since before she had Lucky Lu's. She was the only stylist that actually listened to what I was looking for and was able to produce exactly that. Now with Darcey and the larger place Lucky Lu's has become quite popular. This is what happens when you are good and word of mouth spreads. When you go in they make you feel like a star with the compliments and treatment.
I will most likely go to her for a long time to come.

Great job Lucky Lu's.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Tyler Hurula","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYRsdMv7RYvkoaqFDtZU_BtikGshu0O5JYeojX8u8lRJNSs95k5A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alicia Kuiken is the most incredible hair stylist. I started seeing her over 6 years ago after a hair mishap at a different studio. She saved my hair 6 months before my wedding, and was able to help me get it to a healthy spot again. Alicia dyes my hair the most vibrant colors and it always comes out perfect and the color lasts so long (we're talking 6 months later my hair is still vibrant and pink).

Alicia also did my wedding makeup and was so easy to work with and my makeup came out great! We had a practice session to make sure everything looked the way I wanted it to before the big day.

Alicia is a great listener and always asks clarifying questions to make sure we have the same vision for what the end result should be. She is so fun and creative and loves playing around with new ideas/colors. She is very meticulous and cares a lot about her clients, her work space, and hair! She's great at offering solicited recommendations as well as translating a specific style/color into reality.

Indie Six overall is a very welcoming salon and everyone here is so friendly.

I would absolutely recommend this salon, especially Alicia Kuiken for any and all hair and makeup needs!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUdsndyvMUp9-CrepBKTjYWoQruNWMl5ojQgGW&fid=0x0:0x4fce9e5fc3c64653"],"When":"2025-2-3"},{"Name":"Jake Bakker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkra9NTZKQ4Vr9fiVakNtv152Z83kRp6sjBdi-Ds-KrtjlRGSN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been seeing Alex for my haircuts for several years now, and I’m always impressed with his level of attention to detail. He takes the time to understand exactly what you want, offering expert suggestions while making sure you’re comfortable with the direction. He’s incredibly skilled with both scissors and clippers, and you can tell he’s passionate about his craft.

Alex is professional, punctual, and always maintains a clean, welcoming salon environment. Beyond just the haircut, he’s great at creating a relaxed atmosphere, which makes the experience enjoyable every time. Whether you’re looking for something classic or more modern, he’ll ensure you leave looking your best. Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"alexanichols81","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjMxyejd8w4B0tuLjMq3Rtu4jAB8GUlteXvb_XhobuRYjusA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been a loyal client of Angela at IndieSix for over 10 years, and her talent and dedication continue to amaze me. Angela doesn’t just style hair—she transforms it. She gives every client her full attention, ensuring that each cut, color, or style is perfect down to the last detail.  She takes time to complete a thorough consult about hair type and desired outcome which puts me at ease and set expectations every time.

Her skill and consistency are so impressive that my entire immediate family—my husband, two teen daughters—and even my mom, sister, and nieces all trust Angela with their hair. Without exception, every visit results in flawless results that keep us coming back.

Personally, I have fashion-colored hair (purple), and Angela’s expertise shines through. My vibrant colors fade beautifully and remain on point every time. Angela is truly a master of her craft, and I wouldn’t trust anyone else with my hair!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stephanie Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWH7lwOalpM4_eu92i3S07zKX-bHLYtjfRRkF03EiJ3R2tSz4xvtw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"About 10 years ago I was new to the neighborhood and lucky enough to stumble into Indie Six for an appointment with Alicia Kuiken! She’s been my stylist ever since and has become the stylist for many of my friends and family.

Alicia is kind, friendly, and I always look forward to the appointment. The quality of her work and products speaks for itself. We have done many colors and styles through our time together and I always get so many compliments. The last several years we have done vivid blues and greens. I have never had a color that stays longer and makes my hair feel healthy. The color doesn’t fade and covers my grays so well, which says a lot about the quality of the products she uses. I usually go in every 3/4 months to get it recolored and it’s only because my grays are growing in.

Alicia also started cutting my kiddos hair when he was 1 and she is so good with him. She is great at listening to what he wants and making sure that she really understands. She is great with him and he loves going in to see her to get a fresh do.

I highly recommend Alicia and Indie Six! They are a great crew!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOfQXy01HP5DxsxAwn5-a3w_fI-Wc1yxqq7IBDV&fid=0x0:0x4fce9e5fc3c64653"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Breanna Garcia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbkwiJs_L58o4T64NhOp4ZLa2EiiMW4mqaWdMeUhyxDFTWw8Y2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I am very disappointed with my experience. I have wavy hair and asked for a lob. I met with Angela and should have just kept my hair the way it was.
My hair was so long and healthy and now I feel I look so unattractive.
She didn't listen to me about the length of the front pieces and blow dried my hair even though I said I specifically don't use heat tools.
I showed her a reference photo and she used a curling iron on my naturally wavy hair while it was still wet.
I also felt nails jabbing into my ears multiple times and my hair was getting pulled out by the curling iron.
I honestly don't even want to leave my house today.
She went crazy with the scissors and said the length of my front pieces was "too short" to achieve a lob after she had cut too much off.
I'm not even sure if she has an actual cosmetology license which I was shocked to learn once I sat down and all my hair had been chopped off.

If you value your natural hair please don't go to this salon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Burpie_B0wie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVA_cO-Xh4k6QyA1xvsjIDqOv2Z-xGrKoA4u1D1aIsJbz9PElIH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been a customer at this salon since I was a kid, I’m now 18 years old and every time I leave this building, I have a huge smile on my face. Angela is the best stylist I’ve known, as someone with naturally wavy hair, I feel she knows the best ways to keep my hair clean and healthy and gives the best advice possible to keep it styled. From a simple trim to trying something completely different, this is the salon for you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"N S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrUMxxDtlV2BPte4vLsG3EbmBYSVsj3rHhzCcctokVOtH7jPA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Alicia does the best men's haircuts in Colorado. Impeccable eye for detail and and perfectionism. I'm really picky so it's nice to know I don't even need to worry about saying anything, she catches it all!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bridgette Foster","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyRn3Stge283Tl9FJbeXdEeGKr2RWZsU_JMtn8nxsJLqi5CA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been going to Alex for years for both hair cuts and color. He’s great at all styles and colors. Short hair, bangs, layers, ombré, highlights, full color…I’ve done them all.  10/10 recommend Alex!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEHKmL6xkpkDcqj7t7aUoE93MxThOmLuTxRYee&fid=0x0:0x4fce9e5fc3c64653"],"When":"2025-1-4"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"McKenna Hensley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0dUpW3hox4uqZQdiVLJk4jSjCyOOc1Zb9cIw7CX5hWZqiz6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Booked a long women’s cut with Mercedes and had a great experience! I am super thankful for her and will be returning :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lauren Wesche","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9vIygHy7rC7750eQE9YVlBPBK6Y3Ju-2VxUOi_Xz6rHsYoW8X=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Addie is amazing! I’m very happy with my hair and am so impressed by her skills! Addie is super personable and makes you feel welcomed and at-ease. I already booked my next appointment with her ❤️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Thacher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXxnp1CVFgCvr2EPHPCeNs50tiS5_CuBUK8G50mRiQJS3TBvhTGA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing experience with Addie! I spontaneously got this haircut while traveling through Denver and will definitely make a special trip back for my next one. The salon was also so nice and convenient, booking was super easy. Thanks so much Addie and team!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gina Hemmings","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjIfcSOAVp3eQqH-1GuL2xf2slDsbAVbTcsJOp2qEn_CUbtd0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first time at the salon and the entire experience was very soothing. The end result is beautiful and just what i'd hoped for.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Madison Gunselman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJngQb3ZXwbK8BlFs3TWjRG581wsKoIqNvI_wcfleL-BAsIOA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Christy did an amazing job! user_reviews: [{"Name":"Brittany Conroy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtOGysWuebR8GUFQWkJx6z1sMkVK7Qyj0XWSt_3TYIbZK1jg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Megan was phenomenal! My last haircut was out of town right before a wedding that left me pretty deflated. Megan fixed my hair and also walked me through exactly how to style my hair. She was so patient, kind, and incredibly sweet. I highly recommend her and can't wait to see her after I have my baby!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Belén Vigil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLDgJFtmYU5lv8Io3z-lm-HzenBUPRNG80WtlWvbh3WR1BuMo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Megan did a great job! She is a good listener but is also not afraid to make suggestions. I appreciated her expertise and will be returning for hair color in addition to haircuts.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Georgia Haley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKIZkqEKGVLt3eiJWp9WwBZLdIszXtZMs_OQaoSK0fWaOue=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ashley took the time to listen and understand my hair and future hair goals. A few years ago I had to chop my hair very short due to severe damage from a previous salon/stylist in another state and I’ve been anxious about going to a new stylist in a new city but she exceeded my expectations! She was kind, communicative, and realistic about my goals and timing for my hair growth. She was also great to talk to and I loved the end result (cut \u0026 style) and walked out feeling great. Highly recommend Ashley \u0026 I will be back soon!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer valadez-Vazquez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiNqYdQktDtiWVfhVSJ9UMJDuR38nuCJS85NruldWQ1hMSVIKZ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got my hair done with Megan and I am so happy with the result. I have pretty dark hair and was nervous getting my hair bleached where in the past it was left crunchy and dry. NOT TODAY!!! My hair is still soft and strong! I love the energy and environment of the salon. Differently will be coming back and I will be going back her my stylist. 100% recommend this place!!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"priscilla wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJy4SDrVbLaJc_JN_YRogtbAlhXWk4iYg9fz2IRYI7UKNNftonW=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went in for a haircut today with Ashley, and she was amazing . Listened to what I wanted and made helpful suggestions. I love my haircut. I will be back .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Erin Henson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoQDNE8B8GIUNTUVJO6fhjw14fxkG1LPaQtqXTjfiTBBfyTXI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I cute off 3-4 inches and Joelle made sure it felt good and I was comfortable every step of the way! She was easy to talk to and very attentive. I am definitely going back to her!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Heather Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXp2s_DCdzpUYWZCm94ICamYE5BydyAhSw5EoWIAGZ5vsXb81V2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kim is a magician when it comes to hair! I have course, thick, grey hair that is difficult to color, but Kim has always found a way to give me brilliant vivids. Red is always the hardest to take on my hair, and it usually fades within a few shampoos, but the color she uses remains bright and vivid for months. Kim is meticulous with her haircuts, always only taking off exactly how much I ask her to take off. She always listens to what I want and never fails to give me the hair I’ve been dreaming of!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvkxkvoZpZCks2gsC70g4VvlBPF98fARr_GVcv\u0026fid=0x0:0x8f9cdc2deb457a89"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Lindsey Korthoff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOgXR6Ob1aqMpCXyOhUL2qtKvQIXJsIbhZyrNnjl1cXeW5Cv1f=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Phil was fantastic! I hadn’t had my hair colored in over 7 yrs and was very nervous to have anyone touch it, but Phil listened and took into account his years of practice and skills to ensure everything was perfect. I’m so happy I made the appointment- thank you again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4pKn4T3UXfzsE9RBAxag0zcO6cja7j7-a6H0b\u0026fid=0x0:0x8f9cdc2deb457a89"],"When":"2024-1-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kelly Tasky","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJONtAp85M7OdTrYfjgV0wIjzmy2O_Q4WgkBpL9Bu-OVAetig=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My tween daughter has sensory and OCD issues and gets VERY picky with her hair. We have gone to multiple hair dressers and she always ends in tears with the cut. We found Dakota and it’s like magic! Dakota listens, is gentle, calming, and does a fantastic job with her cut and style and there are NEVER any tears! My older teenage daughter started going to her as well and now gets cut and highlights and we all adore Dakota! I highly recommend her and this salon! The salon is gorgeous with very comfortable sinks to rest your head and yummy snacks! Couldn’t recommend Dakota and this salon enough!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPeUFIZNXNE3QNg3pgAGFE7Kq8PYz3FR898o7fx&fid=0x0:0xa933653c98fddbc9"],"When":"2025-1-28"},{"Name":"Lauren Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGqrewMD7W4mczZnRarZZVx5Bn8NeBokLP-KnZwDog_HQU3A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This salon is amazing! Clean, cute, and welcoming! Andrea Lake is equally as amazing and always takes the best care of me and my kid's wild hair! Highly recommend her expertise for damaged and dry Colorado locks. I can't say enough about Andrea's giant knowledge base about hair care and her rescuing my damaged hair!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Natalia Turner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLyUV1HY5TyXqWMSjo79hBOCI8Y05STPmNCagaZplEbEFEGnA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I went in for a haircut with Andrea Lake and I walked out more than satisfied. Not only was my haircut absolutely everything I wanted and more, but I also genuinely had the best time with Andrea. She’s an amazing hair stylist and has the most beautiful soul! It was worth every penny! I will definitely be back to see her in the future!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxwH_ex_Vq5mVw0WgnfvgHESZmxG1kSimjKmC_&fid=0x0:0xa933653c98fddbc9"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Djille Bengay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWdax1r1aEZUHCOdPpBolvoQ_k7ytUWtbNhpMQyk6eE4D_EPf7H=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my first time having a hair appointment in the area since I'm just new here, but Sofia never disappoints!! 💯 I love the outcome of my hair, She exceeded my expectations! No boring moments with her the entire time of the appointment. She's super nice and talented! Love her so much and surely gonna come back for the next session! 💖💖 Look at my hair before and after!! Wow, I'm crying 😭💖","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPteCm4e36NtKAtZ6vobe9czfDwAaTibtH7J5v2&fid=0x0:0xa933653c98fddbc9"],"When":"2024-1-18"},{"Name":"Liz Henley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNmHe9uhTAn3MB1XMcDyaHVVt7ynIo34DJUe3iqkW6pBLSb6SY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I chopped off 10 inches of my hair to donate to Locks of Love and was very apprehensive about it prior to walking in. Andrea put me at ease immediately and was so incredibly kind and patient with me! She helped me through the whole process, made sure I was comfortable and well taken care of and taught me how to style my new do! She was perfection and I’m so thankful I found this gem!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Melissa Barrenechea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWguHXfwXS21KplCBqH96Eh2MTl5Q4nD2C_2NaAzPPxErA-EV3Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had my first appointment with Andrea, and it was so great.
She is not only so nice, but professional, and I felt so comfortable with her and the work she did with my hair.
I had color and a hair cut, and she did a fantastic job.
The salon is super nice very clean.
My daughter also had a hair cut and blowout with Catelynn Cain, and she did a beautiful job. The hair cut was well done, and the blowout was gorgeous.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Johanna Alperin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUO3REeuYJvAkZZeom3RbpNs2iOYVidEIgcBKMX48qKbDvvOVtI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can’t thank Caitlin and Willow Street Beauty Lounge enough! After going through one of the toughest six months of my life following foot surgery, I had an emotional breakdown and made the drastic decision to cut all my hair off. This was so out of character for me, especially since I have naturally curly and frizzy hair. I never intended to go short, and I never thought I’d find myself cutting my own hair.

Then, Caitlin came into my life like a breath of fresh air. She not only fixed my DIY haircut, but she also took me on as her first short-haired extension client. Her work has been nothing short of amazing, and she’s truly gone above and beyond to help me feel confident and beautiful again. Her attention to detail, kindness, and professionalism have made a world of difference during such a difficult time for me.

If you’re looking for a stylist who cares deeply about her clients and goes the extra mile, Caitlin is the one! Willow Street Beauty Lounge is lucky to have her, and I’m beyond grateful for everything she’s done for me.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"B Maglia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVp2QjzVmPr5KhPNWwxN6NxrwhSQXft9nVe9vgNE-oW9J2df8fQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"What could have been a bad experience was somewhat salvaged by my hair stylist. I asked for hair color you could not only see in certain lighting (I have black hair). Unfortunately the toner messed up. My hair came out the black I went in with. However she made time for me to come in the next day to fix it. While it is not EXACTLY what I was looking for, I am grateful she made the time and owned that it was not what I wanted. I have another appointment to see if she can fix it and can update once done.

The vibe of the salon is very cool, the decorations are spot on and they keep offering water or drinks to you which is very customer service friendly. Hence the high rating. Also my hair stylist herself was extremely nice.

Overall, I am willing to give the salon another shot. But for 300+ I would expect a better overall outcome. I do think the next session will be better and maybe they can offer a discount or some sort of courtesy. And yes- I did love my stylist, she was extremely kind and supportive.

The picture I posted is a week after getting it done with inside lighting. You can see the color on the left and right sides of my head. So it did lighten after she scrubbed it which I am thankful for.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMtpQwQ4lP_kwJ_QJMnUcqni3xZyZGuBZvEw13J&fid=0x0:0xa933653c98fddbc9"],"When":"2024-6-7"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Meg Hamilton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLvpN7x9JGnX-nqhzvMwyvcLOtnYHXnzBpjg7HL3g2ObLDmKw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been seeing my hair stylist, Andi, for about 5 years. She is fantastic! I have had my haircut by top stylists across the country (LA, SF, NY) and Andi is the best. She is highly skilled and very precise in her cuts and styling. Her standards are always higher than mine. She also stays very current and knows the latest techniques and trends. And, my haircut grows out well, the sign of a great cut. I always know I will look my best when I leave her salon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kevin S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIq3GCSex__sbl9cZYwc_xokLd62JiAthLp1ueevorLTb02Yg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Janelle has kept my cut fresh and clean for a few years now. Haven't been to any other stylist, but Janelle is great! Also, the salon is clean, bright and modern.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica Liddle","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXa7xoMGjdF3lwP1mtS420bohhklHup8cJ-4kQwNdAlc1I1sR8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had my first appointment here today and I was so impressed. I've been looking to a good stylist for years and Chelsea was amazing! I showed her a few pictures of what I wanted and she nailed it! She also was very efficient. I have really thick, long hair and other stylists have taken 3 hours to complete my cut and style but she was done in just over an hour. Everyone there was very professional and experienced. I would reccomend this salon to anyone!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Susie Zimma (Mahala)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIx1cv_UQzU70DS7z1DavsET72vTp-1PD3pYzMkWFmRuUgyRtIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Blondies is one of the premier salons in Denver. That is because its colorists and stylists are simply outstanding at what they do, and highly professional. I have been coloring my hair for thirty years. I have never met any colorist as skilled as Caitlin at Blondies. And Bonnie? She is an artist with a comb and scissors. She shapes your hair to flatter your face and enhance your style. I could not be happier than I am with the talent at Blondies.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kathy McInerney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIHrX6hNtAbBLcGBafB5_YVnOng4bu_sVRHbMOvVUfBzwoTKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I go to Blondies for TWO regular services.  First, Cindy Veatch has done my manicures and pedicures for years, and she is the BEST nail and toe technician I've ever experienced.  Second, I see Janelle Rocha for my spectacular haircuts every seven weeks.  She's a cut-expert.  These two are wonderful experts in their fields who definitely add to my quality of life.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marcia House","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX6OzUtX8bDO99BiWu5TCpDg9lIzhH3Qhfrr8rfkvp7tVMEpUD9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I wanted to share my experience on 6/23/23\nMy hairstylist by the name of Bonnie has a very kind heart, but her ability to blow dry hair is questionable. If you are a master hairstylist, you don’t mind paying good money, but you also want what you paid for. The first time I saw Bonnie she charge me $65 and then added $10. The next visit that I saw her  was $75. Because I had extensions the third visit she wanted to charge me $80  because she didn’t feel like I was giving her enough money. So I agreed! After,\nthe blow dry, she told me I needed to pay her $125 which was unheard of, after she told me $80.and that’s  what I paid  BonnIe,  is a very greedy. Person. I had to wash my hair three different times with my hands because she does not know how to wash and that’s a sign, of unprofessional stylus. Today , I look at my hair and it looks like a flat pan cake with no volume. I’m so upset that I paid $ 80 to unprofessional who wanted to charge me 125 after after telling me $80 and bumping up the price each time.  so unprofessional, who does that? Just because they say they are a master stylist. Be careful I was desperate and thought maybe after the third visit she was going to get it. Using the curling iron I told her three different times I wanted tight curls. Couldn’t perform the task so upsetting! .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anna Peters","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULqMyueLfaH5C_e7Ysw7XbjNRCqYf8icbDx1nC1ShnQqLbNqpB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Janelle Rocha is the best! Expert stylist and she is fast!! I have gone to her for 10 years and followed her from a different salon. Great location, parking, atmosphere. The stylists are so kind and you can tell they love working there and take great care of their clients. I brought my momma in for a cut and they treated her like gold. They also offer a temporary Brazilian blowout- perfect for trying it out. Highly recommended!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Clare CAVANAUGH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLP4FReOPZb-D3rxxDGN1AB1RuV-CO9oxX6P9meMUOEHtDMWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been a color….cut…..manicure customer for years.  Great spot…..incredible technicians….friendly ambiance.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"JamesAndEsther Price","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVbhhufQBGdO9sDmU0yk_IMcv8kEEWgLARZi1lcJoxUMakiRRU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mykelti “Kelti” at the honeycomb Salon is such a gem! I have been going to her over the last year and always love my hair when she’s done. I like to keep a lived-in, natural blonde look and she always gives me just what I want while protecting the health of my hair. This last time I had her take out all the dead ends and freshen up my layers, and it has styled better than ever before. I can’t say enough good about Kelti. Her kindness, her attention to detail, and her gentle and friendly personality are all a joy. I’ve never enjoyed talking a ton at my appointments and she’s super chill and respectful of that. If you’re looking for a great stylist, give her a try!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kenzie Alexander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBj9S2nq4xy356BKk-rhBSMuORakUrudaFrKnY7RevuceS1xla=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mykelti is a miracle worker! She did such a wonderful job at my wedding all my bridesmaids (some are pictured below!) and mother looked so beautiful! I had a trial with her where my hair didnt hold very well (personal problem for the gals out there with thin hair!) and she immediately offered another trial! we were able to resolve the style and i looked BEAUTIFUL on my wedding day!!! THANK YOU","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsvDxlU52lGA1o6SaVfRuGr3sg-GoDfyTL0Ost&fid=0x0:0xb7ee11030065186b"],"When":"2024-10-30"},{"Name":"Teya Varela","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfDGY47iRAp6IjzQrNNG34gd0vWCnHBCM4WW9q5P4xKD58kxU7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the salon! Talia has been doing my hair of around a year now, and I love my hair everytime. I have never had nothing short of a great experience. The girls are amazing and show such welcoming hospitality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ravionna Vlogs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlkyYlH_ynb77Eio9Stj5A1DydTd5UmMngYlKZ3YXZ-vegJpuu0A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honey Comb is such an Amazing Salon. All of the stylist are extremely talented.
I have been going to Regina for over 14 years and have loved the many many changes she has done to my hair.

The atmosphere in the salon is the best I have seen and experienced. Everyone is so kind and they all check and cater to everyone who walks in, not only their own clients.
I have watched how they all help each other out if they do get in a bind or time crunch.
I am so happy that Regina Found this salon for Honey Comb Salon and Regina are way to good to pass up.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Helen Romero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhyD38AIj7_WfO9PoLMhkzxacWyn5HQGKeqftEstzPE_5O0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I left a message asking for a haircut appointment. Since I had booked an appointment in the past with Rebecca (had to cancel)she had told me she charged $45 for a haircut and asked ahead of time if I was ok with that price. So I thought all haircuts were that price. Regina was the one that returned my call. She didn't quote me a price, I assumed the price was the same. It wasn't. To my surprise, it was $60. I was desperate to get a haircut, so although I wish I would have left instead of paying that much, I was too embarrassed to do that. Lesson learned. The haircut should have been something special for that money, but it wasn't any different than another haircut I had gotten at a cheaper place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica Welter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcXxTKpZ6c7Xx_c_iR34OUZ_czqaUk5QUMr0nQEhLiaiNDTA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Salon is great. I’ve been going to Regina for the last 20 years and this is the most comfortable Salon she’s worked at. Between her and the environment my “Hair Time” is so relaxing and enjoyable. Regina is by far the best when it comes to color! She creates magic every time and I will not go to anyone else to get my hair done. She’s very knowledgeable about hair textures/types and she knows what products to use to achieve the healthiest and best hair you can have. I get so many compliments on my hair daily and I owe it all the Talented Regina! Thank you for doing what you do!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michele Hart Photo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGVPt2cz1gQojcBwt_7e7E9edGsJff3-gTmsQaNMhnmPd-e-Ub7A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a great price for a kids cut! It makes me feel good about paying someone to cut my daughter's hair instead of trying to figure it out myself. Plus their CoVid procedures are top notch. I'm happy to give up a little right now to keep everyone safe. Thank you.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoc8_HlRd9gNWb5ZQnFrDiLvE2-NXekvFHZ4cV&fid=0x0:0xb7ee11030065186b"],"When":"2020-10-28"},{"Name":"Tonya Farr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsO3DeoTn0zaFHyxQWeOnWfKk4ZW5-l6uprZ6WvgeuFBU8KOw-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is wonderful, and my go to for getting my hair done. Regina is my absolute favorite hair stylist! She’s always gives me the best service, makes me feel comfortable, and helps me walk away feeling brand new! I’d recommend this place for anyone wanting beautiful hair in a cozy and caring atmosphere!","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Thuy Beauty Salon
address: 945 S Federal Blvd C, Denver, CO 80219
open_hours: {"Friday":["10 AM–7 PM"],"Monday":["10 AM–7 PM"],"Saturday":["10 AM–7 PM"],"Sunday":["10 AM–7 PM"],"Thursday":["10 AM–7 PM"],"Tuesday":["10 AM–7 PM"],"Wednesday":["Closed"]}

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jade Tsumura","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeBOqnbCrk2A4R1v1BK30m4jZT-LvVI0SoQJGteUL7xl3woJrl=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's hard to find someone I'm comfortable with cutting my hair after many stylists I haven't been satisfied with... But Thuy is considerate of hair type and made sure I'd be happy with my cut!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steve D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvfQSOQmbtg5sd0t4wXdRRwunVihBZYxQ8Tl48Tn7IFRjlk9sY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been going to this salon since high school. Thuy always does a great job. Fast and friendly service. Both of my kids goes here and she does a great job! Businesses come and go. This salon has been around over 30 years.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yamuna Yogini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAWx3VDzVgauOc9W5nfTH9O10MJGi1xxYZMQefOGtDPVVHL7I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am so grateful and blessed to have found Thuy. I’m coming up a year since I moved here and it took a lot of courage for me to try out a new stylist because I am very picky. The reason for that is because I have thin hair and been losing a lot of hair in recent years. With Thuy you only have to say it once and she will work her magic and the end result is above and beyond your expectation. She takes great pride in her work and it shows. Aside from her incredible talent, she’s super cool, wise, patient, and makes you feel like you’re family—not just a client. Blessings to you girl. Thank you for your beautiful work and presence each and every time 🙏🏻❤️😍😊","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Luat Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvWjgYft1q3SslbjnckFi-OAJN8OjVsFmukrwtQOgsiHe_=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my go to barber she is the only one who can cut my hair the way i want it and i have tried many salons and none of of then can get it right. She is not for everyone though just speaking the truth everyone has their own barber and the barbers all specialize in certain types of hair so either she can be really good for you or not good at all.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andi Vannoy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBmAHF-yOhmxze0siZbLscDNfZfn9YI4FUzGQ0lLFb-8ps3uwT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love love love my stylist. I was nervous getting my haircut as I haven’t had anyone do it in 3 years but gave the exact style I wanted and she was so friendly the whole time. Thank you Thuy Salon. I’ll definitely be seeing you again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjwLWpbMvcHQmXr6cRicH4y-5dv-lczJCz3uC30yI7yxhT_w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Thuy is the best! She stays busy for a reason. I've been going to her for a couple years now, and she always does a great job on my hair. She's also just really kind and nice to talk to.

Schedule an appointment in advance so you don't have to wait.

Cash only! Easy parking right in front.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Celine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUcaMpSx-n82sCiABkW_NpFtWMffui9LndH9aq5CRWkC2URP3s9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My whole family & many members of our community goes to Thuy. Worth a 45 min drive to see her. She's great, works with what we want, and is very affordable. Don't love the location but she gets us in and out quickly so she's cognizant of our time :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"David Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpZa8hapYtnFPt8X6vGFYms-HcFYs3CoFxhqT8_Dp9723UAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Asian men's hair is hard to cut. I've been a client of Winston at Lilac salon for years and was completely satisfied until he moved out of state. Now panic sets in. Had 2 or 3 terrible haircuts trying to find my hair cutter until today. I found Thuy and she cuts as good as Winston. No joke. She listened to my concerns. Great conversationalist. Fantastic skills.  Awesome job.  Now my stress levels have lowered thanks to her.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: The Beauty Box Denver

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Dana meldgaard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQnG3oVnJIUmyWHnbDymjQD4bZV7iU9xS6e7mZ2DoatpeiZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jeannie is just the best stylist I’ve had. She is also a kind soul and I come out of my appointment rejuvenated.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maria McDermott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7DXvwXX8n16RlYOcjWtWxWKL9ZgcSAVC_nyXKbyowkXjXTJXj=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Danielle is FANTASTIC! She’s professional, a perfectionist and wonderfully talented at color and cut. Highly recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOpq--it_uix47ni9V-9gMTlNQrO3KZFxaqpDeO\u0026fid=0x0:0xfa034a7883bc5756"],"When":"2025-3-6"},{"Name":"Meghan Watson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLCqqS_wHtqpR78t_y5uP6h86GbuJfGEt_bBMFjwKCKMKfLvQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Marcy is amazing, she is very talented. I always look forward to getting my haircut from her! Her salon is adorable and the energy is always very welcoming!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"AW","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ9abZluoJP5e_eQ1gifwkCcjW-eo3OAyZxXFxTJggdJxKfh-K0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jeanni is a great hair stylist. I'm in between hairstyles/cuts because I had an undercut previously. She listened to what I wanted for a now cut and how to cut and grow it out for the cut I want as my hair gets longer. She's super nice and the place was clean and in a great neighborhood with easy parking.\nNon-the-less...I've found my new hairdresser!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nicole Hansen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUD3MJbaMjPbeQCOeEIIZ_r55qSxKIRqiQTb3fawD84ZAUN3rCx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jeannie at The Beauty Box is an amazing hairstylist that has done my cuts and highlights for several years now. She is always accommodating to my schedule and finds time to fit me in, even in short notice! At this point, my 3 daughters go to her, and my husband too! My oldest likes to do a split-dye and another started getting highlights.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Keti McKenna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFhgbz3EBF2Tf8m3P_CaXpv0lojRxZNRFRDzzxK-a1Tic-TQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice little salon near all the other stores. Jeanne is a talented  hairdresser. She did amazing highlights on my hair. I am definitely going back to her.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"B Archuleta","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVcBB36hk208YyeCsD6eqlfh19TDRFb-D0Yq6sPur_1PgU-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jeannie did a wonderful job for me. I love the highlights the most but the haircut is amazing too. She made me feel so much better after an awful haircut.  I am beyond satisfied with my experience and highly recommend Jeannie to anyone looking for a great haircut and fantastic service.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cindy Krentz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIBhEul2WEKzNGHe9tdbfQWL2Uue39UC1zFjIAFrlOHwZPOXg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jeannie is the sweetest person ever!  She has such a big heart and is very good at her craft.  I have been going to her for probably 6 years now, and she highlights and cuts my hair really well.  I get compliments on it often.  She is very knowledgable about hair care.  If you go to Jeannie and don't like her, that is a YOU problem.","Images":null,"When":""}]

Excellent service is what she provided. Thank you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMer7SiGZJ8TNGH9vAnacj6SaQpAVo4ozYFbwaf\u0026fid=0x0:0x6f1ebf994afdd28a"],"When":"2022-3-5"},{"Name":"Bettye Davis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNEeuPBOpEW-TlSu6-adpKTxeOugOI_MVCpFER_m1hUCHIW-6f=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am changing my rating. I'm sure my case was not normal and the situation was rectified.😁😁😁","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmfppMR7WcSVOdzVXrbZZ-9-HVlIRZLKbgbzbt\u0026fid=0x0:0x6f1ebf994afdd28a"],"When":"2019-1-3"},{"Name":"Jasmin Hammad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8Q9PG9vukc4I5CQsD_XLO3YquCe2zsVIT4juL3F8SxZnm6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was visiting and needed my hair done prior to an event. Thankfully, Eboni was available.  She is a true professional, extremely knowledgeable about various types of hair textures and styles, and extremely considerate. She did a beautiful job and set a new record for getting my hair done the fastest. Thank you Eboni, I really appreciate you. Next time I'm in town, I will definitely reach out.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alexan Pho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOEMegsWP8UoEv2jp9csThvP01RLL_Y67_EyT6ja1y971OnGUbuw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My hair was severely damaged and she revived it!!! I’m so grateful! Eboni was super professional and really made me feel at home! Repeat Customer Alert!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Leslie Johnson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKVF2I3IHjlCD_duKzIt2xfCYiQP4P-8ruucqe9Ct4OOn6kLA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been seeing Eboni for over a year now and she not only creates beautiful styles, but she really takes such good care of your hair. My natural hair is so much healthier and easier to manage, now that she has been styling it for so long. It's always a great visit whenever I do see her and I always leave happy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bryonna Williams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFSVZYb-QZESaBv8BThfLLtnHp7wo-3sVCVyO45iTvGGvZ3J12=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Eboni was so great. I haven’t been to a stylist since February before COVID \u0026 knew my hair was in need of some tlc. She explained all the products she was using \u0026 why she personally recommends them \u0026 reassured me that my hair would be healthy again with routine maintenance and love. My hair feels so soft \u0026 it’s so bouncy. Will definitely be going to her every 6 weeks to keep on top of my trims \u0026 continue to grow healthy hair.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chris R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrsLo8GhbORNNH1MDgnOPoM_UtK0pdgHekb4fYbHw932h_AGd6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been going to Eboni for just a little over a year and I don’t believe there is enough superlatives available to describe how awesome she is. She is extremely knowledgeable about hair, hair products and then some. I’ve never had her rush through an appointment she takes her time as if your her one and only client. I appreciate that the most! I’ve recently moved and I travel back to Denver just to go to her. I know I am receiving quality professional work done with natural hair products.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sadiyyah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU__zVJpyXTEMxCvtPIaW5JzPmO9MzFAlYJ_BSPAA9vR1rDZQNWeA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is hands down one of the best hair salons that I have been to. I have been natural for almost 5 years now and couldn't find a place for my hair to call home but once I found my stylist Eboni I was very impressed. The prices are exactly what I needed some places charge an arm and a leg just to get beautified. If your looking for a low key spot that's not expensive and a personable stylist this is where it's at. My hair has grown so much and is very healthy now that I faithfully make my way to the Phenomenal Beauty Salon. Check it out and you will definitely be happy you went.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsTtuMypFv7zv1Dpw8Sfm_ms6i8Gkemcm_KwNY\u0026fid=0x0:0x6f1ebf994afdd28a"],"When":"2016-9-18"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"L H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAGZPH7iClV753Gx99CjLWOVX41eJy7hCchxT1mCfhPJXczg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I'm new to the area and in need of a new hair dresser. I live right by this salon and was hopeful it would be my new hair home. I popped in recently to just ask some questions and couldn't even get that far. I believe the girl I spoke with was named sam. She could not have been more disinterested in answering my questions. She was very rude an unwelcoming, she made me feel like I was bothering her. Beyond that, the salon just kind of has a drab, dated look. I will be looking elsewhere for a hair dresser. I personally prefer a more high end experience. I would rate this place a step above a Great Clips.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Suzanne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVacgMqUiuLSiKWpiSte8f5Sj3291qGdz92FEQl-FPVcKiQI9AiMw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A real pleasurable experience at salon theory. The salon is clean and bright and everyone is very friendly. My stylist at the salon is Cristy. I’ve been going there probably for about five years now and never have I been disappointed. I definitely would recommend this salon. They also do nails and facials.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7FC4d1gbDkHMdP7nfAcE0O5Y783vL3elEUCMB\u0026fid=0x0:0x9ee8f1c179bf774d"],"When":"2023-7-27"},{"Name":"Isabella Bartels","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHdxHNpNfOriLurYLcmo5YLNWiuH0gClRug46-4eYd1wt75Ppt=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Honestly, I should be writing this review a lot sooner because Megan has been cutting my hair for over 10 years now and is truly incredible at what she does. I have extremely thick and wavy/curly hair and without fail, she gives me the exact cut I want every time. She has great hair maintenance tips and product suggestions, and really cares about the health of her clients hair. Recently, I had a lot of damage to my hair from a balayage gone bad, and she fit me in the next day to do a clarifying shampoo and bonding treatment to start the process of fixing the damage. She is an exemplary hair specialist and an outstandingly kind person, and that's why I have been a client of hers for so long and will continue to be for the foreseeable future.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cassidy Evans","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU-7wfHy2ixIifPuUxsC7lqXqdXvlMtKTgMhQ39cxTdmPXTDa-sSw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely love this salon and have been coming here for years. I've had multiple stylist who have both cut and colored my hair. Emily, Cristy (the owner), Layla and Katie have l been accommodating, worked with my schedule and not only listen but they hear what my wants and desires are and meet and match my expectations with their expertise. Not only do they do hair but they also do nails as well. Best salon and extremely talented artist here at Salon Theory.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWLY_g6rxSzqXDWbe2OcaoOJbB6ezOYtJd-Cm0\u0026fid=0x0:0x9ee8f1c179bf774d"],"When":"2021-3-3"},{"Name":"BE L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3sd8b6VxBkD4B2pWzALxI9T5PLYGnz9rGDD5kiWXr12BPew=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Chandra is a hair magician! Had two wonderful colors with her during my time in Denver. Highly recommend!!! Will definitely be back next visit. Great salon!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Scottnie09","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLlejQ7rx8ygRCZWSLjQlUmazw1da2GTbDs1GieQJNsaM56zw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sara is the Best hair stylist i ever known!! she’s Amazing!!! I Thank her so much for  turning my dream hair to reality!😍 I love this Salon :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1dCMspcVDVogt4uOGcVl40tdGL36hE6EuzGeV\u0026fid=0x0:0x9ee8f1c179bf774d"],"When":"2019-5-1"},{"Name":"Kristen P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJHws92gZpyCmdr3JB62DNG_R3ntKAeqGT49rr17fI1EaPMeg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hands down the best salon I’ve ever been to (and I’ve been to a lot over my 14 years in Denver). Maria has been my stylist for close to 10 years and I followed her over from the other salon. She always does an amazing job and I have gotten so many compliments on my hair thanks to her. Kristy has also done my highlights when Maria has been out of town a few times and she also does beautiful work! Everyone there is so nice and the atmosphere is relaxed and fun. The salon itself is gorgeous and clean and they have done an awesome job of transforming it into their own and adding tons of beautiful touches and changes. I also love being able to make online appointments from their website. Highly recommend to anyone who has been salon hopping and trying to find “the one.” Salon Theory is the place!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"danielle d","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJX4TXx_eofDIEEwHOyHlGsdpDjYezrw5nfdYNzsV7rm-GYXAg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been seeing Cristy for over three years - she's awesome. My color has never looked better, and her cuts are fantastic. I've honestly never experienced such consistent excellence from a stylist. She makes looking great easy for me; I am more  put together and polished than I have ever been.\n\nSalon Theory is a beautiful environment with an awesome tribe of stylists that care about offering their clients an elegant and approachable experience. I recommend Cristy and the Salon Theory team to anyone looking for a caring team of experts that will make you look and feel beautiful!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jordan Swartz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLezwSYQHgUdDuRe7dka5n9e0aFFAbaJz7M0EHU6C_IRqapXg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amber Taylor did an amazing job with my hair color especially wanting a dark wine color with a pop of red! user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Devin Hieb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU2LOo6M-HAbkSPc96Lnk7S33pZbjpoGP6QZGCCR3woZpxjfw2z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Flaunt Salon is an amazing place for any type of hair treatment. Andrew is such a wonderful human with a beautiful heart. His passion for life comes through his work and the space he has created. I have been coming here for haircuts for a few years now and every time I visit I am so welcomed in the space. Andrew always remembers me and we now have a great personal relationship. When it comes to my hair, I have long wavy hair and it has always been so hard to find someone who knows how to cut it well. He handles my hair with ease and always leaves me with the perfect cut. My favorite thing about the process when I come in is the hair wash and scalp massage that he gives. I would pay for just that part of the service. I have now had my wife start coming here and she loves the salon as well. 10/10 I would recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZf6l5onOxgGMxabnTMT2CGtAi6CoKuiZJ0DHs&fid=0x0:0x6dffe5c7ae2358b9"],"When":"2025-1-1"},{"Name":"cherylann Schaden","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZjatHZswG646g7JOHBMrnjZTvVxfj8VWO9McABnEGWC0h0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the vibe of Flaunt Salon - Everyone who works there is talented, but I see Andrew.  He's fun to talk to, he makes me laugh, we have great conversations!!!  He's a Pro (34 years in the biz).  His cuts are precise, the color is consistent and he likes to give me a different style that always looks crazy amazing and lasts for days!!!  I book out as far as I can to keep my place in line.  I'm Grateful for the scalp massages and that he loves my hair the way I do!!!!  Book Today - I Highly Recommend!!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Barb Bolin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTZAJSFIbwFfWbS8i-DNuvBjsbEzq9ny7hNMML0QWIwM8BAM8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Andrew is amazing! Probably the best haircut I’ve ever had. Took him literal seconds to look at my hair and decide what I needed for cut and color and he was right!  Also just an incredibly good person and the salon has such a wonderful grounded vibe. So happy I found Andrew and Flaunt.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"FitByJenny LLC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4Wn6v7Ky5DpxiBN64pokUZLIx-wmKLXR5aInd8P7cRogvsIg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been going to Andrew for 25 years! I can’t say enough wonderful things about Andrew and his work.  He is absolutely amazing and unbelievably talented! Best hair stylist ever! You will look your absolute best every time!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Theresa Venhuis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_9pEFCYJzkWSrVZRdjp36zK8xX6xLWXMezO9dQ_eW9qCbEaSg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Andrew is the best. My color is fantastic - it looks so natural and no one knows it’s not my real color. And I trust him entirely with the cut. I tell him to do what he thinks is best and I get so many compliments.
He’s also friendly and fun to spend 2 hours with while getting your hair done","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shane Sweeney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKtrV_7f428smlOYXCR1EUPW4tUv_zL1cKIXGcxqYFcVT8RrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Flaunt salon rocks!  As usual I waited to get trimmed up for the weekend. Andrew somehow got me in last minute. So happy with this cut!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPm8FrIF8LWdXwWdKL1gvM-O1MPr6WNNR50VePV&fid=0x0:0x6dffe5c7ae2358b9"],"When":"2025-2-14"},{"Name":"Shay Baiker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsOPdl35Lhn28kFbCzZGPp3iHCJ8hk11qSVd20sGf9RZke0XUY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a coloring emergency and Andrew came to my rescue today! Tried to die it myself and it turned out disastrous. Beyond thankful for him getting me in today and for his help getting it exactly how I wanted it to look. It looks amazing! Super happy! Will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMhxqp2-MQUaGrNPjutt4yoaOO3KZ9qsWzr-wRJ&fid=0x0:0x6dffe5c7ae2358b9"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Meghann Thoma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX00BmftiITMdxe0wUBCRmLx97rN9PWDu6CWBjoBL2N_36phAXN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first experience at Flaunt and I can’t rave enough about this place! My appointment was with Erica and I will just say she’s a gem. I got a balayage and haircut and she listened to everything I said and guided me through everything based off of what I asked for.
My hair looks and feels so great and I really just enjoyed my time there. It was like spending an afternoon with a friend and felt like the entire appointment flew by.
I’m so happy and can’t wait to come back!","Images":null,"When":""}]

I called to schedule an appt two days before coming in and was confirmed. I walked in the salon and wasn’t greeted. I was ignored in the waiting area and they even took other clients they knew before me. It was as if I didn’t exist. I walked up to the counter after waiting 45 minutes and the woman looked at me and turned around. I don’t know how any humans that run a business can act so unfriendly and rude. Wouldn’t recommend to any new clients. For existing clients, I’d reflect on how rude staff is to others (even if not to you). It’s catty and pathetic.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alex Landa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVCTL2M-uDJnMG_Sf0wzDdjy0JIR3koSkVCS3jTIeOZCZobuUo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"SOOO GOOD , amazing work , my favorite barber forever!!!🤪🤪🤪🤪","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rachel Akey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfYtt_v4do8uckj9YK_-_DFf5pk9uCN1Gw4q1mRXbwPDPkXbJt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this salon, I always come here for every haircut. user_reviews: [{"Name":"Erin Pappas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocId_hkAEKwDvExP08hId1m_pvZ7dPefXuIit3jc-u0Ra4NUrg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Meghan is amazing! I am so excited I found her! She has transformed my skin and it's only been 2 visits. She is stuck with me now :) Don't hesitate to pop by and have Meghan help you out, you'll be thrilled with the results.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gabriela Walters","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIN4H8cFhJs_lap5HFFMRaMp1CnwSsszr-klbh_MPeeWBR96IJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had such a great experience here!
