Highly recommend scheduling with her. I got a membership and am so excited to go back next month!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Julia Reckart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLwNLE-SMBNRzZ_g6jMAN1KQJ36ZpiJ_1Eit9COSVaDYTlQ2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Megan was PHENOMENAL!!! This was my first facial of my whole life and I need this to be a regular party of my life. It’s more than worth the money and time investment. Megan does such a good job explaining and educating while creating the most relaxing spa experience. We did this as part of a girls trip and now it will be our tradition!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sonia Hiller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpLhtNHiiM3ddEuivVJv-AzxbCBeXRgehAc3OuwSUji6W7X_Lr=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful experience! Lisa is amazing and very knowledgable about skincare. I ended up signing up for the membership because it's a great deal. The facial was so relaxing and my skin was glowing after! Ellisha and the the front desk staff were so personable and kind. I can't wait to come back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paula Chase","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZYPJQSB5SO9NI3fmhUwoieQXnqHU2hmFY15nKq7hSGtwD5g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been going to Heyday regularly for some months now.  It is the best self care and I can't recommend it enough. There are many facial add-ons to choose from, and they've all been wonderful. It is clean and peaceful, the staff is friendly and helpful, and Alana (\"my\" aesthetician) is amazing. She \"gets\" me and I always leave feeling better than I did when I arrived. 💜","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kaylan Ameenmoore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPPfqf_tnqQoT7xlYd6Jpgykdf_kbD_l92qHxGLDODpgaVnA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was introduced by a friend for her bachelorette party! We did a cute spa day and were surprised with delicious chocolate covered strawberries. My esthetician was super knowledgeable and complimented my skin. She provided a lot of education for how to maintain the facial and keep the glow she gave. Adore this place and highly recommend for an affordable, knowledgeable, and quality facial.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashley Johnston","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhHBQQZTQ64xvW33dlxxkEV3xprt2Zb7E4Ox5gtI9AoNut8UAX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lisa is amazing! I’ve had a membership with Heyday since this location opened and have gone every month to see Lisa since! My skin has never been better and I look forward to my facial every month!! She does an amazing job and I leave feeling refreshed every time. She also gives great product advice and I’ve loved all the products I’ve purchased and used from Heyday.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sara Mata","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI7qY5QLSVsL2UeubjDVdZw87UPr1IoM4edglO-ILTYtMW0_iuf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can’t express how much I needed this experience at heyday. Might have to sign up for a membership soon ;)","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"M Audam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOEuVC0ZypNAary4Hh6xnHE2yhf17VoqvU-1-spJP_22fLm_42=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After looking FOREVER for a place to take my daughters, I found the spot and the most amazing woman that finally got things right! Stephanie took her time, understood the situation, and walked me through everything that would be best. She was so patient with my 7 year old, who has had nightmares from previous salon visits at other places over the past few years. I have recommended her and the salon to several other friends since we were there a few weeks ago. I have so much peace knowing we can stop looking!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jakarah Dittmer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWi33tIljyX4Wwl0zVT0vAbrCEZKzpI9BJy_gZDO0oEvau6egPh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great atmosphere and salon! everyone is very nice and approachable.  Shout out to Stephanie and Renee. They are amazing and so talented ♥ I am very tender headed and they are very careful and precise and never rush with braids. Thank you all!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charlie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4pR48JlHV_QyVtfo5bB7Cjy1Gk5pKxRrBkQEu3fQoekFpmu4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this salon! Alicia and Stephanie are hilarious, knowledgeable, professional and wonderful to be around. I've been coming to these ladies regularly for a year for perms, trims and conditioning treatments. My hair has never been as long or as healthy as it has been since I entrused my hair to them.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMdhdRgzWFJ6bgOb9Q2oEog1qGEx2jDvNQmTrM&fid=0x0:0x62bd62d64f4c322f"],"When":"2018-5-12"},{"Name":"Amirah Brockington","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnIyGeHrwj0M27UvboDpZTQ5XI4wBFYH788KVg9DEeGZiTAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am so glad that I found Alicia. I have Lupus so it has been difficult trying to properly care for my hair but Alicia is knowledgeable and has been helping me better understand what my hair needs. She is very welcoming and offers helpful life advice. I'm looking forward to seeing her again!

- Amirah Brockington","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Nuri Aminah Bradshaw","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW15fUoWe87Oufuw-q_WOcUNM46yjBYGqGj9u508eNOD0m9K1A6vw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This salon is excellent! The staff is kind, knowledgable, and PROFESSIONAL! My mother, sister, and I have had a couple appointments here, and the service is exceptional! We have neither been disappointed nor dissatisfied with the stylists and their work. Because I am a Muslimah, my preference to not have my hair shown in public (mainly to men I am not immediately related to) is always honored and accommodated! During my last visit to Body and Soul, I got my hair washed, protein treated, colored, trimmed, and styled - an experience under $250 and I walked out feeling like a pampered Queen! Before my color, Ms Stephanie sat down with me to really educate me when it comes to hair dye. This allowed me to make a well-informed decision on how I considered  proceeding, I believe this allowed me to choose what is healthiest for my hair! I am very grateful for this particular sister to sister conversation! Who knows, two weeks or a month later my hair could’ve been falling out, extremely dry, the bright violet I desired would’ve been faded to an ugly blond and my curly tresses would’ve turned to strands like over-chewed bubble gum! <— If you don’t want an experience such as the latter, make your appointment with Body and Soul Salon and Day Spa TODAY!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"River Rogers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFh4BlWQS4DoY-vMnSjgJgYxoUY_2j-OsKSSK0lsgnAM9X2w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I’m deeply disappointed by the business’ level of unprofessionalism. Stephanie will make up prices depending on how she feels and waits to let you know what she thinks she’s earned (and will actually be charging) after the service has been completed. She also stopped multiple times while I was in the chair to carry on personal phone conversations.

- I called you about it and you already told me that there was nothing you could do to make it right, so I simply wanted to warn customers. Thank you for your response.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shevonn Damper","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5RI4vT6Jq7VYHmEiepwhkOcjLraN1posBLQJOJQBGlPdXXKk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Scheduled online for a wash, style, trim and came in with hair already washed, clean and blown out. All she did was trim and flat iron but I am still charged full price for EVERYTHING that she didn't have to do. I wasn't looking for a discount, I was looking for a reasonable business. Why am I paying for a wash when it never happened? No thank you.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joan Grant","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKZ7akKf7YxlP4i7YX7wEBqwCXInomgABCWu5vAvL3xZnbdg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ladies, what a blessing to meet you. Your team of angels will be taking care of our family from now on. My daughter brought her 6 yr old in today. She looks so pretty and you taught us so much.
Blessings to each of you.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Casey Love","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0SiaGqbwYY732IZZ4YexJVENnEnT14TwuigqUFO8PuDu6ow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Katie is amazing! She always takes such great care of me and makes the entire experience relaxing and enjoyable. She’s fantastic at helping me figure out what I want, even when I’m not sure, and the results are always perfect. Her communication is great, and she’s super flexible with scheduling, which I really appreciate. Plus, the conversations are always fun! I leave every appointment feeling refreshed and confident. I highly recommend Katie to anyone looking for an exceptional hair stylist!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Katherine Brown","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzZqEwd-RUSOaK_UEIvyzYnYt269Dn2ygkUa98cTz1fcZItyo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Bee Sweet is wonderful! The entire salon has a very welcoming atmosphere and all the service providers are very kind in addition to being very skilled.\n\nKatie is absolutely amazing as well. She is great at understanding what I want even if I’m struggling to convey it. She has also provided me with several product recommendations and styling tips that have improved the health and appearance of my hair. I would wholeheartedly recommend her — and Bee Sweet overall — to everyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anna Moore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXxFI7IZ3U8qL_OVAu5_gGisZgBXyJmQ6qzuaNXUSKsUrAsKG4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dani is simply the best. From the first cut I had with her I trusted her to take my waist-length hair to a pixie cut. That was almost 10 years ago and I have never looked back. She makes everyone who sits in her chair feel seen and heard. She's a true gem; she is an incredible human being all around.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jennifer soos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFr5ha40BDJcbINlUPM84YHAUjnyYdxjTnw6XTfswEtnWX9A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Katie has been doing my hair for a few years and I couldn’t be more impressed! She is very talented and understands exactly what I want. She also provides great suggestions when I am unsure of what I want to do. I always leave feeling and looking like a million bucks. The atmosphere in the salon is so welcoming and it’s a bright, beautiful space. Katie is not only professional but also friendly, kind and fun to be around. We are always laughing and having a great time while she is doing her thing. She is a real gem!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elissa Harcsztark","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJFn0-IyzkAbqAjsnU8hM6m2yYaS2NYDOFczWQe-oO3drd2V4uYg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Katie is incredible! Not only is she the sweetest but I will not let anyone else touch my hair! I've been going to Katie for years and I'll never stop. My hair color is perfect every time and she keeps me looking beautiful with every haircut. ♥️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Allison Gary","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdnYzYxvbmvr7pJXIFfPRD4yftP5IIrRVZA7MVKCR91pjTTgM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is such a wonderful salon filled with compassionate and caring, professional and fun staff who are skilled at what they do. I cannot recommend them enough! It’s a welcoming, supportive and inclusive space with a feel good and healing vibe. Go get some pampering!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"katie weimer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0qXQCa76trTQRViqoFxVmP0r5JnKSRNDJlQ9WXaGbWmh79g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Katie is AMAZING!! She is unbelievably talented with maintaining my blonde. She is the kindest person, with the warmest heart and always radiates positive energy and comforting vibes! I would highly recommend her as your stylist.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel Martinez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIo04UqL8FQ1gRip4OngE-VBym6cbeSKN0wA_j5_dfsC9cG0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Katie is my fave person! She’s amazing at what she does and she is officially my third older sister. I’ve been going to her for 4 years now and I am so grateful for all the talks and especially her expertise when it comes to my hair journey.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"ashley spencer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLFElkMK75E8Hl_Rvu2y4v3RUUWeZHyfDetkI6UUPJQg_rVZw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Zoe from Mauve is the absolute best! She is my go to for color \u0026 cuts always! I couldn’t be more thrilled with the results. Her expertise in color is truly remarkable; she achieved the exact shade I wanted and ensured it complemented my skin tone perfectly. Beyond her technical skills, Zoe is incredibly friendly and attentive. She genuinely listens to what you want and works with you to bring your vision to life. The whole experience was both enjoyable and satisfying. (The salon is soo cute too) I highly recommend Zoe to anyone looking for a talented and personable stylist!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1gE7wlZTYp4mE_GMWYNHjVJ3QLIwyYnWIy8vV\u0026fid=0x0:0x7ee53c46bc8f708f"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Morgan Sandritter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVok-uufCvp6rBBJttVEFzqSs-MNPR1N7Ljf0esPVojiajYDKe9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jamie at Mauve is amazing and I highly recommend going to her for any hair/color needs! She is very down to earth and works with what’s best for you and your comfort levels. I always feel welcome and excited to get my hair done with Jamie. She has her own private suite too, so it makes for a personal experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Abby Cohen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKXlpvKXM9ta86xmVPrgjAyW3VeHVZwYZqyt_l3GXhJW4tOqg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mauve has the best vibe of any hair salon I’ve been to! I get my hair done by Zoe- she always does amazing job of listening to what I would like for my hair and executing it better than I could have imagined. I leave every time with a healthy, shiny blonde. Could not recommend her more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_z9-Zmfm4qzGejpx7-JuDSX2zTHqBu4bLaPug\u0026fid=0x0:0x7ee53c46bc8f708f"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Jaclyn Wallack","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFD_2SK22YtqnNmhDhORsAeKh53_amiD33ooTgVDGsMZl4Ug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a great experience coming to Mauve Salon. Kat does my hair and she does a fantastic job. The coloring and cut is always perfect and the grow out is just amazing. The salon itself is very beautiful and cozy. I can’t wait to go back soon!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rebecca Webb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJlgOruXn4rqnrGGoWTeS-YeSVI2A9_r-pEEZiZddPTdsJdwV2Mg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jamie is the absolute best hair stylist I have ever had, and I have lived all over the U.S. and in Germany. Her ability to create a work of art through my red hair is apparent when I get compliments weekly on its appearance. Her hair styling is representative of our open communication. She listens, colors, trims, and styles my hair to perfection, each and every time. Plus, we have the best banter as she works. I am so grateful for Jamie!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPS87sIie9XTMLBEFw9Y9wnBHbbNL9LQZtwQuOa\u0026fid=0x0:0x7ee53c46bc8f708f"],"When":"2025-2-7"},{"Name":"Jamie Steiner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW_xrWYKWUA0FdhzErRAxjVHXU4T93kPHADFHcQcmKIQ9P8uNrS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always have an amazing experience with Haley! She listens to exactly what I want and makes sure every detail is perfect. My hair has never looked better/healthier.  The atmosphere is always friendly and welcoming. I’ve gotten so many compliments and cannot recommend enough!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sarah Garrity","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkB_mcb2V9nGfqqeKN2kxv-o2kgDpQvWWJ_ckYBBXMZx0BoVPB=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve always had wonderful experiences at Mauve. Haley is incredibly talented, particularly when it comes to color and working with blondes. I consistently love the results and receive compliments on my hair. She is knowledgeable and gifted and truly understands your style. The salon is also fantastic—comfortable and has a great atmosphere that makes you feel at home.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Margaret Pacienza","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJbsfUJK-1b_uSNkxOD9xyz49WTzzcyu8NKsSNQTO30Inpe8A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Well, I have been following Haley Johnson for ~12 years! As a new resident in Denver in 2012 she knew exactly what to do with short curly aging greying hair…she saved me!!! She is responsive, honest, listens to my life’s sagas and is so very talented! No matter where she migrated in her career I followed and will continue to do so! She really made a difference and I always enjoy walking away from an appointment knowing she did her best for me!! Thank you and Happy Valentine’s Day … you are the best!","Images":null,"When":""}]

I will never trust anyone else with my brows or nails!! Thank you girls!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"olivia cole","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIT52vSARr3sBlEyawYmTFhXDXL9l2RbGYe1yLbD3dnvcfGGg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been coming to a the Glam House for 2 years and have always had an amazing experience. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mallory Stroh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-37Bd5SXZ5M0_4RY-Nw6bNzK1luMUjrej1XXyk0HK-Xvetw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always a 10/10 experience at Holistic! She does an amazing job at listening to you and always has the best recommendations. I always leave here loving my hair.
Also the salon is gorgeous and everyone who works there is super welcoming and talented. Get on their books, you will not regret it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Analise Lotz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrFNxsR0zDvoi0X9gv0f9-vw1Q3Tp84lO0MgDoo7Ms6kAZOeQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I discovered Holistic salon after going to a place for so long that getting my hair done felt like a chore. First time ever getting my bangs cut in a way that actually looks good! He took his time and used a variety of techniques to get it just right. I will definitely be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christen Ibarra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIbhbz2wThsyFMG-a4y9bYU8cDImJjebddmFgAtSetvJRbIcg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ADORE Holistic Salon, Grace has been my go-to for 12 years! Her coloring & balayage is next level and lasts. She finds a way to take your vision and then elevate it. Even took my skin tone into account. Grace and Krista stay at the top of their game with all the up & coming techniques. Impeccable, gorgeous salon with ideal customer service (thx Dylan)  I always leave there as the best version of myself hairstyle wise. Magical ❤️ Can't recommend this place enough!!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marianne Cassisi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhjJwWtA7WIQik18Ux3i2K_VZXOVmmxwMa1OE4BNP2_yyMes8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a really amazing experience and cut with Kelsey today! I had a complete transformation cut and was really anxious about how I would look. Kelsey made me feel comfortable and confident and worked with me for how I wanted my hair to look. The hair salon itself is beautiful and fun. 10/10 experience would recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kelly Whitaker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUGfp9jccFynh6IusYPU4Daiidc27QfFuJAG_e4Zd2fImyVRUw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the vibes at Holistic so much! The atmosphere is amazing, I started seeing Ali and she has done such a great job with my hair, I highly recommend her. She is super attentive and knows what she is doing in such a great way.  I have gotten my hair cut and colored by her multiple times.

I used to see a stylist here who moved last year, his advice was “you can see anyone here they are all amazing”. He was so right :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Madeline M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGHdS8ZLqDF4nsMMxie6R87Usgi90qb95lZHkbMBz9A5cABv4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If you want to deal with hair school dropouts this is the place to go! Terrible experience with hair color and huge waste of money. During the color the stylist got the color all over my face. To top that off she made my dark brown hair jet black.

I had to go back again where they attempted to correct their mistake by applying two treatments of Malibu under heat lamps for over an hour. Stylist applied it to grey roots and the rest of the hair all in one sitting which was a mistake! The Malibu barely lifted the black but made my roots orange which I could not see until I got to a place where there was good light. Also the toner they were supposed to apply after Malibu never got done. When I asked stylist if he was going to apply toner, he said no. I trusted him:( After two complete fails I had zero faith in their abilities, want  my money back!

I had to pay ULTA for a toner treatment $90, now I'm going to have to pay a qualified stylist over $400 to get rid of this black hair. Holistic owner is refusing to refund my money. Terrible experience, terrible waste of time, huge wage of money. These stylists are amateurs and liars, they are fake heartless people.

I'm thankful to say that the mistakes this hair salon made with my hair color were corrected by another salon.

Message to responder below- get your facts straight! Clearly your employees are telling you lies. There was no consultation, your stylist was in a rush for some after work event involving the death of a bar tender from your neighboring business, she never told me she was coloring my hair ash black, never showed me a swatch. She got the color ALL over my face! My plans for after this hair color had to be cancelled because I had to go home and fix the stains all over my face! And you didn't do anything for free. In your  attempt to fix your mistake you created more mistakes! And the reason it took me 50 days to ask for a refund was because my boyfriend was going through chemotherapy and was in the hospital. Otherwise I was feeling so hopeless after what you did to my hair that I gave up. It wasn't until I revisited a former stylist who encouraged me to get the awful ink black hair fixed, that I decided to reach out to ask for a refund. I had no idea an honest business would say no. And what does you being "women owned" have to do with it?! You run your business like a teenager! My mother owned her own salon for 15 years and she was a professional, never treated any customers like you did me! I hope you crash and burn.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlEYPT0Dkjo3CxOT5AgQmclXzFGMgFNhgMBi9a&fid=0x0:0xa7037fcd4c9a51f1"],"When":"2023-7-18"},{"Name":"Madeline Nooney","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVJTEnm4gzqP8BYn_j-LXCdnsvkDZxJVeWT9v7j4oSozok6UUR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sheena is the best! I 100% recommend her to anyone looking for a new hairstylist or colorist. She’s super talented and always makes sure you leave feeling amazing. If you’re thinking about switching stylists, definitely go see her!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Megan VerDuft","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUDvpI89cUz__QpnuTWUbdXbftyno9W-KJPvkREt1emhA5hRCzM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I see Ashley at Arrow Beauty and I ADORE her. Not only is she an amazing hairdresser, but she’s an amazing person too. Ashley knows how to cut and style my hair in ways that are achievable for me to do at home, and that’s been a game changer. I also get color done with Ashley and she does a great root smudge and highlight that brings so much dimension to my hair (see a before and after below).

Final thoughts: Ashley is kind and welcoming to everyone in her chair, and she’s an expert at what she does. I highly recommend Ashley and Arrow Beauty 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiEuKWVMUrkQUNfdPID5FfEFZX0q31jXa8eF5F&fid=0x0:0x2443e1a205f6d873"],"When":"2025-1-4"},{"Name":"Bella Malherbe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmjD353i1AGdDSnT2I-t9tVUbFwUlfH2_FFSCivb56qLZp62kK0g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Parker Ramsay at Arrow Beauty Denver is wicked talented at razor cuts and color. I came in looking to get my calico color block touched up and they perfectly matched my old color ! They're also a really cool person; my appointment was never boring or awkward and I felt really affirmed the whole time. If you want a super cool haircut and/or color I would really recommend seeing Parker at Arrow !

*EDITED TO ADD PICTURES*","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhsv83Ev1kaTpmeuJlybsnBGGej7q1Vgjz4qYl&fid=0x0:0x2443e1a205f6d873"],"When":"2025-1-31"},{"Name":"Tena Prange - BHA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0RoV0E4DHvKonlIb3xkm4I-Wq2ZBcK_f_ylGei9nbkzYx626w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I saw Celine for my first visit to Arrow this past week. She made a 3+ hour appointment so relaxing and pleasant. Not only does Celine have expertise in what will work for your hair style and color, she has a warm personality and the perfect balance of chat and relaxation throughout your appointment. The end result was gorgeous and the cut gives my thin hair so much movement and vibrancy. I will be taking my daughter to Celine and doing maintenance visits at Arrow. Who knew Englewood had such classy services with the perfect Eng vibe!! 💕","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashley Hamilton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKoRE6oH37zFoBdj0FcuWsLfOTMY1FVd9HHfMOOkGbB8bkqxug=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Erika is amazing. She is down to earth and a visionary that nailed what I wanted so expertly. I walked away feeling glamorous and confident and blown away by her expertise. The entire experience was awesome from the moment I stepped in and was greeted by the front staff, was offered a beverage with friendly conversation, and I loved the products and overall vibes of the salon. They’re doing it right there, and I will be back. I would undoubtedly recommend Erika for anyone needing a hair Jedi, and for me, I have long, easily dry/static hair that needed layers and texture to bring it back to life. She did that and more. Thank you for being so awesome!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kim Boone","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKCLLCi901BmQYnXgIG9XfV4DQLlTnrYxn8TUx4QQh0sZs9yCVsw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What can I say about Ashley - she’s absolutely phenomenal. Best stylist I’ve ever had! She’s my go to for it all - full color, gray coverage, cut/style, blowouts, you name it. She gives every client her best, every time & it shows. You can tell she puts in the work to constantly better herself, to again, be the best for all her clients. Thanks for all you do for us, Ashley! 🙌💇🏻‍♀️✨","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alyxandra Martin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxI4fNPJ0sNBLwZi86zOl4gTcYPuYIXdrCHVlri2iwz2ZiQg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ericka was incredible! She listened to what I wanted for my hair, explained what would be achievable while considering my hair’s health and history, and executed exactly what I was hoping for. She was meticulous, thorough, and so kind throughout the whole appointment. She did not cut any corners and truly put so much time, love and effort into making my hair look perfect. I could not be happier with the result and it came out looking even more beautiful than I could’ve hoped! Ericka is incredibly talented and willing to put forth exceptional efforts. 10/10!
The salon is beautiful, clean, and pricing is very reasonable for the quality and caliber.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"S Kelly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPn1Z4k9EKkvV5cmyfRN9xvT9uq0lW3Cs17i8l21xU-P1U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love this salon.  It has a nice relaxing vibe.  This was my first time to see Alexa and I am so glad I did.  She is very talented and professional.  I left the salon very happy with my hair and relieved that I had finally found a stylist I trusted and liked.  I will be returning to see Alexa.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kenzie King","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVy4EnW-KojNmcul_6c0om6V7un_Q6yQTUYLDHEeZr9UlK16ANS=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a color service done at a different salon that was ✨not good.✨I had a lot of weird tones in my hair and Celine was able to fix the previous situation and get me closer to what I’d wanted in the first place!! So happy with where we got and grateful she was able to fix me!! I also have curly hair and am so happy with the curly cut. :)","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Mikayla Welch","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJIwPXvMem4-6sBhx-Fr_odLBGf_n0vhVUNtQkKrX6-H3TmQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sammi is an extremely talented stylist to go to.\nShe always does an amazing job with my hair and always makes you feel welcomed in her chair. Nothing is ever awkward and she’s honestly my favorite person. She’s been doing my hair for 4 years and I wouldn’t have it any other way.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPSHHxoKg6CiKFWKenrPQBqxHZ_E1b98_k4vH1W\u0026fid=0x0:0xb21c477127d5cc32"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Kristen Kelley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKIUfJHC7l0gHl3W9ICbik5jbqd51juRpZpHo9cgiKiPRKh-g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Katie Drew of KD Wax is the best! She's friendly and professional and I'm always at ease. She works quickly and there's minimal discomfort. I've been seeing her for several years now and am so excited to support her small (but awesome) business.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mandi Minjarez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWSa_jg-YhwZTiXM_xTrc1yrwxd8p54uf7bjjQG9y5dF_osOX0FqA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've had the pleasure of having Sammy do my hair a couple of times now ... just waiting to book my 3rd appointment soon... I found her by chance and let me tell you how happy I am to have found her... I've found who will do my hair until she's tired of it... She listens to exactly what you want and gives you advice of how to maintain it all... There is nothing this woman can't do or work with... She is a super down to earth person and makes you feel so comfortable...  Would give her 6 stars if I could...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqP1p2A71MsA_qWdpgzVrdHbkk6-LWlbDHgmzd\u0026fid=0x0:0xb21c477127d5cc32"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Tess Dusenberry","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhjSOtAAZ55JwvD_FQFjAFxm-G47jLvhEWNPIJR9LLuCQpQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Katie at KD Wax is the best!  From start to finish, everything was smooth and professional. She always makes me feel completely comfortable. The service is  quick, thorough, and virtually painless thanks to her expertise. The salon has a clean, calming atmosphere, which makes the whole experience even better. Highly recommend Katie for anyone looking for top-notch waxing services!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Destiny Sestina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCuaetoA3ESzSbCFv2JDaaOnRVkd339alTpX6Qim43EZ0rmKWH=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been going to sammi for about 4 years now and every time she has brought out my vision no matter how complicated and brings back my confidence. From what was at first business has turned into a friendship 🫶🏽 her professionalism and positive vibes along with her sense of humor and care she provides her clients, I 10/10 would recommend her. She is so talented and sweet and is always looking out for you and your hair heath! I love her!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"zeb gammons","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKc_Wr2oA_MIu1lzZW4GOp9Bxjlh7AxPdYfDx-nS7O5Dn8utg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Katie with KD WAX is professional, passionate and extremely efficient. I have been seeing her for my back wax for 12 years, I have followed her to Indie Salons and am so stoked to see her thrive owning her own business. It is rare to find someone who LOVES their job and the results are proof of that. Can’t recommend Katie enough for your waxing needs.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lexi MacArthur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzlTLwJjV94vJ_0WLMMNOU75TorfoiFwkWX0Cqpa9rt8Gc9xZ2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Indie Salons is great- it's such a convenient location \u0026 very easy to park! I've been going to Katie Drew at KD Wax for almost 10 years and I'm thrilled that she recently moved her location into Indie Salons. Katie is the best, always has a smile on her face \u0026 takes the best care of you- I highly recommend her! I am looking forward to exploring some of the other business inside Indie Salons!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Angel Cordova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV5j1Zr-kNF3CS_gOymBJO0eLCmsUza2lYl1LV7Fyn9WlqK1rh_KA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sammi has always done my hair and every single time over gone in I’m more than satisfied with the results! She’s amazing, friendly, and very easy going. She’s also a very easy person to talk to about anything. Going in to her salon I always feel more than welcomed and she always makes me feel comfortable. Regardless of what color I’ve wanted Sammi has always been able to make me feel so confident about my hair 🥹❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRH2doV8fflVdZdI3vpFhKS-OpreafBmHoDPQJ\u0026fid=0x0:0xb21c477127d5cc32"],"When":"2024-11-19"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jesse Blum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKcDsZfhJH2Hnq2KRVPFvcLFrAsodCQLaL8wdEo_LvpFfYnIi1nA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Beauty Bee is a phenomenal salon in Park Hill. The owner Kylie has a clean and beautiful shop. All of the stylists are friendly and helpful. There is shared parking with the other businesses and the vibe on the block is fantastic. Highly recommend Beauty Bee.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lindsey Culberson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXaanGYsyDFeSlSKGgnJ57bOzoKOmwnCFdOI9mr02IxOm_Y1VR4fA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kylie at Beauty Bee is amazing.  I was recommended through a friend who used her for her wedding.  She did a phenomenal job on all of my girls, my mom (and makeup) and my mother-in-laws hair.  I’m not one to wear a lot of make-up and she made me feel like the most beautiful bride on my wedding day.  Since then I have been going to her l for all my hair needs.  Whether it’s her touch or the keratin treatment, my hair has NEVER been healthier.  She never misses a beat, and I’m sure all the other girls the beauty bee are the same way.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf30UGnMfa10GRYtrqAZ1gDNLcdafhUckrHUEJ\u0026fid=0x0:0x8e8b52fd13c33c74"],"When":"2020-5-26"},{"Name":"Christine Jobin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeEikk6ODFD3YtpgSB1FjmHKFfPNot1PYl9yCTaiygS-Vz0SoC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Elizabeth gave me my favorite haircut I’ve ever had - wish I found her sooner! Thank you Elizabeth for doing exactly what we talked about, I love my hair!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mara DePena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXj2H13Aq_w4S8x_Bp6CaKCaziaUCSXGE2qxhLr04Gyx6uqa_U=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been to Beauty Bee a few times now to get curly express cuts with Raquel and have had a great experience. I’m currently growing out bleach damage and Raquel is very knowledgeable about how best to style my hair to have it looking great despite the damage. The appointments are short and sweet (just want you want from a layer lift, and I need them very frequently as my hair grows out!) and very affordable, which is rare for a curly cut. She also does bang trims free of charge, and touch ups for free if you need something tweaked right after a cut. The salon itself is nice and clean and in a great spot. I definitely recommend checking out Raquel for your curl needs!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3Y6zE7isuv7l7hPenffcuipV5D5YTcP3Sb6M\u0026fid=0x0:0x8e8b52fd13c33c74"],"When":"2023-12-20"},{"Name":"Sara Rager","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1kXSELfnQtgzCYqimrfFu9pYW_dbLHYwTrwrzAVgan9fLM_eT=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love Kylie!  She’s great.  She’s been cutting my hair for several years and I love it.  She’s so fun and makes you feel like a million bucks when you leave.  Great personality and great conversation!  She also did a friends wedding that I was in and everyone was very happy with their hair for the event.\nHer place on Oneida is also super cute, great location!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica McClintock","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUM9kutk3TK4YBGBxq0b53PvZRz0JmUIKttjbgXP7CrMmJb--Gq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I found Kylie early in 2019 when I was getting ready for my wedding. I emailed many hair stylists to get quotes and discuss what I was wanting for the trial and day of the wedding. Out of dozens of hair stylists and companies, Kylie was the only company that returned my emails. She was very professional setting up the appointments for not only myself, but also my mother, husband, and sister-in-law. Kylie never failed to send reminders and be as accommodating as possible. We all received work that we were beyond happy with and were not disappointed. Despite living over an hour away, my husband and I still prefer to go to Kylie to get our regular haircuts because of the quality work and professionalism Kylie and her staff show us. I would highly recommend getting work done with Beauty Bee Salon. P.S. the shop just got renovated and looks great.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ileena Miltenberger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUX9hNGUwfHzBm-z2kd1ony-_Hv6yfLHfF-SSO9T2PJva_Ks1YIKA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am that girl who likes to change my hair every other month, even would box dye my hair! (For those who change hair as much as I did, that's a no no!) My hair was dead and dry! When I went to Kylie, it all changed!!! She truly saved my hair!! She managed to get the brassy undertones out and recommended great products to use. Also, my daughter who is 5, loves Kylie and wouldn't dare to cheat on her! It's because her salon is so warm and home like! We truly couldn't ask for a better experience every single time. The staff there is also so sweet! 10/10 recomend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jae Anderson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKeYwEspzLxHDJakDoqvoPkcAMqIBcZF9XlxHwWDEn5jkjNkg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have gone to many different salons in the area. I was never really satisfied with how my hair turned out. Kylie did an amazing job on my hair! She took her time and made sure it was done right and exactly how I wanted it. Kylie was very professional but I also felt extremely comfortable around her! I will definitely be going back to Beauty Bee salon and I highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""}]

Cynthia and Mandy are always very helpful and make me feel valued as a client.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lora K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkFK1ZpNZbthIrvLLIA7Jp3THl8Z5pVUxvYGA7ek_voTj3QgNcjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Orion is amazing for all hair cuts and styles!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKgdYLBdryZ8lBJyiCUPT5mpo9TkTtBZzxedlD\u0026fid=0x0:0x8ca97d4b536afd8f"],"When":"2025-3-12"},{"Name":"Brea Christopherson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSmsl2gIk3WM7q5rOMj_flVagmGmaIMAPUjD_Gt6bfd5jJOg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Look has a great vibe and Alessandra is amazing. She is so warm, kind, and always takes great care of my hair! Great atmosphere!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ramiza Aldawood","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTEDJc1FUNxg7rCpcDkrfeoFg7kYRcDeQQ6Zr1lxfjSHk8nv4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Heather is absolutely AMAZING at what she does. I truly didn’t think I could find my “ hair person” after my last stylist moved away. I had such a hard time finding a stylist that connected with me and understood my needs.  I’ve been following Heather on instagram for a while now and our schedules finally aligned. I could not be happier with my hair. Not only is she good with the hair, she is just so kind and communicates with you about everything she is doing! I haven’t been confident with my hair last few times I had it done. I walked out of that salon with so much confidence, just so happy with what she has accomplished and that I have finally found this place. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsHs7dWV2fcIQXq3Nnrn5y1juBvOuc9tJCoALq\u0026fid=0x0:0x8ca97d4b536afd8f"],"When":"2023-4-3"},{"Name":"Landon Beste","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7hjX__zR1HaOWxYH2iW0Oj1-HOwfrMFTvKYnI6w5HSosYV6viCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kaila always does an amazing job. staff is super attentive and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjYKtwNAZdHdlOx8sBS5S4y4XDlKtrgIUQlIhe\u0026fid=0x0:0x8ca97d4b536afd8f"],"When":"2025-3-14"},{"Name":"Moriah Shockley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWbD7Q1iWRifItutlapLc2mTCxQDja1iDKczslVFcVlyy7wtNzI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been a client of Lyndie ‘s for over two years and I am extremely happy with her services. Lyndie is the consummate professional and a wonderful practitioner. My skin has never looked and felt as good as it does today. Thank you, Lyndie.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kelsie Kleiber","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6j-XqAcVG4zKvyOhJF40xaw_rk-mMQbtte8RWd4C4pErYKc-C4A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Heather does AMAZING work and is a master at balayage. She took me from a brunette to a beautiful blonde color that looks natural and fresh. Her bubbly personality makes the visit enjoyable and she always provides great professional advice as well. Heather is my go-to hair professional, highly recommend! Her work is also featured on her Instagram account: hl_glamdolls.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzI5WVH8uYc3Qrti2sX-yiZWoauwpFsWI1R4KF\u0026fid=0x0:0x8ca97d4b536afd8f"],"When":"2022-2-11"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nate Kennelly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWa_4LTm5cfrwgQahJRl24AzKwSvqeaHRhALRGTSybyFB6XO3Nc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the BEST place to go for any of your hair needs. Ergun runs a very family friendly, great place. The experience is all about you and by the time you are walking out, you are amazing.
We live in Loveland but we happily drive to this excellent location because of how great the experience is. Always greeted with a smile and good vibes, Ergun will be sure to make you are happy with your hair. He has a passion for hair that is remarkable and I truly appreciate his passion. My wife started going to this place about 5 years ago and we know we won’t go anywhere else. From start to finish, it is a truly amazing experience.
We let my son’s hair grow until he was 5 years old. Ergun was so caring when he cut my son’s hair for the first time. It was nerve wracking, but Ergun handled it like a pro. A truly ethical man with an impressive amount of positivity. Anyone would be lucky to have their hair done by him.
He has a lab and he creates a bunch of really great products. I have a dry scalp and his energizing shampoo helps me like no other shampoo that I’ve tried over the last 40 years of my life.
I respect Ergun so much because he realized his passion at a young age, went for it and now look at him! His shop is amazing and he does an amazing job with everyone I’ve seen come through there.
There is one thing certain, you will be in a better mood when you leave there than when you arrived. I love this place and will be a lifelong patron of this top notch establishment. Say hi to me if you see me and my family there!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMq3ImnCy4rvm9cQHHr47SUe4X5S4GfhdGdukp-&fid=0x0:0xd8cae1b5671e6c79"],"When":"2023-4-14"},{"Name":"Doga Altuntas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiIuSA4d5AXECrTrzkOHlFzMvqqmDUtLvsxZOpGff89lJsUA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're looking for a top-tier hair stylist, Ergun is the one you need to see. I’ve been trusting him with my cut and color for the past 10 years, and every single visit has been a flawless experience. He’s not just a stylist; he’s a true master of his craft. Whether it’s a fresh cut or a new color, he always knows exactly what will work best for me. I can’t imagine going to anyone else—his attention to detail, expertise, and personalized approach are unmatched. If you want someone who really knows hair, Ergun is the best in the business!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Doğa Topaçoğlu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXW-Dh-2CD0QN947zpibwdt519PI39WFVaLbAfSlX970mMR24R7=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had a fantastic experience at Ergun Tercan European Salon! The hair extensions I got are flawless and look so natural. The staff is professional, attentive, and made me feel welcome from the start. I also loved the touch of Turkish coffee they offered—it made the visit even more special. Highly recommend for anyone looking for top-notch service and a great atmosphere!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lizbeth Medellin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJMgB0OAE9tyhSy9oxatX5yUtoEwIHlNNQa64_BZD4RY6fKyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Let me start by saying I am writing this review after 5 weeks of having my keratin extensions on, I  have worn extensions for a very long time and I have  try them all! I was a little undecided if  I wanted to try the keratin method but I finally decided to go for them, and I love them! Ergun is such a professional in what he does, he was very time efficient, extremely professional. Everyone at the salon had an incredible customer service, I could not be more pleased.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ur Mom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJXOIlp-kXsD-UODtqH4fy9K6FK3vTVPEbVLwNspT5s-VHM8Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If I could give 0 stars I would. I went here in hopes to make myself more confident, the end result made me more self conscious. Being in the hair industry myself, I feel taken advantage of. I wasn't so worried about the price at first, you get that you pay for right? wrong. I paid well over $2000 for hair extensions and they felt cheap, tangles easy and left my hair matted. They fell out of my hair within the span of 2-3 months (taking some of my real hair with it) even with the proper maintenance and care. After having them taken out, my hair looks worse than it did before, so much breakage and unevenly cut from the stylist trying to blend my real hair and the extension hair. I couldn't wear my hair down because it wouldn't blend even when curled, so I had to wear my hair up and strategically place each hair because the glue would peak out. I'm very dissatisfied with this service. I would have hoped that spending so much money would mean higher quality, unfortunately I was wrong. Another stylist from a different salon had told me it was the worst hair extension job they had ever seen, hair matted at the bonds(even with proper care, this is inevitable). AVOID THIS PLACE AT ALL COSTS","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Asia Villalva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFnVQeLQeRbIs9k0jvUAXhEZXcgouH0jCvY_bpaFGLeTvX4A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been coming to this salon for years now! It’s my favorite place to get my hair done. Ergun and his staff treat me like a Queen every time I am there. They all remember my name as they greet me with best Turkish coffee I’ve ever had.  I have been a long time client of Samantha Balagat and I could not imagine letting anyone else touch my hair. I have very dark, thick and heavy hair which calls for long sessions as I have been transitioning to icy blonde. She is patient and she loves to explain her process as she works, I feel like I get a free science lesson every visit. Her knowledge of the color bar is also somewhat scientific as she always seems to know the perfect blend of colors to add or mix. Sam is a true artist and she wows me every visit. I always say “Sam I don’t know how you lifted my hair so well” and her answer is always “Old Turkish Secret” This salon is amazing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5d97-42rq1aFh7WzEhUwfwkIApLznqRaWsDVx&fid=0x0:0xd8cae1b5671e6c79"],"When":"2022-2-9"},{"Name":"Astabraq Al Rawe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_gclw7q6UgG5fcB2TxgFubhMoFA-vT9goyqxFdykJJhDbiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of getting a haircut. Samantha was in charge of doing my haircut, and I couldn’t be more satisfied with the experience. The stylist was exceptional at her job, delivering a haircut that exceeded my expectations. Her attention to detail and skill were awe-inspiring.
The staff at the salon were amiable and welcoming, especially since I’m a hijabi Muslim female. Everyone was considerate and very friendly, making the entire visit enjoyable from start to finish. To top it all off, I was treated to a delicious cup of Turkish coffee, which added a delightful touch to the overall experience.
I highly recommend Ergün Tercan European Salon to anyone looking for a top-notch haircut and a warm, inviting atmosphere. I’ll definitely be returning!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Katrina Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXf5cBB7_Ln-_H-H2khGx3_6f4DelhFyOHdPloe6CGPINcKQVW8zA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was extremely disappointed in my experience at the salon. I showed the hairstylist what I wanted which is basically a trim of what I already had. I showed how short I wanted to cut off which was about 3 inches when I'm standing up.  Then I sat down, he measured my hair based on a layer that I had in the front and did a rough cut that took off 6+ inches of hair. On top of that, he was telling me a story about how he made another client cry because he chopped off her hair to donate to charity but cut it too short. Long and behold, it happened to me. What was supposed to be a trim with face framing layers ended up becoming a long bob. My hair is so uneven that I need to go to a different salon to fix it. I have attached photos of my hair before, what I was aiming for and what I ended up with. If you're looking for a salon who completely disregards your requests, then this is the place. I reached out to management to get a refund and they offered to give me a complimentary appointment. After what I went through, I would never ever let them touch my hair ever again. I never once in my life walk out of a salon bawling my eyes out. What was supposed to be a nice thing to do for myself ended up being something really traumatic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOF71llsBgyAZdP6zxvcy56xfl7XOD_3pmJsig-&fid=0x0:0xd8cae1b5671e6c79"],"When":"2024-7-29"}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Lindsey Mulhern","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXIoH5DAHK7-4N2HObKU600A6cTXYeAKQ-MmthIObasBPrGvG59=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had my hair done by the wonderful Gina Martinez at Blondies Beauty Shop. This was the best experience I have ever had at a salon. Everyone is very professional and friendly. It is a very unique experience from the time you walk in to the end. Gina is truly an artist with her color and hairstyling. She takes her time consulting on what you want and then she gives her input and expertise. Gina's assistant Erika is going to be a great hair stylist as she learns the tricks of the trade from the best, Gina. She does a wonderful shampoo and blow out, making me feel like I am ready for the cat walk! ;) I also really love how healthy my hair feels after my deep conditioning treatment. Everyone that I see walk out of Blondies looks amazing, these girls have got it goin' on!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Courtney R. Ponce Guzman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4-O7y0z_zZAt_szmQW3Tzv-TcWUeWwX-D586nPLm3hyUonTON=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time with Gina was absolutely amazing! She was honest and very upfront with each step of the way and reality of the outcome. She took the time to listen \u0026 research what we wanted \u0026 needed during our appointment. Her assistant, Angel, was such a huge help and contributed to our satisfaction as well! Gina's work is absolutely AMAZING and has gained a continued customer! Give her a try - You will NOT regret it!! I feel like a million bucks!! Thank you, Gina!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kelli Love","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJpdbDpeT65YwTK6GbtJtMgRrxce23_R6eL1gxjvd9RvIrhPQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I always have an amazing time at Blondies!  I feel pampered and all of the girls are so welcoming.  Gina has been doing my hair for over 12 years and has an amazing artistic talent.  I regularly get stopped (often by other stylists) to ask who does my hair and compliment the color and cut.  Gina will listen to what you want, take your vision and make it even better than you imagined.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Charlotte Jankoski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULxmb_eIGOwlr_RpJqKSLkoAFTeomuQEo2_5mAxAXN1BXLCKc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I agree it is expensive, but it is worth every cent.  I have been to many different salons all over Denver and in Cherry Creek and Blondies is by far the very BEST.  I have been going to Gina and Cameron mostly and they have amazing talent with color and cut.  I have been to other stylists in the salon and watched as their clients leave and they are all beautiful.  I would not even think of going anywhere else.  I have recommended friends and they have loved the salon as well.  You will be treated like royalty and feel like a new fabulous, refreshed person when you leave.  Highly recommend!!!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Roberta Keller","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIXtcIKyjNg5ns7L9G53dwY9AbdXwihcsZW-tdGaXByZgrPwA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been going to Gina for 14 years and love what she does with my hair! There is no one that makes you feel like Gina does. The hip vibe of Blondie's lets you know you are in the presence of true artists. I have always found the service to be excellent and feel like I am being pampered throughout my appointment. After each appointment, I feel a need to go out and do something special because that's how I feel!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Angel Perna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0IUufl8pIrXsG38tAk4s9WiE_atEfft-9WCJP6UgJufwOxGU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have never in my life experienced such a talented professional as Gina.  I honestly believe she is the best hairstylist in Denver and maybe even the whole country.  She did things to my hair that I never knew was possible and I was so surprised by how healthy it was after all the treatments she did.  This woman is beyond anything else that is out there and I absolutely insist people give her a try!  You will not be disappointed!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tawnya Fabian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqduAQf7wls019M3MT-4NtzxjIlTNFQN8u1ogluHjSclK-wg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been a client of Gina's for about 10 years, and I have had the pleasure of sitting in the chairs of many of the stylists at Blondies on occasion. While I have a very long history with the salon, I am always treated as if I am a new client, not someone who can be brushed aside due to familiarity. I always feel welcomed, appreciated, and valued - a part of this incredible family of talented and highly-educated stylists. I sincerely cherish my decade-long association with Blondies, and I ALWAYS leave the salon with knock-it-out-of-the-park hair!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Lauren Schwartz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQK6AGjblJ7sAB-4tst0SmO6wONN2sgUePTJhtPH1ctvPSLiF_aw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am a huge fan! Gina Martinez is not only an artist, but also a very caring and generous individual who makes her clients feel special. I never regret blocking out some time for myself to be cared for by the team at Blondies. Plus, I like the fact that over the years random strangers have consistently asked me who does my hair.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Patty Concialdi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVE4K3TQB6NnE_u8gn2IGXOtUYl79v0Ex51HQe5J-vQrSwYC4ug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Jade is wonderful! She is a specialist in her craft. She takes her time and explains everything in detail and gives you her best recommendations. 😊🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Meredith Long","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVi5W4xx9v4SEz3j9aYJqbzM189EFEiw3YmGNF0RBpnPBpwwm3V=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Sway has really changed with the relocation. There’s no longer a receptionist to schedule appointments. There’s no online booking system, so you’re left to exchange a series of texts with your stylist in an attempt to divine their schedule.
